Title: La Vedetta 2017 Cà Grossa (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of ripe white stone fruit, tropical fruit and pastry cream shape the inviting nose. Mirroring the aromas, the enveloping, delicious palate doles out white peach, vanilla and candied lemon zest. Crisp acidity lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vestini Campagnano 2018 Le Ortole Pallagrello Bianco (Terre del Volturno)
Country: Terre del Volturno, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made entirely with red grape Corinto Nero, this ruby-colored dessert wine has compelling aromas of, prune, red cherry marinated in spirits, grilled herb and walnut. The rounded palate offers baked plum, Christmas cake, vanilla and carob. It's enveloping and velvety, while fresh acidity lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fenech 2017 Disiato Corinto Nero (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Made with native grapes Fiano and Greco, this opens with aromas of yellow field flower, mature stone fruit and a whiff of Mediterranean brush. The savory palate delivers ripe apricot, Bartlett pear and a mineral note evoking flint before a honeyed almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2017 Campanaro White (Irpinia)

Description: This opens with aromas of walnut and orange liqueur. Reflecting the nose, the palate, doles out candied orange zest, acacia honey and walnut while fresh acidity boosts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Hauner 2016 Carlo Hauner Passito (Malvasia delle Lipari)
Country: Malvasia delle Lipari, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Aromas of yellow wild flower, ripe tropical fruit and a yeasty whiff of pasty dough form the nose. The mouthwatering palate doles out ripe apricot, Bartlett pear and citrus while Mediterranean and a smoky mineral note add depth. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rossovermiglio 2017 Falanghina del Sannio
Country: Falanghina del Sannio, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of mature pear, hazelnut and acacia honey carry on to the linear, medium-bodied palate along with a hint of lemon zest on this restrained, classy white. A flinty mineral note marks the finish and lends depth. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta del Meriggio 2017 Fiano di Avellino
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Smooth and concentrated, this has subtle aromas suggesting underbrush, leather and steeped prune. Showing the heat of the vintage, the palate is rather evolved, offering the same prune note as the nose along with baking spice and tobacco. It's savory and ready, with polished tannins. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Di Meo 2011 Vigna Olmo Riserva (Taurasi)

Description: Made with dried Malvasia grapes, this opens with intense aromas of date, mature apricot and jasmine. The enticing aromas carry over to the savory palate alongside fresh acidity and notes of almond and chestnut honey. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2017 Passito di Noto
Country: Passito di Noto, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: This opens with aromas of dried apricot, marmalade and jasmine. The fruity aromas carry over to the creamy palate together with dried exotic fruit and bright acidity. Notes of pine nuts and vanilla emerge on the persistent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2018 Passito di Noto
Country: Passito di Noto, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Culinary spice, Mediterranean brush and mature dark-skinned fruit aromas take shape on this full-boded wine. Structured and enveloping, the smooth palate delivers ripe blackberry, baked plum, nutmeg and clove framed in fine-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argiolas 2015 Senes Riserva (Carignano del Sulcis)
Country: Carignano del Sulcis, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Balsamic aromas of camphor mingle with new leather, French oak, blue flower and exotic spice. Densely concentrated, the brawny palate offers prune marinated in spirits, licorice, tobacco and a note of dried cherry alongside tightly knit, close-grained tannins and the heat of evident alcohol. This is all about power and spice but fans of fruit richness should drink sooner rather than later. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Coppo 2015 Riserva della Famiglia (Nizza)

Description: Chewy and savory, this smooth young red doles out ripe black-cherry, juicy blackberry, licorice and baking-spice flavors. It's generous and ready to enjoy, with polished tannins. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2017 Rubrato Aglianico (Irpinia)

Description: A blend of Nero d'Avola and Frappato, this opens with aromas of black-skinned berry, carob and Mediterranean brush. The savory, balanced palate offers black cherry, orange zest, blackberry jam and white pepper alongside polished tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2017 Dorilli (Cerasuolo di Vittoria Classico)
Country: Cerasuolo di Vittoria Classico, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Aromas of black- and red-skinned berry, blue flower and exotic spice waft out of the glass along with a whiff of graphite. On the linear palate, bright acidity accompanies juicy red cherry, ripe raspberry, green pepper corn and a hint of star anise. Polished tannins offer lithe support. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Saracco 2016 Per Sba Glio (Barbera d'Alba)

Description: Aromas of mature golden apple and smoky flint carry on to the linear, elegant palate along with Meyer lemon and toasted almond. A honeyed note lingers on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Cavalier Pepe 2016 Brancato (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Yellow stone fruit, graphite and Mediterranean scrub aromas form the nose. Round and tangy, the fresh, savory palate delivers ripe apricot, lemon drop and saline alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argiolas 2018 Meri (Vermentino di Sardegna)
Country: Vermentino di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Mature black-skinned fruit, leather, blue flower and exotic spice mingle with balsamic notes on this brawny red. The jammy palate shows baked plum, ripe blackberry, tobacco and oak-driven spice set against enveloping tannins and the warmth of alcohol. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Coppo 2016 Pomorosso (Nizza)

Description: Aromas evoking black-skinned berry, new leather, blue flower, Asian spice and dried botanical herb waft out of the glass. On the taut, linear palate, youthfully austere, fine-grained tannins envelope cranberry, pomegranate, star anise and a hint of ground clove while surprisingly fresh acidity for the hot vintage keeps it balanced. It's still young and needs a few more years to unwind. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2015 Taurasi

Description: Apricot, wild herb and spring-blossom aromas lead the nose on this fragrant dessert sparkler. It's silky and delicious, doling out ripe apricot, orange zest, sage and mineral alongside tangy acidity that brightens the rich flavors. A softly foaming perlage lends finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi Incisa della Rocchetta 2018 Felice (Moscato d'Asti)

Description: White spring flower and green-melon aromas lead the nose on this bright, fragrant white. The smooth savory palate delivers crunchy green apple, cantaloupe and white peach plus a hint of banana alongside crisp acidity. A saline note backs up the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vestini Campagnano 2018 Falanghina (Terre del Volturno)
Country: Terre del Volturno, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Eucalyptus, Mediterranean scrub and exotic spice aromas carry over to the full-bodied palate along morello cherry and raspberry jam. Fine-grained tannins provide elegant support while a saline note signals the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argiolas 2016 Is Solinas (Carignano del Sulcis)
Country: Carignano del Sulcis, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Eucalyptus, rose, wild red-berry and alpine-herb aromas mingle together in the glass. On the austere, linear palate, firm acidity and fine-grained tannins accompany sour cherry, orange zest and star anise. Drink 2021–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Pianelle 2015 Bramaterra

Description: Nearly amber colored, this unusual but compelling wine initially has a shy nose that eventually shows dried sage, dried yellow stone fruit, citrus and flinty mineral. Vinified and aged in amphora, the smooth, almost syrupy palate also has a surprising weightless quality, offering dried apricot, mature orange zest and tangy oyster shell alongside fresh acidity. It closes on a hazelnut note. While it's not for everyone, fans of orange wine will be impressed. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Fontana 2017 Vigneti ad Alberata (Asprinio di Aversa)
Country: Asprinio di Aversa, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This bright red has inviting aromas of red berry, rose petal and Mediterranean scrub. The juicy palate offers strawberry, red cherry and clove alongside silky tannins and fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Valle dell'Acate 2018 Il Frappato Red (Vittoria)

Description: Smooth and tangy, this enjoyable red has alluring aromas of blueberry, blackberry and carob. The aromas follow on to the bright, tangy palate along with lithe tannins and vibrant acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Curto 2016 Nero d'Avola (Eloro)

Description: Grilled herb, French oak, camphor and Mediterranean scrub aromas form the nose. Made with 85% Bovale, 10% Carignano and 5% Cannonau, the tightly wound palate features dried cherry, cassis, licorice and green peppercorn accompanied by grippy, close-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argiolas 2016 Korem Red (Isola dei Nuraghi)
Country: Isola dei Nuraghi, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Delicate aromas of red berry, baking spice and leather emerge from the glass. The full-bodied palate offers red cherry, clove and licorice alongside firm tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cavalier Bartolomeo 2015 San Lorenzo (Barolo)

Description: Aromas of cassis, dark berry and spice form the nose of this Nero d'Avola. The savory, full-bodied palate delivers ripe black cherry, blackberry jam and black pepper alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cusumano 2016 Sàgana Tenuta San Giacomo Vigneto del Torrone Bianco Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
Designation: Sàgana Tenuta San Giacomo Vigneto del Torrone Bianco

Description: Aromas of mature dark-skinned berry and Mediterranean scrub lead the nose on this 100% Nero d'Avola. The bright palate delivers blackberry jam, star anise and white pepper alongside pliant tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Donnafugata 2018 Sherazade Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Showing structure and a restrained elegance, this has a rather shy nose that eventually reveals white stone fruit, dried thyme, citrus and a hint of nut. The smooth palate offers mature yellow pear, saline and bitter almond before a light honey note signals the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fontcreuse 2017 Fiano di Avellino
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This juicy red opens with aromas of ripe dark-skinned berry, star anise and a whiff of forest floor. Rounded, chewy and fresh, the savory palate doles out mature Marasca cherry, cranberry, licorice and a hint of truffle alongside smooth tannins. Enjoy through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Michele Chiarlo 2017 Le Orme 16 Mesi (Barbera d'Asti)

Description: Made with Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, this opens with aromas of dark-skinned berry, bell pepper and tilled earth. The structured palate offers black plum, white pepper, mocha and tobacco alongside smooth tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2015 Menfi Burdese Red (Sicilia)

Description: Made predominantly with Nero d'Avola and a touch of Merlot, this offers aromas of black-skinned berry, Mediterranean scrub and cooking spice. The juicy plate offers black-cherry jam, white pepper and vanilla alongside polished tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2016 Noto Controdanza Red (Sicilia)

Description: Soft and approachable, this offers aroma of mature blackberry, forest floor and blue flower. On the savory palate, pliant tannins accompany juicy black cherry, raspberry and a pepper note. Enjoy soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bava 2017 Libera (Barbera d'Asti)

Description: Aromas of mature yellow stone fruit, dried pineapple and candied citrus slice form the nose. On the enveloping palate, notes of vanilla and honey accompany apricot candied lemon drop. This would make a good meditation wine to sip after a meal. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Caravaglio 2018 Malvasia delle Lipari
Country: Malvasia delle Lipari, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: A blend of Nebbiolo, Vespolina and Croatina, this tangy rosato has delicate aromas of red berry, wild herb, violet and vineyard dust. It's crisp and savory, featuring sour cherry, pomegranate, orange zest and white pepper alongside vibrant acidity. It closes on a mineral note suggesting oyster shell. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Pianelle 2018 Al Posto dei Fiori Rosato (Coste della Sesia)

Description: Spring wild flower, green-melon and white stone fruit aromas mingle with Mediterranean scrub aromas. On the palate, saline notes accent creamy white peach, pineapple and citrus alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tasca d'Almerita 2018 Cavallo delle Fate Grillo (Sicilia)

Description: White stone fruit, wild herb and spring blossom aromas lift out of the glass. The vibrant, savory palate doles out succulent pineapple, white peach and Bartlett pear before a crisp, saline-driven finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Cavalier Pepe 2018 Falanghina (Irpinia)

Description: Aromas of Mediterranean scrub, dark spice and mature black-skinned fruit form the nose. It's warm, ripe and full bodied, doling fleshy black cherry, prune and licorice alongside velvety tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Agricola Punica 2015 Barrua Red (Isola dei Nuraghi)
Country: Isola dei Nuraghi, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Country: Isola dei Nuraghi, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Aromas of hazelnut, pressed field flower and ripe stone fruit form the nose. The medium-bodied palate suggests dried yellow peach, lemon drop and dried aromatic herb before a bitter almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina del Taburno 2017 2017 Falanghina (Beneventano)

Description: Heady aromas of white rose and apricot practically jump out of the glass. Dry and linear, the crisp palate offers unripe yellow peach and lemon zest alongside a note of crushed Mediterranean herb. Brisk acidity gives it a vibrant edge. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gorghi Tondi 2018 Rajah Biologico Zibibbo (Sicilia)

Description: The rather subdued nose has aromas of yellow stone fruit and a hint of hazelnut. The aromas carry over to the palate along with white almond, a hint of peach and tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nuraghe Crabioni 2018 Kanimar (Vermentino di Sardegna)
Country: Vermentino di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: This deeply hued wine has aromas of acacia honey, dried apricot and grilled Mediterranean herb. The linear, lean palate offers lemon drop, pineapple and honeyed notes before a bitter walnut close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Bartolo 2016 White (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Aromas of fragrant spring flower and exotic fruit make their way front and center. The crisp palate offers pineapple, honeydew melon and lemon zest alongside brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Marchisio 2018 Falanghina (Campania)

Description: A blend of Fiano, Moscato and Falanghina, this has aromas of yellow stone fruit, citrus and Mediterranean brush. The aromas carry on to the bright palate alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casa di Baal 2018 White (Colli di Salerno)
Country: Colli di Salerno, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Fragrant spring flower and exotic fruit aromas lead the nose. On the rounded, fruity palate, tangy acidity accompanies banana, pineapple and honeydew melon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: F.lli Puddu 2018 Gioas Su Sole White (Isola dei Nuraghi)
Country: Isola dei Nuraghi, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Aromas of leather, camphor and underbrush follow over to the palate together with notes of salted game and dried cherry. Firm acidity and tight close-grained tannins leave an austere, rather astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Chiosso 2016 Fara

Description: This Frappato has aromas of candied berry and white pepper. The aromas carry over to the light-bodied palate along with soft tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Bastonaca 2017 Frappato (Terre Siciliane)

Description: This has an extremely shy nose that eventually reveals subtle whiffs of Spanish broom and ripe white stone fruit. The round palate is also understated and subdued, offering delicate notes suggesting mature yellow apple, bitter almond a honeyed note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantine Olivella 2017 Lacrimabianco White (Lacryma Christi del Vesuvio)
Country: Lacryma Christi del Vesuvio, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas suggesting spring blossom, mature yellow pear and grilled herb shape the nose. The aromas carry over to the rounded, rather evolved palate along with notes of citrus zest and a hint of tangy saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Claudio Quarta 2017 Greco di Tufo
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with organically farmed Nero d'Avola and Frappato grapes, this opens with aromas of dark-skinned berry and cooking spice. The supple palate offers blackberry jam, toast and mocha. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cortese 2017 Classico Sabuci (Cerasuolo di Vittoria)
Country: Cerasuolo di Vittoria, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Red berry, vineyard dust and a whiff of carob shape the nose. On the enjoyable palate, orange zest and saline accompany blueberry jam and lemon thyme alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Curto 2018 Rosato EOS Nero d'Avola (Eloro)

Description: Made with organically grown Nero d'Avola, this opens with aromas of roasted coffee bean, toasted oak and ripe dark-skinned berry. The assertive palate offers blackberry jam, mocha and toasted oak alongside close-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudo di Santa Tresa 2016 Avulisi Nero d'Avola (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Savory and bright, this has delicate aromas suggesting white spring flower, tropical fruit and white stone fruit. The tangy, refreshing palate offers pear, honeydew melon and citrus alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fina 2018 Kebrilla Grillo (Sicilia)

Description: Subtle aromas suggesting tilled earth, leather and underbrush form the nose along with a whiff of eucalyptus. On the somewhat lean palate, you'll find truffle, prune and dried sage alongside brisk acidity and dusty, drying tannins that leave a rather drying finish. Drink sooner rather than later. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Chiosso 2010 Ghemme

Description: Balsamic aromas of camphor, worn leather and dried rose lead the nose. On the straightforward palate, lithe tannins lightly support dried cherry, orange zest and a hint of anise. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Chiosso 2011 Red (Colline Novaresi)

Description: Delicate scents suggesting field flower, white stone fruit and citrus slowly appear on this. It's racy and linear, offering Meyer lemon, pineapple and saline alongside racy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Guardiense 2018 Janare Greco (Sannio)

Description: The shy nose slowly reveals Mediterranean scrub, citrus and a whiff of Spanish broom. The aromas give way to the linear palate offering sour cherry, citrus and a fennel note alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palmento Costanzo 2018 Mofete Rosato (Etna)

Description: Aromas of yellow peach and pineapple carry over to the bright, racy palate along with a note of white almond. Vibrant acidity gives it a crisp, clean close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Cavalier Pepe 2018 Bianco di Bellonona Coda di Volpe (Irpinia)

Description: Intense aromas of orange blossom and pressed flower evoking room freshener jump out of the glass. On the syrupy, rather one-dimensional palate, you'll honey and candied notes. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colosi 2015 Passito Na'jm Malvar (Salina)

Description: Made with organically grown Nero d'Avola grapes, this has aromas of dark-skinned berry, Mediterranean brush and baking spice. The easygoing, light-bodied palate offers blackberry jam, star anise and a touch of white pepper alongside smooth tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gorghi Tondi 2018 Luce di Luna Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Leather, underbrush, menthol and moist soil aromas form the nose. On the palate, brisk acidity accompanies dried cherry, powdered sage and a hint of tobacco leaf alongside assertive close-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Chiosso 2013 Gattinara

Description: Made with organically grown Nero d'Avola, this has aromas of ripe dark-skinned fruit and tilled soil. The mature palate offers blackberry extract, star anise and cocoa alongside smooth tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantine Grasso 2017 Lilium Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: This Nero d'Avola has aromas suggesting dark-skinned fruit and baking spice. The round palate offers blackberry jam, vanilla and a hint of cooking spice alongside smooth tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantine Grasso 2017 Sette Aia Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Made with organically grown Nerello Mascalese, this opens with delicate aromas of red berry and underbrush. The lean, linear palate offers sour cherry and a hint of star anise alongside lithe tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cortese 2018 Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: This has a shy nose that eventually reveals aromas of toasted nut and pressed acacia flower. On the lean, somewhat evolved palate, tangy acidity accompanies dried pineapple slice and a hint of green melon before a white-almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cusumano 2015 Cubia Insolia (Sicilia)

Description: This opens with aromas of cassis and star anise. The simple palate offers blackberry, vanilla and white pepper alongside smooth tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudo Arancio 2017 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sicilia)

Description: Intense aromas of spring blossom, white stone fruit and Meyer lemon lift out of the glass. The crisp, light-bodied palate isn't quite as expressive as the nose, suggesting peach and citrus alongside vibrant acidity. It closes on a hint of white almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: MandraRossa 2017 Bertolino Soprano Grillo (Sicilia)

Description: A deeply hued, golden-yellow, this aged white wine has a shy nose that eventually gives up whiffs of wet stone, pressed acacia flower and the barest hint of honey. Reflecting the nose, the lean, subdued palate suggests saline, bitter walnut and the merest hint of dried apricot. Drink soon to capture what little fruit remains. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antico Castello 2014 Mida Greco (Irpinia)

Description: Aromas suggesting yellow stone fruit and vanilla form the delicate nose. The palate is less expressive and on the lean side, offering dried peach slice, orange zest and a hint of toasted almond alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Olianas 2018 Vermentino di Sardegna
Country: Vermentino di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Lean and light-bodied, this has aromas of Meyer lemon, sea brine and a hint of yellow-apple skin. The aromas follow over to the brisk, simple palate along before closing on a note of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Contrada Salandra 2016 Falanghina (Campi Flegrei)

Description: Made with organically grown Nero d'Avola, this informal wine opens with aromas of dark berry and cooking spice. The aromas carry over to the simple palate along with smooth tannins and the merest touch of white pepper. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantine Ermes 2018 Vento di Mare Bio Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Smooth and easygoing, this light-bodied red has aromas of wild red berry and whiffs of dark spice. On the soft, simple palate, pliant tannins loosely support fleshy blackberry and a hint of tobacco. Drink now. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Guardiense 2017 Janare Aglianico (Beneventano)

Description: Subtle aromas suggesting Mediterranean scrub and white stone fruit waft out of the glass. It's simple but well made, offering pineapple and citrus alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Bastonaca 2018 Grillo (Sicilia)

Description: Informal and easy drinking, this simple wine suggests sour cherry, pomegranate and the barest hint of spice. Loose-knit, rather fleeting tannins offer light support. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gabbas 2018 Lillovè (Cannonau di Sardegna)
Country: Cannonau di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: This easygoing white has subtle aromas suggesting white stone fruit and almond. Reflecting the nose, the crisp, simple palate suggests yellow apple and bitter nut before a tangy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gorghi Tondi 2018 Coste a Preola Grillo (Sicilia)

Description: Aromas of tropical fruit and spring flower lead the nose. On the simple, fruity palate, tangy acidity accompanies banana and honeydew melon before a candied lemon drop close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Iorio 2017 Falanghina (Beneventano)

Description: Made with Nero d'Avola, this easygoing red has subdued aromas of dark-skinned fruit and a whiff of brown spice. The simple palate offers mature black plum, tangerine zest and a dollop of vanilla alongside round tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nero Oro 2018 Nero d'Avola (Terre Siciliane)

Description: This has subdued aromas that offers mere suggestions of honeydew melon, apricot and bitter almond. The aromas carry on to the simple, rather diluted palate along with brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nuraghe Crabioni 2018 Crabioni (Vermentino di Sardegna)
Country: Vermentino di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Made with organically grown Nero d'Avola, this has aromas of dark fruit and baking spice that carry over to the easygoing palate along with round tannins and the merest hint of black pepper. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: TerrAmore 2018 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: This has an extremely subdued nose suggesting mature stone fruit and a whiff of pressed yellow flower. The rather evolved, monolithic palate evokes dried yellow apple slice, saline and the heat of evident alcohol that dominates the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Amarano 2017 Cardenio (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Blueberry and violet aromas mingle with Mediterranean brush and toasted notes. The assertive, lean palate is far less expressive, offering dark spice and the heat of evident alcohol. It lacks fruit richness while dusty, drying tannins leave an abrupt, astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: F.lli Puddu 2015 Nepente di Oliena Pro Vois Riserva (Cannonau di Sardegna)
Designation: Nepente di Oliena Pro Vois Riserva
Country: Cannonau di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Aromas of toasted walnut dominate the nose and carry over to the brisk palate along with yellow-apple skin. It's crisp, with tangy acidity but it's lean on fruit richness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Funaro 2018 Pinzeri Grillo (Sicilia)

Description: This informal white has aromas of white spring flower and tropical fruit. On the lean, diluted palate, brisk acidity accompanies mere suggestions of banana, pineapple and honeydew melon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vesevo 2018 Falanghina (Beneventano)

Description: This extremely simple white has aromas of white stone fruit and almond. The aromas flow through to the light, easygoing palate along with tropical fruit notes and tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Dolia Nova 2018 Vermentino di Sardegna
Country: Vermentino di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: The shy nose eventually reveals aromas suggesting prune, weedy underbrush and toasted oak that carry over to the lean, rather diluted palate along with coffee bean and saw dust. It seems more evolved than its age, with loose, fleeting tannins. Drink sooner rather than later. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nativ 2016 Rue (Taurasi)

Description: This informal Nero d'Avola has aromas suggesting dark-skinned fruit and scorched earth. The simple palate offers blackberry and a hint of star anise alongside relaxed tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Botter 2018 Caleo Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Here's an informal white that has aromas evoking banana and exotic fruit. The aromas make their way over to the diluted palate along with brisk acidity before a rather bitter finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antica Hirpinia 2018 Greco di Tufo
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of Mediterranean scrub and grilled herb lead the nose on this informal red. The light-bodied, diluted palate suggests dried blackberry, a green note of powdered sage and bitter unroasted coffee bean alongside dusty fleeting tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Dolia Nova 2018 Monica di Sardegna
Country: Monica di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Roasted herb and Mediterranean brush aromas mingle with a whiff of toasted nut on this extremely simple wine. The diluted palate lacks fruit richness while dusty, fleeting tannins give it a drying, abrupt finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Dolia Nova 2018 Cannonau di Sardegna
Country: Cannonau di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: This informal white has subdued aromas suggesting white stone fruit and a whiff of spring flower. The extremely simple, rather diluted palate offers mere suggestions of yellow apple and lemon alongside brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantine Grasso 2018 Grillo (Sicilia)

Description: Fragrant, structured and loaded with finesse and complexity, this stunning, perfumed wine opens with alluring scents evoking new leather, pressed rose, eucalyptus, cinnamon and carob. It's vibrant, focused and bestowed with incredible energy, delivering crushed raspberry, red cherry, licorice and savory mineral notes. Bright acidity and polished tannins lend remarkable elegance and precision. It's the best wine from this challenging vintage. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 Asili Vecchie Viti (Barbaresco)

Description: Yet another incredible showing from the estate's dazzling range of 2014 Barbarescos, this opens with enticing scents of dark spice, camphor, new leather and wild red berry. The palate boasts a weightless concentration, delivering bright red cherry, strawberry jelly, orange zest and licorice alongside taut, polished tannins. Bright acidity keeps it lifted and balanced, and a hazelnut note caps off the close. Drink 2024–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 Pajè Vecchie Viti (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of rose, red berry and eucalyptus mingle with whiffs of exotic spice on the gorgeous, fragrant red. Loaded with finesse and tension, the elegant, structured palate delivers crushed raspberry, white pepper and star anise set against fresh acidity and taut, lithe tannins. It's already compelling, but hold for even more complexity. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gaja 2016 Barbaresco

Description: Rose petal, camphor, eucalyptus and dark-skinned-berry aromas shape the nose on this captivating wine. Vibrant and intense, the palate evokes spiced cranberry, red cherry, licorice, espresso and a hint of orange zest alongside taut, fine-grained tannins. It's still youthfully austere but already balanced, with firm acidity. Drink 2024–2041. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gaja 2016 Sorì San Lorenzo (Barbaresco)

Description: My highest scoring Barolo of the vintage (out of over 300 reviewed so far), this gorgeous wine has heady aromas of violet, rose, baking spice and ripe, red berry. On the smooth, juicy palate, taut, polished tannins support succulent red cherry, raspberry compote, licorice and wild herbs. It's already delicious and accessible but will also age well for years to come. Drink through 2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Bartolo Mascarello 2015 Barolo

Description: Structured, tense and racy, this offers layers of red cherry, raspberry, dark spice and balsamic flavors of camphor. It has a Barolo-like structure, with firm, well-integrated tannins and vibrant acidity, and a licorice note lingers on the long finish. Give it time to fully develop, and you'll be rewarded. Drink 2024–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 Montefico Vecchie Viti (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of wild red berry, rose petal, wet stone, Mediterranean brush and star anise shape the nose on this compelling, vibrant wine. Made with Nerello Mascalese planted in 1961, the wine has a linear, racy palate that's almost ethereal and loaded with finesse and energy, delivering sour cherry, pomegranate, licorice and orange zest before a flinty mineral close. Taut, refined tannins and vibrant acidity lend lithe support. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tascante 2016 Contrada Sciaranuova VV Rosso (Etna)

Description: Balsamic aromas of camphor mingle with red berry, underbrush and dark spice on this vibrant red. On the delicious, radiant palate, bright acidity and elegant tannins accompany raspberry compote, crushed strawberry and star anise before an orange zest finish. Drink 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 Gallina (Barbaresco)

Description: Here's another stunning wine from this fantastic estate, opening with aromas of underbrush, wild berry, tobacco, rose and dried mint. The structured, elegant palate delivers crushed raspberry, strawberry compote, star anise and flinty mineral, while taut, refined tannins provide finesse and support. Drink 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franchetti–Passopisciaro 2017 Contrada G Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Aromas of woodland berry, wild herb, violet and camphor mingle together in the glass. Elegantly structured and boasting great intensity, the vibrant palate delivers crushed strawberry, cranberry, orange zest and licorice set against tightly wound but extremely refined tannins. Firm acidity provides the backbone and impeccable balance while a mineral note lends tension. Some may find this almost too ethereal, but others will be dazzled. Drink 2024–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mascarello Giuseppe e Figlio 2014 Monprivato (Barolo)

Description: Rose, red berry and star anise aromas align with earthy whiffs of forest floor and new leather. The full-bodied, delicious palate doles out succulent Morello cherry, black raspberry, licorice and chopped mint set against a backbone of firm but refined tannins. It's already gorgeous but will be even better with just a few more years of bottle age. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2015 Muncagota (Barbaresco)

Description: Made with extremely old vines, the youngest of which are over 60 years old and most much older, this opens with aromas of new leather, scorched earth, underbrush and balsamic notes of camphor. Concentrated and boasting a great depth of flavors, the structured, full-bodied palate delivers raspberry compote, dried black cherry, carob and hazelnut alongside firm, enveloping tannins. Another compelling wine from the estate. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2011 Crichet Pajè (Barbaresco)

Description: Camphor, rose and woodland berry aromas shape the nose on this structured red. The firm, full-bodied palate delivers juicy cherry, crushed raspberry and licorice alongside tight, noble tannins and vibrant acidity. It has incredible structure and a compelling purity of fruit. Give it time to fully develop. Drink 2022–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 Albesani (Barbaresco)

Description: Violet, new leather, perfumed berry and a whiff of face powder mingle together with camphor on this fragrant red. On the structured, polished palate, taut, refined tannins support succulent Morello cherry, mulberry and licorice. It's already tempting, but hold for even more complexity. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2015 Pajè Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Another gorgeous wine in the estate's stunning lineup from the 2014 vintage, this is a testament to how much better this difficult vintage was in Barbaresco when compared with other areas. With vines averaging over 40 years old, it offers aromas and flavors of crushed raspberry, cranberry, cinnamon and licorice along with a hint of game. It's focused, taut and vibrant, with enveloping tannins. Drink 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 Pajè (Barbaresco)

Description: This gorgeous red stuns with its heady fragrance of pressed rose, truffle, new leather and red berry. Thanks to the age of the vines, the youngest of which were planted in 1937, it boasts an unusual concentration of flavors for the vintage, delivering raspberry compote, licorice, truffle, orange zest and baking spice before a salty, mineral-driven finish. It has wonderful energy and balance, with concise, refined tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2022–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 Pira Vecchie Viti (Barolo)

Description: Violet, Mediterranean herb and red berry are just some of the aromas you'll find on this compelling wine. Silky and full bodied, the palate delivers raspberry compote, crushed Marasca cherry, star anise and flinty mineral alongside taut, refined tannins. Fresh acidity and a mineral vein add tension. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franchetti–Passopisciaro 2017 Contrada C Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Enticing aromas of graphite, Mediterranean scrub and wild berry shape the nose of this compelling wine. The vibrant, structured palate is loaded with finesse and tension, delivering crushed strawberry, red cherry, star anise and orange zest, while notes of botanical herbs and a vein of flinty mineral lend depth. Racy acidity and lithe tannins provide energy and support. Drink 2021–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frank Cornelissen 2016 Munjebel VA Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Mixing power and finesse, this full-bodied red opens with intriguing aromas suggesting smoke, graphite, truffle, molten chocolate and wild black-skinned berry. On the structured, enveloping palate, velvety tannins wrap around blackberry jam, crushed black raspberry, licorice and grilled herbs, while a mineral note lingers on the finish. Tangy acidity lifts the finish. Drink now–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frank Cornelissen 2017 Munjebel Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Wild cherry, crushed mint, forest floor and graphite aromas shape the nose on this gorgeous wine along with an earthy whiff of new leather. It's full bodied and elegantly structured, doling out Marasca cherry, raspberry compote, licorice and flinty mineral alongside enveloping, velvety tannins. Drink 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franchetti–Passopisciaro 2017 Contrada P Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Fragrant and full bodied, this structured red has enticing aromas evoking woodland berry, balsamic aromas of pine, rose petal and exotic spice. The enveloping palate delivers crushed raspberry, succulent Marasca cherry, licorice and nutmeg alongside firm, tightly knit tannins. Fresh acidity lends tension and balance. Best 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2015 Ovello (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of strawberry compote, tangy orange zest and licorice carry over to the radiant, elegantly structured palate along with tart pomegranate. It has a pristine quality and focused energy thanks to the fantastic, juicy fruit, vibrant acidity and polished tannins. It's already accessible but will age beautifully as well. Drink through 2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 Faset (Barbaresco)

Description: Wild berry, violet, face powder and eucalyptus aromas lift out of the glass. On the youthfully austere, structured palate, tightly knit but noble tannins wrap around black cherry, raspberry, licorice and crushed mint. Give this a few more years to fully develop. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2015 Rabajà Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Dark-skinned berry, camphor, rose and crushed stone aromas shape the nose along with a whiff of pipe tobacco. The aromas carry on to the structured, full-bodied palate along with juicy Marasca cherry and licorice. Firm, fine-grained tannins provide support. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2015 Rio Sordo Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Elegant and loaded with compelling tension, this has enticing aromas including wild red berry, truffle and crushed mint. The firm palate shows remarkable finesse, delivering pomegranate, strawberry, orange zest and crushed mint as well as savory, almost salty mineral notes. It's focused and balanced, with taut, polished tannins and vibrant acidity. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 Pira (Barolo)

Description: Rose, red berry and wild mint aromas shape the fragrant nose. On the radiant, linear palate, taut, lithe tannins accompany juicy red cherry, pomegranate, star anise, thyme and white pepper, while vibrant acidity provides tension and balance. It has wonderful energy and elegance. Best 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mascarello Giuseppe e Figlio 2014 Villero (Barolo)

Description: Perfumed and radiant, this beguiling Barolo opens with heady scents of cranberry, crushed rose petal and wild herbs. Boasting extreme elegance and energy, the almost ethereal palate delivers succulent strawberry, red cherry, star anise and orange zest set against polished tannins and racy acidity. A mineral note on the finish lends tension and depth. This is all about finesse and complexity and is a wonderful expression of the vintage. It shows more aging potential than many 2014s. Drink 2022–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mascarello Giuseppe e Figlio 2014 Perno Vigna Santo Stefano (Barolo)

Description: Intensely fragrant, this radiant red has vivid aromas of Mediterranean brush, myrtle berry, wild cherry, rose and chopped mint. The linear palate boasts great mineral tension alongside flavors of juicy black cherry, blackberry, licorice, wild herbs and smoky minerals, all framed by taut, polished tannins. It's balanced, with bright acidity. Drink through 2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palmento Costanzo 2016 Mofete Rosso (Etna)

Description: Balsamic aromas of camphor and new leather mingle with scorched earth and mature black-skinned berry on this full-bodied red. Mirroring the nose, the enveloping palate delivers ripe Marasca cherry, black raspberry and licorice alongside tightly knit, fine-grained tannins before a hazelnut close. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2015 Montefico Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Intense and linear, this vibrant red has intriguing aromas of wild red berry, violet, dark spice, crushed stone and eucalyptus. On the lithe, racy palate, polished tannins and lively acidity frame crunchy red cherry, strawberry compote, orange zest and licorice before a saline finish. Drink 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tascante 2016 Contrada Rampante Rosso (Etna)

Description: Eucalyptus, underbrush and red berry aromas shape the nose on this structured, elegant red. The taut palate is full of tension and energy, delivering crushed raspberry, juicy Marasca cherry, licorice and a hint of truffle alongside refined, enveloping tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it well balanced. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Giuseppe Rinaldi 2015 Brunate (Barolo)

Description: Underbrush, wet stone and camphor aromas meld with whiffs of scorched earth and Mediterranean scrub. The full-bodied, enveloping palate delivers dried Marasca cherry, orange zest, raspberry compote, fennel and flint alongside velvety tannins and lively acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franchetti–Passopisciaro 2017 Contrada R Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Dark-skinned berry, coconut and balsamic aromas of eucalyptus shape the nose along with a whiff of rose petal. On the tense, youthfully austere palate, taut, fine-grained tannins and vibrant acidity support red cherry, cranberry, orange zest, brown pepper and a hint of tobacco. Give it time to fully develop. Drink 2024–2041. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gaja 2016 Costa Russi (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of honeysuckle and Granny Smith apple jump out of the glass. The green apple aroma carries on to the racy palate together with lemon zest and yellow peach. A vibrant perlage provides the backdrop. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palari 2015 Rosso del Soprano Red (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Underbrush, wild herb and dark-skinned-berry aromas form the nose along with a whiff of camphor. On the firm, structured palate, tightly knit but noble tannins offset dried Marasca cherry, cranberry, orange zest and star anise. Tense and youthfully austere, it needs a few years to unwind. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2015 Pora Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Enticing scents of wild berry, violet and Mediterranean scrub mingle with minty notes. It's elegant and linear, offering juicy Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, star anise and orange zest alongside lithe, polished tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Carranco 2017 Rosso Villa dei Baroni (Etna)

Description: Full bodied and elegantly structured, this offers alluring aromas of woodland berry, wild herbs and camphor along with a whiff of forest floor. On the firm palate, taut, refined tannins offset juicy red cherry, pomegranate, star anise and a hint of tobacco. A hazelnut note lingers on the close. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Giuseppe Rinaldi 2015 Tre Tini (Barolo)

Description: Delicious and loaded with finesse, this Nerello Mascalese delivers aromas and flavors of ripe black cherry, blackberry and star anise, while smoky flint adds depth. Lithe, elegant tannins provide the polished framework. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2017 Eruzione 1614 Nerello Mascalese (Sicilia)

Description: Wild berry, violet, new leather, forest floor and eucalyptus aromas lift out of the glass. The elegant, full-bodied palate delivers dried black cherry, raspberry compote, licorice and dried mint alongside taut, polished tannins. Given the hot, dry growing season, this is a more powerful and concentrated version of Asili. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2015 Asili Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Eucalyptus, Mediterranean herb and wild berry aromas mingle with a whiff of wet stone. It's full bodied and youthfully austere but also boasts a weightless elegance, doling out black cherry, flinty mineral and bitter almond sensations before a licorice close. Thanks to the ripe fruit flavors, you'd never guess this had a hefty abv of 15%. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franchetti–Passopisciaro 2017 Contrada S Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Red berry, exotic spice and a whiff of camphor form the enticing nose. Firmly structured but loaded with finesse, the linear palate delivers crunchy red cherry, pomegranate, star anise and white pepper alongside tightly knit, noble tannins. It's still youthfully austere but already impeccably balanced, with vibrant acidity. Drink 2023–2041. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gaja 2016 Sorì Tildin (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of ripe black-skinned berry, Mediterranean scrub, new leather and crushed mint are front and center in this elegant, full-bodied red. It's smooth and delicious, doling out blackberry jam, carob and rosemary alongside lithe, polished tannins, while a citrus zest note picks up on the finish. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tornatore 2017 Pietrarizzo Rosso (Etna)

Description: Aromas of rose, truffle, moist soil and new leather mingle together on this earthy yet elegant red. On the tight, tense palate, racy acidity and taut, graceful tannins support red cherry, pomegranate and licorice. Drink 2021–2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2014 del Comune di Barolo (Barolo)

Description: Balsamic aromas of camphor mingle with mature dark-skinned berry, leather, licorice and vanilla on this structured red. The full-bodied palate reflects the nose, delivering raspberry compote, star anise, crushed mint and hazelnut alongside firm, fine-grained tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2015 Montestefano Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Fragrant and vibrant, this opens with enticing scents of perfumed berry, violet and baking spice. It's racy and linear, offering strawberry, red cherry and mineral tension alongside lithe tannins and bright acidity. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Giuseppe Rinaldi 2014 Tre Tini (Barolo)

Description: Aromas of smoke and strawberry mingle with whiffs of Mediterranean scrub on this compelling red. The aromas carry on to the savory, elegant palate along with red cherry, exotic spice and flinty mineral. It's balanced and loaded with finesse, with lithe tannins and bright acidity. Drink through 2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frank Cornelissen 2017 Susucaru Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Radiant and loaded with finesse, this lovely sparkler opens with floral and fruit aromas of hawthorn, acacia and yellow pear. The bone-dry, linear palate delivers mature green apple, white peach and a savory mineral note alongside a foaming mousse. Bright acidity keeps it balanced and energized. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: De Stefani NV Rive di Refrontolo Brut Nature (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)

Description: Aromas of coconut, Mediterranean scrub and black-skinned berry mingle with French oak and spice. The elegantly structured palate doles out ripe Marasca cherry, raspberry compote, licorice, espresso and exotic spice set against fine-grained tannins. Bright acidity keeps it fresh and balanced. Drink 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Donnafugata 2016 Fragore Contrada Montelaguarda (Etna)

Description: Made with 75% Inzolia and 25% Sauvignon Tasca, a unique clone of Sauvignon grown at the Regaleali estate, this is one of Sicily's top whites, and it shows good aging potential. It opens with aromas of spring blossom, white stone fruit and citrus along with a whiff of Mediterranean scrub. On the elegant palate, fresh acidity lifts honeydew, creamy white peach and Meyer lemon, while a tangy saline note lends mineral tension. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tasca d'Almerita 2017 Tenuta Regaleali Nozze d'Oro White (Sicilia)

Description: Aromas of strawberry, red cherry and white pepper follow over to the polished, savory palate, along with hints of smoke and pomegranate. It's silky and bright, with fresh acidity, making it incredibly delicious to enjoy now. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2018 Frappato (Vittoria)

Description: Made with Nerello Mascalese and Nerello Cappuccio, this lovely wine has enticing aromas of red berry, Mediterranean brush, rose and chopped mint. Vibrant and smooth, the palate delivers juicy raspberry, blackberry, orange zest, licorice and carob alongside a savory, saline mineral note. Silky tannins and bright acidity provide finesse and balance. Drink through 2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Torre Mora 2016 Scalunera Rosso (Etna)

Description: Aromas of rose mingle with wild herb, underbrush and balsamic notes of eucalyptus on this perfumed red. Elegant and racy, the graceful—almost ethereal—palate delivers strawberry, pomegranate, steely mineral and white pepper alongside polished tannins. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Giuseppe Rinaldi 2014 Brunate (Barolo)

Description: Aromas of ripe wild berry and Mediterranean scrub alongside a whiff of eucalyptus take shape in the glass. Juicy and smooth, the palate offers crushed raspberry, strawberry compote, licorice and notes of exotic incense framed in taut, fine-grained tannins. A tangy mineral note gives the finish tension. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franchetti–Passopisciaro 2017 Passorosso (Etna)

Description: Wild berry, Mediterranean herb, scorched soil and a whiff of game meld together on this 100% Nerello Mascalese. On the tightly knit palate, close-grained, drying tannins wrap around dried black cherry, orange zest and licorice alongside a hint of smoky mineral. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Benanti 2017 Contrada Cavaliere (Etna)

Description: Mediterranean scrub, rose and wild berry aromas shape the fragrant nose. Smooth and savory, the linear palate delivers juicy Marasca cherry, pomegranate, clove and mineral notes suggesting saline. Polished tannins and fresh acidity lend lithe support. Drink 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2018 Rosso Nerello Mascalese (Sicilia)

Description: Glossy and bright, this opens with alluring aromas of camphor, wild red berry, violet and wet stone. The elegant palate delivers juicy red cherry, orange slice, star anise and crushed mint alongside flexible tannins and racy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tascante 2017 Ghiaia Nera Rosso (Etna)

Description: Mediterranean brush and exotic spice aromas combine with whiffs of wet stone and wild herbs on this 100% Nerello Mascalese. The aromas march on to the palate together with ripe Marasca cherry, licorice and dried mint. Taut but lithe tannins and bright acidity provide support. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Fessina 2014 Il Musmeci Riserva Rosso (Etna)

Description: Violet, wild red berry and Mediterranean brush aromas mingle with a whiff of wet stone. It's polished, delicious and easygoing, delivering black berry, crushed raspberry and star anise alongside bright acidity and lithe, elegant tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Torre Mora 2018 Cauru Rosso (Etna)

Description: This opens with aromas suggesting scorched earth, carob, Mediterranean scrub and prune. Reflecting the nose, the brawny palate offers hazelnut, raisin, orange zest and dried mint alongside smooth, enveloping tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frank Cornelissen 2016 Magma Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: A blend of 60% Nero d'Avola and 40% Nocera, this has enticing scents of Mediterranean brush, wild blueberry and eucalyptus. The aromas carry over the taut palate along with blackberry jam, star anise, carob and a hint of cocoa. Densely woven but fine-grained tannins provide the framework. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2016 Red (Mamertino)

Description: Exotic incense, oak, mint and Mediterranean brush aromas lift out of the glass. The smooth, concentrated palate offers licorice, dried cherry and orange zest alongside taut, polished tannins and fresh acidity. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Firriato 2014 Cavanera Rovo delle Coturnie (Etna)

Description: Hawthorn, acacia, wild herb and white stone fruit aromas lift out of the glass. Racy and refined, the savory palate doles out creamy white peach, yellow pear and lemon slice, alongside tangy acidity, while a foaming mousse lends finesse. It closes on a white almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Manzane 2018 Manzane 20.10 Brut (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)

Description: Aromas of underbrush, pressed rose, Mediterranean herb and wild red berry shape the nose. Linear and ethereally elegant, the palate offers dried cherry, pomegranate, star anise and smoky minerality alongside polished tannins. It's balanced, with vibrant acidity. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Theresa Eccher 2014 Etna

Description: Elegant and savory, this linear white offers delicate scents of spring blossom and yellow stone fruit along with a whiff of citrus. The crisp palate boasts tension and energy, offering yellow pear, apricot, Meyer lemon and tangy mineral notes of saline alongside racy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2018 Bianco (Etna)

Description: This blend of Nero d'Avola, Petit Verdot, Syrah and a small percentage of other grape varieties offers ripe dark-skinned berry, mocha and cedar aromas. The concentrated but elegant palate delivers prune, licorice, tobacco and carob notes alongside fine-grained tannins. Enjoy through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Donnafugata 2015 Mille e Una Notte Red (Sicilia)

Description: Elegant and structured, this opens with delicate, alluring scents of yellow stone fruit, citrus, Spanish broom and Mediterranean herb. The full-bodied palate boasts freshness and finesse, delivering yellow peach, apricot, Meyer lemon and saline before a lingering honeyed almond finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2018 Cometa Fiano (Sicilia)

Description: Aromas of wild berry, Mediterranean scrub, carob and exotic spice mingle with a light whiff of toasted coffee bean. The linear, elegant palate offers mulberry, blackberry, licorice and hazelnut set against taut, fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink through 2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Torre Mora 2016 Chiuse Vidalba Rosso (Etna)

Description: Smooth and bright, this boasts an earthy elegance, opening with aromas of wild berry, blue flower and Mediterranean herb that interlace with earthy whiffs of leather and game. The juicy, linear palate offers crushed red cherry, orange zest, star anise and white pepper alongside lithe tannins and lively acidity. It closes on a saline note. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Benanti 2017 Rosso (Etna)

Description: Rose, red berry and Asian incense aromas lift out of the glass on this fragrant red. Made entirely with Nerello Mascalese, the elegant palate delivers sour cherry, pomegranate, exotic spice and saline mineral notes alongside pliant tannins and bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Donnafugata 2016 Sul Vulcano Rosso (Etna)

Description: Aromas of smoky flint, leather, red berry and brown spice mingle with whiffs of game and rusty iron. The aromas follow over to the firmly structured but linear palate along with ripe Marasca cherry, orange zest and carob. Tight, dusty tannins and mineral tension provide the framework. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Fessina 2017 Laeneo Nerello Cappuccio (Sicilia)

Description: This opens with earthy aromas of dark-skinned berry, new leather, cedar and tilled soil. The savory palate delivers black plum, cassis, tobacco and licorice alongside fine-grained tannins. Enjoy through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Donnafugata 2016 Tancredi Red (Terre Siciliane)

Description: White spring flower, summer orchard fruit and a whiff of citrus lead the nose. On the juicy, savory palate, a saline note underscores mature yellow apple, Bartlett pear and Meyer lemon before an almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Montevetrano 2017 Core White (Campania)

Description: Delicately enticing scents of spring wildflower, white stone fruit and beeswax mingle together on this crisp, elegant white. It's linear, balanced and loaded with finesse, delivering ripe yellow pear, lemon zest, Mediterranean herb and saline alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pietradolce 2018 Archiner Biancoi (Etna)

Description: Aromas of fragrant spring flower and white orchard fruit form the delicately enticing nose. Dry and savory, the vibrant palate shows crunchy apple, Anjou pear and a hint of green melon alongside crisp acidity. Foaming bubbles soften the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Malibràn 2018 5 Grammi Extra Brut (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)

Description: Aromas of French oak lead the nose along with whiffs of pressed rose, camphor and wild berry. On the tightly knit palate, taut, close-grained tannins accompany dried cherry, mint and licorice before a drying, roasted coffee bean finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palmento Costanzo 2015 Contrada Santo Spirito (Etna)

Description: Made with Nero d'Avola, this opens with aromas of ripe black-skinned fruit, underbrush and baking spice. It's juicy and balanced, delivering black cherry, crushed plum, clove and star anise flavors alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: MandraRossa 2016 Terre del Sommacco Red (Sicilia)

Description: Wild berry, geranium, Mediterranean scrub and eucalyptus aromas lift out of the glass. This is made entirely from the native grape Nocera, and its smooth palate boasts dense fruit, including ripe raspberry, black cherry and plum, while white pepper adds depth. Soft and enveloping, it's made to be enjoyed young, so drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2017 Nocera (Sicilia)

Description: Aromas of beeswax and white stone fruit mingling with a whiff of oak-driven vanilla shape the nose. The palate offers mature yellow apple, lemon zest, saline and a hint of espresso together with crisp acidity and mineral-driven tension. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Fessina 2015 Il Musmeci Contrada Caselle Bianco (Etna)

Description: Aromas of eucalyptus mingle with oak, black-skinned berry and exotic spice. Elegantly structured, the medium-bodied palate offers dried black cherry, orange zest and licorice alongside tight, fine-grained tannins before an espresso close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cusumano 2015 Guardiola Rosso (Etna)

Description: Aromas of white and yellow stone fruit mix with floral scents of white spring blossom. Tangy and polished, the softly sparkling palate delivers mature yellow apple, ripe Anjou pear and lemon zest alongside crisp acidity. An almond note lingers on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Adami 2018 Vigneto Giardino Rive di Colbertaldo Asciutto (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
Designation: Vigneto Giardino Rive di Colbertaldo Asciutto

Description: Aromas of dark-skinned berry, cedar and cooking spice emerge from the glass. The savory palate offers dried black cherry, mocha and licorice alongside firm tannins. Drink after 2020. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Enrico Serafino 2016 Sanavento (Barbaresco)

Description: This opens with heady scents of honeysuckle and tropical fruit and a whiff of Mediterranean brush. The racy, refreshing palate doles out yellow peach, pineapple and grapefruit alongside a saline note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudo Montoni 2018 Grillo (Sicilia)

Description: Scorched earth, blue flower and plum mix with balsamic aromas of camphor on this brawny red. Full-bodied and concentrated, the dense—almost syrupy—palate offers dried cherry, prune, mint and star anise alongside tight, close-grained tannins that leave a rather astringent, drying finish. You'll also detect the heat of evident alcohol. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pietradolce 2016 Barbagalli Rosso (Etna)

Description: Coconut and hazelnut aromas mingle with ripe, dark-skinned berry aromas. Reflecting the nose, the tight palate offers toast, licorice and blackberry jam alongside tightly knit, drying tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cusumano 2017 Alta Mora Rosso (Etna)

Description: Fresh and savory, this elegant, crowd-pleasing red has aromas of red and black-skinned berry and culinary spice. Juicy and delicious, the lithe palate doles out succulent Morello cherry, crushed raspberry and star anise while polished tannins offer smooth support. It's made to be drunk young, so enjoy soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tasca d'Almerita 2017 Tenuta Regaleali Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Made with 90% Carricante and 10% Catarratto, this has delicate aromas of white spring flower, Mediterranean scrub and pear. On the rounded palate, tangy acidity lifts yellow apple, Meyer lemon, acacia honey and almond before a saline close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palmento Costanzo 2018 Bianco di Sei (Etna)

Description: Juicy and savory, this has aromas evoking black-skinned berry, crushed mint, carob and a hint of Mediterranean brush. On the linear, taut palate, dusty tannins accompany juicy blackberry, blueberry and almond. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudo Montoni 2018 Core Perricone (Sicilia)

Description: Enticing floral aromas of wisteria and hawthorn mingle with white peach. On the creamy palate, a polished mousse wraps around Granny Smith apple, green melon and candied citrus notes alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Andreola 2018 Dirupo Extra Dry (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)

Description: Scorched earth, ripe black-skinned fruit and a whiff of game lead the nose. The aromas follow over to the vigorous palate along with dusty tannins. It's a bit rustic but also full of personality. Give it a few more years to fully integrate, then drink. Best 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Benanti 2017 Nerello Cappuccio (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Rose and wild berry aromas lead the way, while the palate offers ripe Marasca cherry, raspberry compote, star anise and a hint of iron. It's full bodied but accessible, thanks to pliant tannins and fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2018 Nebbiolo (Langhe)

Description: Aromas evoking underbrush, scorched soil, dark spice and Mediterranean scrub slowly appear in the glass. On the linear, firmly structured palate, close-grained tannins accompany dried cherry, star anise and an earthy hint of game. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terrazze dell'Etna 2012 Cimeco (Etna)

Description: Made with Nero d'Avola, this opens with aromas of ripe black-skinned berry, Mediterranean brush and cooking spice. The juicy palate offers blackberry jam, star anise and vanilla alongside velvety tannins and bright acidity. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Valle dell'Acate 2015 Il Moro Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Made with 70% Nero d'Avola and 30% Syrah, this opens with aromas of black-skinned berry, bay leaf and sandalwood. The full-bodied, juicy palate offers blackberry jam, star anise and black pepper alongside chewy tannins. Enjoy through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cusumano 2017 Tenuta Presti e Pegni Benuara Red (Sicilia)

Description: Aromas of black-skinned berry, coconut and a whiff of Mediterranean scrub shape the nose. The taut, linear palate offers black cherry, raspberry jam, exotic spice and a toasted almond note alongside tight, lithe tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cusumano 2015 Alta Mora Feudo di Mezzo (Etna)

Description: Aromas of dark-skinned berry, carob and leather emerge from the glass of this 100% Nero d'Avola. The savory, elegant palate delivers ripe blackberry, licorice and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. Enjoy through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: MandraRossa 2016 Cartagho Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Aromas of ripe black-skinned berry, espresso and cedar emerge from the glass. The chewy palate offers blackberry jam, clove and cocoa alongside polished tannins. Enjoy through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Morgante 2016 Don Antonio Riserva Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Aromas of ripe black-skinned berry mingle with Mediterranean brush and dark spice. On the smooth, juicy palate, hints of tobacco and vanilla accent a fruity core of mature Marasca cherry and crushed blackberry. Polished tannins provide elegant support. Enjoy through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tasca d'Almerita 2017 Tenuta Regaleali Lamùri Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: This fragrant sparkler opens with aromas of spring blossom and mature white stone fruit. On the creamy palate, bright acidity lifts mature yellow apple, ripe Bartlett pear and citrus drop candy. It's polished, with a silky mousse. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bacio della Luna 2018 Extra Dry (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)

Description: Aromas of blackberry and violet mingle with an earthy note of humid soil. Reflecting the nose, the juicy, straightforward palate offers blueberry jam, crushed raspberry and light note of salted game alongside lithe tannins. Enjoy through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudo Montoni 2018 Lagnusa Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Aromas evoking underbrush, wild herbs, coconut and raw oak lead the nose. Reflecting the aromas, the tight, linear palate offers espresso, toasted nut, exotic spice and dried cherry alongside drying, grainy tannins that leave an astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Firriato 2017 Le Sabbie dell'Etna (Etna)

Description: Aromas of acacia flower and mature yellow apple mingle with whiffs of almond. On the soft palate, a polished mousse accompanies mature pear, glazed almond and lemon drop candy. Fresh acidity brightens the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Tordera NV Dry (Valdobbiadene Superiore di Cartizze)
Country: Valdobbiadene Superiore di Cartizze, Veneto, Italy

Description: White spring wildflower and ripe pear aromas shape the nose. On the off-dry palate, a soft mousse accompanies mature yellow apple and creamy peach before a lemon drop candy close. Bright acidity lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Malibràn 2018 Gorio Extra Dry (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)

Description: This blend of Nero d'Avola and Cabernet Franc offers aromas of dark berry, cedar and tobacco. The savory palate shows black currant jam, licorice and vanilla alongside firm tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: MandraRossa 2018 Bonera Red (Sicilia)

Description: This has a subdued nose that eventually reveals whiffs of new leather, eucalyptus and pressed rose. The no-frills palate offers dried Marasca cherry, licorice and a hint of carob alongside polished tannins and fresh acidity. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Bastonaca 2015 Etna

Description: Exotic fruit, fragrant spring blossom and Granny Smith are some of the aromas you'll find on this expressive sparkler. On the crisp palate, a polished perlage softens mature golden apple, pineapple, bitter almond and a light confectionary note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Andreola 2018 Mas de Fer Riva di Soligo Extra Dry (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
Designation: Mas de Fer Riva di Soligo Extra Dry

Description: Floral aromas of orange blossom and honeysuckle mingle with exotic fruit on this tangy white. On the palate, bright acidity accompanies ripe Bartlett pear, yellow apple and a hint of pineapple. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antico Castello 2017 Demetra Falanghina (Irpinia)

Description: Made with native grape Caprettone that was vinified and aged in amphorae, this unusual, amber-colored wine has aromas of dried apricot, honey and toasted nut. The aromas carry on to the rather lean, linear palate along with a smoky mineral note. It's not for everyone, but fans of orange wine will be intrigued. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bosco de' Medici 2017 Dressel 19.2 Caprettone (Pompeiano)

Description: Creamy and fragrant, this has enticing scents of spring blossom, mature pear and crystallized ginger. On the lightly sparkling palate, a polished mousse and crisp acidity accompany baked yellow apple, white peach and lemon drop candy. Crisp acidity lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Drusian NV Extra Dry (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)

Description: Made partly in steel and partly in wood, this has subtle aromas of black-skinned berry and spice with a whiff of French oak. The tight palate offers dried black cherry, licorice and roasted coffee bean alongside close-grained tannins that leave a firm finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sallier de la Tour 2017 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Aromas of yellow apple, peach and Bartlett pear follow over to the tangy, savory palate along with lemon zest notes. A saline note caps off the finish, while crisp acidity keeps it vibrant. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Cavalier Pepe 2018 Nestor (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Title: Gini 2016 La Froscà (Soave Classico)

Description: Spiced blueberry and blackberry brandy aromas shape the nose along with a whiff of rose. The enveloping, delicious palate shows a polished concentration, delivering ripe black cherry, plum, carob and baking spice. Firm, velvety tannins and fresh acidity provide the framing. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Fratelli Pardi 2014 Sacrantino (Montefalco Sagrantino)

Description: Delicate but enticing scents evoking white spring flowers, beeswax, wild herbs and yellow stone fruits float above the glass along with a whiff of wet stone. Crisp and focused, the elegant, chiseled palate delivers ripe peach, yellow pear, lemon drop candy and flinty minerality alongside vibrant acidity. A saline note enhances the long, lingering finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2016 Studi Arielle (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Heady aromas of yellow stone fruit, spring flower and wild herb mingle with a whiff of toasted nut. The elegant, savory palate delivers ripe apricot, creamy yellow pear and tangerine zest before a mineral-laden, saline finish. Tangy acidity brightens the rich flavors. For juicy fruit enjoy now, or hold for even more complexity. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pieropan 2017 Calvarino (Soave Classico)

Description: Field flower, ripe orchard fruit, acacia and wild herb aromas are front and center. The palate is enveloping and precise, offering ripe apricot, almond, honeyed minerality and lemon drop candy alongside fresh acidity. It closes on a nutmeg note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2016 Studi Arianello (Fiano di Avellino)
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with grapes from vines that are over 100 years old, this dazzling white opens with heady scents of yellow spring flowers, apricot, dried pineapple slice and toasted almond with a whiff of acacia honey. The focused palate delivers ripe yellow peach, mature yellow pear, lemon drop candy and white pepper alongside grilled herb and a mineral note of graphite. Fresh acidity keeps it young and tense. Drink now or hold for even more complexity. Best through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gini 2015 Contrada Salvarenza Vecchie Vigne (Soave Classico)

Description: Alluring aromas of woodland berry, sunbaked soil, hazelnut and truffle mingle with whiffs of leather and eucalyptus. The focused palate is savory and full of finesse, delivering juicy Marasca cherry, black currant, clove and tobacco alongside a tangy citrus note. Polished tannins and remarkable freshness for the hot vintage give it balance and structure. Drink now through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Isole e Olena 2015 Chianti Classico

Description: More exuberant than the winery's Arielle bottling, this opens with heady aromas of tropical fruit, peach and hawthorn. The rounded, delicious palate doles out Meyer lemon, ripe apricot, creamy yellow apple and a hint of honeydew before a savory finish suggesting salty minerality and chopped mint. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2016 Studi Bussi (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Boasting elegance and tension, this demonstrates the greatness of the Fiano grape. It opens with subtle aromas of yellow stone fruit, eucalyptus and crushed stone with a whiff of acacia honey that follow over to the well-structured palate along with mature yellow pear, wild mint and an almond note. A flinty mineral note graces the close. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Raiano 2016 Ventidue (Fiano di Avellino)
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made entirely with Nebbiolo, this creamy sparkler opens with enticing scents of wild red berry, bread crust, pastry cream and botanical herb. It's delicious and loaded with finesse, delivering strawberry, red cherry, vanilla and a hint of nutmeg set against a silky, continuous mousse. Bright acidity keeps it superbly balanced and fresh. A fantastic wine. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Germano Ettore 2016 Rosanna Metodo Classico Brut Rosé Sparkling (Vino Spumante)

Description: White stone fruit, citrus and almond aromas mingle with a whiff of flint. On the remarkably elegant, focused palate, tangy minerality and fresh acidity accompany apple, Meyer lemon and a hint of honey before a dry, nutty finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Raiano 2016 Alimata (Fiano di Avellino)
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of baked plum, purple flowers, exotic spices and French oak form the nose on this full-bodied red. The firmly structured palate shows focus and finesse, delivering ripe black cherry, spiced blueberry, licorice and tobacco alongside tightly knit, fine-grained tannins that leave a rather drying finish. Give it time to fully develop. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Arnaldo Caprai 2015 25 Anni (Montefalco Sagrantino)

Description: This stunning white is all about flavor and finesse. It opens with enticing scents of crushed stone, citrus zest, almond and heady whiffs of fragrant spring flower. The vertical, focused palate delivers tangy lemon drop candy, peach and savory mineral, while firm acidity provides balance and an ageworthy structure. It already boasts impressive depth, but hold for even more complexity. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Inama 2016 Vigneti di Carbonare (Soave Classico)

Description: From the winery's estate in Castel del Monte, this Aglianico boasts a dense dark-berry aroma on the nose, with shades of anise, crushed peppercorn and violet. There's richness to the firm palate that's built by flavors of thick-skinned dark berries and earthy spice. While approachable now, it should cellar well for years to come. Drink through 2029. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2014 Bocca Di Lupo Aglianico (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Yellow stone fruit, beeswax, Spanish broom and eucalyptus aromas form the nose. On the palate, a mineral note evoking crushed oyster shell underscores ripe peach, apricot, yellow pear and lemon drop candy alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2016 Studi Laura (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Focused and elegant, this linear white offers aromas of mature yellow stone fruit and crushed stone with a whiff of hawthorn. Linear and precise, the palate shows restraint and finesse, delivering dried apricot, unsweetened lemon drop candy, almond and a hint of ginger. Juicy acidity lifts the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: I Stefanini 2017 Monte di Fice (Soave Classico)

Description: Made with 100% Pinot Nero grapes, this copper-colored wine opens with enticing scents of spring field flowers, orchard fruits and wild berries. The delicious, elegant palate doles out white cherry, strawberry, citrus and minerality, while baking spice notes lend depth. Vinified as a white wine, this is a rare, intriguing bottling. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cavallotto 2017 Pinner Pinot Nero (Vino Bianco d'Italia)
Country: Vino Bianco d'Italia, Italy Other, Italy

Description: Aromas tropical fruit, chamomile, toasted nut and acacia lift out of the glass. The full, rounded palate doles out ripe apricot, yellow peach, juicy pineapple and grilled herb, while a bitter almond note graces the lingering finish. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pieropan 2017 La Rocca (Soave Classico)

Description: Aromas of yellow field flower, spring blossom and whiffs of wet flint form the nose. The elegant, linear palate boasts great energy, offering lemon drop candy, graphite and bitter almond alongside vibrant acidity. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Inama 2016 Vigneti di Foscarino (Soave Classico)

Description: Made entirely with Sangiovese, this elegant red has aromas of underbrush, moist earth, hazelnut and French oak. On the taut palate, firm, fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity accompany cassis, espresso, vanilla and coconut before a rather drying finish. Give it a few more years to unwind and fully come together. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lungarotti 2013 Rubesco Riserva Vigna Monticchio Red (Torgiano)

Description: Earthy and elegant, this offers aromas of mature black-skinned berry, pressed rose petal and leather along with a whiff of game. Reflecting the nose, the linear, savory palate evokes dried cherry, raspberry compote, licorice and charcuterie alongside a hint of black tea. Taut, polished tannins and fresh acidity provide support. Give it time to fully develop. Drink 2020–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Contucci 2015 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy
