Description: Underbrush, violet, rose and wild herb aromas mingle together on this fragrant, elegant red. The enveloping palate has concentration and finesse, delivering fleshy black cherry, blackberry and baking spice alongside tightly knit but velvety tannins. Drink through 2032. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lungarotti 2012 Rubesco Riserva Vigna Monticchio Red (Torgiano)

Description: Spiced plum, tobacco, rose and citrusy aromas shape the nose. On the full-bodied, enveloping palate, firm, grainy tannins accompany dried black cherry, raisin and baking spice. The fruit richness easily stands up to the hefty alcohol, while fresh acidity lends balance. Drink 2020–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Fratelli Pardi 2014 Montefalco Sagrantino

Description: Dense aromas of dark berries meld with subtle accents of cinnamon, violet and anise on the nose of this wine that's sourced from the winery's Castel del Monte estate. There's a plushness to the palate where thick-skinned dark berries are holding court alongside baking spice and earthy undertones, with firm tannins and bright acidity lending support to the whole. Drink through 2027. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2015 Bocca Di Lupo Aglianico (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Enticing scents of green apple, peach blossom and crushed stone mingle together on this elegant white. It's vibrant and loaded with finesse, offering Anjou pear, Meyer lemon and minerality alongside bright acidity. The crisp, dry finish closes on a ginger note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mustilli 2017 Sant'Agata dei Goti (Falanghina del Sannio)
Country: Falanghina del Sannio, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Grown on the limestone hills of the Castel del Monte region, this is an elegant Aglianico that displays an intense nose of crushed pink peppercorn, dried violet, hibiscus and tobacco. The medium-bodied palate is driven by persistent acidity and a mineral vein that are tightly coiled around tart red berry, spice and earth flavors. There's a lot of intensity to this wine that needs to unravel, including its firm, grippy tannins. Drink from 2022. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Rivera 2013 Cappellaccio Riserva Aglianico (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This beautiful white boasts an understated but enveloping elegance, starting with delicate but enticing scents of spring blossom, beeswax and ripe white stone fruit. The rounded, polished palate delivers creamy white peach, apricot, honey, wild herb and tangy mineral before a dry, lingering close. At four years old and despite the warm vintage, it's still remarkably fresh. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Balestri Valda 2015 Vigneto Sengialta (Soave Classico)

Description: Aromas suggesting petrol, wet stone, citrus rind and Mediterranean scrub lead the nose. On the chiseled palate, crisp acidity accompanies Meyer lemon, dried apricot and white almond before a saline close. It's focused, elegant and unique. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Sibilla 2016 Cruna deLago Falanghina (Campi Flegrei)

Description: Spring blossom, crushed stone and citrus fruit aromas waft out of the glass. The vibrant, focused palate has tension and finesse, offering Reinette apple, Meyer lemon, saline and bitter almond framed in bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2018 Pietracalda (Fiano di Avellino)
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Baked plum, coconut, toast, vanilla, nail polish and resin aromas mingle together on this brawny red. The solid palate shows French oak, roasted coffee bean and stewed prune alongside grainy tannins. You'll also notice the heat of evident alcohol. Give the tannins another year or two to soften, then enjoy in time to capture the remaining fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Montioni 2017 Montefalco Rosso

Description: Elegant and focused, this lovely sparkler opens with delicately enticing scents of white spring flowers, crushed herbs and white stone fruits. The vibrant, bone-dry palate shows precision and finesse, delivering tart apple, Bartlett pear, tangy citrus and minerality alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cascina Chicco 2015 Cuvée Dosaggio Zero Metodo Classico Sparkling (Vino Spumante)

Description: Aromas of wild berry, coffee bean, cedar and French oak lift out of the glass. The linear, elegant palate mirrors the nose, offering Morello cherry, pomegranate, espresso and star anise framed in taut, polished tannins. It's balanced, with fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Isole e Olena 2016 Chianti Classico

Description: Aromas of stewed prunes, blue flowers and exotic spices lead the way along with whiffs of underbrush. The full-bodied palate doles out baked plum, steeped cherry, licorice and mocha before a sage finish. Close-grained tannins lend firm support. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Montioni 2016 Montefalco Sagrantino

Description: Fragrant and racy, this elegant, focused white opens with heady scents of yellow stone fruit, spring blossom and wild herb. The vibrant, savory palate delivers apricot, pineapple, Meyer lemon and white almond set against zesty acidity that leaves a dry, juicy finish. A saline note graces the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pieropan 2018 Soave Classico

Description: Black-skinned berry, violet, new leather and tobacco aromas are front and center. Reflecting the nose, the smooth, approachable palate doles out juicy Marasca cherry, ripe plum, nutmeg and a hint of licorice framed in polished, pliant tannins. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Volpaia 2017 Chianti Classico

Description: Heady aromas of Spanish broom, white and yellow stone fruit and Mediterranean scrub along with a whiff of green melon fill the glass. Crisp, elegant and savory, the medium-bodied palate delivers ripe Bartlett pear, nectarine, Meyer lemon and tangy mineral notes. Enjoy now for the succulent fruit and freshness, or hold for more complexity. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2018 Cutizzi (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of blueberry brandy, underbrush, dark spice and eucalyptus take shape in the glass. On the tightly knit, brawny palate, assertive, close-grained tannins support dried black cherry, licorice and clove alongside the heat of evident alcohol. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Arnaldo Caprai 2015 Valdimaggio (Montefalco Sagrantino)

Description: Aromas of black-skinned fruit, underbrush, dried herbs and French oak form the subtle nose. Made with organically farmed Sangiovese, the firm, medium-bodied palate offers ripe Marasca cherry, spiced prune, dried sage and mocha alongside close-grained tannins. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Barberani 2016 Polvento Red (Umbria)

Description: Aromas of underbrush and prune and a whiff of pressed rose come together in the glass along with a resin note. Concentrated and enveloping, the rounded, full-bodied palate offers dried cherry, raisin, licorice and tobacco, all framed in tightly knit, close-grained tannins. Drink 2020–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Goretti 2015 Montefalco Sagrantino

Description: Resin, black-skinned berries, exotic spices and baked plum aromas slowly take shape on this along with whiffs of French oak. Densely concentrated, the firm, muscular palate offers blackberry jam, prune, vanilla and coconut set against assertive, close-grained tannins that clench the finish. Drink after 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lungarotti 2015 Montefalco Sagrantino

Description: Aromas of plum cake, orange and potpourri spice carry to the rounded, lush palate. There's density to the jammy fruit flavors, with immense acidity and copious yet pulverized tannins providing a fine counterbalance. While this leans more powerful than finessed, the overall outcome is quite enjoyable. This should reward with a few years in the cellar. Drink from 2022. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tommasi 2013 Masseria Surani Dionysos Riserva (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: White spring flowers, Alpine herbs and orange zest mingle with a whiff of bread crust on this crisp sparkler. The linear, racy palate offers yellow apple, pear, Meyer lemon and thyme alongside firm acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nino Franco 2014 Grave di Stecca Glera (Vino Spumante)

Description: Aromas of grilled herbs, ripe yellow stone fruits, Spanish broom and lychee fill the glass. On the vibrant, linear palate, crisp acidity accompanies mature apricot, yellow peach, lemon zest and saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Raiano 2016 Contrada Marotta (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of spring wildflowers and tropical fruits are front and center. On the tangy, savory yet understated palate, crisp acidity accompanies pineapple, green melon and Meyer lemon while a saline note lingers on the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Raiano 2018 Greco di Tufo
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: A heady mix of tilled earth, anise and tar ride over a dense blackberry and plum jam core. While densely packed on the palate, there's an impressive line of acidity pushing through to draw out the jammy fruit and spice flavors. Firm tannins lend ample support and clench up the finish. Drink from 2023. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tommasi 2015 Masseria Surani Dionysos Riserva (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: White spring flower and white orchard fruit aromas mingle with whiffs of beeswax on this fresh, polished white. The lovely palate shows ripe yellow apple, white peach and citrus zest before an almond and graphite finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gianni Tessari 2018 Monte Tenda (Soave Classico)

Description: Aromas of beeswax, acacia and honey mingle with whiffs of wild herb. The aromas carry on to the vibrant, focused palate along with mature yellow pear, citrus and saline before a bitter almond close. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Contrade di Taurasi–Lonardo 2016 Grecomusc' Roviello (Campania)

Description: A blend of equal parts Viognier and Grechetto, this opens with aromas of acacia flower, white stone fruit and a hint of cedar. The savory palate offers Bartlett pear, white peach, toasted almond and a hint of ginger alongside bright acidity. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alessandrojacopo Boncompagni Ludovisi 2016 Fiorano White (Vino Bianco d'Italia)
Country: Vino Bianco d'Italia, Italy Other, Italy

Description: Aromas of leather, underbrush, rose, dark spice and camphor lead the way. On the firm, focused palate, fine-grained tannins support cranberry, sour cherry and licorice before it closes on a coffee bean note. It's fresh, with bright acidity. Drink 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Val di Suga 2013 Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Honeysuckle and exotic fruit aromas are front and center on this dazzling white. On the linear, vibrant palate, you'll find honeydew, Meyer lemon and tart apple alongside crisp acidity. A mineral note reminiscent of oyster shell closes the dry, tangy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2018 Greco di Tufo
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of lemon and wild herbs with a whiff of smoke take shape on this linear, vibrant white. Reflecting the nose, the racy, elegant palate delivers tart apple, citrus and a saline-like citrus note before a nutty finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Cavalier Pepe 2018 Refiano (Fiano di Avellino)
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Fruity and floral, this fresh, juicy red offers aromas of wild berries, fragrant blue flowers and crushed herbs with a whiff of forest floor. Showing Nebbiolo's playful, charming side, it's bright and delicious, doling out succulent Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, orange zest and baking spice alongside tangy acidity and supple tannins. It's made to be enjoyed young, so drink over the next few years. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Guelpa 2017 Longitudine 8.26 Nebbiolo (Vino Rosso d'Italia)
Country: Vino Rosso d'Italia, Italy Other, Italy

Description: This opens with aromas of wild red berry, botanical herb, pipe tobacco and underbrush. The aromas follow over to the medium-bodied palate together with spiced blackberry, while fine-grained tannins offer polished support. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Fratelli Pardi 2016 Montefalco Rosso

Description: Blackberry jam and exotic spice aromas lead the nose along with a hint of menthol. On the brawny, velvety palate, flavors of vanilla, licorice and mocha accent a core of fleshy black cherry and prune. The heat of evident alcohol signals the finish, while close-grained tannins offer firm support. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenute Lunelli 2016 Lampante Riserva (Montefalco Rosso)

Description: From the winery's Salento estate located in the Brindisi province, this Negroamaro shows a wealth of black olive, game, pepper and brandied dark berries on the nose. The firm, medium-bodied palate is framed by polished tannins that prop up a complex mix of fruit, spice and savory qualities that echo the nose. A tangy mineral note propels freshness from the start to the lingering finish. Drink from 2022. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2015 Masseria Maìme Negroamaro (Salento)

Description: Aromas of dark-skinned berries, toasted oak and underbrush lead the nose. The spicy, structured palate offers dried black cherry, black pepper, tobacco and clove alongside tight, close-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Arnaldo Caprai 2015 Collepiano (Montefalco Sagrantino)

Description: Yellow wildflower, exotic fruit and ripe pear aromas lead the nose. On the juicy, savory palate, a tangy mineral note energizes creamy white peach, Meyer lemon and honeydew, while a hint of white almond lingers on the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gini 2017 Soave Classico

Description: Aromas of citrus, honey and pressed Spanish broom shape the nose. Linear and savory, the palate also boasts elegance, offering mature apricot, yellow pear, lemon drop candy and tangy saline alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina di Monteforte 2016 Castellaro (Soave Classico Superiore)

Description: Extremely refined, this understated but intriguing wine offers delicate aromas of mature yellow stone fruit, citrus and hawthorn. Smooth and enveloping, the palate shows elegance and a weightless concentration, doling out mature apricot, lemon zest, mineral and white almond alongside mild but still fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Portinari 2017 Ronchetto (Soave Classico Superiore)

Description: A blend of 90% Sangiovese and 10% Colorino, this focused red opens with aromas of black cherry and blue flowers along with a whiff of exotic spice. Savory and medium bodied, the polished palate delivers cassis, white pepper and star anise set against polished tannins. Bright acidity keeps it fresh and focused. Drink now through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lungarotti 2016 Rubesco Red (Torgiano)

Description: Aromas of steeped plum and baking spice and a whiff of rose lift out of the glass. Round and concentrated, the full-bodied, enveloping palate doles out fleshy black cherry, blackberry jam and cinnamon alongside close-grained, dusty tannins. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roccafiore 2014 Montefalco Sagrantino

Description: Sourced from 50- to 90-year-old bush-trained vines, this dense red offers a wealth of baked plum, fig, cracked pepper and orange rind on the nose. The palate is rich yet well balanced by a framing of persistent acidity and firm tannins. Cocoa and coffee tones provide a solid counterpoint to all the ripe, jammy fruit. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Produttori di Manduria 2014 Sonetto Riserva (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This wine spent 18 months in 50% new French oak. Aromas of anise, game and pepper ride over a concentrated dark cherry core on the nose. The palate is creamy in feel, with ripe berry and savory spice flavors that are supported by integrated tannins and bright acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Pietraventosa 2013 Riserva Primitivo (Gioia del Colle)
Country: Gioia del Colle, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of cassis and blue flowers along with a whiff of bell pepper lift out of the glass. Savory and smooth, the juicy palate delivers black cherry, licorice, ground pepper and crushed mint. Firm, refined tannins provide the framework. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Còlpetrone 2016 Saccr Red (Umbria)

Description: This blend of Primitivo, Negroamaro and Cabernet Sauvignon offers an intense nose of brandied cherry and blackberry, with a wealth of peppery spice, anise and potpourri. It is full in feel, displaying a mix of dried and fresh fruit tones that meld with sweet spice and drying tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Li Veli 2016 Red (Salento)

Description: A wealth of savory spice starts off this wine: anise and Chinese five spice powder are joined by orange and game. The full-bodied palate is big and plush in feel, filled out by ripe dark cherry and blackberry flavors. Despite the massive feel, there's plenty of balance from tangy acidity and a lifted mineral element. The tannins offer grip but remain in check, providing ample support for all that fruit. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Poderi d'Agostino 2016 F.D. Nero di Troia (Murgia)

Description: This red offers an intense nose of tobacco, game, violet and peppery spice, with rich cherry filling out the core. Starting out rounded and plump on the medium-bodied palate, bright acidity and a tangy mineral note quickly pick up and lend a fine, taut feel alongside sinewy tannins. The finish lingers on savory spice tones. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torrevento 2014 Ottagono Riserva Nero di Troia (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of cedar, dried yellow stone fruits, Spanish broom and wild herbs come together on this. The full-bodied palate offers dried apricot, mature pear, lemon drop candy and toasted nut before a saline finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marisa Cuomo 2017 Fiorduva White (Costa d'Amalfi)

Description: This Primitivo-led rosato offers bright aromas of cherry, watermelon and cinnamon. It's vibrant and crunchy on the palate in lots of bubbly berry flavors that are energized by a slick of wet stone. Cranberry skin tannins frame it all, contributing to the overall power of this boisterous pink pour. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Pietraventosa 2018 EstRosa Rosato (Murgia)

Description: Citrus blossom, white stone fruit and wild herb aromas set the tone on this elegant white. Linear and racy, the palate offers yellow apple, pear, Meyer lemon and tangy minerality evoking oyster shell alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2018 Fiano di Avellino
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: The nose is rather shy but eventually reveals aromas of pressed field flowers and wet stone. Tangy and linear, the rounded, understated palate evokes dried apricot, mature pear and a hint of lemon drop candy alongside a suggestion of saline on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Suavia 2017 Monte Carbonare (Soave Classico)

Description: Intensely fragrant, this soft, savory white opens with heady scents of elderflower, citrus blossom and white stone fruit. The palate doles out ripe Granny Smith, white peach, green melon and Meyer lemon alongside tangy acidity. It closes on the barest hint of white almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franchetto 2018 La Capelina (Soave)

Description: This opens with aromas of exotic fruit and fragrant spring flowers. On the medium-bodied palate, crisp acidity accompanies Reinette apple, white peach, Meyer lemon and a hint of minerality before a tangy close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria La Rivolta 2018 Taburno Greco (Sannio)

Description: Lightly scented, this has delicate but enticing aromas of spring flowers and white stone fruit with a whiff of beeswax. The rounded palate offers yellow apple, nectarine, lemon zest and white almond alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pieropan 2017 Soave Classico

Description: Aromas of baked cherry and blackberry meld with dried hay, anise and orange on the nose. The medium-bodied palate is all about jammy fruit, with accents of spice, orange and earth that add complexity. Bright acidity and drying tannins push through to tighten up the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Produttori di Manduria 2015 Elegia Riserva (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This bright, crunchy Primitivo sees no time in oak. Firm black cherry and blackberry aromas are lifted by streaks of graphite and pink peppercorn. It is tangy yet explosive on the palate in a tart dark-berry flavor, with a grip of tannins providing a fine counterbalance. Graphite and violet pick up on the midpalate and extend through the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Pietraventosa 2016 Allegoria Primitivo (Gioia del Colle)
Country: Gioia del Colle, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Dense dark-berry aromas are lifted by plenty of violet, graphite and potpourri spice on the nose. There's a creaminess to the dark fruit on the palate, with warm baking spice tones and firm tannins giving grip and bright acidity lifting it up. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2017 Torcicoda Primitivo (Salento)

Description: Enticing scents of spring blossoms, citrus, white stone fruit and Mediterranean brush waft out of the glass. Structured and loaded with finesse, the vibrant, linear palate delivers Meyer lemon, white peach, Bartlett pear and tangy saline notes before a long, crisp finish. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terredora Di Paolo 2018 Le Loggia della Serra (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This elegant sparkler opens with delicate scents recalling violet, red berry, bread crust and citrus. The focused, racy palate offers pink grapefruit, pomegranate and a saline-like mineral note, while vibrant acidity lends nice tension. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cascina Chicco 2015 Cuvée Rosé Dosaggio Zero Metodo Classico Sparkling (Vino Spumante)
Designation: Cuvée Rosé Dosaggio Zero Metodo Classico

Description: Ripe black-skinned fruit, truffle, wild herb and brown spice aromas shape the nose. A blend of 70% Sangiovese, 15% Sagrantino and 15% Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, it's smooth and juicy, offering ripe black cherry, blackberry compote and nutmeg alongside taut, polished tannins. Enjoy through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roccafiore 2016 Montefalco Rosso

Description: Alluring aromas of Spanish broom, white stone fruits and wild herbs shape the nose. The linear, focused palate offers Reinette apple, pear, Meyer lemon and saline before a hazelnut finish. Crisp acidity keeps it vibrant. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terredora Di Paolo 2018 Fiano di Avellino
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of white orchard fruit and Spanish broom with a whiff of honeydew take shape in the glass. On the focused, racy palate, bright acidity accompanies white peach, yellow pear, Meyer lemon and a hint of honeyed almond before a saline close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Raiano 2018 Fiano di Avellino
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Honed aromas of grapefruit, melon, crushed herbs and peony carry the nose. There's a beautiful tension to the palate in tight mineral and grapefruit flavors that are broadened out by plenty of juicier melon and apricot tones. The savory, earthy tones win out on the finish, ending brisk and clean. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Botromagno 2018 Rosé di Lulú Rosato (Murgia)

Description: The first vintage of this Negroamaro rosato comes out with a bang. Pretty aromas of grapefruit, melon and spice carry to the creamy, medium-bodied palate. Tangy acidity lends power and support to the fruit, with slight astringency offering a firm grip to the whole experience. An orange blossom tone lingers on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Altemura 2018 Zìnzula Rosé (Salento)

Description: A concentrated nose of brandied cherry, tobacco and dried herbs carries the nose. The medium-bodied palate is rich in feel yet well honed by persistent acidity and integrated tannins. Flavors of dark cherry, leather and tobacco are lifted by a bright mineral vein that extends through the lingering finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Leone de Castris 2015 Donna Lisa Riserva Red (Salice Salentino)

Description: Aromas of yellow stone fruit and toasted hazelnut lead the nose along with a whiff of acacia. On the round, savory palate, a honeyed almond note accents ripe apricot and pineapple before a saline close. Drink through 2020. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina del Castello 2017 Pressoni (Soave Classico)

Description: Yellow stone fruit, orange blossom and Mediterranean scrub aromas form the delicate, enticing nose. Tangy and linear, the precise palate delivers ripe Reinete apple, pear, white pepper and citrus set against crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2018 Serrocielo (Falanghina del Sannio)
Country: Falanghina del Sannio, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Cassis, exotic spice, blue flower and graphite aromas form the nose. The structured, elegant palate offers dried black cherry, white pepper and licorice, while firm, fine-grained tannins provide polished support. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lungarotti 2016 San Giorgio Red (Umbria)

Description: A pleasing depth of bramble berry jam melds with lifted tones of violet, pepper and tilled earth in this delightful Primitivo. There's richness to the fruit on the palate, but it all feels quite fresh and crunchy due to the bright acidity and firm tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: San Marzano 2017 Talò (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with organically farmed Fiano, this racy, bone-dry sparkler delivers aromas and flavors of bread crust, citrus and saline, along with a smoky note. Vibrant acidity and a lively perlage provide the framework before a nutty, mineral finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casa di Baal NV Oro di Baal Metodo Classico Pas Dosé Fiano (Vino Spumante)
Designation: Oro di Baal Metodo Classico Pas Dosé

Description: Heady aromas suggesting ripe apple, honeysuckle and tropical fruit almost jump out of the glass. Reflecting the nose, the bright, medium-bodied palate offers ripe pear, honeydew and tangerine drop candy. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria La Rivolta 2018 Falanghina del Sannio
Country: Falanghina del Sannio, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Linear and savory, this elegant, understated white has lovely scents of spring blossoms, wet stone and orchard fruit. It's racy and light bodied, delivering lemon, yellow apple and bitter almond alongside vibrant acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mustilli 2017 Greco (Sannio)

Description: Spring field flower, yellow stone fruit and a whiff of lightly grilled herb waft out of the glass. The tangy palate doles out mature apricot, yellow peach and lemon drop candy before a savory, saline finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattori 2017 Motto Piane (Soave)

Description: A blend of 60% Primitivo and 40% Negroamaro, this wine offers an intensity of tobacco, leather and dried herbs on the nose, with blackberry coulis filling out the dense core. It is rich in dark-berry flavors on the palate, yet bright acidity and firm tannins provide a solid frame alongside a wealth of lingering spice tones. Drink through 2025. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantele 2015 Amativo Red (Salento)

Description: This blend of 70% Aglianico, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Syrah offers a wealth of fruit on the nose in red cherry, bramble berry and currant aromas, with delicate warm spice tones lingering in the background. The lithe palate follows suit, framed by soft, chalky tannins and tangy acidity. It's a lively blend that will please many palates. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2016 Trentangeli Red (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of lemon blossom, white stone fruit and Mediterranean scrub lead the way on this intriguing white. The dry, rounded palate delivers unsweetened lemon drop candy, fennel seed and nectarine before a saline, almost salty finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salvatore Martusciello 2017 Serrevulcani Falanghina (Campi Flegrei)

Description: Elegant and understated, this opens with delicate scents of mature orchard fruit, yellow spring flower and crushed botanical herbs. The smooth, enveloping palate offers dried apricot, mature yellow pear and unsweetened lemon drop candy alongside juicy acidity. It closes on a hint of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Mainente 2017 Vigne del Tenda (Soave Classico)

Description: Aromas of wisteria, exotic fruit and citrus shape the nose. Reflecting the aromas, the round, juicy palate offers banana, lemon drop candy and white peach alongside tangy acidity. It closes on a white almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Mandolare 2018 Corte Menini (Soave Classico)

Description: Aged in large French casks, this opens with aromas of dried fruit, vanilla and zesty candied citrus peel. The mature, medium-bodied palate offers lemon drop candy, ripe grapefruit and toasted almond. The dry finish closes on a hint of spice. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sandro de Bruno 2015 Monte San Piero (Soave Superiore)

Description: Made entirely from Negroamaro, this riserva offers a striking balance between elegance and rusticity. Brandied cherry and blackberry aromas carry the nose alongside a savory hoisin sauce note. Tangy red fruit broadens out the medium-bodied palate, with a grip of tannins carrying it through to the dark cocoa-dusted finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Leone de Castris 2015 Per Lui Riserva Red (Salice Salentino)

Description: Aromas of mixed berry preserves and fig are lifted by accents of pepper, violet and tar on the nose. There's a pleasing vibrancy to the palate, with lively acidity brightening flavors of jammy berries and orange rind. The tannins are fine yet copious, giving a structured frame to this immensely food-friendly wine. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Vespa 2017 Il Rosso dei Vespa (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Lifted aromas of crushed red pepper, cracked black pepper and tar sit over a dense dark berry core on the nose. There's ample richness on the palate in lush dark berry flavors yet it's lifted by an equal force of bright acidity. This shows good progression and structure, offering a balance between power and precision. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Li Veli 2016 Askos Primitivo (Salento)

Description: Dark cherry, bubblegum, anise and clove dot the nose of this brooding Primitivo. There's a creamy concentration of dark fruit to the palate, with tangy acidity lifting it up. Plenty of warm spice and dry tannins linger on the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torrevento 2015 Since 1913 Primitivo (Puglia)

Description: Made entirely with Malvasia, this offers scents of yellow stone fruits, citrus and yellow spring flowers. The palate is delicately sparkling and tangy, offering orange zest, pear and apricot before a hint of lemon drop candy. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Virgona NV Ruffiano Extra Dry Sparkling (Vino Spumante)

Description: Bright aromas of cherry jam, plum, geranium, blood orange rind and crushed stone carry the nose. The sleek, light-bodied palate offers crunchy red fruit lifted by juicy acidity, making this a superfresh and enjoyable wine. The tannins ride in the background, lending support to the fruit and mineral flavors. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2017 Nèprica Primitivo (Puglia)

Description: Earthy and enjoyable, this opens with aromas evoking wild black cherry, tilled soil, leather and a whiff of game. The aromas follow over to the bright, sleek palate along with crushed thyme and a hint of clove. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Contucci 2016 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: This opens with aromas of spring blossoms, mature yellow stone fruits and wild herbs with whiffs of spice. Reflecting the nose, the medium-bodied, rounded palate delivers mature apricot, spearmint, white mint and yellow peach alongside lemon zest. It closes on a bitter almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Giacobbe 2017 Vigneto Runcata (Soave Superiore)

Description: Inky ruby in the glass, this rich wine offers aromas of cherry jam on the nose, alongside iodine, blood orange and a savory note reminiscent of sake. There's density to the lush fruit on the medium-bodied palate, supported by firm tannins and well-balanced acidity. A cocoa-dusted blueberry note lingers on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Felline 2017 Terra Rossa (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with organically grown grapes and fermented in amphorae, this brawny red has a shy nose that eventually reveals stewed plum, moist earth and game. Densely concentrated, the ripe palate doles out blackberry jam, prune and baking spice alongside solid, enveloping tannins that leave a firm, drying finish. You'll also notice the heat of evident alcohol on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fongoli 2013 Francaton (Montefalco Sagrantino)

Description: Bright, bouncy aromas of red cherry and blackberry carry a sweet spice inflection of vanilla and anise on the nose. This is light in profile yet smooth and supple in feel, with a delicate framing of polished tannins and fresh acidity. Drink in the near term. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Leone de Castris 2016 50th Vintage Riserva Red (Salice Salentino)

Description: There's a wealth of ripeness to this rosato, displaying rich tones of crushed strawberry, cherry and watermelon alongside a slight balsamic tone. While it shows a depth of fruit on the palate, it still maintains admirable freshness in bright acidity. A resinous herb accent offers additional lift, and fine, stony tannins mark the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Produttori di Manduria 2018 Aka Primitivo Rosato (Salento)

Description: Aromas of elderflower, citrus and white orchard fruit lead the nose. The rounded palate shows body and discreet concentration, offering ripe yellow pear, peach and lemon drop candy before a bitter almond finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Solar 2017 Le Caselle (Soave Classico)

Description: Spiced plum and blue flower aromas take center stage on this blend of Sangiovese, Sagrantino, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. On the full-bodied palate, solid tannins accompany fleshy black cherry, cassis and ground pepper. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenute Lunelli 2017 Ziggurat (Montefalco Rosso)

Description: Aromas of spiced blackberry and cherry meld with accents of smoke, stone and blood orange. The well-meshed palate is built by fine tannins and bright acidity, rounded out by plenty of lush berry flavors. This is smooth and supple in feel, with a well-balanced nature that makes it a great crowd-pleasing wine. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tommasi 2016 Masseria Surani Heracles (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This blend of Negroamaro and Malvasia Nera doesn't give much away on the nose at first, yet iodine, baked black fruit and dark chocolate arise with time in the glass. There's a brawniness to the medium-bodied palate in the way of rich flavors of mixed berry jam, cocoa and vanilla that extend on the finish. Medium-grained tannins and juicy acidity lend ample support to the whole. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Vetrère 2015 Kremelios Red (Salento)

Description: This blend of Primitivo, Aglianico, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon offers a well-integrated nose of leather, anise and brandy-soaked cherries. The smooth palate offers rich cherry and berry flavors that are brightened by specks of savory spice and earth. Supple tannins and fresh acidity frame it all. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Amastuola 2016 Onda del Tempo Organic Red (Puglia)

Description: Ripe cherry and blackberry aromas are lifted by orange and potpourri spices. Rounded in feel, the palate pops in bright, bouncy red-fruit flavors, with spicy tannins riding underneath. Accents of violet and graphite arise on the midpalate and extend through the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Li Veli 2017 Orion Primitivo (Salento)

Description: This light ballerina pink rosato offers bright aromas of peaches and cream, cherry blossom and grapefruit. An orange creamsicle flavor arises on the palate, yet there's tamed acidity and delicate tannins to tighten it up. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Li Veli 2018 Primerose Negroamaro Rosato (Salento)

Description: Made with organically farmed 80% Sangiovese and 20% Cabernet and Merlot, this has subtle aromas of wild berries and ground brown spices. It's juicy, savory and easy drinking, doling out ripe black cherry, cassis and clove set against polished tannins. Enjoy through 2020. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Barberani 2017 Foresco Red (Umbria)

Description: This is a plush, rounded red that's full of juicy dark berry, hot earth and violet tones. There's a bit of jamminess on the palate, yet smooth tannins and integrated acidity do well to provide grip and structure. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Feudo Croce 2017 Imperio LXXIV (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of yellow stone fruits, citrus and botanical herbs are front and center. Made with organically grown grapes, the savory, linear palate offers apricot and white grapefruit alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gorgo 2018 San Michele (Custoza)

Description: While not a common grape for the region, Sauvignon Blanc seems to have found a home in the winery's limestone-based vineyards that sit at over 1,000 feet in elevation. Crisp aromas of gooseberry, lime and passion fruit meld with a grassy tomato vine tone. There's a juicy, fresh feel to the palate that melds all of these notes together to yield a well-balanced wine that shows good tension and grip. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Rivera 2018 Terre Al Monte Sauvignon (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: There's a pleasing mix of spiced cherry and blackberry on the nose of this wine, alongside blood orange rind and hot earth. The palate is plush in feel, with fine tannins and juicy acidity supporting a mix of lush berry fruit and warm spice. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tommasi 2017 Masseria Surani Heracles (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This Nero di Troia is dense and brooding on the nose in dark cherry coulis, tobacco and earth. A sour cherry flavor arises on the medium-bodied palate, propelled along by driving acidity and powdered tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torrevento 2014 Vigna Pedale Riserva Red (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with Glera and Pinot Nero grapes, this has aromas of honeysuckle and white orchard fruit and a whiff of crushed botanical herbs. On the tangy, foaming palate, fresh acidity accompanies pomegranate, white peach and white grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: BiancaVigna NV Cuvée 1931 Rosa Sparkling (Vino Spumante)

Description: Aged on its lees for nine months in steel, this opens with aromas of acacia honey and toasted almond. The aromas follow over to the linear palate along with Meyer lemon, saline and dried herbs before a tangy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casa di Baal 2017 Fiano (Colli di Salerno)
Country: Colli di Salerno, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of brandied cherry and blackberry carry the nose of the Primitivo and Aglianico blend, alongside a wealth of baking spice and tobacco. It is smooth and plush in feel with no hard edges. Plump berry fruit flavors fill it out, with small-grained tannins firming up the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Due Palme 2015 1943 del Presidente Red (Salento)

Description: Aromas of honeysuckle, citrus and Mediterranean brush waft out of the glass. The tangy palate of this wine, made with native grapes Coda di Volpe and Falanghina, offers Meyer lemon, saline and yellow pear alongside vibrant acidity. An almond note marks the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2018 White (Lacryma Christi del Vesuvio)
Country: Lacryma Christi del Vesuvio, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of toasted nut and acacia honey follow over to the linear palate along with unsweetened lemon drop candy, citrus, mature yellow pear and a hint of brioche. Fresh acidity lifts rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guastaferro 2017 Bianco Fulgeo White (Campania)

Description: Made with rare native grape Roviello and 20% Fiano, this has heady aromas of citrus zest, spring flowers, Mediterranean herbs and pine sap. It's linear and medium bodied, offering acacia honey, lemon and almond alongside fresh acidity and a mineral note suggesting saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guastaferro 2018 Bianco Fulgeo White (Campania)

Description: Made with Falanghina and Biancolella, this delicately scented wine offers scents of white spring flower and white stone fruit. The linear, vibrant palate shows pear, apple and Meyer lemon alongside vibrant acidity. It closes on a saline note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marisa Cuomo 2018 Furore Bianco White (Costa d'Amalfi)

Description: Earthy aromas of tobacco and leather meld with a balsamic cherry note on the nose. There's weight to the medium-bodied palate, with racy acidity pushing through to clean up the clench of the sinewy, dry tannins. Tobacco and violet linger on the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Li Veli 2016 Pezzo Morgana Riserva Negroamaro (Salice Salentino)

Description: This has floral and fruit aromas of honeysuckle and ripe orchard fruits while the linear, medium-bodied palate doles out ripe pear, acacia honey and almond. It has a tangy finish thanks to saline notes and bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terredora Di Paolo 2018 Le Starse Coda di Volpe (Irpinia)

Description: Aromas of ripe apricot and dried white flowers carry to the rounded palate. Flavors of white tea and peach skin show a pleasing grip of astringency, with plenty of juicy fruit tones filling it out. A lifted vein of acidity keeps it persistent and lively. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tommasi 2018 Masseria Surani Arthemis Fiano (Puglia)

Description: Made from organically grown Aglianico, this rosato offers ripe watermelon and strawberry on the nose alongside crushed stone and a balsamic edge. Tangy red fruit melds with lush melon on the palate, with dried herbs and more stone extending on the finish. For those looking for a structured yet fruity offering, this is an excellent choice. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Amastuola 2018 Ondarosa Organic Rosato (Puglia)

Description: This opens with subdued aromas evoking beeswax, yellow stone fruit and steel. The palate is linear, offering dried apricot, lemon drop candy and a hint of honey before a bitter almond finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alessandrojacopo Boncompagni Ludovisi 2017 Fioranello White (Lazio)

Description: Blue flower, black-skinned berry, crushed mint and baking spice aromas are front and center on this fragrant red. The tight, medium-bodied palate shows dried black cherry, ground pepper and sage set against firm, close-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Arnaldo Caprai 2016 Rosso (Montefalco Sagrantino)

Description: This full-bodied red opens with aromas of wild berries, botanical herbs, violets and toasted notes. The firmly structured palate offers sour cherries marinated in spirits, French oak and espresso framed in tightly wound, close-grained tannins that leave an astringent close. Give the tannins another few years to unwind. Drink 2022–2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Arnaldo Caprai 2016 Rosso Riserva (Montefalco Sagrantino)

Description: There's a density of plum and red berry notes to the nose, along with overtones of game, orange spice, tilled earth and anise. The medium-bodied palate is lithe in feel, with tart red fruit flavors that are filled out nicely by savory spice and earth accents. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Botromagno 2017 Primitivo (Puglia)

Description: Alluring scents of wisteria and exotic fruit lift out of the glass. On the tangy palate, fresh acidity accompanies honeydew and ripe green apple, while a hint of lemon drop candy signals the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Adami 2018 Cimalta (Soave Classico)

Description: Aromas of apple peel, citrus and lemon verbena carry to the light, crisp palate. This is brisk and lively in feel, displaying a wonderful mix of orchard fruit, citrus and herbal flavors that make it a perfect accompaniment alongside grilled chicken or seafood. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Leone de Castris 2018 Messapia Verdeca (Salento)

Description: Yellow spring flower, orchard fruit and citrus aromas lead the way on this refreshing white. The savory, light-bodied palate shows ripe apple, Meyer lemon and a hint of white almond accompanied by bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marco Mosconi 2018 Corte Paradiso (Soave)

Description: There's intensity on the nose in aromas of peach, melon, chamomile and pine, which translate to the ripe, medium-bodied palate. There's plenty of zesty acidity and tea-like astringency to tighten up the overall feel, with a blossomy note lingering on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Produttori di Manduria 2018 Zìn Fiano (Salento)

Description: Aromas of spring field flower and white stone fruit lead the nose. On the round palate, you'll find ripe apple, white peach and a hint of lemon drop candy before a white almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina di Soave 2017 Rocca Sveva Ciondola (Soave Classico Superiore)

Description: Aromas of sea spray, citrus and white blossoms meld with a lightly toasted background. There's ample roundness to the palate, with grilled lemon and melon flavors that are propped up by juicy acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantele 2017 Teresa Manara Chardonnay (Salento)

Description: Aromas of chamomile, hawthorn and yellow stone fruit along with a whiff of beeswax shape the nose. On the round palate, juicy acidity accompanies dried apricot, ripe peach and a bitter almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina di Monteforte 2017 Foscarino (Soave Classico)

Description: Green apple, hawthorn and peach blossom aromas shape the inviting nose. Fresh, tangy and linear, the bright palate offers the same green apple sensations as well as green melon and citrus drop candy. It's dry and refreshing, with crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Mainente 2018 Tovo al Pigno (Soave Classico)

Description: Aromas of crushed gravel, toasted spice, chocolate and cherry jam display very good depth on the nose. There's levity to the medium-bodied palate, with tangy acidity pushing through the rich blue fruit and red fruit flavors. The tannins are fine and supportive, yet play second fiddle to the vivacious acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Leone de Castris 2017 Villa Santera (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: The nose is initially subdued but eventually suggests acacia flower, almond and eucalyptus. The vibrant, linear palate offers mature apricot, ripe yellow pear and thyme alongside a honeyed note and crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monte Tondo 2016 Foscarin Slavinus (Soave Classico Superiore)

Description: This opens with aromas of red berry, cedar and cooking spice. The straightforward palate offers raspberry jam, tobacco and vanilla alongside close-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Paolo e Noemia D'Amico 2015 Pinot Nero (Umbria)

Description: Subdued aromas of acacia, honey and toasted almond with a whiff of yellow stone fruit follow over to the palate along with fennel and dried apricot. Fresh acidity lifts the rather rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Sant'Antonio 2016 Vecchie Vigne (Soave)

Description: Aromas of ripe pineapple, apricot and dried flowers carry the nose. This medium-bodied white is slick and juicy in feel, with full stone and tropical fruit flavors that are honed by accents of lemon verbena and blanched almond. Despite the lushness, there's good grip and tension to the overall feel. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tommasi 2017 Masseria Surani Arthemis Fiano (Puglia)

Description: Aromas of spring field flower and white stone fruit lead the nose. On the round palate, you'll find ripe apple, white peach and a hint of lemon drop candy before a white almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina di Soave 2017 Rocca Sveva Ciondola (Soave Classico Superiore)

Description: Aromas of tropical fruit and wisteria fill the glass. On the crisp palate, vibrant acidity accompanies Meyer lemon and green melon before a tangy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colli di Castelfranci 2018 Grotte (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This opens with subdued aromas suggesting toasted nut, honey, coconut and mature citrus zest. The linear palate is also quite understated in terms of fruit richness, offering vanilla, butterscotch and bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Moschina 2016 I Tarai (Soave Superiore)

Description: Aromas of baked blueberry, cardamom and pie crust start off this ripe wine. The medium-bodied palate is plush and rounded in feel, with lots of juicy blue fruit dotted with toast and warm spice tones. It's an accessible wine to enjoy in the near term. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Due Palme 2015 Selvarossa Riserva Red (Salice Salentino)

Description: A blend of Sangiovese, Merlot and Ciliegiolo, this opens with aromas of toasted oak, black plum and underbrush. The dense palate offers prune, clove and tobacco alongside close-grained tannins. Drink after 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Goretti 2016 L'Arringatore Red (Colli Perugini)

Description: There's density to the blackberry and cherry jam aromas on the nose, with lifted accents of crushed pepper, violet and tilled earth adding nuance. It is rounded and soft in feel on the palate, with delicate tannins and juicy acidity lending support to the lush fruit. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Altemura 2016 Altemura (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with Sagrantino, Sangiovese and Montepulciano, this opens with aromas of cedar, mocha and dark-skinned fruit. The dense palate offers prune, roasted coffee bean and tobacco alongside close-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roccafiore 2015 Rosso Prova d'Autore Red (Umbria)

Description: This offers delicate aromas of acacia honey, yellow apple and almond that carry over to the linear, subtle palate along with a citrus note. Tangy acidity lifts the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Salvatore 1988 2018 Trentenare Fiano (Paestum)

Description: Baked plum, coconut, toast, vanilla, nail polish and resin aromas mingle together on this brawny red. The solid palate shows French oak, roasted coffee bean and stewed prune alongside grainy tannins. You'll also notice the heat of evident alcohol. Give the tannins another year or two to soften, then drink to capture the remaining fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Scacciadiavoli 2015 Montefalco Sagrantino

Description: Made with Syrah and a small amount of Vermentino, this opens with aromas of oak and brimstone and a whiff of mature white stone fruit. Fermented and aged in oak, the rounded palate offers ripe honeydew, peach and toasted notes alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Montecchiesi 2017 Versy in Rose Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Broom, citrus and a whiff of pastry shell waft out of the glass. The bright, creamy palate offers yellow apple, candied orange slice and a hint of walnut alongside fresh acidity and a lively perlage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Patria NV Metodo Classico Femina Brut Nerello Mascalese (Vino Spumante)

Description: Aromas of tilled earth, pepper and violet are mild on the nose. It is smooth and supple on the medium-bodied palate, with a tart red berry flavor rising up. The tannins are polished and the acidity is well balanced, making this an approachable Primitivo. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Amastuola 2015 Centosassi Primitivo (Puglia)

Description: Beeswax, citrus rind and acacia honey aromas form the nose along with a whiff of almond. The aromas carry over to the medium-bodied palate along with mature yellow apple skin and a smoky note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antico Castello 2017 Orfeo Fiano (Irpinia)

Description: A blend of Sangiovese and Merlot, this opens with aromas of dark-skinned fruit and black spice. The rounded palate offers cassis, bell pepper and ground clove alongside a note of powdered sage. Dusty, close-grained tannins give it a drying close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bigi 2016 Sartiano (Montefalco Sagrantino)

Description: Aromas of baked cherry dipped in liquor, tobacco and menthol show nice concentration on the nose. The medium-bodied palate offers a cherry jam flavor, with a stony, tangy element rising up on the finish. There's good acidic lift and a firm framing of tannins that support the medium-concentrated core. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Di Majo Norante 2013 Don Luigi Riserva Montepulciano (Molise)

Description: Aromas of tilled earth, menthol and spice tickle the nose, with ripe red plum at the core. The palate is sleek in feel, with juicy, crunchy berry and plum flavors that show good intensity. The acidity is persistent and lively, and the fruit lingers nicely on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Due Palme 2018 Don Cosimo Primitivo (Salento)

Description: This muscular red has subdued aromas suggesting black-skinned fruit, leather and spice. The assertive palate is lean on fruit richness, suggesting steeped prune, leather, ground clove and evident alcohol set against aggressive, grainy tannins that clench the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fongoli 2013 Montefalco Sagrantino

Description: Spanish broom, crushed rock and white stone fruit aromas slowly appear in the glass. The linear palate offers apricot, lemon drop candy and tangy oyster shell alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Battistelle 2017 Roccolo del Durlo (Soave Classico)

Description: Earthy tones of hot soil and clove meld with strawberry and cherry on the nose. The palate is supersmooth in feel, lifted by tangy acidity and a light mineral vein. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Li Veli 2017 Askos Susumaniello (Salento)

Description: An earthy nose of violet and menthol carries to the crunchy dark fruit on the palate. The tannins are mellow but provide a nice grip around all that bouncy fruit, with bright acidity lending support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Pietraventosa 2016 Volere Volare Primitivo (Puglia)

Description: This offers aromas of red berry, underbrush and cooking spice. The straightforward, easygoing palate delivers juicy red cherry, clove and cinnamon alongside supple tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roccafiore 2016 Il Roccafiore Sangiovese (Umbria)

Description: Aromas of French oak, camphor, underbrush and exotic spice lead the nose. The firm, austere palate presents coconut, oak-driven spice, dried Morello cherry and vanilla set against tight, grainy tannins that leave an astringent, mouthdrying finish. Give the tannins a few more years to unclench, then drink sooner rather than later to capture the remaining fruit richness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Lorenzo 2013 Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Toasted almond, acacia honey and pressed yellow flower aromas take shape in the glass. Lean and linear, the firm palate offers oak, vanilla, butterscotch, lemon and a honeyed note alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terredora Di Paolo 2015 Campo Rè (Fiano di Avellino)
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Delicately scented, this opens with aromas of spring wildflowers and wet stone with a whiff of yellow pear. On the palate, bitter almond accents yellow apple and dried apricot before a tangy close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Canoso 2017 Fonte (Soave Classico)

Description: Bright aromas of lemon, melon and white blossoms carry the nose. There's a slick, polished feel to the medium-bodied palate, with juicy stone fruit pushing forward. Bright acidity keeps it feeling lively, with a blanched almond note extending on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Li Veli 2018 Fiano (Salento)

Description: Subdued aromas of Spanish broom, toasted nut and citrus form the delicate nose. On the palate, a saline note accompanies grapefruit, lemon drop candy and bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cenatiempo 2017 Kalimera Biancolella (Ischia)

Description: Brandied blackberry and cherry aromas meld with sugarplum, baking spice and cola tones. Pulverized tannins give a delicate frame to the light-bodied palate, with tangy acidity leading the way for the bright cherry jam and spice flavors. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Claudio Quarta 2015 Cantina Moros Riserva Red (Salice Salentino)

Description: Light aromas of peppery spice, violet and cranberry start off this Negroamaro. There's a softness to the feel at first, yet bright acidity quickly brightens up the palate and propels along the flavors of tart red berries. Light tannins and ripe cherry show good resolve on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Leone de Castris 2017 Maiana Negroamaro (Salice Salentino)

Description: Made with Moscato Giallo, this opens with aromas of white rose, thyme, bread crust and lemon zest. The aromas carry over to the vibrant palate along with mature yellow apple skin and a note of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Maeli 2015 Brut Nature Moscato Giallo (Vino Spumante)

Description: Aromas of candied banana, citrus cream and stone are mild on the nose. There's some roundness to the palate that is fleshed out by citrus and papaya flavors. A stony mineral note rises up on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Rivera 2018 Preludio N.1 Chardonnay (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Subtle aromas of black-skinned fruit, Asian spice and a suggestion of rose slowly take shape on this. The solid, straightforward palate shows prune, coconut and espresso alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2020. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Scacciadiavoli 2016 Montefalco Rosso

Description: Aromas of dark cherry, pepper, toast and anise grace the nose. It is smooth and creamy in feel on the palate, lifted by bright, crunchy acidity. Toasty oak rides around the ripe fruit, with a tangy mineral note on the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Vetrère 2015 Barone Pazzo Primitivo (Salento)

Description: Made with 100% Sangiovese, this bright, savory semisparkler offers red berry, grapefruit and a hint of wild herb. It's refermented in the bottle and remains on its lees, giving it a slightly cloudy appearance. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Cilnia NV Larthi Sangiovese (Vino Spumante)

Description: Aromas of candied blackberry and cherry mark the nose, lifted by plenty of pepper, violet and tilled earth accents. The medium-bodied palate is framed by a solid structure of rigid tannins and juicy acidity, with plush dark-fruit flavors and spice filling it out. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Claudio Quarta 2016 Antico Sigillo (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This blend is dominated by Primitivo and Negroamaro, with smaller portions of Cabernet Sauvignon, Petit Verdot and Shiraz. Aromas of tar, potpourri and ripe blackberry carry to the plush, full palate. Warm spice and frankincense tones push through, with bright acidity and soft tannins holding it all together. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Claudio Quarta 2017 Sud del Sud Red (Puglia)

Description: Honeysuckle and tropical fruit aromas almost leap out of the glass on this fragrant white. The linear palate is a bit more subdued, offering yellow apple, pear and citrus alongside firm acidity and a hint of saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2018 Falanghina del Sannio
Country: Falanghina del Sannio, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of oak and toasted hazelnut with a whiff of dried yellow flowers shape the nose. The aromas carry on to the rather lean palate along with mature apricot and acacia before a citrus drop candy close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roccolo Grassi 2016 La Broia (Soave)

Description: Red berry and rose aromas lead the nose. The bright palate shows raspberry, orange zest and a hint of ginger alongside racy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Sant'Anna NV Cuvée Brut Sparkling (Vino Spumante)

Description: Lifted aromas of violet, pink peppercorn and hibiscus carry this unoaked Nero di Troia. It is vibrant and juicy on the palate, displaying bright cranberry and cherry flavors accented by plenty of floral and spice tones. The tannins are smooth and integrated, while the acidity propels it all along. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torrevento 2015 Torre Del Falco Nero di Troia (Puglia)

Description: A dense nose of brandied dark cherries melds with intense accents of savory and sweet spices. The firm palate boasts condensed dark fruit flavors that are bolstered by tangy acidity and fine-grained tannins. There's a bit of thickness to the fruit on the midpalate, yet savory spice tones lift it up by the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Vespa 2015 Helena Nero di Troia (Puglia)

Description: This blend of 50% Negroamaro, 35% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Primitivo offers a bright, zesty nose of mixed berries alongside lifted pepper and graphite accents. There's a tense, grippy feel to the tannins, with bright shots of acidity propelling the crunchy berry flavors along. A light cherry pit note extends on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2016 Neprica Red (Puglia)

Description: Aromas of blood orange, baked plum and cherry are lifted by potpourri spice on the nose. Rounded and juicy on the palate, a succulent red fruit jam flavor is honed by racy acidity and fine-grained tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Leone de Castris 2018 Il Medaglione Primitivo (Salento)

Description: A wealth of cured meat and anise aromas carry the nose, with purple flowers and cranberry at the core. The medium-bodied palate shows tart red and blue berries ensconced in toasty oak and violet. The tannins are spicy and a bit grainy, giving grit and grip to the whole. A tangy mineral tone pervades throughout to offer lift. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Grifo 2014 Augustale Riserva Nero di Troia (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Montepulciano, this opens with aromas of sunbaked earth, cassis and dark spice. The aromas carry over to the juicy, straightforward palate along with a hint of crushed sage and powdered tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argillae 2017 Sinuoso Red (Umbria)

Description: Spanish broom, citrus, and white stone fruit aromas lift out of the glass. The tangy palate offers yellow apple and notes of honeyed almond alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Capolino Perlingieri 2017 Nembo Fiano (Campania)

Description: Subdued aromas suggesting chamomile and mature citrus zest eventually appear in the glass. The rounded, subtle palate offers mature yellow apple and lemon drop candy before a bitter almond finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casarotto 2017 Vigne di Fittà (Soave Classico)

Description: Aromas of tropical fruits and white spring blossoms lead the nose along with a hint of nut. Crisp and linear, the palate offers green melon, Meyer lemon and an almond note alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Donnachiara 2018 Fiano di Avellino
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of allspice and juniper mesh well with the ripe cherry core in this wine. Lifted acidity is matched by smooth tannins to give a solid home for tart red berry and spice flavors. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Due Palme 2018 Canonico Negroamaro (Salento)

Description: Aromas of dried tropical fruit, pressed yellow flower and toasted almond lead the way. The toasted almond note follows over to the rather lean, linear palate together with dried apricot and a hint of chestnut honey before a saline close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gianni Tessari 2017 Pigno (Soave Classico)

Description: Made entirely with Nero d'Avola, this fun, foaming sparkler offers aromas of exotic fruits, honeysuckle and dark-skinned berries. On the off-dry palate, fresh acidity lifts juicy blackberry, ripe cherry and raspberry while it finishes on ripe pink grapefruit and candied notes. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gorghi Tondi NV Palmarès Extra Brut Rosé Sparkling (Vino Spumante)

Description: Cherry and bramble berry aromas meld with violet and pepper on the nose. There's a pleasing roundness to the medium-bodied palate, with bright acidity pushing through to deliver a bit of crunch behind all the fruit. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Altemura 2017 Negroamaro (Salento)

Description: This delicate rosato offers aromas of fresh basil and melon on the nose. There's a creamy melon flavor on the palate, with tangy white cherry and grapefruit lifting it up. While light on concentration, this shows delightful nuance with its powdered stone texture on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Poderi d'Agostino 2018 Poggio al Parco Rosato (Puglia)

Description: Ripe apricot and melon aromas meet accents of salt, pine and white flowers. This is rounded in feel yet driven by a persistent citrus flavor. There's a white tea-like astringency to the midpalate that extends through the salty finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Produttori di Manduria 2018 Alice Verdeca (Salento)

Description: This savory Chardonnay offers aromas of hard cheese rind and citrus cream on the nose. There's a pleasing ripeness to the palate in Meyer lemon and melon flavors, with a salty edge extending on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2017 Pietrabianca Chardonnay (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This has subdued aromas suggesting field flowers, wild herbs and yellow peaches. It's light bodied, offering flavors suggesting dried apricot, orange rind and a yeasty note of bread dough before a bitter almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alois 2016 Caiati Pallagrello Bianco (Terre del Volturno)
Country: Terre del Volturno, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of crushed red pepper, black pepper and liquor-soaked berries carries to the light-bodied palate. The dark berry flavors are firmed up by a crunch of tannins, with zesty acidity offering lift. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Amastuola 2016 Organic Primitivo (Puglia)

Description: Aromas of cola, anise and brandy-soaked dark cherry mark the nose, with peppery spice lingering in the background. The palate is rather soft and easy in feel, yet there's just enough acidity to keep it lifted. Cherry and crushed pepper mark the short finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantele 2015 Riserva Negroamaro (Salice Salentino)

Description: Subtle aromas of Spanish broom, white stone fruit and toasted nut float above the glass. The racy palate is lean in terms of fruit richness, suggesting dried peach and lemon zest alongside brisk acidity before a bitter almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Col di Corte 2016 Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore
Country: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore, Central Italy, Italy
City: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore

Description: Aromas of blackberry jam and violet interplay quietly on the nose. The fruit-forward palate is straightforward in its jammy berry appeal, with bright acidity and medium-grained tannins lending support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Due Palme 2018 Sangaetano (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: A wealth of potpourri spice, orange and pepper carry the nose. The soft, plush palate shows more fruit in the way of cherry and blackberry jam. An oaky char rises up on the midpalate and carries through the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Jorche 2014 Riserva (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: A blend of 80% Sangiovese and 20% Montepulciano, this opens with aromas of black-skinned berries and a whiff of sunbaked earth. The straightforward palate offers dried black cherry, prune and a hint of clove alongside soft tannins. Drink now. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roccafiore 2017 Melograno Red (Umbria)

Description: A pleasing intensity of red currant, tilled earth, violet and orange spice carries the nose. The palate is light in feel yet filled out by bright red and black berry flavors. A thin veil of tannins coats it all, with persistent acidity keeping it afloat. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tommasi 2016 Masseria Surani Ares Red (Puglia)

Description: Aromas of dark cherry and blackberry coulis meld with a proper dose of sweet spice on the nose. It is rounded and plush on the palate in ripe berry flavors, with juicy acidity and fine-grained tannins propping it all up. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Varvaglione 2015 12 e Mezzo Negroamaro (Salento)

Description: A heady dose of sweet spices grace the nose, with baked black-cherry and plum tones at the core. This is ultrasoft and plush in feel, led by jammy fruit flavors and lifted by juicy acidity. Ripe fruit and sweet spice linger on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Varvaglione 2015 Papale Oro (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: A spicy nose of potpourri melds with fresh grapefruit and lemon zest. It is creamy in feel on the palate, lifted by bright acidity and accented by lilac. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Varvaglione 2018 12 e Mezzo Malvasia Bianca (Salento)

Description: A mild nose of wild strawberry with a balsamic edge starts off this rosato made from Negroamaro and Malvasia Nera. The medium-bodied palate is juicy in feel, driven by watermelon and cherry flavors that are honed by a streak of limestone and a mild grip of tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Vetrère 2018 Taranta Rosato (Salento)

Description: This Negroamaro-based wine carries aromas of blackberry balsamic vinegar, stemmy herbs and candied cherry on the nose. The palate is quite light and zesty in feel, filled out by a red plum flavor and honed by zesty acidity and delicate tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Li Veli 2017 Passamante Red (Salice Salentino)

Description: Mild aromas of bramble berries, cranberry and herbal spice carry the nose. The palate is plush and soft in feel, with creamy red berry flavors that finish pleasantly but short. A delicate veil of tannins and honed acidity frame it all. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Polvanera 2015 14 Vigneto Marchesana Primitivo (Gioia del Colle)
Country: Gioia del Colle, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: A bright, fruity nose of grapefruit and pineapple carries a slightly stony undercurrent. The palate is light and brisk in the same tones, with zesty acidity lending balance. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Rivera 2018 Marese Bombino Bianco (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Spring flower and orchard fruit aromas take center stage on this straightforward white. The bright palate shows apple, pear and citrus zest alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roeno 2018 Tera Alta Pinot Grigio (Valdadige)

Description: Aromas of brandy-soaked cherries, dried violet and white pepper carry to the richly fruited palate. Bright acidity pushes through, lending ample support to the dense fruit, with fine tannins providing a gentle grip. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Amastuola 2016 Vignatorta Organic Red (Puglia)

Description: Made with organically farmed grapes, this opens with delicate aromas suggesting orange blossom and green melon with a whiff of white stone fruit. On the light-bodied palate, crisp acidity accompanies green apple and tangy saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sorrentino 2018 Verso Falanghina (Vesuvio)

Description: A bright, fruity nose of red cherry melds with cinnamon and clove. A medium-bodied palate is juicy in red and black berry flavors, flecked with sweet spices. The tannins show a mild grit, with honed acidity providing balance. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Due Palme 2017 Serre Susumaniello (Salento)

Description: Aromas of pollen, spice and crushed flowers carry the demure nose of this wine. There's a creaminess to the palate in the way of peach and melon flavors, with juicy acidity rising up and culminating on a tangy grapefruit finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Due Palme 2018 Rosalita Rosato (Salento)

Description: Aromas of stewed prune and toasted oak with a whiff of resin lead the nose. The assertive palate reflects the nose, offering raisin, clove and French oak. It lacks fruit richness, and grainy tannins give it a clenching, astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Montioni 2015 Ma Gia (Montefalco Sagrantino)

Description: Aromas of leather, anise and game take the fore in this lush wine, with cherry jam at the core. Zesty acidity and fine, sandy tannins provide a framing to the light-bodied palate, keeping the jammy fruit in check and making this an appealing, if a bit straightforward, Primitivo di Manduria. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Produttori di Manduria 2016 Lirica (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Here's a fun sparkler that boasts fruity aromas of wild berry that carry on to the palate along with pomegranate and pink grapefruit. Fresh acidity and lively bubbles provide the framework. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terre Gaie NV Rosé Premium Cuvée Pinot Nero (Vino Spumante)

Description: Exotic fruit and white spring flower aromas are front and center. On the bright palate, crisp acidity accompanies exotic fruit and citrus. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terredora Di Paolo 2018 Corte di Giso Falanghina (Irpinia)

Description: Bright aromas of green apple, papaya and pineapple start off this fruity Chardonnay. The palate dazzles in creamy tropical-fruit flavors that are energetic yet brisk. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2018 Chardonnay (Puglia)

Description: There's a pleasing concentration of dark cherry and blackberry tones to this wine, with peppery spice and mild tobacco adding interest. It is smooth and easy in feel, supported by a gentle grip of tannins and integrated acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantele 2016 Primitivo (Salento)

Description: Made with organically farmed grapes, this has aromas of tropical fruits, citrus and wildflowers with a whiff of beeswax. Lean and linear, the racy palate offers Meyer lemon and a hint of acacia honey alongside brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Capolino Perlingieri 2018 Vento Greco (Campania)

Description: A blend of Sangiovese, Sagrantino and Montepulciano, this opens with aromas of truffle, violet, sunbaked earth and a note of eucalyptus. Densely concentrated, the assertive palate offers steeped prune, licorice and the heat of evident alcohol set against a backbone of assertive, grainy tannins that clench the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fongoli 2015 Sepullo Riserva (Montefalco Rosso)

Description: While quite spicy on the nose in pepper and orange spice, there's still plenty of ripe cherry and currant underneath. Juicy red berry flavors reign on the palate, honed by graphite and a bit of tannic grip. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantine del Borgo Reale 2017 Maturo Cabernet Sauvignon (Puglia)

Description: Aromas of tar, geranium and tart black berries carry to the light-bodied palate. There are no harsh edges, making this a smooth, balanced offering that's lifted by bright peppery spice and a mild grip of tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Claudio Quarta 2017 Qu.ale Red (Salento)

Description: Subdued aromas of dark-skinned fruit, toast and underbrush lift out of the glass. Made with Sangiovese and Sagrantino, the medium-bodied palate offers prune and a hint of ground clove alongside dusty, astringent tannins that dry out the close. Drink soon to capture the remaining fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Colsanto 2015 Montefalco Rosso

Description: Aromas of wild berry and baking spice lead the nose. Juicy and easygoing, the straightforward palate offers black cherry and white pepper alongside dusty tannins. You'll also get a note of powdered sage on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Colsanto 2015 Ruris (Montefalco Rosso)

Description: Aromas of prune, espresso and tobacco leaf lead the way. Reflecting the nose, the no-frills palate offers dried cherry, roasted coffee bean and ground clove alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2020. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Goretti 2017 Le Mura Saracene (Montefalco Rosso)

Description: This accessible Primitivo shows a mild concentration of cherry and raspberry flavors on the palate, with medium-grained tannins and bright acidity providing a solid frame. Spice and toast accents lend a bit of complexity to an otherwise straightforward yet enjoyable wine. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masseria Altemura 2017 Sasseo Primitivo (Salento)

Description: Aromas of tropical fruit and a whiff of almond follow over to the palate along with crisp acidity. It's simple but well-made and refreshing. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bertani 2018 Sereole (Soave)

Description: Inky ruby in color, this wine is thickly concentrated in aromas of hot stones, baked cherry and powdered vanilla. There's a toasty edge to the whole palate, with dark fruit showing alongside accents of coffee and cocoa. The bright acidity helps keep it afloat as the tannins are soft and mellow. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Mottura 2017 Le Pitre (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: A wealth of cocoa and vanilla carries the nose, with a berry cobbler tone lending a fruity nature. The medium-bodied palate is rounded in feel, led by a toasty spice flavor that sits over the rich cherry and bramble berry core. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Mottura 2017 Le Pitre Red (Salice Salentino)

Description: This so-called orange wine opens with subdued aromas evoking honeyed nut and dried apricot. The palate is lean and rather oxidized, suggesting mineral and dried herb. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rossovermiglio 2017 Ambrata di Montemato Greco (Beneventano)

Description: A luscious nose of ripe melon, white plum and spring flowers carries to the creamy palate. There's a light grip to the palate, with a bit of potpourri spice on the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: San Marzano 2017 Edda Lei White (Salento)

Description: Delicate scents of orchard fruit and spring wildflower eventually appear after a few swirls of the glass. The easygoing, simple palate evokes yellow peach and a hint of citrus before a bitter almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villabella 2018 Custoza

Description: A straightforward nose of warm spices and violets carries to the silky palate. Creamy cherry meets vanilla and clove flavors, supported by light tannins and balanced acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Grifo 2018 Nero di Troia (Puglia)

Description: Subdued aromas evoking wild berry and candied orange zest lead the way. The aromas carry over to the tangy palate along with a hint of sour cherry and a confectionary note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Buonamico NV Particolare Sparkling (Vino Spumante)

Description: This has subdued aromas suggesting yellow wildflowers, white stone fruits and acacia. The light-bodied palate is on the shy side, offering hints of ripe pear and bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colli di Castelfranci 2018 Pendino (Fiano di Avellino)
