Description: Bright aromas of Bing cherry and baking spice carry the nose. The medium-bodied palate is polished in feel, boasting bouncy red fruit flavors that play nicely with tones of wood and baking spice. The fruit flavors extend on the finish to give a wine that will please many. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Fantini 2016 Casale Vecchio (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: A well-rounded nose of melon, peach and sea spray mixes with a white blossom undertone. This is pleasantly plump in feel on the palate and displays a nice concentration of fruit that's backed up by juicy acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Fattoria Giuseppe Savini 2018 Colleventano Pecorino (Colli Aprutini)

Description: This has subtle aromas evoking roasted coffee bean, leather, dark spice and mature black-skinned fruit. On the dense, rounded palate, you'll find dried black cherry, prune, vanilla and ground clove alongside close-grained tannins that leave an astringent, drying finish. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ronchi di Giancarlo Rocca 2015 Ronchi (Barbaresco)

Description: This accessible Montepulciano displays a mix of ripe cherry and wild berry tones, studded with peppery spice, tobacco and menthol. There's plenty of tangy acidity to keep it refreshing and a sturdy structure of medium-grained tannins for support. The finish extends on cherry skin and warm spice tones. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Illuminati 2017 Riparosso (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: This opens with aromas recalling leather, menthol, violet and cherries marinated in spirits. On the brawny, rather evolved palate, you'll find the heat of evident alcohol, dried cherry and a hint of star anise before an assertive, drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lodali 2015 Lorens (Barbaresco)

Description: Floral aromas of honeysuckle mingle with whiffs of tropical fruit and pear. The fruity palate doles out Granny Smith apple, green melon and a candied lemon drop note alongside tangy acidity. It closes on a suggestion of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi di Barolo 2018 del Comune di Gavi (Gavi)

Description: Subtle aromas of tilled soil, baking spice and a whiff of violet slowly emerge from the glass. The dense palate offers blackberry jam, clove and mocha alongside assertive tannins that grip the finish. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rattalino 2014 del Comune di Serralunga Novantuno91 (Barbaresco)

Description: This opens with subdued aromas of dark fruit, scorched earth and leather. The austere palate offers tart sour cherry, tangerine zest and clove alongside firm tannins. Drink after 2020. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salvano 2013 Vinorum Riserva (Barolo)

Description: Delicate aromas of cedar, cooking spices and dark fruit emerge from the glass. The tight palate offers sour cherry, toasted hazelnut and licorice alongside assertive, rather astringent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Negretti 2015 Barolo

Description: Aromas of baking spice, red berry and forest floor lead the nose. The solid palate offers sour cherry, white pepper and clove alongside assertive tannins. Drink after 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antario 2014 Barolo

Description: Menthol, rose and wild herb aromas lead the nose. Linear and youthfully vibrant, the straightforward palate offers sour cherry and licorice alongside taut tannins. Drink 2022–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Arbéta 2016 Barbaresco

Description: This barrel-fermented and aged Pecorino carries aromas of buttered corn kernel, dried sage and lemon oil, with nice concentration and depth. It is rounded and full on the palate, with earthy herb and barrel tones rising up over quiet tones of citrus and melon. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Ciavolich 2015 Fosso Cancelli Pecorino (Colline Pescaresi)

Description: Aromas of black-skinned fruit, scorched earth and baking spice emerge from the glass. The solid, no-frills palate offers black plum, clove and orange zest alongside chewy tannins. Drink after 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Collina San Ponzio 2015 Barolo

Description: Faint aromas of lemongrass, apple and pine carry to the light- to medium-bodied palate. There's ample energy to the tangy palate, driven by fresh fruit and herbal elements that end slightly creamy yet brisk. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Ferzo 2018 Cococciola (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Pretty aromas of yellow field flower, green melon and crushed stone start off this white. There's adequate weight and balance to the palate, giving a solid home to the ripe melon and stone fruit flavors. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Ferzo 2018 Passerina (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: There's sharpness to the nose, driven by citrus rind and fresh herbs, with melon riding underneath. Bright, crunchy peach and creamy melon sit on a zesty river of lemon-lime acidity on the palate. A tangy element comes in midway to provide a burst of refreshment, lingering toward a savory and tangy finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Feudo Antico 2015 Per Casadonna Pecorino

Description: A fresh, herbal nose of pine and eucalyptus melds with limestone and white flower. It is bright and crunchy on the palate, with a tangy mineral element riding over a crisp apple and lime core. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Feudo Antico 2017 Passerina (Tullum)

Description: Aromas of elderflower, citrus and white stone fruit lift out of the glass. Racy and linear, the palate offer honeydew and Meyer lemon before a crisp, tangy close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Mesma 2018 del Comune di Gavi (Gavi)

Description: Underbrush, oak, eucalyptus and wild berry aromas mingle with a whiff of citrus. Taut and tight, the firm, linear palate offers sour cherry, orange zest, cracked white pepper, saline and a powdered sage alongside racy acidity. Grainy tannins give it a rather astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Negro Giuseppe 2016 Gallina (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of pineapple, kiwi and fresh hops give a strong start to this wine. It is rounded and juicy on the palate in tropical and melon flavors, with tangy acidity pushing through for support. A crisp, mouthwatering sensation lingers on the finish, akin to biting into a crisp green apple. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Talamonti 2018 Trebì (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of pressed field flowers, white stone fruit and bread dough lead the way. On the concentrated palate, bitter almond backs up mature yellow apple and ripe Bartlett pear alongside a hint of saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Girlan 2018 Pinot Grigio (Loazzolo)

Description: A pleasing concentration of peach, melon, candied banana and chamomile show on the nose. The medium-bodied palate offers juicy melon and pineapple flavors, propped up by tangy acidity and a slight saline edge. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Tollo 2018 Biologico (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of coconut, dark fruit and mocha emerge from the glass. The dense palate offers black plum, espresso and vanilla alongside close-grained tannins. Drink after 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Claudio Alario 2015 Riva Rocca (Barolo)

Description: Rose, wild berry, chopped herb, coconut and baking spice aromas slowly appear in the glass. On the assertive palate, firm tannins and an acidic backbone support sour cherry, orange rind, licorice and espresso. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Collina Serragrilli 2016 Starderi (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of cherry and blackberry jam meld with peppery spice and mentholated herbs on the nose. Firmly medium in weight, the palate offers crunchy berry flavors lifted by zesty acidity and fine sandy tannins. A light cherry pit note extends on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Di Sipio 2015 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Defined aromas of lemon and melon meld with a stony undertone on the nose. It is medium-bodied on the palate, driven by ripe flavors of pineapple and honeydew that are pushed along by bright acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Feudo Antico 2017 Pecorino (Tullum)

Description: Cracked dill, minestrone and toasted nut aromas lead the nose along with notes of wild herbs and a hint of plum. The palate shows unripe cranberry, hazelnut and toasted notes alongside powdered sage and vanilla. It's shy in terms of fruit richness, while tight, astringent tannins and bright acidity give it a lean, rather abrupt close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Spinetta 2016 Valeirano (Barbaresco)

Description: Weedy underbrush, toasted hazelnut and leather aromas lead the nose. The racy, lean palate offers sour cherry, licorice and a salted game note alongside tight, grainy tannins and a backbone of firm acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Orlando Abrigo 2016 Meruzzano (Barbaresco)

Description: Spring blossom and white stone fruit aromas shape the nose. The tangy palate shows honeydew, almond and a hint of honey alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta La Marchesa 2018 Saula (Gavi)

Description: A streamlined nose of Meyer lemon, melon and chamomile starts off this fresh white. The tangy palate is driven by tart stone fruit and citrus flavors, with bright acidity carrying it along to a brisk finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Tollo 2018 Pecorino (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Heady aromas of coffee and cocoa are front and center on the nose. It is supple and soft on the palate, with juicy acidity highlighting the jammy red berry flavor. An oaky char rises up on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni 2015 Margae (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)
Winery: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni

Description: Oak, sawdust, star anise and balsamic aromas lead the nose. The concentrated palate offers espresso, prune, licorice, spearmint and tobacco alongside tightly knit, fine-grained tannins and firm acidity before a chocolate orange finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Manera Fratelli 2016 Rizzi (Barbaresco)

Description: The shy nose eventually reveals underbrush, toasted oak and mocha aromas. The tight palate offers espresso, tobacco and a touch of dark-skinned berry alongside dusty tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Paolo Manzone 2015 Ruvey (Barolo)

Description: Violet, resin and wild cherry aromas mingle with whiffs of oak. The assertive palate is austere and a bit lean in terms of fruit richness, offering orange zest, unripe cranberry and espresso along with a sprinkling of sage. Assertive, astringent tannins leave a drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pietro Rinaldi 2016 San Cristoforo (Barbaresco)

Description: This opens with aromas of mocha, cedar and dark fruit. The firm palate offers black plum, tobacco and clove alongside tight tannins. Drink after 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poderi Elia 2015 Serracapelli (Barbaresco)

Description: Delicate aromas of mocha, baking spice and dark-skinned fruit shape the nose. The solid palate offers clove, mature black plum and espresso alongside chewy tannins. Drink after 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Raineri Gianmatteo 2015 Perno (Barolo)

Description: A rich nose of iodine, brandied cherries and tobacco sets the stage for the palate. It is jammy and fully in feel, driven by dried fruit and tobacco flavors that are supported by lip-smacking acidity and copious tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Valle Martello 2011 I Due Archi Riserva (Villamagna)

Description: Aromas of menthol and roasted coffee bean lead the nose. It's straightforward, with red berry and star anise alongside solid but not very persistent tannins. Drink 2020–2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantine Povero 2016 Batù (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of camphor, saline and leather lead the way along with the barest hint of blue flower. The palate is lean and evolved, showing sour cranberry, pomegranate and a suggestion of fennel alongside drying, not very persistent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rattalino 2013 Quarantacinque45 Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of ripe dark cherry, tobacco and mentholated herbs show a pleasing concentration on the nose. There's nice richness to the fruit on the palate, with zesty acidity and fine, sandy tannins framing it all. A bit simplistic and short, but nonetheless a solid weekday red. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Fantini 2018 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Subdued aromas of cooking spices and a whiff of red berry emerge from the glass. The straightforward palate offers tart cherry, tobacco and clove alongside close-grained tannins. Drink after 2020. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Araldica 2014 Flori (Barolo)

Description: This opens with subtle aromas of dark fruit, grilled herbs and scorched earth. The lean palate offers orange zest, licorice and sour cherry alongside tight tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casali del Barone 2015 Barolo

Description: Toasted oak, spearmint, camphor and rose aromas mingle with clove. The palate is rather lean and smoky, offering espresso, sour cherry and coconut alongside assertive, close-grained tannins and firm acidity. Give the tannins another few years, then drink to capture the remaining fruit richness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cascina Bruciata 2016 Rio Sordo (Barbaresco)

Description: Earth, tart red berries and tobacco start off the moderately concentrated nose. Smooth and supple on the palate, this is polished and easygoing, with juicy cherry and berry flavors that are lined with toasted oak. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Di Sipio 2014 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Aromas of grilled onion, dried dill and minestrone soup lead the nose. The astringent palate offers green notes of powdered sage, chopped celery and raw, unripe cherry alongside aggressive, grainy tannins and firm acidity that leave a raspy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Spinetta 2016 Vigneto Bordini (Barbaresco)

Description: This opens with aromas of cedar, ripe red berry and menthol. The bracing palate offers sour cherry, mocha and star anise alongside grainy, rather astringent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Manfredi 2016 Barbaresco

Description: Toasted hazelnut and roasted coffee bean aromas carry over to the palate along with powdered sage and a hint of prune. Assertive, close-grained tannins create an astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pasquale Pelissero 2016 Bricco San Giuliano (Barbaresco)

Description: Named after an archangel mentioned in Jewish texts, this Montepulciano is dark ruby in color with purple highlights. Dense blackberry and cherry jam aromas carry a slight iodine edge on the nose. There's a richness to the palate, lightened up by violet and tangy acidity but ultimately grounded by a sandy grip of tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Poggio Anima 2016 Samael (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Roasted coffee bean, coconut and toasted oak aromas lead the nose. The tight, austere palate offers prune, vanilla and clove alongside close-grained, assertive tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ricossa 2011 Riserva (Barolo)

Description: Delicate aromas of cedar, baking spice and dark fruit lead the nose. The straightforward palate suggests sour cherry, clove and toasted hazelnut alongside chewy tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salvano 2015 Barolo

Description: Lifted aromas of vanilla, anise and tobacco ride over a red cherry jam core in this blend of Montepulciano and Merlot. The medium-bodied palate is oak laden, yet juicy red fruit lingers in the background and ultimately provides a fine counterbalance. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Talamonti 2013 Kudos Red (Colline Pescaresi)

Description: Subdued aromas of mocha, leather and tobacco slowly emerge from the glass. The dense palate delivers sour cherry, roasted coffee bean and coconut alongside tight, astringent tannins that leave a drying finish. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Negretti 2015 Bricco Ambrogio (Barolo)

Description: This opens with aromas of chopped celery, grilled herb and balsamic notes. On the palate, you'll find orange zest, licorice, powdered sage and caramelized onion alongside astringent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Spinetta 2016 Gallina (Barbaresco)

Description: Grilled onion, minestrone and broth aromas lead the nose. The palate shows soy sauce and crushed dill, but it lacks fruit richness. Drying, aggressive tannins leave an astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Spinetta 2016 Starderi (Barbaresco)

Description: Earthy aromas of leather, scorched earth and dark-skinned berries lead the nose. The straightforward palate offers dried black cherry, tobacco and vanilla alongside assertive, rather astringent tannins. Drink after 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Manfredi 2015 Barolo

Description: This has a shy nose that eventually reveals light scents evoking citrus, spring flowers and toasted nuts. It's lean and linear, suggesting Meyer lemon, saline and bitter almond alongside brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Sparina 2016 del Comune di Gavi Monterotondo (Gavi)

Description: Underbrush, cracked pepper and aromas evoking soy sauce lead the way. The palate offers oak, grilled porcini and unripe cranberry alongside rustic, raspy tannins and firm acidity. You'll also detect a green note of powdered sage on the astringent close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Giacosa Fratelli 2016 Basarin (Barbaresco)

Description: Quiet aromas of crushed red berries and flint lead to a more intense palate of juicy strawberry and raspberry. A frame of bright acidity keeps it fresh, light and easygoing. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni 2018 Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo
Winery: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni

Description: Aromas of spring flowers and honeydew shape the nose. On the lean, tangy palate, crisp acidity accompanies suggestions of green apple and lemon zest before a saline close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Battistina 2018 Gavi

Description: This blend of Trebbiano, Cococciola and Pecorino offers aromas of melon, citrus zest and a hint of banana on the nose. The light-bodied palate is refreshing and lively, driven by lemon and yellow apple flavors at first, with melon arising on the midpalate. The finish is crisp and clean. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masciarelli 2018 Villa Gemma White (Colline Teatine)

Description: A fruity nose of peach and pineapple juice carries to the medium-bodied palate. There's nice weight and tension to the feel, with ample acidity pushing through all that fruit-driven intensity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bosco Nestore 2017 Eclipse (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Inky ruby in color, with a purple rim, this red offers a bright mix of berries on the nose—cherry, raspberry and blackberry—with hints of menthol and tobacco. It is smooth and supple on the palate, displaying a tutti-frutti blend of berries that are honed by persistent acidity and fine, sandy tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Caldora 2015 Yume (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of chalk, chamomile and citronella offer a vibrant start to this easygoing wine. It is rounded in feel on the palate, bolstered by bright, persistent acidity and sporting flavors of juicy citrus and melon. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Tollo 2018 Made with Organic Grapes White (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: This has delicate aromas of dark-skinned fruit, weedy underbrush and toasted hazelnut. The straightforward palate offers sour cherry, star anise and sage alongside grainy tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casali del Barone 2016 Barbaresco

Description: Aromas of mocha, tilled soil and ripe black fruit lead the nose. The solid, straightforward palate offers black plum, vanilla and coconut alongside assertive tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ricossa 2015 Barbaresco

Description: Aromas of eucalyptus oil, exotic incense and coconut lead the nose. Reflecting the aromas, the lean, assertive palate evokes camphor, sandalwood, roasted coffee bean and a green note of powdered sage alongside astringent tannins that clench the finish. Give the tannins a few more years to unwind, then drink to capture the remaining fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sassi San Cristoforo 2015 San Cristoforo (Barbaresco)

Description: The shy nose eventually reveals toasted oak, espresso and a whiff of dark fruit. The tight palate offers dried black cherry, roasted coffee bean and licorice alongside firm, astringent tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Rocca 2015 Bussia (Barolo)

Description: Dense ruby in color, with purple highlights, this wine offers condensed aromas of potpourri, frankincense, cherry and plum. The palate is driven by barrel spice tones that ride over a core of dense berry fruit, yet there's enough bright acidity and firm tannins to provide a fine counterbalance. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Terzini 2016 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Aromas of ripe black cherry, peppery spice, tobacco and violet show on the moderately concentrated nose. Tart cherry and spice grace the medium-bodied palate, held in check by a firm structure. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Umani Ronchi 2016 Jorio (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: A raspy nose of fresh cherries and baked wild berries melds with sweet and savory spices. The palate is on the leaner side, showing a juicy berry fruit expression that's framed by delicate tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Valle Martello 2017 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: A rather closed nose shows rubber and red flower aromas. It is soft and supple on the palate, led by dark cherry, blackberry and warm spice flavors. There's good tannic grip and juicy acidity to hold it all together. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bosco Nestore 2015 R (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of Juicy Fruit, melon and citrus perfume carry the flamboyant nose. Round and luscious on the palate in peach and melon, there's a slight oiliness to the texture that is cleaned up by bright acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Fattoria Giuseppe Savini 2018 Rondineto Pecorino (Colli Aprutini)

Description: Aromas of ripe melon and lychee start off this straightforward white. There's a pleasing suppleness to the entry of the palate, with ripe yellow apple and melon flavors melding with a peach-fuzz texture. Crisp acidity keeps this refreshing and light. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Feudo Antico 2018 Made with Organic Grapes Pecorino (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: A blend of Falanghina, Pecorino and Trebbiano, this white offers ripe peach, melon and lemon oil on the nose. Fleshy apple and cantaloupe flavors carry the palate, with a bitter almond note offering some depth. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Di Sipio 2016 White (Colline Teatine)

Description: Shy aromas of lemon and pineapple rind mix with a powdered stone undertone on the nose. This is light and zesty in profile, driven by bright acidity that races to a lightly astringent finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni 2018 Passerina (Colline Teatine)
Winery: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni

Description: Ripe cherry and wild berry aromas take on a bit of bubblegum spice on the nose. While medium in weight, the fruit concentration is rather light on the palate. There's plushness to the feel, with juicy acidity and a sandy grip of tannins for balance. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Fattoria Giuseppe Savini 2017 Rondineto (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Spiced raspberry and cherry meld with a bit of tobacco on the nose. There's a pleasing smoothness to the medium-bodied palate, with rounded red fruit flavors that are clipped by bright acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Feudo Antico 2017 Organic (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Cherry, plum and tobacco aromas carry to the medium-bodied palate. It is tart in profile, with a sour cherry note rising up alongside lightly bitter tannins on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Illuminati 2017 Lumeggio di Rosso (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: A rather reductive nose carries a rubber aroma over a raspy cherry and raspberry core. It is light in profile on the palate, with bright acidity and sandy tannins framing juicy blackberry and cherry flavors. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Nicodemi 2016 Le Murate (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane)
Country: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Tight and bracing, this opens with aromas of oak, coffee, coconut and vanilla along with a whiff of minestrone soup. On the palate, grainy tannins frame sour berry and espresso before a grainy, astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Angelo Negro & Figli 2016 Basarin (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of butterscotch, cheese rind and citrus form the nose. The palate is taut and linear in feel, driven by a sharp line of acidity. It is fresh and crisp in pineapple and lemon flavors that lead to a brisk finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bosco Nestore 2017 Donna Bosco Pecorino (Colline Pescaresi)

Description: This light-bodied Montepulciano is bright and fruity, driven by tart cherry and wild berry flavors. Peppery spice and delicate tannins frame the fruit, giving it enough structure to be a welcome addition to the dinner table. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2017 Estate Grown (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of nail polish, vegetable broth and hay carry to the palate along with hints of cellar floor. Grainy tannins give it an astringent close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Prinsi 2016 Gaia Principe (Barbaresco)

Description: This has subdued aromas of baking spice and a whiff of dark-skinned fruit. The simple, lean palate offers sour cherry and clove alongside assertive tannins. Drink after 2020. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alasia 2014 Barolo

Description: Aromas of tilled soil, cherry jam and flower show a pleasing intensity on the nose. This is light and lithe on the palate, displaying a mix of jammy and fresh berry fruit flavors propped up by bright acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Belpaese 2016 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: White spring flower and honeydew aromas lead the nose. The fruity aroma carries over to the tangy palate along with green apple and candied lemon drop. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bersano 2018 del Comune di Gavi (Gavi)

Description: Spiced cherry and raspberry mix with a hint of tobacco on the nose and palate. This is light in feel and driven by a tangy line of acidity, supported by a frame of fine, sandy tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Caldora 2018 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Medium ruby in color with purple highlights, this easygoing red displays dark cherry and wild berry tones, accented by peppery spice and crushed stone. A fine film of tannins coats the palate, with juicy acidity keeping it afloat. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Tollo 2017 Organic Red (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of flint, smoke and charred citrus carry the nose of this Trebbiano that sees time in oak. The medium-bodied palate is driven by flavors of brûléed melon and lemon that are pushed along by juicy acidity. A roasted almond note lingers on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Tollo 2017 Tre (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of French oak, coconut, menthol and graphite form the nose. The linear, assertive palate is shy on fruit richness, offering oak-driven spice, vanilla and prune alongside racy acidity and assertive, grainy tannins that dry out the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Collina Serragrilli 2016 Serragrilli (Barbaresco)

Description: Sweet wood spice pervades on the nose, driven by warm baking spice, tobacco and red berries. A soft, plush palate houses rounded cherry and berry flavors, with enough bright acidity and sandy tannins to lend support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Fantini 2018 Sangiovese (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Bright tones of banana peel, melon and peach take on a bit of a medicinal note on the nose and palate. The medium-bodied weight is silky and smooth, lifted by slick acidity and a slightly astringent finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni 2018 Pecorino (Colline Teatine)
Winery: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni

Description: This opens with delicate aromas suggesting field flowers and citrus. The fresh, light-bodied palate shows hints of green melon and lemon zest alongside bright acidity. It's simple but well-made. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Silvestro 2018 del Comune di Gavi Fossili (Gavi)

Description: A luscious, ripe nose of melon, pineapple and lemon peel mixes with accents of hay and sweet spices. This barrel-aged Trebbiano is rounded and heavy on the palate, with melon rind and floral flavors that are a bit cloying on the midpalate. However, citrus-driven acidity and a slight bitter almond-skin note do well to firm up the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Talamonti 2017 Aternum (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Closed aromas of yeast, pollen and plastic eventually open up to reveal a candied watermelon tone. This is light in profile on the palate, with melon and balsamic flavors lifted by bright acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni 2018 Fonte Venna Rosato (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy
Winery: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni

Description: Aromas of stewed prune, licorice and a whiff of fish stew carry over to the palate. Astringent tannins create a lean, mouthdrying close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Prinsi 2016 Gallina (Barbaresco)

Description: This has a shy nose that eventually reveals whiffs of white stone fruit and field flowers. It's simple, lean and racy, offering green melon and lemon alongside racy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salvano 2018 del Comune di Gavi (Gavi)

Description: An intensely earthy floral aroma starts off the nose in tones of gardenia and tilled soil. Fresh cherry and berry flavors define the light-bodied palate, honed by pulsing acidity and upright tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Terzini 2016 Dumì (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: A light nose of baked cherry and earthy flowers carries to the rounded, soft palate. A solid framing of bright acidity and polished tannins offer support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2017 Estate Grown Merlot (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: This has a shy nose that eventually shows hints of beeswax and spring flowers. The simple, light-bodied palate shows honeydew and a hint of lemon alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Rocchin 2018 Gavi

Description: Brisk aromas of citrus and pineapple move to the light-bodied palate. This straightforward Trebbiano is crisp, refreshing and driven by bright acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: La Valentina 2018 Trebbiano d'Abruzzo

Description: This offers aromas of oak, nail polish, sawdust and stewed plum. The palate is lean and evolved, suggesting prune, powdered sage and espresso alongside firm acidity and astringent, grainy tannins that leave a raspy, drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Manera Fratelli 2014 Rizzi Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: This has a subdued nose offering whiffs of honeydew. The simple palate offers green apple and lemon zest alongside vigorous acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2018 Principessa Gavia (Gavi)

Description: Lifted aromas of tobacco and red berries carry the nose. There's a sweet vanillin tone to the palate, with ripe red cherry riding in the background. A grip of tannins and bright acidity firms everything up on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Caldora 2018 Sangiovese (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of blistered cherry and berry carry a slight tone of crushed herbs on the nose. This is light and easy in feel, driven by tart red fruit on the palate and supported by slightly gritty tannins and juicy acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masciarelli 2016 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Vinous aromas of freshly pressed grapes mix with red berries and a whiff of cellar floor. The simple, light-bodied palate offers candied cherry and a hint of ground clove alongside fresh acidity and fleeting tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poderi Elia 2018 Padrun Nebbiolo (Langhe)

Description: This has unusual aromas suggesting stewed prune, chopped celery and vegetable broth. The aromas carry over to the lean, muddled palate along with vanilla, roasted coffee bean and sweet-and-sour sauce. Dusty, fleeting tannins leave a drying close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roberto Sarotto 2014 Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Bright aromas of cherry and strawberry mix with a faint tone of violet in this simplistic red. It is light and easygoing on the palate, driven by juicy red fruit flavors that are honed by delicate tannins and fresh acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: La Fiera 2017 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: An earthy nose of hard cheese rind and pollen melds with a subdued citrus tone on the nose. This is light and bright on the palate, driven by snappy acidity that propels flavors of green melon and chamomile. A creamy, savory note lingers on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Chiusa Grande 2017 Vinosophia Biologico Pecorino (Abruzzo)

Description: A faint nose of red currant, tilled earth and peppercorn carries to the light-bodied palate. This is soft in feel and framed by delicate tannins and easygoing acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2017 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: A rounded nose of citrus cream, melon and pineapple juice carries the mildly concentrated nose. The palate carries brûléed citrus and melon flavors, with mild acidity backing it up. Toasted almond marks the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masciarelli 2017 Marina Cvetic Chardonnay (Colline Teatine)

Description: Opulent aromas of melon and peach meld with cut flowers on the nose. The palate is rounded and plush in feel, with stone fruit and cantaloupe flavors that carry a light balsamic undertone. The finish is brisk on a slight bitter white almond note. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Terzini 2017 Dumì Pecorino (Colline Pescaresi)

Description: A dense nose of dark cherry juice, fig, tar and iodine indicates a hefty palate to come. It is thick in feel and laden with sweet oak tones on the entry, with baked fruit flavors that are lifted by enough acidity to clean it up. The tannins are a bit disjointed and give a harsh edge to the whole. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Valle Martello 2015 Villamagna

Description: This has aromas suggesting minestrone soup and fish stew. The aromas carry over to the muddled palate along with a green sensation of powdered sage and candied notes that are cut short by astringent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Prinsi 2016 Gaia Principe Cascina Barberis (Barbaresco)

Description: This straightforward Sangiovese delivers dark cherry, peppercorn and tobacco on the nose. The palate is smooth on entry, with a light concentration of tart cherry surrounded by bits of spice. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2017 Estate Grown Sangiovese (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of wet tobacco and peanut shell are an odd start for Montepulciano. The medium-bodied palate is driven by tart red fruit, with sharp acidity slicing through the flavors. The tannins are soft and give mild support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bosco Nestore 2015 Donna Bosco (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of wet tobacco, menthol and peanut shell give way to tangy red fruit on the nose. Prickling acidity gives sharpness to the palate, and medium-grained tannins offer a slightly gritty feel. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bosco Nestore 2015 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Closed aromas of wild ramp and citrus lead to a medium-bodied palate of tart peach and lemon. This is straightforward and easy in profile, with sharp acidity rising up on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni 2018 Fonte Venna Pecorino (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy
Winery: Il Feuduccio Di S. Maria D'Orni

Description: Aromas of grilled celery, fish stew and soy sauce carry over to the astringent palate along with the heat of scorching alcohol. It's unbalanced and muddled. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roberto Sarotto 2016 Gaia Principe (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of Dr Pepper, fresh wood grain and warm baking spice ride on a ripe cherry core in this red that spent six months in large Slovenian oak barrels. Sweet oak tones are upfront on the palate, with berry flavors eventually arising on the midpalate. A framing of bitter tannins gives it a harsh edge. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Talamonti 2017 Moda' (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: This has an extremely shy nose while the lean, diluted palate offers the merest suggestions of white stone fruit and lemon juice. It's doesn't have enough fruit to balance the brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alasia 2018 del Comune di Gavi (Gavi)

Description: The nose of this light-bodied wine is driven by earthy pollen and wilted flower aromas. A bit of fruit arises on the palate in the way of melon and lemon, yet the yeast note tends to overpower. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Chiusa Grande 2017 Vinosophia Biologico Passerina (Colline Pescaresi)

Description: An intense herbal nose of tomato vine and earthy flowers starts off this easygoing red. It is light in profile, with herbal notes riding over a tart red berry core. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bosco Nestore 2016 Eclipse (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: A strong tobacco leaf aroma dominates the nose. The medium-bodied palate is slightly thick in feel, with more peppery, herbal flavors and crunchy red fruit that are housed in a chalky coating of bitter tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Fosso Corno 2016 Mayro (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Forest floor, red berry, leather and pipe tobacco aromas are front and center. The intense, full-bodied palate offers impressive structure and finesse, delivering succulent Marasca cherry, cinnamon, star anise and a hint of hazelnut alongside assertive but noble tannins and vibrant acidity. It already shows focus and depth, but give it time to fully bloom. Drink 2026–2038. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Ca' Nova 2016 Montestefano (Barbaresco)

Description: Red berry, violet, forest floor, vanilla and balsamic aromas of menthol and camphor slowly appear on this stunning, radiant red along with whiffs of charcuterie. The vibrant, focused palate is young and taut but already impeccably balanced, evoking juicy red cherry, pomegranate, star anise and cool mint framed in firm acidity and tightly knit but fine-grained tannins and vibrant acidity. It's already fantastic but will hold for even more complexity. Best 2026–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sottimano 2016 Cottà (Barbaresco)

Description: This has a lovely, alluring nose that evokes rose, iris, woodland berry, new leather and cake spice along with a whiff of camphor. It's focused and delicious, with juicy Marasca cherry, star anise, clove and mocha flavors framed in taut, fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2026–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Musso 2016 Pora (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of underbrush, camphor, violet, dark culinary spices, new leather and dark-skinned fruit lead the way. The structured, full-bodied palate shows juicy red cherry, raspberry, orange zest, ground clove, star anise and truffle alongside fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. It boasts elegance and structure. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Giuseppe Cortese 2016 Rabajà (Barbaresco)

Description: Forest floor, new leather, underbrush and eucalyptus aromas mingle with a whiff of peppercorn. On the full-bodied, focused palate, tightly knit, noble tannins and bright acidity frame juicy Morello cherry, licorice, tobacco and a hint of truffle. Drink 2026–2036. Cellar Selection. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Albino Rocca 2016 Ronchi (Barbaresco)

Description: Rose, violet, just-tilled vineyard soil and perfumed berry are just some of the aromas you'll find on this dazzling, fragrant red. The elegant, delicious palate is chock-full of elegance and flavor, delivering juicy Morello cherry, raspberry compote, cake spice and a balsamic note. It boasts fantastic tension and finesse, and will be even better with more bottle age. Gorgeous. Drink 2026–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Neive 2016 Barbaresco

Description: Rose petal, iris, dark-skinned berry and spice aromas mingle with balsamic notes of camphor on this fragrant, stunning red. Elegantly structured, the precise palate evokes cranberry, Marasca cherry, star anise and thyme set against tightly knit but refined tannins and bright acidity. It's a quintessential Barbaresco, with fantastic tension. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Albino Rocca 2016 Angelo (Barbaresco)

Description: Classic Nebbiolo aromas of wild red berry, rose petal, star anise and a whiff of aromatic herbs are front and center on this full-bodied red. Reflecting the nose, the structured palate doles out juicy red cherry, pomegranate, licorice and a hint of tobacco alongside tightly knit, polished tannins and vibrant acidity. It's still youthfully austere with good aging potential. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rizzi 2014 Boito Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of wild berry, forest floor, leather, blue flower and spice meld together with a cool breeze of menthol. The palate is delicious, offering juicy Marasca cherry extract, crushed black raspberry, licorice, tobacco and truffle alongside velvety, enveloping tannins. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nada Giuseppe 2016 Casot (Barbaresco)

Description: Red berry, rose, menthol, new leather, cracked pepper and wild herb aromas come together on this. Linear, elegant and youthfully austere, the palate delivers red cherry, pomegranate, licorice and star anise framed in tight, close-grained tannins and racy acidity before an orange zest finish. Drink 2026–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rizzi 2016 Pajorè (Barbaresco)

Description: Spearmint, black-skinned berry, blue flower and new leather aromas lead the way along with a whiff of menthol. Tight and taut, the elegant, structured palate delivers juicy black cherry, crushed raspberry, wild herbs and white pepper alongside assertive, close-grained tannins. Bright acidity provides balance. Best 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Adriano Marco & Vittorio 2016 Basarin (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of dried botanical herbs, hay, mature stone fruit, acacia honey and candied citrus slice slowly take shape on this spry 15-year-old. Mirroring the nose, the enveloping, savory palate doles out tangerine zest, dried apricot, marzipan and bitter almond alongside still tangy acidity. A honeyed mineral note lingers on the close. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bucci 2004 Villa Bucci Vintage Collection Riserva (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico)
Country: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico, Central Italy, Italy
City: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico

Description: This firmly structured, focused red offers aromas of red berry, fragrant blue flowers, menthol, oak and spices. The assertive palate evokes cranberry, sour cherry, star anise, underbrush and orange zest set against tightly knit, close-grained tannins that leave a rather drying finish, while racy acidity lends balance. It's still tight and youthfully austere, so give it ample time to fully open up and develop. Drink 2026–2041. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Neive 2016 Albesani Santo Stefano (Barbaresco)

Description: Black-skinned berry, iris, leather, hazelnut and menthol aromas whiff of forest floor. The smooth, full-bodied palate shows tension and finesse, offering fleshy black cherry, espresso and licorice alongside fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2021–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Figli Luigi Oddero 2016 Rombone (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of game, new leather, humid forest floor and ripe berry mingle with whiffs suggesting cake spice and violet. The juicy, earthy palate is savory and loaded with personality, doling out fleshy Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, cinnamon and a salty mineral note. Tightly woven but polished tannins and fresh acidity provide the framework, while a licorice note lingers on the close. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Ca' Nova 2016 Barbaresco

Description: Ripe black-skinned fruit, new leather, rose and spice aromas fill the glass. Concentrated and juicy, the succulent, savory palate shows fleshy Marasca cherry, raspberry jam, vanilla, licorice and tobacco alongside firm, noble tannins. Fresh acidity lends balance. Delicious. Best 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ada Nada 2016 Rombone Elisa (Barbaresco)

Description: Enticing scents of underbrush, tilled earth, wild rose and woodland berry align with balsamic notes of cool menthol. The linear, elegant palate offers red cherry, raspberry, white pepper and tobacco alongside taut, refined tannins. It's all about focus and finesse. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Adriano Marco & Vittorio 2016 Sanadaive (Barbaresco)

Description: Enticingly fragrant, this stunning white opens with heady scents of yellow stone fruit, beeswax and Alpine herbs. The elegant, linear palate boasts great tension focus, offering juicy ripe apricot, juicy citrus and a smoky flint note alongside tangy acidity. It's mesmerizingly delicious and alluring, with a bone-dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2017 Praepositus Riesling (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: New leather, menthol, red-skinned fruit and dark spice aromas form the nose along with enticing whiffs of vineyard dust. The linear, savory palate is still young but already boasts succulent red cherry, crushed raspberry, star anise and clove while taut, refined tannins and bright acidity provide finesse and freshness. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Verduno 2016 Barbaresco

Description: Rose petal, sunbaked earth, wild herb and woodland berry aromas come together on this linear, structured red. Vibrant and precise, the palate shows intriguing tension, doling out red cherry, pomegranate, star anise and white pepper framed in taut, fine-grained tannins. It's balanced, with bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Negro Giuseppe 2016 Pian Cavallo (Barbaresco)

Description: Underbrush, camphor and black-skinned fruit aromas lead the nose along with fragrant blue flowers. The structured, racy palate is focused, vibrant and youthfully austere, offering red cherry, crunchy cranberry, vanilla, truffle and a hint of game alongside firm acidity and fine-grained tannins. Drink 2026–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Michele Chiarlo 2016 Asili (Barbaresco)

Description: Enticing aromas of violet, woodland berry, loose vineyard soil, wild mint and a hint of spearmint shape the intensely fragrant nose. The tense, young palate is still nervous but already boasts finesse, showing wild raspberry, crunchy red cherry, white pepper and star anise. Firm, refined tannins and racy acidity give it a linear, almost austere elegance, while bright acidity keeps it focused and balanced. Drink 2026–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2016 Barbaresco

Description: Delicate, enticing scents of Spanish broom, botanical herbs, beeswax and ripe citrus shape the nose. Linear and supremely elegant, the vibrant palate delivers ripe yellow peach, apricot, grapefruit and mineral alongside tangy acidity. A classic varietal note of bitter almond graces the lingering finish. Hold for even more complexity. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bucci 2016 Villa Bucci Riserva (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico)
Country: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico, Central Italy, Italy
City: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico

Description: Vineyard dust, violet and wild raspberry aromas mingle with notes of dark culinary spices on this fragrant red. Juicy red cherry, clove, licorice and orange zest aromas are framed in bright acidity, while elegant, taut tannins provide the backbone. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Borgogno F.lli Serio e Battista 2016 Barbaresco

Description: Aromas of new leather, ripe plum, vanilla and mocha mix with the barest hint of nail polish. The aromas carry over to the full-bodied palate along with juicy black cherry and licorice. It boasts body and flavor. Drink through 2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cascina Alberta 2016 Giacone (Barbaresco)

Description: Aromas of new leather, iris, wet earth and perfumed berry meld together with crushed herbs and spices. The full-bodied, elegant palate delivers juicy Marasca cherry, black raspberry, white pepper and a hint of tobacco, while firm acidity and taut, fine-grained tannins lend ageworthy support and finesse. Drink 2023–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fontanabianca 2016 Barbaresco

Description: This golden-colored 14-year-old opens with subtle but heady scents of beeswax, yellow wildflower, dried apricot and a whiff of petrol. The aromas follow over to the linear palate along with mature yellow peach, citrus zest, crushed herbs, coffee and a dollop of vanilla. An almond note caps the finish. It boasts a great depth of flavors while surprisingly fresh acidity keeps it balanced. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bucci 2005 Villa Bucci Vintage Collection Riserva (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico)
Country: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico, Central Italy, Italy
City: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico

Description: Aromas of rose petal, red berry, camphor and wild herb shape the nose. The linear, precise palate offers cranberry, sour cherry, espresso and licorice alongside close-grained tannins and vibrant acidity. It's elegant and focused. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi di Barolo 2016 Serragrilli (Barbaresco)

Description: This opens with earthy aromas of leather, forest floor, game and balsamic notes of camphor. The elegant, taut palate evokes dried cherry, cranberry, fennel and tobacco alongside tightly knit tannins and vibrant acidity. Give it time to fully develop. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Michele Chiarlo 2016 Reyna (Barbaresco)

Description: Fragrant blue flowers, wild berry, new leather and an earthy whiff of game shape the nose. Linear and precise, the focused palate delivers dried black cherry, tobacco, vanilla and star anise alongside fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rivetti Massimo 2016 Froi (Barbaresco)

Description: Rose, menthol, wild herb and forest berry aromas lead the nose. Linear and elegantly structured, the savory palate is loaded with finesse, offering wild cherry extract, licorice and orange zest framed in firm, refined tannins. Bright acidity lends balance and tension. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cascina Luisin 2016 Paolin (Barbaresco)

Description: Star anise and black-skinned berry aromas mingle with notes of new leather and underbrush. Focused, elegant and structured, the palate offers ripe black cherry, licorice, grated clove and tobacco framed by firm, fine-grained tannins and youthfully nervous acidity. It boasts a great mix of structure and elegance, tension and focus. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pertinace 2016 Nervo (Barbaresco)

Description: White stone fruit, spring flower and citrus aromas delicately waft out of the glass. Grown with organically farmed grapes, it's smooth, delicious and juicy, doling out honeydew, Bartlett pear, white peach and lemon zest alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria La Vialla 2017 Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico
Country: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico, Central Italy, Italy
City: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico

Description: Violet, clove, underbrush, new leather, menthol and tilled soil aromas take center stage. The full-bodied palate delivers juicy Marasca cherry, black raspberry, licorice and a hint of tobacco alongside firm acidity and tight, fine-grained tannins. Give it a few more years to unwind and develop even more complexity. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Francone 2016 I Patriarchi (Barbaresco)

Description: Balsamic aromas of camphor mingle with scents of pressed rose, vanilla, dark-skinned berry and a whiff of dried aromatic herb and game. On the focused palate, fresh acidity and taut, fine-grained tannins frame dried Morello cherry, sage and star anise. It's balanced, with firm acidity. Drink 2024–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Socré 2016 Barbaresco

Description: Structured and elegant, this Pinot Grigio shows enviable class and pedigree. It opens with delicate scents of white spring flowers, ripe pears and a whiff of dried Alpine herbs while the round, polished palate delivers creamy apple, honeydew and white almond. Fresh acidity lifts the rich flavors, while a tangy mineral note suggesting saline lingers on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Elena Walch 2017 Vigna Castel Ringberg Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: This informal white has subdued aromas evoking yellow apple and green melon. The aromas carry on to the extremely simple light-bodied palate. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tommasi 2018 Le Rosse Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Extremely simple and rather muddled, this has flavors suggesting ripe honeydew melon and candied lemon drop before a bitter finish. It's vigorous and initially fizzy but the fizz eventually burns off. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sgreva 2018 Sirmio (Lugana)

Description: The nose is quite shy but eventually reveals whiffs of adhesive bandage, medicinal herb and mature orange rind. The sharp diluted palate evokes bitter almond and an astringent hint of powdered sage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Onepiò 2017 Lugana

Description: Made entirely with Pinot Nero, this elegant sparkler is both dazzling and savory. It opens with aromas of pomegranate, botanical herbs and bread crust that follow over to the dry, savory palate along with grapefruit and ginger notes. Bright acidity lends tension and freshness while a silky perlage imparts finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Berlucchi 2012 '61 Nature Rosé (Franciacorta)

Description: Earthy aromas of wild berry, new leather, truffle and exotic spice emerge from the glass. The concentrated, vibrant palate delivers dried black cherry, licorice, tobacco and black pepper alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Valdicava 2013 Madonna del Piano Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Bread crust, chamomile and mature yellow stone fruit aromas mingle with whiffs of grilled herbs. The creamy, complex palate delivers ripe apricot, yellow apple and lemon zest alongside fennel seed and a hint of acacia honey. Fresh acidity brightens the rich flavors while an elegant perlage lends finesse. A hazelnut note lingers on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bellavista 2011 Vittorio Moretti Extra Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Made with organically grown Chardonnay and Pinot Nero, this stunning sparkler offers intense aromas of toasted bread crust, eucalyptus, mature yellow stone fruit and a whiff of pressed wildflower. The vibrant, bone-dry palate delivers ripe golden apple, juicy grapefruit, ginger and crushed herbs alongside crisp acidity and a refined, lively perlage. It closes on a hazelnut note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Barone Pizzini 2012 Bagnadore Dosaggio Zero (Franciacorta)

Description: A 50-50 blend of Pinot Nero and Chardonnay, this has enticing scents of yellow wildflower, orchard fruit and a whiff of pastry dough. It's vibrant and elegant, offering juicy pomegranate, yellow apple and grapefruit alongside a savory hint of saline. A lively but refined mousse provides the backdrop. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonfadini NV Rosé Brut Opera (Franciacorta)

Description: Bread crust, baked apple and citrus aromas follow on to the crisp, elegant palate along with pear and grapefruit. A hint of ginger accents the primary flavors while bright acidity and a silky perlage provide vibrancy and finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ferghettina 2014 Milledì Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Made with 90% Nerello Mascalese and 10% Carricante, this elegant rosato has a light, onion skin color, while alluring scents of citrus, Mediterranean scrub and white stone fruit float above the glass. On the tangy palate, crisp acidity lifts pomegranate, grapefruit, ginger and nectarine. A savory vein of salinity leaves a mouthwatering finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Barone di Villagrande 2018 Rosato (Etna)

Description: Fragrant and loaded with finesse, this elegant sparkler offers delicate but enticing scents of white spring flowers, orchard fruits, pie crust and a whiff of wild herbs. On the softly foaming palate, fresh acidity brightens creamy yellow apple, white peach and citrus notes before finishing on a thyme note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ferghettina 2014 Satèn (Franciacorta)

Description: A blend of organically farmed Corvina (80%) and Rondinella (20%), this elegant rosato opens with enticing scents of spring field flower, aromatic herb, ripe peach and a whiff of baking spice. Smooth, bright and juicy, the savory, easy-drinking palate offers wild red berry, tangerine zest and a hint of white pepper alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Fraghe 2018 Ròdon (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: A 100% Sangiovese rosé, this opens with inviting aromas of wild berries, grilled herbs and a whiff of culinary spices. On the bright, savory palate, hints of ground clove and white pepper accent juicy red cherry, white peach and citrus while bright acidity gives it a tangy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Fibbiano 2018 Rosato (Toscana)

Description: High-toned aromas of wild strawberry, crushed cherry and powdered stone dazzle on the nose of this rusty-pink hued wine. There's ample tang and energy to the palate, with cranberry and cherry skin flavors enlivened by a slick of wet limestone. Red apple peel tannins offer a soft frame to it all, rising up on the finish to offer a final kiss of astringency. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: De Fermo 2017 Le Cince Superiore (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: Made with 80% Chardonnay and 20% Pinot Nero, this has aromas of citrus, spring field flower and a whiff of bread crust. On the vibrant palate, bright acidity and a continuous, elegant perlage provide freshness and finesse to creamy yellow apple, dried apricot and a hint of hazelnut. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Majolini 2011 Electo Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Aromas of French oak, coconut and wild berry leap from the glass. The elegant palate offers juicy red cherry, cranberry and well-integrated, oak-driven spice alongside fresh acidity and fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salicutti 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This absolutely delicious rosato opens with alluring aromas of Spanish broom, wild berry and a whiff of sea breeze. The smooth, savory palate doles out mouthfuls of juicy raspberry, pink grapefruit, white pepper and a salty mineral note alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sallier de la Tour 2018 Madamarosé Rosé (Sicilia)

Description: Made from organically farmed grapes, this has aromas of underbrush, dark-skinned berry and cooking spice. The savory, full-bodied palate delivers ripe black plum, ground pepper and tobacco leaf alongside polished tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Massimago 2014 Conte Gastone (Amarone della Valpolicella)

Description: Brioche, crushed herbs, pressed field flowers and orchard fruits aromas shape the nose. It's silky, savory and structured, offering ripe Golden Delicious apple, grapefruit, toasted hazelnut and a hint of coffee alongside fresh acidity and an elegant perlage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Crespia 2010 Brut Millè (Franciacorta)

Description: A wild strawberry and herb aroma carries a slight balsamic edge on the nose. The palate is well rounded and juicy in feel, with delicious red cherry and strawberry flavors that are honed by bright acidity and a tangy slick of wet stone. Cherry skin astringency marks the close, extending the fruit flavors into a medium finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Zaccagnini 2018 Dal Tralcetto Dry Rosé (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: Mature berry, sunbaked earth, underbrush and eucalyptus aromas lift out of the glass along with whiffs of clove. On the full-bodied palate, taut, polished tannins support fleshy black cherry, ripe cranberry and a hint of dried herbs. Best 2020–2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Baricci 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Inviting floral and wild berry aromas mingle with whiffs of botanical herbs. On the savory, refreshing palate, tangy acidity accompanies pomegranate, juicy pink grapefruit and creamy white peach. It closes on a saline note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cavalchina 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Made with Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah, this fresh, tangy rosato boasts juicy primary flavors of red currant, black cherry and raspberry. Notes of white pepper and Mediterranean herbs accent the fruity flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Campo alle Comete 2018 Rosato (Bolgheri)

Description: This opens with delicate aromas of ripe black plum, baking spice and an earthy whiff of new leather. The forward palate delivers ripe black cherry, clove and tobacco alongside polished tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casisano 2010 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of dark berry, violet and scorched earth take shape on this. The bright palate offers juicy Marasca cherry, clove and star anise alongside polished tannins and fresh acidity. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello Tricerchi 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Made with 90% Chardonnay and 10% Pinot Nero, this has aromas evoking spring blossom, bread crust and white stone fruit. On the palate, a silky mousse lends finesse to creamy apple and grapefruit. It closes on a hint of ginger. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonfadini NV Nobilium Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: This vibrant coral-pink rosato is a blend of 70% Negroamaro and 30% Susumaniello. The nose offers lifted aromas of gardenia and rose, with a squeeze pink grapefruit giving a burst of freshness. It's light in feel but bright on the palate in crisp citrus and melon flavors. There's a pleasing creaminess on the midpalate that leads to a kiss of grapefruit peel on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantine Menhir 2018 Numero 0 Negroamaro-Susumaniello Rosato (Salento)

Description: Enticing scents of spring wildflower, white orchard fruit and pastry dough are some of the aromas you'll find on this fragrant sparkler. On the savory, elegant palate, a soft mousse and fresh acidity accompany ripe yellow apple, white grapefruit and a bread crust note. A hint of saline marks the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fratelli Berlucchi NV Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Made with organically farmed grapes, this savory rosé offers aromas of wild red berries and spring field flowers. It's bright and tangy, evoking sour cherry, strawberry and a hint of citrus zest alongside fresh acidity. It closes on a note of ground clove. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gorgo 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Aromas of white spring blossom, citrus, bread crust and saline shape the delicate nose. On the bright palate, fresh acidity and a silky mousse accompany creamy white peach, yellow apple and grapefruit before a white almond finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lantieri NV Cuvée Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Wild herb, woodland berry and fragrant field flower aromas come together in the glass. Made entirely with Pinot Nero, the vibrant, elegant palate offers pomegranate, grapefruit and a hint of ginger alongside bright acidity and lively perlage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Majolini NV Altera Brut Rosé (Franciacorta)

Description: Brioche, spring flower and orchard fruit aromas waft out of the glass. On the bright palate, fresh acidity and continuous beading accompany mature yellow apple, citrus and a hint of bread crust. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Majolini NV Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: This opens with aromas of red berry, spring flower and a whiff bread dough. On the tangy, lightly sparkling palate, fresh acidity brightens Rennet apple, pomegranate and pink grapefruit alongside a soft, refined perlage. It closes on a mineral note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Crespia NV Brolese Rosé Extra Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Made entirely with native Sicilian grape Nerello Mascalese, this fresh, fragrant wine opens with aromas of rose petal, wild red berry and Mediterranean scrub. Bright and savory, the palate recalls the nose, doling out raspberry, red cherry and a hint of citrus alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tasca d'Almerita 2018 Regaleali Le Rose Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Aromas of wild red berry, bread dough and citrus form the nose. Reflecting the aromas, the bright, softly foaming palate offers pomegranate, grapefruit and a hint of baking spice before a bitter almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Contadi Castaldi 2014 Rosé Brut Riserva (Franciacorta)

Description: White spring flower, bread dough and wild herb aromas float above this lively sparkler. On the dry, savory palate, fresh acidity brightens mature yellow apple, white peach and a hint of grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ferghettina NV Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Lemon, white spring flower, chamomile and brioche aromas mingle with whiffs of wild herbs. The linear, tangy palate delivers creamy yellow apple, grapefruit, hazelnut and an unusual but intriguing hint evoking charcuterie alongside a continuous perlage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Montina NV Quor 2910 Extra Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Fragrant and foaming, this inviting sparkler has aromas of spring blossom and ripe orchard fruit. The bright, polished palate offers creamy white peach, yellow apple and citrus alongside a hint of honey. It closes on a bread crust note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lantieri de Paratico NV Brut Satèn (Franciacorta)

Description: A 50-50 blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon, this savory rosato opens with inviting aromas of wild berry, botanical herb and a hint of baking spice. Reflecting the nose, the juicy palate doles out cherry, red currant, citrus zest and a bit of ginger alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terre di Talamo 2018 Piano Piano Rosato (Toscana)

Description: A blend of 70% Sangiovese and 30% Cabernet Sauvignon, this offers aromas of wild berries and blue flowers. On the tangy palate, fresh acidity brightens red cherry and pomegranate while a white pepper note keeps it savory. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Bossi 2018 Rosato (Toscana)

Description: This shows a concentrated hue of watermelon pink in the glass. Bright tones of fresh cherry and pomegranate meld with an earthy limestone core on the nose and palate. The persistent acidity drives these flavors to a lingering cherry pit finish, giving a rosato that is both bold and balanced. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cataldi Madonna 2018 Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo

Description: Breezy aromas of white spring flower, orchard fruit and a hint of pie crust shape the nose. On the foaming palate, a silky mousse and bright acidity provide finesse and freshness for creamy yellow apple and lemon zest. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fratelli Berlucchi 2014 Satèn (Franciacorta)

Description: Citrus, bread crust, eucalyptus and botanical herbs aromas lead the nose. Racy and linear, the focused palate offers mature yellow apple, white grapefruit and hazelnut set against bright acidity and a light perlage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monogram 2015 Zero (Franciacorta)

Description: Aromas of red berry, tobacco and Mediterranean scrub lead the nose. It's juicy and balanced, offering fleshy red cherry, licorice and black pepper alongside fine-grained tannins. It's fresh, with bright acidity. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Scopetone 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of white spring flowers, citrus, crushed herbs and brioche form the delicate but inviting nose. The racy, linear palate offers grapefruit, Rennet apple and hazelnut alongside vibrant acidity and a silky perlage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonfadini NV Nature Veritas (Franciacorta)

Description: A delicate nose of cherry and stone starts off this Cerasuolo. The medium-bodied palate is more expressive in flavors of thick-skinned red berries and crushed herbs, with a cherry pit note marking the close. A healthy framing of acidity and gentle tannins frames it all, offering a well-balanced rosato that would be perfect at the dinner table. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Tollo 2018 Hedòs (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of white spring flower, pastry dough and white stone fruit waft out of the glass. The foaming, polished palate offers creamy yellow apple, grapefruit and a hint of bitter almond alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Contadi Castaldi 2014 Satèn (Franciacorta)

Description: Sleek and vibrant, this has alluring aromas of white and yellow spring flower, wild berry and yellow stone fruit. The succulent palate has more structure than most Chiarettos, offering sour cherry, juicy strawberry, honeydew melon and a hint of baking spice before a crisp, dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guerrieri Rizzardi 2018 Classico (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: Chamomile, orange rind and toasted bread crust aromas shape the nose. On the elegant palate, a soft perlage accompanies mature yellow apple, white grapefruit and a hint of toasted almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Majolini 2012 Blanc de Blancs Riserva Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: This has delicate aromas of bread crust, orchard fruits and a whiff of botanical herbs. On the bright, elegant palate, fresh acidity and a lively but refined perlage accompany pomegranate, grapefruit and a hint of hazelnut. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ricci Curbastro NV Rosé Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Made predominantly with Pinot Nero, this opens with aromas of bread crust, chamomile and grapefruit. The aromas follow over to the mature, structured palate along with ripe yellow apple, toasted hazelnut and a hint of pastry dough. A soft perlage provides the backdrop. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Crespia 2011 Dosaggio Zero Riserva (Franciacorta)

Description: Heady aromas of pink grapefruit, orchard fruit and crushed herbs follow over to the tangy palate along with juicy sour cherry and pomegranate. It closes crisp and clean, with a savory suggestion of white pepper. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pasqua 2018 11 Minuti Rosé (Trevenezie)

Description: A pale shade of strawberry pink in the glass, this rosato shows aromas of wild bramble berries, crushed herbs and wet stone on the nose. The palate is broad and soft in feel, housing a strawberry flavor that melds with blood orange and tangy limestone. A sheer veil of tannins frames it all and helps dry things up on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Teanum 2018 Favùgnë Nero di Troia Rosato (Puglia)

Description: Bright aromas of candied watermelon and pink grapefruit grace the nose of this neon-pink rosato from the Farnese group. It's textural and soft on the entry of the palate, yet a veil of tannins offers a solid frame to flavors of cherry, melon and citrus. Cleansing acidity rises up on the finish, which creates a refreshing overall experience. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Fantini 2018 Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo

Description: Salmon pink in color, this Cerasuolo offers aromas of cherry, pink grapefruit and orchard blossoms on the nose, with hints of crushed stone giving a delicate, earthy nuance. There's good energy to the juicy palate, balancing flavors of cherry pit and pink grapefruit. The acidity is supportive and bright yet integrated and honed, with a pleasing tannic astringency offering good grip. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Feudo Antico 2018 Organic (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: This opens with aromas of red berry, scorched earth and new leather. The juicy palate offers ripe Marasca cherry, clove and a hint of white pepper alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: SassodiSole 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Made with Nerello Mascalese, this opens with aromas of yellow spring flower, wild berry and a whiff of citrus. Bright and tangy, the refreshing palate offers sour cherry, pink grapefruit and a hint of Mediterranean herbs alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vivera 2018 Rosato di Martinella Nerello Mascalese (Etna)

Description: This opens with aromas of tilled soil, red berry and baking spice. The savory palate offers raspberry jam, white pepper and cinnamon alongside velvety tannins and fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte dei Venti 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Delicately enticing, this has aromas and flavors of juicy red berry, tangerine slice and peach. It's vibrant and easy drinking, with tangy acidity and a crisp, clean finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Giovanna Tantini 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Peachy pink in color, this iconic Apulian rosato starts off with a delicate nose of apricot, grapefruit and watermelon. The palate boasts rounded flavors of juicy red berry and flowers, framed by a gentle slick of tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Leone de Castris 2018 Five Roses Rosato (Salento)

Description: This opens with violet, red-skinned berry and underbrush aromas. The juicy, accessible palate shows red cherry, white pepper and star anise alongside supple tannins. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pinino 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: A blend of 70% Sangiovese and 30% Cabernet Sauvignon, this offers aromas of wild berries and blue flowers. On the tangy palate, fresh acidity brightens red cherry and pomegranate while a white pepper note keeps it savory. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio al Tesoro 2018 Rosato Red (Bolgheri)

Description: Enticing aromas of wild berry, spring flower and crushed thyme are front and center. The bright, savory palate offers pomegranate, citrus and a hint of baking spice alongside refreshing acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Santa Margherita 2018 Chiaretto Classico Rosato (Riviera del Garda Bresciano)
Country: Riviera del Garda Bresciano, Lombardy, Italy

Description: Made from organically grown Montepulciano, this rosato offers a plush strawberry aroma, with hints of crushed herbs and stone in the background. The palate is soft and rounded in feel, with integrated acidity and gentle tannins framing the fruit flavors. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantinarte 2017 Gaia (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: This has aromas evoking underbrush, cedar and dark-skinned berry. The medium-bodied palate offers raspberry jam, star anise and white pepper alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Col di Lamo 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This opens with aromas evoking rose petal, tilled soil and new leather. The juicy palate offers red cherry, clove and star anise alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Pavone 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of Spanish broom, wild berry and a whiff of Mediterranean scrub form the nose on this vibrant Nerello Mascalese rosato. The crisp, savory palate offers sour cherry, tangerine and botanical herbs alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cottanera 2018 Rosato (Etna)

Description: Aromas of honeysuckle, red berry and yellow stone fruit are front and center. The savory, fruity palate doles out juicy yellow peach, pomegranate, pineapple and citrus alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Dal Cero 2018 Miraly Rosé (Toscana)

Description: Made with organically farmed grapes, this opens with aromas of black-skinned berry, sunbaked earth and leather. The juicy palate offers fleshy black cherry, star anise and white pepper alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Magia 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Spring wildflower, bread dough and grapefruit aromas follow over to the lively palate along with medicinal herbs and bread crust. Firm acidity keeps it fresh. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Majolini NV Blanc de Noir Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: A blend of Syrah and Vermentino aged in oak, this opens with subdued aromas of citrus and cedar. On the bright palate, you'll find sour cherry, dried apricot, candied citrus zest, coconut and coffee bean alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi de' Frescobaldi 2017 Aurea Gran Rosé (Toscana)

Description: Subtle aromas of sunbaked earth, leather and dark fruit come together on this. The taut palate offers dried black cherry, orange zest and white pepper alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Voliero 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This opens with aromas of spring wildflower, citrus and red berry. On the tangy palate, refreshing acidity accompanies pomegranate, pink grapefruit and a hint of ginger. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cà dei Frati 2018 Classico Rosato (Riviera del Garda Bresciano)
Country: Riviera del Garda Bresciano, Lombardy, Italy

Description: Made with 80% Chardonnay and 20% Pinot Nero, this mature sparkler has aromas and flavors of toasted bread crust, dried aromatic herbs, mature apple and a dollop of honey. Fresh acidity brightens the rich flavors. It closes on a butterscotch note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Majolini 2005 Valentino Majolini Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Aromas of walnut, bread crust, orange peel and honey carry over to the slightly lean palate along with mature apple and bread crust. Bright acidity and a polished perlage provide the backdrop. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Majolini 2014 Pas Dosé Aligi Sassu (Franciacorta)

Description: A pretty shade of ruby pink in the glass, this starts off with crushed cherry and herbs on the nose. The medium-bodied palate offers flavors of cherry skin and shattered stones that lead to an astringent veil of tannins on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masciarelli 2018 Villa Gemma (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: A blend of 80% Chardonnay and 20% Pinot Bianco, this has delicate aromas of white flower, citrus and ripe white stone fruit. The linear, rather lean palate offers grapefruit, graphite, hazelnut and mature yellow apple alongside racy acidity and a lively perlage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monogram NV Blanc de Blancs Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Aromas of bread crust, chamomile and mature yellow stone fruit form the nose. On the lively palate, vivacious bubbles and vibrant acidity accompany Golden Delicious apple, lemon zest and a hint of botanical herbs. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Aura NV Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Made entirely with Frappato, this bright rosato opens with enticing scents of geranium and red berry. On the lively palate, fresh acidity accompanies pomegranate and ripe pink grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudo Arancio 2018 Tinchitè Rosé (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Aromas of toasted oak, bread crust and peanut follow over to the palate alongside a hint of candied citrus zest. A foaming perlage softens the bitter almond finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ricci Curbastro 2014 Satèn (Franciacorta)

Description: A pretty shade of watermelon pink in the glass, this Cerasuolo offers aromas of wild strawberry and cherry on the nose. The palate is soft in profile, with a mild concentration of red berry flavors and a gentle tannic grip on the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tenuta Cerulli Spinozzi 2018 Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo

Description: This has subdued but distinctly earthy aromas of soil, damp fur, brimstone and wild herbs. On the vibrant, simple palate, bright acidity guides sour cherry and pink grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Cilnia 2018 Rosato (Toscana)
