Description: This opens with delicate aromas of underbrush, grilled herbs and a whiff of blue flowers. The taut palate offers sour cherry, mocha and clove alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Aisna 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Made entirely with Corvina, this savory, light-bodied wine has aromas of spring field flowers and wild berries. On the tangy palate, refreshing acidity accompanies pomegranate, pink grapefruit and a hint of white pepper. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Caposaldo 2018 Rosé (Veneto)

Description: Aromas of grapefruit, mature yellow apple and a whiff of spring flower form the nose. The fruity aromas carry over to the palate along with lightly foaming palate and a hint of thyme. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello Bonomi NV Satèn (Franciacorta)

Description: Violet, underbrush and tobacco aromas appear in the glass. The straightforward, approachable palate offers ripe black cherry, clove and star anise alongside supple tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Palazzo 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Earthy aromas of sunbaked earth, leather and a whiff of dark-skinned fruit emerge from the glass. The taut, medium-bodied palate offers dried cherry, orange zest and mocha alongside grainy tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Martoccia 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of wild red berry, honeysuckle and a hint of pink grapefruit lead the nose. Refreshing and savory, the easygoing palate offers tart sour cherry, juicy cranberry and white pepper alongside bright acidity. It closes crisp and tangy. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monte del Frà 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Made entirely with Merlot, this has a shy nose, but the bright palate is more expressive, offering red currant, sour cherry and a hint of white pepper. Tangy acidity keeps it juicy. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vivera 2018 C'era una Volta Rosato (Terre Siciliane)

Description: This saignée of Negroamaro offers pretty aromas of grapefruit, white flowers and strawberry on the nose. It is silken in feel, with creamy red fruit flavors, yet propped up by just enough acidity to keep it refreshing. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Castello Monaci 2018 Kreos Negroamaro Rosé (Salento)

Description: Perfumed aromas of rose and lily dance with accents of blood orange and slate in this coral-pink rosato. The light-bodied palate is driven by drawing acidity, with flavors of crushed rose petals and cranberry skin lingering on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Coppi 2018 Coré Negroamaro Rosato (Salento)

Description: Ballet slipper pink in the glass, this Negroamaro rosato offers delicate aromas of banana and melon on the nose. The palate shows good intensity of strawberry and melon flavors, with a tart line of acidity shining through. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantele 2018 Negroamaro Rosato (Salento)

Description: Aromas of citrus and wild red berry float out of the glass. Made entirely with Nerello Mascalese, the bright, juicy palate offers sour cherry and pink grapefruit alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Di Giovanna 2018 Vurria Nerello Mascalese Rosato (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Aromas of tobacco, black plum and French oak come together on this. The medium-bodied palate offers prune, clove and espresso alongside taut tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fanti 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This opens with aromas of French oak, coconut and dark berry. The dense palate offers black plum, mocha and tobacco alongside close-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Madonna Nera 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This Bombino Nero rosato is unabashedly fruity on the nose and palate with watermelon, grapefruit and strawberry tones taking center stage. It's a soft, easygoing sipper that is sure to please many with its straightforward appeal. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Rivera 2018 Pungirosa Bombino Nero Rosé (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Tangy and vibrant, this opens with delicate scents of wild berry and Spanish broom. The racy, linear palate offers sour cherry and orange slice alongside a hint of fennel and bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Torre Mora 2018 Scalunera Nerello Mascalese Rosato (Etna)

Description: A 50-50 blend of Chardonnay and Pinot Nero, this has aromas of roasted hazelnut, toasted bread crust and mature yellow apple. The aromas carry over to the lively palate along with grapefruit and bitter walnut. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Contadi Castaldi 2014 Zero (Franciacorta)

Description: Made with 100% Syrah, this fresh, linear rosé offer flavors of wild red berry, citrus and suggestions of white pepper. It's refreshing, with bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Le Pupille 2018 RosaMati Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Made with Sangiovese and a small percentage of white grapes, this has aromas of spring flowers and wild berries. On the fresh palate, a hint of white pepper adds interest to sour cherry and grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Sardi 2018 Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of ripe dark berry, underbrush and cooking spice lead the nose. The fleshy palate offers black plum, licorice and vanilla alongside supple tannins. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fossacolle 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This opens with delicate aromas of baking spice, rose petal and tilled soil. The vigorous palate offers dried black cherry, clove and tobacco alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Innocenti 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of spring wildflower, ripe orchard fruit and a whiff of saline float out of the glass. On the polished, foaming palate, fresh acidity accompanies ripe apple, peach and a hint of citrus. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monogram NV Satèn (Franciacorta)

Description: Aromas of peach blossom and woodland berry lift out of the glass. Made with 90% Sangiovese and 10% Syrah, the tangy palate offers pomegranate, sour cherry and a hint of grapefruit. It closes crisp and clean. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Moraia 2018 Rosato (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Fragrant yellow wildflower, bread crust and citrus aromas form the nose. On the palate, a lively perlage frames Golden Delicious apple, thyme and a hint of white grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Crespia NV Novalia Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Lively and linear, this crisp sparkler has rather subdued aromas, but the palate offers juicy pink grapefruit, pomegranate and peach. Bright acidity gives it a refreshing finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello Bonomi NV Brut Rosé (Franciacorta)

Description: Bread crust, white flower and orchard fruit aromas are front and center. On the foaming palate, vibrant acidity lifts mature yellow apple, candied lemon zest and a drop of chestnut honey. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Majolini 2014 Satèn (Franciacorta)

Description: Aromas of yellow spring flower, bread crust and yellow stone fruit lead the nose. On the vigorous palate, steely bubbles and bright acidity frame ripe golden apple, grapefruit and a hint of hazelnut. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mirabella NV Edea Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: This has aromas of medicinal herbs, pink grapefruit and saline. The aromas carry over to the lean, lively palate along with toasted nut and a hint of raw pomegranate. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Contadi Castaldi NV Rosé (Franciacorta)

Description: This cherry blossom pink wine has delicate aromas of watermelon, crushed stone and white flowers on the nose. It is light in profile on the palate, with bright acidity carrying flavors of cherry and pomegranate. A salty, savory note and a brush of tannins mark the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Feudo Antico 2018 Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo

Description: This has delicate aromas evoking red berry and rose. On the palate, fresh acidity partners with sour cherry and a citrus note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lornano 2018 Etél Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Made with Sangiovese, this has aromas of damp underbrush, toasted nut and red fruits. On the lean, bright palate, you'll find sour cherry, grapefruit and almond alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Piandaccoli 2016 Operandi Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Made with Gropello, Syrah, Barbera and Marzemino, this tangy rosato offers sour cherry, pomegranate and citrus flavors. Bright acidity gives it a juicy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pratello 2018 Riviera del Garda Chiaretto Sant'Emiliano Rosato (Valtènesi)

Description: Earthy aromas of sunbaked earth, game and ripe dark fruit appear in the glass. The straightforward palate offers black plum, powdered sage and clove alongside taut tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tiezzi 2017 Poggio Cerrino (Rosso di Montalcino)

Description: A blend of Barbera and Dolcetto, this bright, light-bodied wine offers pomegranate, sour cherry and citrus flavors. Bright acidity gives it a crisp finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Sparina 2018 Chiaretto Rosé (Monferrato)

Description: Floral and fruity aromas of honeysuckle, peach and wild berry lead the nose. On the bright, easygoing palate, fresh acidity lifts sour cherry and pink grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Buonamico 2018 Rosato (Toscana)

Description: A blend of 70% Primitivo and 30% Susumaniello, this rosato is boisterous on the nose with white flowers and orange rind. It is soft and melon-driven on the palate, with gentle shots of blood orange offering lift. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantine Menhir 2018 Pietra Rosato (Salento)

Description: A blend of Sangiovese and Vermentino, this has aromas of wild berry and peach. Bright and easygoing, the palate suggests sour cherry and grapefruit alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2019 Cost'è Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Made predominantly with Sangiovese, this has fruity aromas of wild berries and a whiff of botanical herbs. The aromas follow over to the bright, simple palate along with pink grapefruit. It's informal but refreshing. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Meleto 2018 Borgaio Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Delicate aromas of tilled soil, graphite and leather emerge from the glass. The forward palate offers cranberry, vanilla and clove alongside round tannins. Drink now. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Valentiano 2016 Campo di Marzo (Rosso di Montalcino)

Description: The nose is rather closed but eventually reveals leather, pipe tobacco and botanical herbs. The firm, no-frills palate offers blackberry jam and star anise alongside dusty tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Poderina 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This opens with aromas of toasted bread crust, candied orange zest and a hint of walnut. The aromas carry over to the lively palate along with a hint of sour cherry. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mirabella NV Rosé (Franciacorta)

Description: Made with Syrah and Sangiovese, this offers aromas of exotic fruit, honeysuckle and citrus. On the palate, white pepper notes accent pink grapefruit and pomegranate. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rocca di Montemassi 2018 Syrosa Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Pale strawberry pink in color, this easy rosato carries flamboyant aromas of spiced bubblegum and watermelon. The palate is light and bright in feel, carrying the same tones as the nose, with a juicy squirt of pomegranate on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2018 Calafuria Rosato (Salento)

Description: Aromas of medicinal herbs, thyme, orange peel and grapefruit follow to the slightly lean palate along with a saline note. It's fresh, with bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Albino Piona 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Subtle aromas of scorched earth, graphite and cooking spice emerge from the glass. The dense, straightforward palate offers black plum, clove and bitter almond alongside solid tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Carlo 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Floral and citrus aromas lead the way while the tangy, light-bodied palate offers sour cherry and grapefruit. It's crisp, with bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Santi 2018 Infinito (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: Red berry and pink grapefruit aromas follow over to the bright palate. Racy acidity and a hint of white pepper accent the fruity flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Caposaldo NV Rosé Brut Sparkling (Vino Spumante)

Description: This copper colored Pinot Grigio has aromas of orchard fruit and a whiff of spring wildflower. On the bright, straightforward palate, you'll find suggestions of apple and pink grapefruit alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Giacobbe 2018 Ramato Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Made with 100% Sangiovese, this has fruity aromas of wild berries and a whiff of yellow spring flowers. The juicy, enjoyable palate doles out ripe Morello cherry and raspberry alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria di Basciano 2018 Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Made with 50% Syrah and 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, this has aromas of citrus blossom, toasted nut and wild berry. On the linear palate, sour cherry partners with pomegranate and a hint of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio al Tesoro 2017 Cassiopea Pagus Cerbaia Rosato (Bolgheri)

Description: Fruity aromas of wild red berry follow over to the palate along with pink grapefruit and the merest suggestion of ginger. Fresh acidity brightens the slightly candied cherry close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Zeni 2018 Classico Vigne Alte (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: Boisterous aromas of cherry blossoms, melon and strawberry give a great start to this candied-watermelon pink rosato. There's a juicy, fruity entry to the palate, with a rounded, mouthwatering feel. It's a bit short on the finish, but altogether an enjoyable wine that would please a crowd. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Tollo 2018 Biologico (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: This opens with aromas evoking damp underbrush, wild berries and grilled herbs. On the no-frills palate, lithe tannins frame dried cherry, pomegranate and a hint of culinary spice before closing on a note of powdered sage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Carpineto 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This blend of Cesanese and Syrah has aromas of citrus blossom and orchard fruit. The zesty palate offers wild berry, mature white peach and the merest hint of spice alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casata Mergè 2017 Ginevra Rosato (Lazio)

Description: Peach, wild berry and spring flower aromas mingle with a whiff of ginger. On the easy-drinking palate, fresh acidity accompanies sour cherry and pink grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cecilia Beretta 2018 Freeda Rosé (Trevenezie)

Description: Aromas of tropical fruit, peach and wild berry form the nose on this Syrah-Vermentino blend. The aromas carry over to the fresh, enjoyable palate along with a hint of grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi de' Frescobaldi 2018 Alie Rosato (Toscana)

Description: A blend of 60% Sangiovese and 40% Syrah, this has a lively nose that offers wild berries and crushed aromatic herbs. On the bright, fresh palate, you'll find pomegranate and grapefruit alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rocca di Montemassi 2018 Renaissance Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Fragrant purple-flower, ripe plum and baking-spice aromas lead the nose. On the chewy full-bodied palate, tight, velvety tannins accompany succulent black cherry, blackberry and star anise. It's not your typical easygoing Rosso and will offer good mid-term aging. Drink through 2021–2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tassi 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This rustic Cerasuolo carries a balsamic strawberry nose, leading to soft, pleasing flavors of ripe red berries and melon on the palate. Tangy elements of pomegranate and wet stone arise on the midpalate, giving a savory nature to this easy-drinking rosato. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Fattoria Giuseppe Savini 2018 Rondineto (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: Crushed herb and citrus aromas follow over to the fresh, simple palate along with sour cherry. Bright acidity keeps it fresh. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Meridiana 2018 Riviera del Garda Classico Rosato (Valtènesi)

Description: Fruity aromas of wild berry and a hint of honeysuckle lead the nose. The bright, simple palate offers juicy strawberry and sour cherry alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pasini San Giovanni 2018 Il Chiaretto Rosato (Valtènesi)

Description: Aromas of wild berry follow over to the bright, easygoing palate along with tangerine and nectarine. Tangy acidity gives it a mouthwatering close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sartori 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Aromas of spring wildflower and orchard fruit lead the nose. On the bright, simple palate, you'll find sour cherry, a hint of peach and fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antica Corte 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Ripe aromas of strawberry and cherry lead the nose, with these soft red berry flavors taking on an almost confected tone on the palate. A healthy vein of acidity helps bright things up, giving decent balance to this fruity rosato. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bosco Nestore 2017 Eclipse (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: Made entirely with Canaiolo, this has delicate scents reminiscent of wild berries and a whiff of dried herbs. On the light-bodied palate, bright acidity accompanies sour cherry and a grapefruit note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Meleto 2017 Virginia Rosato (Toscana)

Description: A blend of several red grapes, this has aromas of crushed wild berry, rose and a whiff of soil. The bright, simple palate suggests Marasca cherry and the merest hints of orange zest and wild herbs alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lecci e Brocchi 2018 Il Meticcio Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Rose and wild berry aromas lead the nose. The aromas follow over to the racy, lean palate along with tangerine and a hint of herbs. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: One NV Spumanté Brut (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: Made with organically farmed Merlot, this bright, easygoing wine offers juicy wild cherry and blackberry flavors alongside just a hint of citrus. It's fresh and simple but well made. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Casabianca 2018 Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of wild red berry lead the way. Reflecting the nose, the fruity palate offers sour cherry, pomegranate and a citrus note alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Regola 2018 Roségola Rosato (Costa Toscana)

Description: This offers subdued aromas of scorched earth, leafy underbrush and a hint of dark-skinned fruit. The no-frills palate offers sour cherry, toast and orange peel alongside raspy, rather astringent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio Nardone 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Made entirely with Nero d'Avola, this fun, refreshing rosato offers aromas and flavors of juicy red cherry and raspberry. It's simple but well made, with bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Stemmari 2018 Estate Grown Rosé (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Wild berry and blue flower aromas lead the way while the light-bodied, simple palate offers suggestions of sour cherry and citrus. It closes on a note of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Usiglian del Vescovo 2017 Sangiovese Rosato (Costa Toscana)

Description: This has delicate scents of spring field flower and orchard fruit. The bright, simple palate offers sour cherry and grapefruit alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa de' Guareschi 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Made with Schiava, this has floral and fruity aromas of fragrant spring wildflowers and red berries. On the light-bodied, easygoing palate, crisp acidity accompanies cranberry and pink grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Albino Armani 2018 Rosé (Vallagarina)

Description: Made with Sangiovese and Merlot, this easygoing rosato offers delicate aromas of violet and wild berry. On the refreshing palate, tangy acidity accompanies juicy sour cherry along with the barest hints of white pepper and bitter almond. It's simple but well made. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2018 Centine Rosé (Toscana)

Description: Made with Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, this has fruity aromas of wild berry with hints of mint and a floral note. The light-bodied palate offers red currant and pomegranate alongside juicy acidity. It's simple but well made. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Borgo La Caccia 2018 Rosaprima Rosato (Alto Mincio)

Description: Hailing from Valle d'Aosta and made with Nebbiolo, Gros Vien and Neyret grapes, this bright rosato has aromas of wild berries, Alpine herbs and white rose. The racy, light-bodied palate suggests unripe strawberry, pomegranate and a hint of tangy grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Kiuva NV Rosé de Valée Rosato (Vino da Tavola)
Country: Vino da Tavola, Italy Other, Italy

Description: This easygoing rosato has subdued aromas suggesting orchard fruit and a whiff of spring flower. The simple palate offers apple and tangy citrus alongside refreshing acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Vis 2018 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Aromas of yeast, watermelon and grapefruit start off this delicate ballerina pink rosato. It's light in body and spritzy in feel, with decent fruit weight of watermelon and tart cherry flavors. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Varvaglione 2018 12 e Mezzo Rosato (Salento)

Description: This has a shy nose that eventually reveals the merest whiffs of wild berry and Mediterranean brush. The bright, simple palate suggests sour cherry and a hint of saline alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Benanti 2018 Rosato (Etna)

Description: Here's a tangy rosato that offers aromas of honeysuckle and wild berry while the palate offers sour cherry and pink grapefruit. It's simple but well made. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cesari 2018 Classico (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: Burnt orange in color, this Cerasuolo offers a cooked cherry aroma, with a background of wood spice. It sees time in barrels, which gives a bit of breadth to the feel, with flavors of soft red cherry and savory, nutty spice marking the palate. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Di Sipio 2016 Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo

Description: Fun and simple, this informal, light-bodied wine has sour cherry and citrus flavors. It's pleasant, with fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villabella 2018 Classico (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: Fruity aromas of wild red berry lead the nose on this simple rosato. It's fresh and informal, offering pomegranate and sour cherry alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alma Wines 2018 Ambo Rosa Pinot Nero (Provincia di Pavia)

Description: This has aromas of wild red berry and grapefruit that carry over to the light, simple palate. It's bright and easygoing, with fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bellora 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Bright and crisp, this simple rosato offers up flavors evoking unripe pomegranate, sour cherry and a hint of citrus. It closes on a slightly bitter note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Franzosi 2018 Chiaretto Riviera del Garda Rosato (Valtènesi)

Description: This opens with unusual aromas evoking pungent, soft cheese and charcuterie. On the lean palate, you'll find mature orange rind, butter and bitter walnut. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mirabella 2011 Demetra Extra Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Gentle coral pink in the glass, this is a delicate Cerasuolo that offers flavors of white cherry and blood orange. A bit of lemon pith zing hits the finish, offering a pleasing end to a simplistic wine. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Podere Castorani 2018 Cadetto (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: A pale shade of coral pink in the glass, this rosato is rather neutral on the nose. The palate is a bit more expressive in bubblegum spice and cherry skin flavors, with astringent tannins framing it all. The finish is short and to the point. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Agriverde 2018 Solàrea (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: Bright and simple, this light-bodied wine offers aromas and flavors of wild red berry, citrus and a floral note. It's easy and refreshing. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Delibori 2018 Classico (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: This strawberry pink rosato offers a wild berry aroma, with hints of banana and herbs. The light-bodied palate is bright with spritzy acidity and a red cherry flavor. The finish is brisk in a cleansing tonic note. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: La Valentina 2018 Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo

Description: Made entirely with Sangiovese, this light-bodied wine has aromas of red berry and orchard fruit. Reflecting the nose, the fresh, simple palate suggests wild raspberry and a hint of white peach. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Torre a Cenaia 2018 Pitti Rosato (Toscana)

Description: A pale shade of millennial pink, this rosato carries a delicate nose of orchard blossoms, pollen and white grapefruit. It is pithy and textural on the palate, with lots of citrus rind flavors that lend a slight bitter edge to the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Masciarelli 2018 Rosato (Colline Teatine)

Description: This has subtle aromas suggesting wild berries and a whiff of almond. The aromas carry over to the informal, light-bodied palate along with a hint of citrus. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Menegotti 2018 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Made predominantly with Sangiovese, this has fruity aromas of wild berries and a whiff of botanical herbs. The aromas follow over to the bright, simple palate along with pink grapefruit. It's informal but refreshing. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Renzo Masi 2018 Le Bastarde Rosato (Toscana)

Description: This has aromas of tropical fruit and honeysuckle. It's lean and informal, suggesting flavors of pink grapefruit, sour red berry and a candied note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cà de' Rocchi 2018 Campo delle Rose (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: Peach and honeysuckle aromas lead the nose. On the slender, informal palate, you'll find fresh acidity but only mere suggestions of sour cherry and grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantine di Ora 2018 Rosato (Veronese)

Description: Exotic fruit and honeydew aromas lead the nose. The aromas carry over to the extremely simple, light-bodied and rather diluted palate along with a sour cherry note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Domìni Veneti 2018 Colle Vento (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: Bright and informal, this extremely simple wine suggests pink grapefruit and a notion of sour cherry. It has brisk acidity and closes on a rather bitter note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Botter 2018 Rosato (Veneto)

Description: Pale salmon pink in color with a slight haziness, this is floral and yeasty on the nose. The palate is delicate in flavor, with soft melon and strawberry flavors that lack vibrancy and intensity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Feudo Antico 2017 Biologico Rosato (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Medium strawberry in hue, this Cerasuolo shows a density of cherry coulis on the nose, with accents of cedar and singed herbs. There's a candied red fruit flavor on the palate, with sweet-tart flavors like Pixy Stix adding to the experience. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Talamonti 2018 Rosé (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: A bit closed on the nose, this eventually opens up to aromas of watermelon and herbs. The palate is light in profile, with a yeasty tone that pervades over lagging fruit tones of melon and raspberry. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Jorche 2018 Dipinta Negramaro Rosato (Salento)

Description: A vibrant watermelon red hue is one of the leading appeals of this wine. The nose is driven by sharp tones of nail polish and strawberry balsamic, yet the palate takes a turn with bubblegum and cherry flavors that are flat and lack vitality. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Ripa Teatina 2018 Arenile 1969 (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: Wild berry, fragrant purple flower and crushed herb aromas mingle with whiffs of tilled earth and new leather in this dazzling red. The stunning, savory palate boasts remarkable finesse combined with an ageworthy structure, offering succulent black cherry, raspberry compote, licorice and tobacco alongside taut, refined tannins. It's impeccably balanced by bright acidity. It's already tempting, but hold for even more complexity. Drink 2021–2033. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ciacci Piccolomini d'Aragona 2013 Pianrosso (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Just re-released, this supremely elegant complex red is a testament to Brunello's remarkable aging potential. It opens with aromas evoking sunbaked earth, underbrush, new leather and mature berry that mingle with whiffs of flint and tar. The silky palate is chock–full of flavor and finesse, boasting mature black cherry, raspberry compote, tobacco and black tea framed in polished tannins and still tangy acidity. Drink through 2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Biondi-Santi 1995 Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Fragrant and loaded with finesse, this stunning red still shows the estate's hallmark of elegance and structure, opening with enticing scents of rose, iris, wild red berry and a whiff of new leather. The vibrant palate is dazzling and almost ethereal, delivering flavors of succulent red cherry, pomegranate, star anise and a hint of forest floor. Taut, polished tannins and bright acidity provide impeccable balance. Drink 2021–2033. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Biondi-Santi 2013 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Fragrant and refined, this stunning red opens with captivating aromas of woodland berry, rose, violet, ground spice and a whiff of new leather. On the firm, elegantly structured palate, taut refined tannins intertwine with succulent red cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and chopped herb while fresh acidity lends balance. It's already tempting but still young so give the tannins a few more years to unwind. Drink 2021–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2014 Asili Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Wild berry, fragrant blue flower, baking spice and a balsamic note of menthol shape the nose. Structured and focused, the tense palate delivers juicy red cherry, raspberry compote, star anise and cinnamon while taut, fine-grained tannins and bright acidity provide the backbone. It has a youthfully austere finish that promises great aging potential. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2014 Montefico Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Forest floor, new leather, rose and red-berry aromas mingle with a whiff of camphor. Youthfully austere, the taut palate shows serious aging potential, presenting juicy cherry, cranberry, star anise and orange slice set against tightly knit, noble tannins and firm acidity. Drink 2022–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2014 Rabajà Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Wild berry, underbrush, tilled earth, leather and blue flower aromas shape the nose of this fragrant, stunning red. The newest Taurasi addition to the firm's already impressive line up, this is focused, terroir-driven and loaded with finesse. It delivers flavors of juicy wild cherry, crushed rasperry, blood orange, star anise and tobacco, framed in lithe, polished tannins and fresh acidity. While already enjoyable, it will also age well for years. Drink through 2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mastroberardino 2015 Stilema (Taurasi)

Description: Forest floor, red-skinned berry, leather and tobacco aromas mingle with a balsamic note. The focused, structured palate delivers juicy Morello cherry, raspberry compote and licorice while a graphite note backs up the finish. A backbone of fine-grained tannins and bright acidity gives it an age-worthy structure. Drink 2021–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2014 Montestefano Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Earthy, alluring aromas of new leather, freshly tilled soil, fragrant blue flower and plum shape the nose. Smooth, chewy and delicious, the palate doles out ripe black cherry, carob and sweet tobacco alongside polished tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Paradiso di Manfredi 2012 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Enticing scents of white spring flower, yellow stone fruit and freshly baked bread form the bouquet on this gorgeous sparkler. On the balanced, savory palate, fresh acidity lifts ripe golden apple, white peach, juicy citrus and the merest hint of acacia honey. An elegant mousse persists into the long, bone-dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Berlucchi 2011 '61 Nature (Franciacorta)

Description: Forest-floor, leather, menthol, black-skinned fruit and a whiff of French oak aromas shape the nose on this focused red. Savory and elegant, the taut palate delivers ripe Marasca cherry, cranberry, star anise and tobacco set against tightly knit fine-grained tannins that need a few more years to unwind. Fresh acidity shores up the finish. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castelgiocondo 2013 Ripe al Convento (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: New leather, camphor, red-berry and rose aromas lead the way on this vibrant red. The medium-bodied palate offers sour cherry, pomegranate and white pepper accompanied by bright acidity and polished fine-grained tannins that lead to a firm finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2014 Rio Sordo Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Showing the firm's hallmark of remarkable elegance, this fragrant, linear red opens with enticing scents of red berry, blue flower, rose, white pepper and crushed herb. The vibrant palate boasts compelling finesse and tension, delivering juicy red cherry, strawberry compote, star anise and a hint of tobacco. Taut refined tannins and bright acidity provide balance and seamless support. It screams out for food. Drink 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Chiuse 2014 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This opens with alluring aromas of red berry, violet, leather and underbrush. The balanced, juicy palate delivers cherry, star anise, tobacco and orange zest alongside tightly knit, fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: SassodiSole 2013 Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Delicately scented, this refined sparkler offers enticing scents of red berry, apple, cake spice and a whisper of citrus. The vibrant focused palate is loaded with finesse, delivering red cherry, pomegranate, bread crust and a graphite note alongside bright acidity and an elegant perlage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ferrari 2006 Giulio Ferrari Riserva del Fondatore Rosé Extra Brut Sparkling (Trento)
Designation: Giulio Ferrari Riserva del Fondatore Rosé Extra Brut

Description: Woodland-berry, forest-floor, Mediterranean herb and blue-flower aromas mingle with whiffs of dark spice and leather. Savory and loaded with finesse, the focused palate delivers black cherry, cranberry, baking spice and tobacco set against tightly knit polished tannins. It's balanced, with bright acidity. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Canalicchio di Sopra 2013 Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Wild berry, fragrant blue flower, baking spice and a whiff of menthol slowly appear in the glass along with an earthy whiff of underbrush. The savory palate shows tension and finesse, delivering raspberry compote, red cherry, star anise and cinnamon set against taut polished tannins. Bright acidity keeps it well balanced. Drink 2020–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Macioche 2013 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Lovely aromas of perfumed berry, rose petal, aromatic herb and baking spice set the tone on this fragrant red. The ethereally elegant, medium-bodied palate is all about finesse and balance, delivering succulent red cherry, juicy raspberry, cinnamon and a dash of white pepper. It's nicely balanced, with polished tannins and fresh acidity. It's already accessible but will also age well over the next several years or more. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2014 Ovello Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Wild-berry, rose, camphor and crushed herb aromas appear in the glass along with whiffs of new leather and underbrush. It's extremely elegant and savory, delivering succulent Marasca cherry, raspberry compote, mocha and star anise. Firm fine-grained tannins and bright acidity provide the framework. Drink 2021–2033. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Talenti 2013 Pian di Corte Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Inviting scents of bread crust, orchard fruit and chamomile mingle together on this extremely elegant sparkler. It's radiant, delivering yellow apple, lemon zest, toasted hazelnut and mineral flavors accompanied by vibrant acidity. The bone-dry finish is softened by a refined perlage of small, continuous bubbles that impart finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Barone Pizzini 2014 Nature (Franciacorta)

Description: Aromas of pipe tobacco, ripe plum, underbrush and a whiff of new leather lead the way on this firmly structured red. The full-bodied palate shows raspberry compote, tart cranberry, star anise, sage and espresso alongside tight close-grained tannins that give the finish grip. Drink 2021–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2013 Poggio alle Mura Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Elegant and showing intriguing complexity, this offers delicate scents of pastry dough, white and yellow stone fruit and a whiff of bread crust. The palate shows finesse and freshness, delivering mature yellow apple, white peach, citrus zest and a dollop of vanilla alongside a silky mousse. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fratelli Berlucchi 2011 Casa delle Colone Brut Riserva (Franciacorta)

Description: Menthol, woodland-berry and crushed herb aromas slowly take shape on this fragrant red. The savory palate doles out juicy Morello cherry, cranberry and licorice while bright acidity and polished tannins provide seamless support. Drink through 2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2014 Pora Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Plum, underbrush, exotic spice and French oak aromas jump out of the glass on this concentrated Cabernet Franc and Merlot blend. The bold dense palate offers blackberry jam, licorice, vanilla and tobacco framed in firm velvety tannins. It closes on the warmth of alcohol. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Trinoro 2016 Red (Toscana)

Description: Violet, wild-berry and ground clove aromas take center stage while the medium-bodied palate shows juicy cherry, raspberry compote and star anise. Vibrant acidity and refined tannins provide an elegant framework. Drink 2021–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2014 Pajè Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Racy and linear, this elegant sparkler has delicate scents of spring flower, white orchard fruit and brioche. The vibrant, precise palate offers yellow apple, white peach, citrus and a hint of hazelnut framed in bright acidity. A refined perlage carries through to the pristine bone-dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fratelli Berlucchi 2014 Freccianera Brut Nature (Franciacorta)

Description: Made with 100% Cabernet Franc, this full-bodied red offers enticing aromas of violet, licorice, mature plum and an intriguing whiff of vineyard dust. The smooth enveloping palate doles out raspberry compote, dried cherry, licorice and tobacco. Polished tannins provide seamless support and finesse. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Trinoro 2016 Campo Tenaglia Red (Toscana)

Description: Vibrant and boasting a creamy finesse, this radiant sparkler offers heady scents of spring flower, white orchard fruit and bread crust. The palate dazzles with yellow apple, juicy Bartlett pear, Meyer lemon and mineral, all framed in a silky mousse and racy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' del Bosco 2014 Vintage Collection Dosage Zero (Franciacorta)

Description: Aromas of woodland berry, damp soil, new leather and crushed thyme form the nose along with a whiff of iris. Linear and elegant, the polished palate evokes juicy red cherry, pomegranate, licorice and a hint of coffee alongside fine-grained tannins and vibrant acidity. It's already approachable but also offers good mid-term aging. Drink 2020–2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castelgiocondo 2014 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Made with Pinot Bianco and Durella, this deeply golden-colored sparkler has delicate scents of white spring flower, bread crust and mature yellow stone fruit. It's vibrant, linear, elegant and focused, delivering juicy grapefruit, ripe apricot, fennel seed and a flinty mineral note alongside an extremely refined perlage. It boasts a crisp bone-dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bellaguardia 2011 Metodo Classico Sparkling (Vino Spumante)

Description: Wild berry, crushed herb, and toasted bread-crust aromas lead the nose on this fragrant sparkler along with a balsamic note. The dynamic linear palate offers sour cherry, pomegranate and a hint of white pepper alongside a lively refined perlage. It closes on an orange zest note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' del Bosco 2009 Anna Maria Clementi Extra Brut Rosé (Franciacorta)
Designation: Anna Maria Clementi Extra Brut Rosé

Description: Forest-floor, tobacco, dark-skinned berry and clove aromas mingle together in the glass. On the bright savory palate, polished tannins and fresh acidity balance succulent black cherry, crushed raspberry, cinnamon and star anise. Drink 2020–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Collosorbo 2013 Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Field flower, wild berry, crushed herb and brioche aromas interlace on this radiant sparkler. Made entirely with Pinot Nero, it's bright, savory and elegant, offering strawberry, pomegranate, bread crust and a hint of candied orange zest alongside a silky mousse. Bright acidity lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ferghettina 2014 Brut Rosé (Franciacorta)

Description: Aromas suggesting bread crust and hazelnut segue into yellow spring flower and citrus notes. Made with organically grown grapes, the racy focused palate delivers juicy white grapefruit, graphite, apricot and a hint of brioche alongside vibrant acidity and lively continuous perlage. Give this a few more years to develop even more complexity. Drink 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fongaro 2013 Brut Bio Riserva (Lessini Durello)

Description: Heady aromas of wild berry, rose, thyme, tilled soil, truffle and a whiff of new leather float above the glass. Supremely elegant, the savory palate offers succulent wild cherry, raspberry compote, star anise and crushed herb alongside polished tannins. Fresh acidity lends nice tension. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fuligni 2016 Ginestreto (Rosso di Montalcino)

Description: Bread crust, crushed rock, chamomile and apricot aromas mingle with a whiff of smoke. On the elegant palate, bright acidity and a silky perlage provide the refined backdrop for mature yellow apple, pastry cream and citrus zest. A mineral vein carries over to the dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gianni Tessari 2008 120 Mesi Extra Brut (Lessini Durello)

Description: Full bodied, smooth and savory, this youthful fragrant red opens with inviting aromas of black-skinned berry, rose, new leather and a whiff of camphor. The juicy delicious palate doles out fleshy Marasca cherry, raspberry compote and baking spice while taut polished tannins provide the framework. Drink 2020–2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salvioni 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Pastry dough, yellow stone fruit and citrus aromas lead the way on this elegant sparkler. Made with organically farmed native grape Durella, the savory, polished palate doles out Golden Delicious apple, orange zest, bread crust and a hint of crystallized ginger alongside a mineral vein. The silky perlage and fresh acidity give it weightless balance. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fongaro 2011 Brut Riserva (Lessini Durello)

Description: Fragrant and fresh, this sleek red offers inviting aromas of rose, wild berry, botanical herb and a whiff of tilled soil. The bright savory palate evokes juicy red cherry, ripe pomegranate, star anise and orange zest accompanied by present but polished tannins. It closes on a flinty mineral note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Marroneto 2016 Ignaccio (Rosso di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of brioche, acacia honey and chamomile shape the nose. The silky elegant palate shows depth and complexity, delivering white peach, tangerine bread crust, bitter almond and vanilla. Bright acidity lifts the bone-dry finish while the creamy perlage lends finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lantieri 2012 Origines Pas Dosé (Franciacorta)

Description: Elegantly structured, this vibrant wine opens with aromas of underbrush, rose petal, red woodland berry and a whiff of new leather. The graceful palate boasts great energy and is delicately delicious, delivering juicy red cherry, pomegranate, star anise and white pepper. Polished tannins show some grip on the lingering finish. Drink 2020–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2014 Muncagota Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Vibrant and loaded with finesse, this compelling sparkler offers enticing scents of yellow spring flower, citrus and pastry dough. The pristine precise palate delivers yellow apple, lemon, brioche and mineral alongside tangy acidity and a silky perlage. It has a crisp, bone-dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antica Fratta 2014 Essence Nature Dosaggio Zero (Franciacorta)

Description: Enticingly fragrant, this offers aromas of rose petal, citrus chamomile and a whiff of brioche. Savory and precise, the vibrant palate delivers strawberry, pomegranate, bread crust and mineral alongside racy acidity and silky perlage. The dry crisp finish closes on a hazelnut note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antica Fratta 2014 Essence Rosé (Franciacorta)

Description: Smooth and creamy, this has delicate aromas of pastry dough, citrus and white stone fruit. The polished palate delivers Bartlett pear, yellow apple, orange zest and a hint of ginger alongside a foaming, refined mousse and bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' del Bosco 2014 Vintage Collection Brut (Franciacorta)

Description: Citrus zest, crushed herb, pastry dough and wild herb aromas follow over to the vibrant palate along with lemon, yellow apple and a hint of vanilla. Racy acidity gives it freshness and tension while the silky perlage lends softness and elegance. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' del Bosco 2014 Vintage Collection Satèn (Franciacorta)

Description: A blend of Pinot Nero and Nerello Mascalese, this savory, stunning sparkler boasts aromas of Spanish broom, bread crust and wild berry. The racy elegant palate presents strawberry, pomegranate, nectarine, citrus and a sprinkling of baking spice. Tangy acidity and a silky mousse provide balance and finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terrazze dell'Etna 2014 Metodo Classico Brut Rosé (Vino Spumante)

Description: Aromas of smoke, bread crust, yellow flower and crushed rock lift out of the glass. On the vibrant, savory palate, fresh acidity lifts yellow peach, pastry dough and lemon cream alongside an elegant perlage. A savory mineral note lingers on the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sandro de Bruno NV 36 Mesi (Lessini Durello)

Description: Bread crust, mature orchard fruit, Spanish broom and acacia honey aromas follow over to the elegant mature palate along with creamy yellow apple, lemon zest and toasted almond. It boasts the complexity of an aged sparkler while youthfully fresh acidity lends energy and freshness. A soft mousse lends finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antica Fratta 2007 Quintessence Riserva (Franciacorta)

Description: Smooth, savory and stunning, this lovely sparkler has delicately enticing aromas of yellow pear, spring flower, toasted brioche, crushed stone and citrus zest. The silky palate delivers Golden Delicious apple, ripe apricot, almond and a honeyed mineral note. An elegant mousse softens the bone-dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bellaguardia 2012 Montecchi Pas Dosé (Lessini Durello)

Description: Made with organically farmed grapes and packaged in an extremely heavy bottle, this has aromas of tropical fruit and green apple. On the racy, rather lean palate, crisp acidity accompanies suggestions of green melon, Granny Smith apple and a hint of citrus. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monte Zovo 2019 Wolhlgemuth Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: This natural-leaning wine is a bit dichotomous. The nose starts off on rich aromas of citrus oil, drawn butter, smoke and walnut skin, while the palate is more tense and mineral driven. Crushed stone and steely lemon flavors are energetic and lifted, while drying tannins lend grip. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Valentina Passalacqua 2018 Bombino (Puglia)

Description: This has aromas of honeysuckle and tropical fruit with a whiff of hay. On the rounded palate, tangy acidity accompanies passion fruit and banana before closing on a note of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villabella 2019 Lugana

Description: Zesty aromas of peppery spice and tomato vine meld with creamy melon on the nose. The rounded palate brings flavors of banana, melon and orange that are initially lifted and pure but end a bit short. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tormaresca 2019 Calafuria Rosato (Salento)

Description: Lightly scented, the nose evokes tropical fruit and elderflower. It's linear and light-bodied, suggesting honeydew and white peach alongside racy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Produttori di Cormons 2019 Sauvignon (Collio)

Description: Aromas of coconut and French oak carry over to the assertive, austere palate along with unripe cranberry, espresso and licorice. It doesn't have enough fruit richness to stand up to the aggressive, grainy tannins that clench the astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gianni Gagliardo 2016 Mosconi (Barolo)

Description: Blue flower, baked plum and oak-driven spice aromas lift out of the glass. On the one-dimensional palate, solid but rather fleeting tannins accompany prune and ground clove. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Vedetta 2017 Cà Grossa (Barbaresco)

Description: A warm spice tone reminiscent of Chinese five-spice powder is ensconced in the ripe cherry and blackberry tones of this wine. It's smooth and silken on the palate, with creamy berry flavors that are lifted by zesty acidity. Well-mannered tannins support it all, giving this a vibe that will appeal to many. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Castello Monaci 2018 Pilùna Primitivo (Salento)

Description: Aromas of honeysuckle and white stone fruit waft out of the glass. The fresh, tangy palate offers mature white peach and honeydew before closing on a note of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lenotti 2019 Soave Classico

Description: This has subdued aromas suggesting stewed prune and leather with a whiff of sunbaked soil. Reflecting the aromas, the evolved palate appears tired, suggesting prune and dark spice set against grainy tannins that leave a lean, drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Montaribaldi 2017 Sorì Montaribaldi (Barbaresco)

Description: Oak, toasted hazelnut and graphite aromas slowly take shape in the glass. The aromas follow over to the amber-hued palate along with vanilla and butterscotch before a bitter almond close. It's medium bodied but lacks fruit richness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Primosic 2016 Skin Friulano (Collio)

Description: Tangy and fresh, this has aromas of white spring flowers and tropical fruit. The bright palate offers honeydew and citrus alongside vibrant acidity before a lemon drop candy close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Santa Sofia 2019 Lugana

Description: The nose offers firm tones of toasted oak, toasted vanilla, bologna and warm spices. Medium to full in weight, the palate echoes the nose, showing oak spices wrapping around cherry and plum fruit. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tagaro 2017 Cinquenoci Primitivo (Puglia)

Description: Heady aromas of toasted vanilla, anise and clove carry over the rich dark berry jam core. This is full in feel on the palate, with oak tones firmly wrapping around the coiled dark-berry fruit. While there is a lot of oak, the fruit is still there to flesh it out. It's a full, flashy and rich style. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Trullo di Pezza 2017 Licurti (Primitivo di Manduria)
Country: Primitivo di Manduria, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Bright, bouncy aromas of cherry and cranberry mix with integrated warm spice tones on the nose. It's silky in feel on entry, with flavors of juicy spiced blackberry lifted by violet. Mildly clenching tannins give a bit of grip and bite, but this rounds out well come the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Amastuola 2018 Organic Primitivo (Puglia)

Description: Prunes and cherries show a slightly stewed quality on the nose alongside olive tapenade and crushed herbs. Zesty acidity drives the palate, with flavors of sauced red fruit showing some lift thanks to a zip of crushed granite. The tannins are fine but crunchy, and this ends a bit hot. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Castello Monaci 2015 Aiace Riserva Red (Salice Salentino)

Description: Aromas of scorched earth, toasted nut, burnt rubber and stewed prune form the nose. On the evolved palate, grainy tannins accompany dried cherry, prune, rusty nail and a hint of nutmeg before a lean, mouthdrying finish that grips the close. Despite the astringent tannins, drink sooner rather than later to capture what little fruit remains. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pier Paolo Grasso 1997 Piccola Emma Riserva (Barbaresco)

Description: Lively aromas of papaya, melon and lemon start off this fruity number. It's well balanced and juicy on the palate, with a soft curve of melon against a sharper streak of lemon peel. “Alice” means anchovy in Italian, and this zesty white could be a perfect match alongside some fresh seafood. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Produttori di Manduria 2019 Alice Verdeca (Salento)

Description: Delicate scents of spring wildflowers, white stone fruit and a hint of nut form the subtle nose. On the palate, bright acidity accompanies pear, candied tangerine slice and bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Angoris 2018 Pinot Grigio (Collio)

Description: Aromas of balsamic-dipped cherries, tar and rubber carry the nose, while the plush, rounded palate offers more appeal in rich blackberry flavors. Oak and tannins are in full force, with just enough fruit weight and acidity to balance it all out. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Tenute Rubino 2016 Visellio Primitivo (Salento)

Description: This opens with aromas of dark-skinned fruit, wood smoke and underbrush. The taut palate offers clove, prune and dried sage alongside dusty tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Icardi 2015 Parej (Barolo)

Description: This opens with aromas evoking underbrush, tobacco and dark-skinned fruit. The solid palate shows black cherry, clove and white pepper alongside close-grained tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rizieri 2016 Barolo

Description: This opens with aromas of black-skinned fruit, tobacco and cooking spice. The solid palate offers baked plum, espresso and clove alongside assertive tannins that grip the close. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Silvio Grasso 2016 Barolo

Description: Rose petal, cooking spice and a hint of truffle lead the nose. The medium-bodied palate offers red cherry, white pepper and star anise alongside solid tannins. Drink 2023–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terre del Barolo 2015 Barolo

Description: Aromas of black-skinned fruit, tilled soil and leather lead the way. The firm palate offers sour cherry, clove and sage alongside dusty tannins. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villadoria 2016 del Comune di Serralunga d'Alba (Barolo)

Description: Aromas evoking dark-skinned berry, cedar and mocha emerge from the glass. The concentrated palate offers black plum, star anise and clove alongside firm tannins. Drink 2023–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Negretti 2016 Barolo

Description: Aromas of red-skinned berry, leather and underbrush form the nose. The savory, solid palate offers raspberry jam, clove and tobacco alongside firm tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Collina San Ponzio 2016 Barolo

Description: Subdued aromas of vanilla, mocha and cedar slowly emerge from the glass. The solid palate offers black plum, clove and toasted hazelnut alongside close-grained tannins. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Arnaldo Rivera 2016 Monvigliero (Barolo)

Description: Subdued aromas of toasted oak, espresso and coconut slowly take shape in the glass. The tightly-wound palate evokes prune, roasted coffee bean and clove alongside close-grained tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Boroli 2016 Cerequio (Barolo)

Description: This opens with aromas of vanilla, dark-skinned fruit and cedar. The dense brawny palate offers cherry marinated in spirits, star anise and espresso alongside closed-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gagliasso 2013 Riserva (Barolo)

Description: Aromas of black-skinned berry, culinary spice and tilled soil emerge from the glass. The bracing palate offers dried black cherry, powdered sage and licorice alongside assertive, close-grained tannins. Give the tannins a few years to unclench, then drink sooner rather than later to capture the remaining fruit. Best from 2023 to 2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gemma 2016 Colarej (Barolo)

Description: This opens with aromas of espresso, toasted oak and tobacco. The tightly wound palate offers cherry marinated in spirits, licorice and mocha alongside assertive tannins. Drink 2023–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Josetta Saffirio 2014 Millenovecento48 Riserva (Barolo)

Description: Earthy aromas of truffle, leather and dark-skinned fruit lead the nose. The mature palate offers blackberry jam, star anise and clove alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marrone 2013 Bussia Riserva (Barolo)

Description: Aromas of exotic spice, camphor and blue flower emerge from the glass. On the firm palate, you'll find sour cherry, pomegranate and tobacco set against fresh acidity while assertive, close-grained tannins that clench the finish. Drink after 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Piero Benevelli 2016 Le Coste di Monforte (Barolo)

Description: Subtle aromas of mocha, tobacco and cooking spice emerge from the glass. The solid palate offers baked plum, clove and sage alongside close-grained tannins. Drink after 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Raineri Gianmatteo 2016 Perno (Barolo)

Description: Subtle aromas of violet, mocha and cedar form the subdued nose. The dense palate offers black plum, licorice and vanilla alongside dusty tannins. Drink 2023–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Revello Fratelli 2016 Giachini (Barolo)

Description: Black-skinned berry, cooking-spice and tilled soil aromas lead the way. The firm palate offers cherry marinated in spirits, clove and dried sage alongside dusty tannins. Drink 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rocca Felice 2012 Famiglia Lanzavecchia Riserva (Barolo)

Description: Aromas of espresso, toasted oak and exotic spice emerge from the glass. The dense palate offers vanilla, star anise and dried black cherry alongside bracing tannins that leave an astringent finish. Drink after 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Virna Borgogno 2016 Cannubi (Barolo)

Description: The shy nose eventually reveals aromas suggesting toasted oak, roasted coffee bean and coconut. The straightforward palate offers prune, mocha and cedar alongside assertive tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Arnaldo Rivera 2016 Castello (Barolo)

Description: Tilled soil, tobacco and leather aromas slowly emerge from the glass. The straightforward palate offers sour cherry, orange zest and clove alongside tightly wound tannins. It does not have much persistence. Drink after 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marianot 2016 Garblet (Barolo)

Description: Subdued aromas suggesting cedar, mocha and underbrush waft out of emerge from the glass. The dense palate offers cherry marinated in spirits, licorice and roasted coffee bean alongside assertive, rather astringent tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marrone 2016 Barolo

Description: Underbrush, scorched earth and toasted nut aromas mingle with whiffs of grilled herb. On the lean palate, assertive, grainy tannins accompany sour cherry, clove and roasted coffee bean and leave an astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Piazzo 2016 Barolo

Description: Aromas of eucalyptus, rose water and stewed prune emerge from the glass along with a hint of coconut. On the brawny palate, licorice and evident alcohol accompany espresso and dried cherry while grainy tannins leave an astringent mouth-drying close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca'Romè 2016 Cerretta (Barolo)

Title: Fattoria La Rivolta 2019 Taburno Fiano (Sannio)

Description: Left on its lees for 16 months, this wine is full of character, opening with heady aromas of citrus blossom, white stone fruit and slightly balsamic notes of eucalyptus. On the savory, enveloping palate, tangy acidity lifts mature apricot, lemon drop and golden apple before a honeyed almond close. It has surprising freshness for the hot vintage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Martinelli 2017 Pantagruele (Soave)

Description: Made with organically cultivated grapes, this offers enticing scents of Spanish broom, acacia, stone fruit and honey. The honey note follows on to the enveloping, savory palate along with dried apricot, lemon drop and ginger before a white-almond close. Bright acidity keeps it fresh. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Filippi 2018 Vigne della Brà (Soave Colli Scaligeri)

Description: Aromas of dark-skinned berry, dried rose, tobacco and new leather slowly take shape in the glass. On the elegantly structured medium-bodied palate, bright acidity and fine-grained tannins lithely support dried cherry, cranberry and cinnamon before an orange-zest and almond finish. Best 2022–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nino Negri 2016 Inferno Carlo Negri (Valtellina Superiore)

Description: Linear and elegant, this has delicate but enticing aromas of acacia, beeswax, stone fruit and a whiff of honey. The aromas follow through to the racy palate, together with yellow pear, hazelnut and a hint of smoky flint that lends mineral tension. Some may find this too ethereal, while others will be captivated. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Raiano 2018 Alimata (Fiano di Avellino)
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: White stone fruit, elderflower and citrus aromas follow on to the savory palate along with honeydew melon and bitter almond. Tangy acidity brightens the rich, juicy flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Morette 2019 Mandolara (Lugana)

Description: Spring wild flower, yellow stone fruit and a whiff of toasted nut form the nose. On the bright palate, vibrant acidity accompanies yellow peach, apricot and orange zest before closing on notes of bitter almond and saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marangona 2018 Tre Campane (Lugana)

Description: Intense aromas evoking Spanish broom, citrus and wet stone permeate the glass. Savory, vibrant and restrained, it shows Soave's serious side, delivering yellow pear, golden apple and Meyer lemon. Notes of flinty mineral and a bitter-almond close impart surprising depth—a great showing. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sandro de Bruno 2016 Soave Colli Scaligeri

Description: Crisp and savory, this refreshing white has lovely aromas of white stone fruit and wild flowers. Showing classic varietal flavors, the tangy palate doles out ripe pear, apple and citrus before a white-almond finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Inama 2018 Vin Soave (Soave Classico)

Description: Fresh and savory, this tangy rosé has aromas of red berry, peach and yellow wild flower. On the crisp palate, vibrant acidity accompanies strawberry, sour cherry and baking-spice notes before a lemon-thyme close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cavalchina 2019 Bardolino Chiaretto

Description: Tangy and vibrant, this opens with delicate aromas suggesting hawthorn, Mediterranean scrub and white stone fruit. It's racy and linear, delivering yellow pear, peach, Meyer lemon and savory saline mineral notes alongside crisp acidity before a slightly nutty close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Raiano 2018 Ponte dei Santi (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Fragrant and loaded with finesse, this 100% Nebbiolo from the mountains has enticing aromas of wild rose, woodland berry, flint and alpine herb. Focused and all about elegance, the graceful palate offers strawberry, pomegranate, white pepper and a hint of clove set against polished tannins. Vibrant acidity keeps it balanced. It may too ethereal for some while others will be enchanted. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Perla Marco Triacca 2014 La Mossa (Valtellina Superiore)

Description: This tangy, medium-bodied white has inviting aromas of spring wild flower, ripe orchard fruit and a whiff of dried botanical herb. On the savory palate, juicy acidity accompanies white peach, green apple and honeydew melon before closing on a hint of almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feliciana 2019 Felugan (Lugana)

Description: White spring flower and exotic fruit aromas form the nose. On the savory, refreshing palate, crisp acidity frames grapefruit, apricot and pineapple before a tangy saline finish evoking oyster shell and a hint of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Mainente 2019 Pigno (Soave Classico)

Description: Aromas recalling tropical fruit and white spring flower lead the nose. On the savory palate, tangy acidity accompanies white peach, green melon and Meyer lemon before an almond finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' Rugate 2019 San Michele (Soave Classico)

Description: Made with organically farmed grapes, this savory rosato offers delicate, enticing aromas of spring wild flower, yellow stone fruit and botanical herb. Juicy, refreshing and delightfully drinkable, the tangy palate doles out pomegranate, sour cherry, orange zest and white pepper alongside crisp acidity. It closes on a saline note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Fraghe 2019 Rodon (Bardolino Chiaretto)

Description: Crisp and savory, this polished white has enticing scents of hawthorn, white stone fruit, apricot and a whiff of citrus. On the savory palate, bright acidity accompanies apple, white peach, Meyer lemon and tangy saline before a white-almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Raiano 2019 Greco di Tufo
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of pear and exotic fruit form the nose on this lovely, refreshing white. Racy and linear, the savory palate features apple, Meyer lemon and tangy mineral alongside hints of pineapple and white almond. Vibrant acidity keeps it bright and lively. KERIN O’KEEFE

Description: Delicate scents of wild herb, red berry and rose waft out of the glass along with a whiff of camphor. It's racy and linear, offering juicy sour cherry, raspberry and star anise framed in taut refined tannins and vibrant acidity. It closes on a savory, almost salty mineral note. Best through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nino Negri 2016 Le Tense (Valtellina Superiore)

Description: Fragrant aromas of peach blossom, field flower and ripe white-stone fruit are front and center on the nose. The creamy, savory palate doles out ripe peach, yellow pear and lemon drop alongside bright acidity that gives it a tangy, mouthwatering close. KERIN O’KEEFE

Title: Monte del Frà 2019 Lugana

Description: Made entirely with Garganega grapes and unfiltered, this crisp white has aromas of pressed spring blossom, acacia, honey and toasted nut. The savory, medium-bodied palate sneaks up on you, needing a few minutes in the glass before revealing ripe yellow apple, hazelnut, citrus and saline before a bitter almond finish. Bright acidity keeps it fresh. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Adami 2016 Decennale (Soave)

Description: Refreshing and savory, this opens with delicate scents of spring field flower, white stone fruit and Mediterranean herb. On the linear palate, vibrant acidity accompanies yellow pear, green melon and lemon drop before an almost salty close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mustilli 2019 Falanghina del Sannio

Description: Linear and bright, this fragrant red opens with aromas of woodland berry, wild rose and aromatic herb. The racy palate doles out crushed strawberry, white pepper and clove before a minty, tangy finish. Great value for the quality and the sheer drinking pleasure. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nino Negri 2016 Quadrio (Valtellina Superiore)

Description: Aromas of spring blossom, white stone fruit and a whiff of exotic fruit shape the nose on this medium-bodied white. On the savory, linear palate, tangy acidity lifts green apple, pear and Mediterranean herb before a lemon drop close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria La Rivolta 2019 Taburno Coda di Volpe (Sannio)

Description: This savory rosato has inviting aromas of grapefruit, wild berry and crushed aromatic herb. It's rounded, delicious and tangy, featuring juicy red cherry, crushed strawberry and baking spice alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE

It goes down so easily, one bottle probably won't enough. KERIN O’KEEFE

Description: Released after 10 years aging in the estate's cellars, this drop-dead gorgeous, classy red shows its celebrated pedigree. Made from vineyards that once supplied grapes for the famous Biondi Santi Riservas, this stunning red opens with classic aromas of red berry, rose, dark spice and crushed herb, while the radiant, elegantly structured palate delivers juicy red cherry, orange zest, licorice and crushed mint before a mineral note graces the long finish. Taut, refined tannins and fresh acidity keep it impeccably balanced. Drink 2022–2060. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Chiuse 2010 Diecianni Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Boasting alluring scents of new leather, truffle, camphor, pipe tobacco and just a whiff of tar, this just re-released Riserva from the estate's cellar is absolutely gorgeous. Loaded with finesse, the polished, vibrant palate delivers dried cherry, orange zest, cinnamon and nutmeg alongside silky, smooth tannins before finishing on a note of black tea. Still amazingly fresh and going strong. Drink through 2048. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Biondi-Santi 1998 Riserva La Storica (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Pressed rose, new leather, dark-skinned berry and truffle aromas emerge from the glass along with a balsamic whiff of camphor. Delicious and supremely elegant, the vibrant, youthfully austere palate shows lovely depth even at this young stage, delivering juicy Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and baking spice framed in taut, refined tannins. Fresh acidity generates youthful tension. Give it several more years to fully develop. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: L'Aietta 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Carob, mature black-skinned berry, new leather and tobacco aromas follow over to the smooth, savory palate along with ripe Marasca cherry and black olive. It's full of personality and already tempting but will develop even more complexity over the next few decades. Drink 2023–2043. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Paradiso di Manfredi 2013 Brunello di Montalcino

Velvety, fine-grained tannins provide support while coffee and crushed mint linger on the finish. Drink 2022–2032. KERIN O’KEEFE

Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salvioni 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2018 Praepositus Sylvaner (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with organically grown grapes, this opens with enticing aromas of ripe red berry, dried aromatic herb and a whiff new leather. Reflecting the hot vintage, it's already approachable but still offers good midterm aging potential. Drink 2021–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE

Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2018 Praepositus Sauvignon (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)

Full bodied and enveloping, the firm palate doles out mature Marasca cherry, prune, licorice and tobacco alongside youthfully assertive, fine-grained tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced and lends tension. It's still young so give it time to unwind and fully develop. Drink 2026–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fontodi 2016 Flaccianello della Pieve Sangiovese (Colli della Toscana Centrale)
Country: Colli della Toscana Centrale, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Camphor, rose and new leather shape the nose along with whiffs of woodland berry and underbrush. It's full bodied and loaded with elegance, delivering mature Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and tobacco set against firm fine-grained tannins. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria dei Barbi 2015 Vigna del Fiore (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Made with organically grown Pinot Nero, fermented and aged in terr-cotta amphorae, this opens with aromas of leather, scorched soil, rose petal, wild berry and game. Earthy and elegant, the aromas follow through to the smooth structured palate along with pomegranate, rhubarb, licorice and tobacco. Fresh acidity gives it youthful tension while taut fine-grained tannins lend support and finesse. Drink 2021–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fontodi 2016 Case Via Pinot Nero (Colli della Toscana Centrale)
Country: Colli della Toscana Centrale, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Underbrush, plum, tobacco and violet shape the nose, along with a whiff of eucalyptus oil. Full in weight yet refined, the enveloping palate doles out juicy black cherry, orange zest, vanilla and licorice alongside densely woven, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argiano 2015 Vigna del Suolo (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of ripe yellow stone fruit, beeswax and a whiff of pine resin shape the nose. Boasting finesse and invigorating acidity, the medium-bodied, racy palate delivers apricot, juicy grapefruit, Alpine herb and a hint of pineapple alongside vibrant acidity. A mineral note backs up the persistent finish. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nals Margreid 2018 Pitzon Riesling (Alto Adige)

Description: Round and creamy, this gorgeous white opens with aromas of chamomile, white stone fruit and baking spice. The delicious palate doles out succulent yellow apple, ripe pear and honeydew melon before a mineral-driven finish. This shows the incredible potential of Pinot Bianco in Alto Adige. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nals Margreid 2018 Sirmian Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Racy and linear, this vibrant white has aromas of white spring flower, citrus and crushed mint. It's bright and delicious, with grapefruit, yellow peach, saline and dried herb before a smoky mineral finish that adds depth. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2018 Praepositus Müller-Thurgau (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of elder flower, exotic fruit, citrus and baking spice are front and center on this fragrant white. It's full bodied and delicious, dishing out ripe apricot, juicy grapefruit, crushed mint and pineapple alongside tangy acidity. A ginger note lingers on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nals Margreid 2018 Fels Kerner (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of fragrant purple flower, new leather, underbrush and mature plum form the nose. The concentrated palate doles out blackberry jam, orange rind, licorice and tobacco framed in densely woven, close-grained tannins that leave a firm, drying finish. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Polino 2015 Helicrysum (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Truffle, leather and wild-berry aromas mingle with a whiff of botanical herb. It's full bodied and delicious, offering juicy Morello cherry, orange-zest and ground clove flavors before an anise close. Firm fine-grained tannins and bright acidity provide support. Drink 2021–2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Capanne Ricci 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: At first shy, a few swirls of the glass reveal pipe tobacco, sunbaked earth, dark spice and menthol aromas. Enveloping and elegantly structured, it's already almost accessible, offering baked plum, star anise and espresso alongside velvety tannins. Drink 2021 through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castiglion del Bosco 2015 Campo del Drago (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Leather, camphor, steeped plum and exotic-spice aromas mingle with a violet note. The concentrated, powerfully structured palate shows dried cranberry, black cherry extract, tobacco and espresso framed in assertive, close-grained tannins. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Talenti 2015 Piero (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Firmly structured, this opens with aromas of underbrush, exotic spice and whiffs of eucalyptus oil. The firm palate evokes black-cherry extract, orange zest, licorice and tobacco set against assertive, close-grained tannins that leave a rather austere, drying finish. Give it time to fully unwind. Drink 2023–2032. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Polo 2015 Podernovi (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Underbrush, new leather and camphor aromas lead the way along with whiffs of dark spice and blue flower. The full-bodied, chewy palate delivers juicy black cherry, crushed raspberry, truffle and licorice alongside a tannic backbone. Drink 2023–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Iris, woodland berry, new leather and wild mint aromas shape the nose on this fragrant red. The smooth, savory palate delivers juicy Morello cherry, crushed raspberry and licorice while velvety tannins lend polished support. Drink 2021–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Brizio 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Tobacco, baked plum and cooking-spice aromas waft out of the glass, along with of mint oil. The palate is full bodied and tightly knit, offering licorice, dried black cherry and espresso alongside assertive, close-grained tannins that grip the finish before closing on a menthol note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa I Cipressi 2015 Zebras (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Apricot, citrus and smoke aromas form the nose on this radiant, fragrant white. On the racy, delicious palate, vibrant acidity and flinty mineral notes lend tension and depth to ripe yellow peach, juicy grapefruit and ginger. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2019 Sylvaner (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Scents of woodland berry, eucalyptus oil, star anise and rose petal come together in the glass along with whiffs of new leather. The linear palate shows youthful tension that underscores red cherry, pomegranate, graphite and black tea. Taut refined tannins and fresh acidity provide support. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Palazzone 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of underbrush, new leather, camphor and tobacco leaf lead the way along with a whiff of ripe plum. The rounded full-bodied palate evokes dried cherry, crushed mint, vanilla and a hint of coffee bean alongside taut fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio Antico 2015 Altero (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Pipe-tobacco, baked plum and blue-flower aromas mingle with camphor and coconut while the austere palate features dried cherry, pomegranate, licorice and a hint of espresso. Close-grained tannins give it a drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frescobaldi 2015 Tenuta Perano Rialzi Gran Selezione (Chianti Classico)

Description: Spring-blossom, apricot and exotic-fruit aromas are front and center. On the delicious palate, vibrant acidity accompanies white peach, cantaloupe and citrus before an energizing mineral finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2019 Grüner Veltliner (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Rose, woodland berry and camphor aromas mingle together on this taut medium-bodied red. On the linear elegant palate, polished tannins lithely support red cherry, pomegranate and star anise. Best 2021–2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Donatella Cinelli Colombini 2015 Prime Donne (Brunello di Montalcino)
