Description: Crisp and elegantly structured, this fragrant white has enticing scents of elderflower, white stone fruit and Alpine herb. On the savory palate, notes of ginger and a hint of cedar back up juicy yellow pear, white peach and lemon drop before finishing on a fennel note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castel Firmian 2018 Riserva Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: Spring blossom and ripe white stone fruit mingle with a whiff of cantaloupe on this delicious white. The aromas carry over to the round, full-bodied palate along with nutmeg and white almond. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kofererhof 2018 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Heady tones of violet and rose ride over a dense wild-berry core in this wine sourced from the contrada Rotondo near the town of Barile. The medium-bodied palate is driven by lots of tangy crushed stone energy, with tightly coiled red fruit hiding behind it all. There's a real sense of hidden power to this wine, which needs time to unwind. Drink 2022–2030. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Paternoster 2015 Rotondo (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Violet, wild berry, face powder and a whiff of eucalyptus are front and center on this fragrant red. It's elegant and linear, offering ripe Marasca cherry, licorice and dried mint framed in lithe polished tannins. It's already accessible but will also offer several more years of sipping pleasure. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Donatella Cinelli Colombini 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of dark-skinned fruit, tobacco, forest floor and camphor waft out of the glass. The tightly wound, linear palate evokes mature Morello cherry, licorice and an earthy hint of game while dried thyme and a rusty iron note provide backup. Drink 2022–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argiano 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of wild berry, violet, new leather and star anise fill the glass. Firm and boasting finesse, the linear palate features ripe Morello cherry, mature cranberry, licorice and dried Mediterranean spice set against taut polished tannins. It closes on a roasted coffee bean note. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Gerla 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Forest floor, mature red berry, dried tobacco leaf and balsamic whiffs of camphor come together on this. It's firm and concentrated, delivering dried black cherry, licorice and coffee bean framed in velvety tannins. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio Antico 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of apricot and white rose shape the enticing nose. On the tangy, delicious palate, ginger and orange zest accompany ripe yellow peach and white grapefruit. It has wonderful energy thanks to mineral tension and crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2019 Riesling (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Menthol, truffle and exotic-spice aromas form the nose on this medium-bodied red. Elegant and linear, the taut palate offers sour cherry, strawberry and a hint of star anise accompanied by fine-grained tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alessandro Rossi 2015 Camponovo (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Tobacco, leather and dark-spice aromas take center stage along with a pretty whiff of violet. The full-bodied, rounded palate shows dried cherry, licorice and ground clove while fine-grained tannins lend polished support. Drink 2021–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castiglion del Bosco 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Racy and mineral-driven, this features aromas of smoky flint, graphite, unsweetened lemon drop and dried Alpine herb. The aromas follow through to the vibrant, focused palate along with a hint of toasted nut. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pfitscher 2017 Mathias Riserva Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Fermented and aged in large casks, this offers delicate scents of mature white stone fruit, cedar and toasted nut. On the medium-bodied, elegant palate, fresh acidity lifts ripe pear and apple while a hint of baking spice graces the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: St. Pauls 2017 Passion Riserva Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Elegantly understated but enticing, this has aromas of white stone fruit, crushed herb and a whiff of Alpine wildflower. The savory palate boasts great finesse, delivering ripe pear, apple and creamy white peach set against crisp acidity. A mineral note suggesting tangy oyster shell marks the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: St. Pauls 2019 Plotzner Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Made with 60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Merlot, this smooth red opens with aromas of cassis, vanilla, violet and a whiff of bell pepper. Racy and delicious, the linear palate doles out juicy red currant, black cherry and vanilla set against lithe tannins. Bright acidity keeps it balanced and fresh. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta San Guido 2018 Guidalberto Red (Toscana)

Description: This opens with aromas of ripe black-skinned berry, new leather and underbrush. The structured savory palate delivers dried black cherry, star anise and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink through 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Grappolo 2015 Sassocheto (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Mature dark-skinned-fruit, black-spice, new leather and camphor aromas are front and center. Reflecting the nose, the firm medium-bodied palate doles out juicy black raspberry, licorice and a hint of tobacco alongside taut close-grained tannins. It closes on a note of dried mint. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terzuoli 2015 Bruno (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Subtle aromas suggesting camphor, French oak, purple flower and star anise form the nose. Firmly structured and linear, the elegant, savory palate evokes Marasca cherry, licorice and orange zest alongside fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frescobaldi 2016 Tenuta Perano (Chianti Classico)

Description: Underbrush, wild-berry and violet aromas form the nose. Succulent and delicious, the vibrant palate features juicy wild cherry, crushed raspberry and white pepper before a salty savory close. Taut refined tannins provide lithe support. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Molino di Sant'Antimo 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of mature woodland berry, underbrush, leather and camphor mingle together with a whiff of blue flower. The bright, polished palate offers juicy Marasca cherry, cranberry, cocoa and clove alongside taut fine-grained tannins that leave a firm, somewhat chalky finish. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Caparzo 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Named after the founder of the winery, this is an effusive, rich and structured wine. An enveloping nose of blueberry tart, sour cream, iodine and crushed rock carries to the broad palate, with roasted hazelnut chiming in. The fruit feels rounded and lush but held in check by pulsing acidity and fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2030. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Paternoster 2015 Don Anselmo (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of green apple, pear and citrus follow over to the savory palate along with green melon, ginger and tangerine zest. It's bright and delicious, with tangy acidity before a fresh, clean close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Coconut, oak-driven-spice and woodland-berry aromas form the nose. Reflecting the aromas, the full-bodied palate features licorice, dried cherry and a hint of coffee bean set against fine-grained tannins. Drink 2021–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa I Cipressi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This red offers aromas of baked plum, exotic spice, blue flower and new leather. The tight palate reflects the nose, featuring additional tones of dried black cherry, licorice and tobacco alongside firm, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Poggio Salvi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: An intense aroma of brandied cherries melds with wood spice, mushroom and incense on the nose. The full-bodied palate is all about power, showing ample grip to the flavors of thick-skinned dark cherry and black plum, with tobacco and spice lingering on the sides. Despite all that intensity, there's still lots of bright, vibrant acidity and structured yet fine-grained tannins to balance it all. Drink though 2025. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Illuminati 2013 Pieluni Riserva (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane)
Country: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Hawthorn, white stone-fruit and bread-dough aromas mingle with whiffs of Alpine herb and hazelnut on this elegant white. The polished palate delivers creamy white peach, ripe yellow pear, almond and citrus zest before finishing on a honeyed note. Fresh acidity brightens the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mezzacorona 2016 Musivum Vicina Pinot Grigio (Trentino Superiore)

Description: Elderberry, honeysuckle and grapefruit aromas mingle with whiffs of smoky flint and Alpine herb on this fragrant white. The grapefruit and smoky aromas follow over to the crisp, savory palate along with pineapple and ginger notes. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pfitscher 2018 Saxum Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: The nose is initially rather shy but slowly opens to reveal new leather, forest floor, dark-skinned berry and pipe tobacco. Reflecting the aromas, the full-bodied youthfully austere palate delivers ripe Marasca cherry, licorice and menthol set against tightly-knit, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Molino di Sant'Antimo 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This full-bodied red has aromas of French oak, camphor and a whiff of roasted coffee bean. Tightly knit and youthfully austere, the palate offers sour cherry, orange zest, licorice and a note of dried sage alongside firm, close-grained tannins that grip the close. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2015 Poggio alle Mura (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Underbrush, leather, tobacco and camphor aromas mingle together in the glass. The smooth medium-bodied palate features juicy black cherry, orange zest and licorice framed in taut fine-grained tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello Tricerchi 2015 AD 1441 (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of forest floor, new leather, dried botanical herb and dark spice lead the nose. Reflecting the aromas, the palate evokes dried black cherry, licorice and a hint of tobacco framed in taut polished tannins. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: SassodiSole 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Inviting aromas of ripe apple and a yeasty whiff of bread dough segue over to the delicious palate along with creamy yellow pear and a hint of lemon drop. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors while a hazelnut note lingers on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nals Margreid 2018 Berg Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of apples and pears carry over to the delicious palate along with creamy white peach and green apple. Bright acidity and a hint of flinty mineral lift the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Girlan 2019 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Delicately scented, this offers aromas of spring blossom and white stone fruit. Round and medium bodied, the palate presents ripe Bartlett pear, white peach and a hint of baking spice alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Girlan 2018 Platt & Riegl Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: A dark, dense nose of forest berries melds with tones of violet and delicate warm spices on the nose of this enveloping red. It is plush at first on the palate, but then the structured tannins take over. All the while, tart berry flavors fill it out, with a tangy mineral tone and bright acidity pushing it along. It has the structure and intensity to hold well in the cellar, but is still quite enjoyable now. Drink now through 2030. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: San Martino 2017 Siir (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with 90% Sauvignon and 10% Trebbiano vinified in 30% amphora, 10% oak and the rest in steel, this boasts classic varietal aromas of tropical fruit, crushed tomato vine and gooseberry. It's savory, linear and tangy, delivering juicy pineapple, grapefruit, cantaloupe, thyme and mouthwatering mineral alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fontodi 2018 Meriggio White (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of oak-driven spice, toasted notes and mature dark-skinned berry take center stage along with a whiff of fragrant purple flower. Reflecting the nose, the taut linear palate features raspberry compote, vanilla, coconut and a hint of star anise alongside polished tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Paradiso di Frassina 2015 Mozrat Wine (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Yellow stone-fruit, nutmeg, apple and citrus aromas are front and center. The aromas follow over to the tangy, savory palate along with crisp acidity. It closes on a lemon-drop note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pacher Hof 2018 Kerner (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Baked plum and camphor aromas form the subtle nose while the rounded full-bodied palate offers prune, cherry extract, licorice and a hint of espresso. Fine-grained tannins lend support and leave a rather drying finish. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Siro Pacenti 2015 Pelagrilli (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Menthol, exotic-spice, pipe tobacco and French oak aromas mingle together. It's tightly wound and still austere, featuring sour cherry, pomegranate, dried herb and espresso set against vibrant acidity and assertive, close-grained tannins that grip the close. Drink 2023–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2013 Poggio all'Oro Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: A blend of mostly Pinot Bianco, Pinot Grigio and Chardonnay with smaller amounts of Kerner, Müller-Thurgau and Sauvignon, this white carries aromas of hawthorn, white stone fruit and graphite. Elegant and savory, the medium-bodied palate doles out white peach, yellow pear, citrus and tangy mineral set against fresh acidity. A hazelnut note lingers on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Kurtatsch 2017 Amos White (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of hay, dried tropical fruit and a whiff of crushed tomato leaf waft out of the glass. Made partly in large cask and partly in steel, it's savory and medium bodied, with a nice depth of flavors including ripe grapefruit, dried apricot and a hint of graphite before a lemon-drop finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2018 Stern Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of elderflower, gooseberry and grapefruit propel out of the glass on this aromatic white. The fruity aromas carry on to the savory palate along with pineapple and yellow pear, while crisp acidity and tangy mineral lift the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2019 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Acacia-flower, white stone-fruit and citrusy aromas waft out of the glass. On the full-bodied palate, hints of ginger accent yellow pear, white peach and lemon zest before a hint of white almond. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nals Margreid 2018 Punggl Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Delicately scented, this offers aromas of spring blossom and white stone fruit. Round and medium-bodied, the palate doles out ripe Bartlett pear, white peach and a hint of baking spice, alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bucci 2018 Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore
Country: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore, Central Italy, Italy
City: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore

Description: Racy and savory, this vibrant white boasts heady aromas of yellow stone fruit and citrus. Reflecting the nose, the crisp, linear palate delivers ripe apricot, juicy grapefruit and tangy saline. It's structured but weightless thanks to vibrant acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kofererhof 2018 Kerner (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Red berry, blue flower, forest floor and menthol aromas meld together on this full-bodied red. It's tightly knit and firmly structured, delivering raspberry compote, cranberry and clove set against assertive, seasoned tannins. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cortonesi 2015 La Mannella (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: A dense core of red-cherry coulis is lifted up by bright mentholated herbs and tobacco on the nose of this riserva. Medium in weight, there's a tangy cherry tone to the palate, with firm, finely knit tannins and pulsing acidity providing the frame. More herbs and a slight granite twang linger on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Illuminati 2017 Ilico Riserva (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Exotic-fruit, pear and white-spring-flower aromas mingle together with a delicate whiff of smoke. The savory, vibrant palate features white stone fruit, lemon drop and a hint of honeyed almond alongside tangy acidity. A saline note adds depth. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mastroberardino 2019 Radici (Fiano di Avellino)
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Earthy aromas of mature berry, new leather, violet and underbrush mingle together in the glass. Reflecting the nose, the full-bodied palate has a rustic charm, offering dried cherry, game, truffle and licorice, alongside drying tannins. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Gode 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of coconut, botanical herb, wild berry and oak-driven spice are front and center. The oak sensations carry over to the firm, rather austere palate along with sour cherry, raw coffee bean and licorice set against close-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi Antinori 2016 Badia a Passignano Gran Selezione (Chianti Classico)

Description: Camphor, exotic-spice and baked plum aromas lead the way along with whiffs of scorched earth and toasted nut. On the tight jammy palate, vanilla, roasted coffee-bean and licorice notes accent black-cherry jam. Close-grained tannins provide firm support. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palazzo 2015 Cosimo (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This joint venture between Fattoria La Valentina in Abruzzo and Inama Azienda Agricola in Veneto offers aromas of baked cherry, mentholated herbs and a hint of soy on the nose. Rounded and silken in feel, the rich red fruit on the palate is bolstered by lifted acidity and fine, integrated tannins. These flavors are propelled along a pulsing river of acidity, with hints of herbs and earth chiming in. It's approachable now, but should hold well through 2025. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Binomio 2015 Riserva (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Elderflower, grapefruit, crushed tomato-vine and gooseberry aromas fill the glass on this aromatic white. The aromas follow on to the crisp savory palate, together with hints of ginger and yellow peach. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Erste Neue 2019 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: This structured white opens with delicate scents of beeswax, white stone fruit and chamomile flower. On the round, medium-bodied palate, notes of honeyed almond accent yellow pear and creamy white peach. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Kurtatsch 2018 Penoner Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Enticing aromas of fragrant spring wild flower and white stone fruit waft out of the glass. Tangy and delicious, the crisp palate offers green apple, apricot and citrus alongside bright acidity. A saline note lingers on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Selva 2018 Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Aromas of crushed tomato vine, apricot and a whiff of toasted almond take shape in the glass. On the savory, medium-bodied palate, crisp acidity lifts ripe yellow peach, grapefruit, pineapple and graphite. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tiefenbrunner 2018 Turmhof Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of honeysuckle, green apple and honeydew melon follow through to the juicy palate, along with a note of white peach. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tiefenbrunner 2019 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of ripe wild berry, purple flower, leather and baking spice shape the inviting nose. It's bigger and more concentrated than what you would normally expect for a Rosso di Montalcino. It's smooth and juicy, with black cherry, plum and cocoa flavors. Taut, fine-grained tannins give it velvety support. Enjoy through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cortonesi 2018 La Mannella (Rosso di Montalcino)

Description: Menthol, blue-flower and tilled soil aromas emerge from the glass along with a whiff of dried tobacco leaf. The full-bodied palate offers dried cherry, vanilla and clove before finishing on a note of powdered sage. Close-grained tannins grip the close. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria dei Barbi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Heady aromas of white rose and yellow stone fruit propel out of the glass on this fragrant white. Vibrant and racy, the savory palate delivers apricot, grapefruit and saline alongside crisp acidity. A hint of white almond graces the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kofererhof 2018 Riesling (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: This single-vineyard wine is sourced from a site that sits around 1,100 feet in elevation. A bright intensity of wild-cherry and red-plum aromas melds with hints of farmyard, Alpine herb and crushed stone on the nose. Firm tannins create a structured frame for tangy red fruit to hang on the palate, lifted by a savory mineral tone and bright acidity. It's a beautiful expression of Montepulciano from a mountain site. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Valle Reale 2011 Vigneto di Popoli (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Vibrant and savory, this linear white has delicate aromas of white stone fruit, citrus and floral notes. On the refreshing, delicious palate, saline and white-almond notes underscore white peach and Meyer lemon alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mustilli 2019 Greco (Sannio)

Description: Enticing aromas suggesting ripe yellow stone fruit, dried Alpine herb, eucalyptus and white rose waft out of the glass. On the linear palate, a smoky mineral note accompanies ripe apricot and grapefruit while vibrant acidity gives it great tension. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2019 Kerner (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Aged in large casks, this structured white delivers sensations of crushed tomato vine, exotic fruit, white peach and grilled herb. A grapefruit note lingers on the tangy close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nals Margreid 2018 Mantele Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Made entirely from Montepulciano, this red starts off with a bright nose of tobacco, crushed herbs and black pepper. The palate is silky smooth and succulent in a firm red-cherry flavor, with plenty of acidity and gripping tannins holding it all in check. Crushed stone and more herbs add interest to the lingering finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torre Zambra 2016 Villamagna

Description: Aromas of wild red berry, violet and rose waft out of the glass on this fragrant, fantastic sparkler. The vibrant, elegant palate doles out juicy strawberry, red cherry, orange zest and star anise before a dry finish. A lightly foaming mousse and bright acidity provide the food friendly structure. One bottle won't be enough. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Paltrinieri 2018 Sant'Agata (Lambrusco di Sorbara)
Country: Lambrusco di Sorbara, Central Italy, Italy

Description: There's a bright intensity of pink peppercorn, violet, rosemary and spicy bramble on the nose of this riserva. The palate is linear and focused, showing a strong current of tart red fruit speckled with pepper and florals, while tangy minerality powers throughout. Firm tannins give a nice framing to it all—it's well structured yet elegant in feel. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Regio Cantina 2014 Campo Melograno Riserva Aglianico

Description: A dense nose of ripe forest berries, iodine and anise and peppery spice kick off this well-balanced Aglianico. It is polished yet firm on the palate, dominated by thick-skinned dark-berry notes and pushed along by a powerful line of acidity. The tannins are up front at the moment, but fruit is riding not too far behind. Drink from 2022–2030. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: San Martino 2017 Arberesko (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Violet, wild-berry and exotic-spice aromas emerge from the glass. On the taut linear palate, hints of star anise and coffee bean accompany dried cherry and cranberry while fine-grained tannins provide support. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Amantis 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Subtle aromas evoking exotic spice, scorched forest floor, baked plum and camphor slowly emerge on this big chewy red, along with a whiff of fragrant purple flower. Thickly concentrated and enveloping, the fleshy palate doles out dried black cherry, steeped prune, licorice and tobacco alongside densely knit, velvety tannins. The heat of alcohol lingers on the finish. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Canalicchio di Sopra 2015 La Casaccia (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This opens with aromas of black-skinned berry, underbrush and leather. The savory palate offers blackberry jam, licorice and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Collemattoni 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Dark-skinned berry, leather and cooking-spice aromas lift out of the glass. The balanced savory palate offers dried black cherry, tobacco and black pepper alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio Landi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of tropical fruit, graphite, white rose and Alpine herb surge out of the glass on this fragrant white. A blend of Riesling, Chardonnay, Sauvignon, Kerner and late-harvested Traminer, the medium-bodied savory palate evokes ripe apricot, grapefruit, pineapple and tangy saline alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franz Haas 2018 Manna White (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Heady tones of tobacco, menthol and earth carry over a core of dense brandied cherry on the nose of this blend of Montepulciano and Cabernet Sauvignon. The full-bodied palate is filled out by rich tones of blackberry and dark cherry that are lifted by earthy accents. It shows a firm grip of tannins and pulsing acidity to keep all the heft in check. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Illuminati 2013 Lumen Riserva Red (Controguerra)

Description: Aromas of honeysuckle and white stone fruit shape the nose. On the savory palate, fresh acidity accompanies ripe apple, creamy pear and honeydew melon. It closes on a white-almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Peter Zemmer 2019 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Inviting aromas of mature white stone fruit, baking spice and a whiff of baked bread waft out of the glass. Tangy and elegant, the savory, medium-bodied palate doles out ripe Bartlett pear, creamy yellow apple and a ginger note alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colterenzio 2019 Cora Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of mature exotic fruit, crushed tomato leaf and honeysuckle lift out of the glass. The full-bodied, savory palate delivers passion fruit, honeydew melon and grapefruit alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colterenzio 2019 Prail Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Youthfully vibrant, this racy Rosso opens with enticing aromas of wild berry, fragrant blue flower and earthy whiffs of leather and tilled soil. On the bright tangy palate, notes of star anise and thyme accent crushed strawberry alongside lively acidity and lithe tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salvioni 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Alpine herb and white stone-fruit aromas segue over to the elegant, savory palate along with hints of hazelnut and ripe pear. It's medium bodied and fresh, with tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tiefenbrunner 2018 Anna Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: This organically grown Syrah opens with aromas of dark-skinned berry, ground pepper and aromatic herb. The savory, ripe palate offers blackberry jam, clove and cocoa alongside smooth tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fontodi 2016 Case Via Syrah (Colli della Toscana Centrale)
Country: Colli della Toscana Centrale, Tuscany, Italy

Description: A warm, generous nose of wild cherry, baking spices and violet carry to the plump palate. A firm frame of tannins provides ample grip to the ripe berry flavors, with a tangy crushed stone note reverberating underneath. There's great balance here between plushness and restraint. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: D'Angelo 2016 Canneto Aglianico (Basilicata)

Description: This structured, delicious white shows Pinot Grigio's serious side, delivering juicy flavors of ripe yellow pear, apple, creamy peach and fennel. Tangy acidity and saline-like mineral notes and lemon thyme linger on the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nals Margreid 2018 Hill Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of stewed prune, licorice and dried herb follow through to the densely concentrated full-bodied palate, along with dried cherry, leather and the warmth of evident alcohol. Enveloping close-grained tannins provide the framework. Drink sooner rather than later before the remaining fruit dissipates. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Le Ripi 2015 Cielo d'Ulisse (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of fragrant purple flower, crushed mint and woodland berry mingle with a whiff of dark spice. Mirroring the nose, the linear palate shows sour cherry, orange zest, star anise and a smoky note alongside dusty tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggiarellino 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Ripe berry, dark spice, coconut and toasted notes form the nose. The full-bodied is palate is shy on fruit richness, evoking dried cherry, star anise and roasted coffee bean alongside dense, close-grained tannins that leave a drying close. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenute Silvio Nardi 2015 Vigneto Manachiara (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Green-melon and yellow stone-fruit aromas lead the way. On the crisp, dry palate, tangy acidity accompanies creamy white peach, apricot and grapefruit. It's savory, with a clean finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kupelwieser 2019 Riesling (Alto Adige)

Description: Racy and delicious, this is a textbook young Riesling from Alto Adige, boasting heady varietal aromas of yellow stone fruit, citrus and Alpine herb. Mirroring the nose, the vibrant palate features apricot, peach and Meyer lemon before finishing on thyme and saline notes. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Erste Neue 2019 Riesling (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of hay, chamomile and golden apple shape the delicate nose along with hints of nut. It's linear and elegantly structured, offering yellow pear, Meyer lemon and hazelnut set against racy acidity. It closes on a saline-like mineral note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2018 Quintessenz Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Crushed tomato vine, grapefruit and hay aromas form the inviting nose. The savory, full-bodied palate doles out juicy citrus, pear and pineapple alongside tangy acidity and a hint of fennel. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nals Margreid 2018 Stein Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: This has classic varietal aromas of crushed tomato vine, citrus, exotic fruit and elderflower. On the crisp, savory palate, tangy acidity underscores juicy grapefruit, peach and pineapple before a mouthwatering saline finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tramin 2019 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Classic varietal aromas of yellow stone fruit and citrus pave the way on this bright white. The savory, vibrant palate has finesse and tension, doling out ripe apricot, yellow peach and a hint of pineapple alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Peter Zemmer 2019 Riesling (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of green apple carry over to the crisp, tangy palate, along with hints of pear and honeydew melon. Bright acidity lifts the fruit flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: St. Pauls 2019 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of underbrush, tobacco, mature dark-skinned fruit and a whiff of French oak lift out of the glass. Firmly structured, the concentrated palate shows dried cherry, cocoa and licorice alongside fine-grained tannins and the warmth of alcohol. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alessandro Rossi 2015 Aisna (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Delicate scents of elderberry and tropical fruit carry over to the tangy palate, along with grapefruit and pineapple. It's vibrant, with crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: St. Pauls 2019 Gfill Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Scorched earth, leather and camphor aromas mingle with a whiff of resin. On the austere tightly knit palate, grainy tannins accompany sour cherry, orange zest and tobacco. This will benefit with a few more years of cellar time. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cerbaia 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of exotic spice, blue flower and menthol waft out of the glass. Ripe and chewy, the full-bodied palate shows dried cherry, orange zest and dried mint set against tightly wound close-grained tannins that leave a firm finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palazzo 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Underbrush, truffle, wild-berry and scorched earth aromas come to the forefront, along with a note of roasted nut. The brawny palate evokes baked cherry, toasted hazelnut and licorice alongside the warmth of evident alcohol. Taut, close-grained tannins give it a firm finish. Drink sooner rather than later to capture the remaining fruit and freshness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Canalicchio di Sopra 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This opens with aromas evoking black-skinned fruit, cooking spice and clove. The forward palate offers black cherry jam, tobacco and star anise alongside polished tannins. Drink 2021–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio Landi 2013 Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This opens with aromas of dark-skinned berry, cooking spice and tobacco. The concentrated palate offers black plum, clove and star anise alongside chewy tannins. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ventolaio 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: There's richness on the nose in tones of liquor-soaked dark cherries and wild berries that are covered in a sheen of sandalwood, coconut and singed rosemary. Thick-skinned dark-berry flavors are propped up by pulsing acidity on the medium-bodied palate, with a firm grip of tannins lending support. It's flashy and forward but with a likeable personality. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: San Martino 2013 Kamai (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Subtle aromas evoking honeydew melon, white stone fruit and Alpine wild flower shape the delicate nose. Round and medium bodied, the palate offers ripe yellow pear, white almond and tangy mineral before closing on a fennel note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Elena Walch 2018 Vigna Castel Ringberg Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Red-berry, crushed mint, new leather and forest-floor aromas slowly take shape on this full-bodied red. The assertive palate offers steeped prune, ground clove, powdered sage and green tea set against grainy tannins that leave an astringent finish. Drink 2023–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Polino 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Savory tones of dried tobacco and mentholated herbs ride over a ripe bramble-berry core on the nose. The light-bodied palate follows suit, adding in a tangy crushed stone. There's real grip to the tannins but the succulent, crunchy fruit offers a fine counterbalance. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Illuminati 2018 Riparosso (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Fragrant and delicious, this opens with heady aromas of yellow stone fruit and citrus. Reflecting the nose, the full-bodied palate delivers ripe apricot, yellow peach and grapefruit alongside tangy mineral notes. Bright acidity keeps it lively and fresh. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2018 Carned Kerner (Alto Adige)

Description: Fermented and aged partly in barrique, this has aromas of cedar, French oak and yellow apple. The aromas carry over to the medium-bodied palate along with a hint of toasted hazelnut and a saline note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Elena Walch 2018 Kristallberg Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of dark-skinned berry, scorched earth and Mediterranean scrub emerge from the glass. The full-bodied savory palate offers ripe black cherry, licorice and black pepper alongside firm tannins. Drink through 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fornacina 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Savory and medium-bodied, this has delicate scents of spring blossom, white stone fruit and a whiff Alpine herb. The elegant, creamy palate doles out yellow pear, white peach and a hint of white almond that lingers on the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Elena Walch 2019 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: A coiled intensity of rose petal, pink peppercorn and rosemary carry the nose and echo on the medium-bodied palate, with a properly deep core of ripe forest berries giving way. Firm yet polished tannins and bright acidity create a solid structure for the whole, making this entirely enjoyable in the near term but able to linger in the cellar. Drink now–2025. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: D'Angelo 2016 Aglianico del Vulture
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Botanical herb, underbrush, new leather and menthol aromas lead the nose. Full bodied and concentrated, the meaty palate features black-cherry extract, tobacco and licorice set against chewy tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fanti 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Wild-berry, forest-floor and truffle aromas mingle with menthol notes. It's full bodied, with juicy Marasca cherry, star anise and a hint of orange zest framed in taut fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: SassodiSole 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: A perfumed nose of crushed violets, pink peppercorn and red berries carries to the linear, medium-bodied palate. Electric minerality races along as tart red fruit seamlessly melds with savory, peppery spices. This shows a sturdy frame of tannins for support, but is still enjoyable in the near term. Drink now–2025. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Regio Cantina 2016 Donpà (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Forest-floor, leather, camphor and dried rose aromas mingle with a whiffs of vanilla and French oak. The brawny palate offers dried cherry, licorice and the heat of evident alcohol while firm, close-grained tannins leave a drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Uccelliera 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of ripe apple and Bartlett pear cross over to the round medium-bodied palate, along with a hint of lemon drop and fennel. It's savory and fresh, with a tangy mineral-driven finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pfitscher 2018 Langefeld Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Crushed tomato leaf, cedar and floral aromas shape the nose along with a whiff of hazelnut. Fermented and aged in a combination of steel, barriques and casks, the medium-bodied palate features ripe peach, mature apple, grapefruit and dried sage alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colterenzio 2018 Lafoa Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Sourced from the winery's highest vineyard, which sits at 1,600 feet above sea level, this red offers a seductive nose of wild strawberry, dark cherry, crushed Alpine herbs and green tobacco on the nose. It's smooth and seamless on the palate, lifted by a bright vein of acidity and a clean line of crushed stone. There's crunchy red fruit at the core, with a savory mineral note extending from start to finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Valle Reale 2017 Vigneto Sant'Eusanio (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of spring wild flower, apricot, wet stone and beeswax mingle together. The vibrant, medium-bodied palate features white peach, pear and a honeyed note before a bitter-almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mastroberardino 2018 NovaSerra (Greco di Tufo)
Country: Greco di Tufo, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Profuse aromas of chamomile and lemon carry the nose of this balanced white, with ripe melon filling out the rounded palate. The ultrabright acidity typical of the variety is integrated well, highlighting all the fruit and floral tones. The finish resolves well, with a slight white-tea-like grip. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Umani Ronchi 2018 Vellodoro Pecorino (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of graphite, toasted nut and hay lead the nose along with a whiff of dried pineapple. The aromas carry over to the palate, along with grapefruit, a hint of coffee bean and bright acidity before a saline close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tiefenbrunner 2016 Rachtl Riserva Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: A perfumed nose of crushed violets, pink peppercorn and red berries carries to the linear, medium-bodied palate. Electric minerality races along as tart red fruit seamlessly melds with savory, peppery spices. This shows a sturdy frame of tannins for support, but is still enjoyable in the near term. Drink now–2025. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Regio Cantina 2016 Donpà (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Forest-floor, leather, camphor and dried rose aromas mingle with a whiffs of vanilla and French oak. The brawny palate offers dried cherry, licorice and the heat of evident alcohol while firm, close-grained tannins leave a drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Uccelliera 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Honeysuckle and tropical-fruit aromas lead the nose. Reflecting aromas, the bright savory palate doles out honeydew melon and creamy white peach alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2019 Müller-Thurgau (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Aged for seven months in large oak casks, this full-bodied white has aromas suggesting white stone fruit, coconut and a whiff of coffee bean. The aromas follow through to the rounded palate, along with fruity sensations of apricot and yellow apple. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tiefenbrunner 2018 Turmhof Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Balsamic aromas of menthol mingle with new leather, underbrush and steeped prune. The big brawny palate offers dried cherry, orange zest, licorice and tobacco alongside assertive, close-grained tannins that grip the close. You'll also notice the heat of evident alcohol. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fanti 2015 Vallocchio (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of star anise, dark-skinned berry, wild herb and toasted oak form the nose. A blend of 70% Cabernet and 30% Sangiovese, the wine's bright, linear palate offers red currant, prune and a hint of licorice before a coffee-bean finish. Racy acidity and taut close-grained tannins provide the framework and tension. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta San Guido 2018 Le Difese Red (Toscana)

Description: Bright aromas of pink peppercorn, violet, rose and red currant show pleasing depth and integration on the nose. The palate is light in feel but well structured by pulsing acidity and a firm frame of tannins. Tart red fruit remains dominant, with light pepper and game notes chiming in on the midpalate, and rose and violet lingering on the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Rivera 2014 Cappellaccio Riserva Aglianico (Castel del Monte)
Country: Castel del Monte, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: There's enviable concentration on the nose of this wine, delivering plumes of dark cherry, plum, salt and tobacco. There's power and verve to the thick-skinned berry fruit on the medium-bodied palate, built up by a sturdy frame of tannins and pushed along by a refreshing vein of acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Nicodemi 2017 Notàri (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane)
Country: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Alluring scents of spring wild flower, white stone fruit and crushed stone waft out of the glass. Elegant and polished, the savory palate delivers ripe pear, apple, white almond and saline mineral notes alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alois Lageder 2019 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Crisp, clean and linear, this snappy, savory white features white-spring-flower, ripe pear and lemon-zest sensations. Bright acidity and tangy saline notes give it a racy edge and a pristine finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alois Lageder 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Fermented partly in barriques, this opens with aromas of toasted hazelnut, crushed tomato leaf and coffee bean. The aromas carry over to the tangy palate along with grapefruit, yellow apple and saline notes. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Elena Walch 2018 Vigna Castel Ringberg Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Crisp and refreshing, this bright wine opens with aromas of white stone fruit, spring blossom and beeswax. On the tangy, linear palate, vibrant acidity lifts ripe yellow apple, Bartlett pear and a hint of tangy saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Infiné 1939 2018 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: Showing the heat of the vintage, this has subdued aromas suggesting mature black-skinned berry marinated in spirits along with whiffs of dried herb, scorched earth, coconut and balsamic whiffs of camphor. The full-bodied palate is rather shy on fruit richness, featuring dried black cherry, French oak, vanilla and licorice alongside the warmth of evident alcohol. Close-grained tannins leave a firm, mouthdrying finish. Give the tannins a few years to unwind then drink sooner rather than later to capture the remaining fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pieve Santa Restituta 2015 Rennina (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of apple, pear and white spring flower shape the nose. The aromas carry over to the creamy palate along with honeydew melon and a citrusy note. Tangy acidity brightens the fruity flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tiefenbrunner 2019 Merus Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of crushed herbs and spiced cherry show a pleasing depth on the nose. Medium in weight, the palate brings juicy red cherry, tobacco and earth, with slightly sandy tannins rising up on the finish. Sourced from a single vineyard in the Colline Teramane DOCG, it shows very good vibrancy and concentration. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Illuminati 2015 Zanna Riserva (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane)
Country: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Bright red cherry melds with crushed granite and herbs on the nose of this red. The medium-bodied palate is juicy in a vibrant red-cherry flavor, with a line of crunchy tannins and vibrant acidity propping it up. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: La Valentina 2016 Spelt Riserva (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Delicate scents of white spring flower, pear and the barest whiff of bread crust form the alluring nose on this elegant white. On the dry, refreshing palate, crisp acidity accompanies yellow apple and lemon before a hazelnut finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Erste Neue 2018 Puntay Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: This has delicate but inviting aromas of spring blossom, white stone fruit and a yeasty whiff of bread dough. On the savory, medium-bodied palate, tangy acidity accompanies ripe apple, pear and a hint of white almond before a saline finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Erste Neue 2019 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of graphite, grapefruit and hazelnut carry over to the linear, structured palate along with dried pineapple and saline. Vibrant acidity gives it a racy, almost weightless feel. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2018 Quintessenz Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Scents of wild red berry and botanical herb mingle with earthy aromas evoking truffle, new leather and freshly tilled soil on this fragrant red. Reflecting the nose, the racy, medium-bodied palate delivers juicy pomegranate, sour cherry, ground clove and a hint of game alongside vibrant acidity and taut tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: L'Aietta 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Made with organically farmed grapes, this bright young red has classic aromas of woodland berry, blue flower and a hint of baking spice. Juicy and smooth, the lithe palate shows succulent wild cherry and star anise set in polished tannins. Enjoy through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Magia 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Black-skinned berry, tobacco and underbrush aromas lead the nose. The bright palate offers fleshy black cherry, licorice and black pepper alongside chewy tannins. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Collelceto 2015 Elia Palazzesi (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of eucalyptus, dried mint, coconut, scorched underbrush and dried tobacco leaf take shape in the glass, along with whiffs of stewed prune. The big assertive palate evokes dried cherry, candied orange rind, star anise and the heat of evident alcohol set against tightly knit close-grained tannins that leave a rather astringent, mouthdrying finish. While the tannins need a few more years to unclench, you should drink sooner rather than later to enjoy the remaining fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pieve Santa Restituta 2015 Sugarille (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Rose, wild-herb and woodland berry aromas mingle with whiffs of new leather. On the lithe linear palate, taut polished tannins lightly support Marasca cherry, star anise and a hint of tobacco. It's already accessible so no need to wait. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello Tricerchi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Underbrush, dark spice, new leather and menthol aromas lead the nose. Chewy and full bodied, the dense palate evokes fleshy Marasca cherry, licorice, espresso and tobacco accompanied by velvety tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Sesta 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Green apple, elderflower and citrus aromas form the nose. The fruity sensations carry over to the medium-bodied palate along with creamy yellow pear and orange zest before a bright, tangy close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Erste Neue 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Showing the serious side of Pinot Grigio, this offers alluring aromas of elderflower, white stone fruit and crushed Alpine herb. The crisp savory palate delivers ripe pear and Meyer lemon alongside lively acidity and a hint of saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pacher Hof 2018 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Apple, pear and baking-spice aromas waft out of the glass along with a whiff of wild sage. The aromas carry over to the full-bodied palate along with a note of toasted hazelnut. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Nals Margreid 2018 Penon Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of wild berry and a whiff of ground clove form the subtle nose. On the fresh palate, notes of vanilla and star anise back up a juicy core of Morello cherry while polished tannins give smooth support. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi Antinori 2018 Pian delle Vigne (Rosso di Montalcino)

Description: Crushed tomato-vine, grapefruit and apricot aromas flow over to the savory palate along with pineapple and saline notes. Crisp acidity keeps it lively and refreshing. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Girlan 2018 Indra Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Fermented and aged partly in large casks and partly in barrique, this full-bodied white has aromas and flavors of oak, coconut and cedar. It closes on a bitter-almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2018 Praepositus Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
Country: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of hazelnut, beeswax and honey follow on the medium-bodied palate along with apple, citrus and a hint of mineral. Crisp acidity keeps if fresh and lively. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alois Lageder 2018 Porer Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: This opens with subtle aromas evoking underbrush, tobacco, baked plum and a whiff of French oak. It's full-bodied and rather austere, featuring dried cherry and roasted coffee bean set against tightly knit, close-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cortonesi 2015 Poggiarelli (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Underbrush, star anise and menthol aromas form the nose. The taut light-bodied palate offers pomegranate, orange zest and a hint of dark spice. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Petrol, honey and citrus aromas carry over to the round but light-bodied palate along with apricot and candied lemon drop. It closes on a vanilla note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Baron di Pauli 2017 Dynamis Riesling (Mitterberg)

Description: White spring-flower, yellow stone-fruit and almond aromas form the nose. On the bright palate, crisp acidity accompanies yellow peach and grapefruit before a saline finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Campo alle Comete 2018 Vermentino (Toscana)

Description: Red-berry, rose-petal and forest-floor aromas emerge from the glass. The palate is already almost accessible, offering juicy red cherry, star anise and a hint of tobacco alongside dusty tannins and fresh acidity. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Carillon 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Fragrant blue-flower, crushed herb, damp earth and wild-berry aromas mingle together on this 100% Sangiovese. Linear and rather light on its feet, the smooth palate suggests juicy Marasca cherry and star anise alongside polished tannins and bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colombaio di Cencio 2016 Massi del Colombaio Riserva (Chianti Classico)

Description: Aromas of French oak, underbrush and prune carry over to the chewy, medium-bodied palate along with vanilla and carob. Solid tannins provide support. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fonzone 2012 Taurasi

Description: Menthol, wild-herb and underbrush aromas lead the way along with a whiff of tobacco. The tight palate is on the lean side, showing dried Marasca cherry, ground clove and a hint of black tea alongside dusty tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frescobaldi 2015 Tenuta Perano Riserva (Chianti Classico)

Description: This blend of Montepulciano and Cabernet shows an integrated nose of fresh red cherry, tobacco, black pepper and mentholated herbs. Ripe and immensely juicy on the palate, it offers lots of tart red-cherry and blackberry flavors, with firm tannins and bright acidity to hold it all in check. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Pasetti 2017 Diecicoppe Red (Colline Pescaresi)

Description: Coconut, menthol and French oak aromas lead the nose. Reflecting the aromas, the subdued, rather languid palate offers prune, oak-driven spice and vanilla alongside taut dusty tannins that dry out the finish. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salicutti 2015 Sorgente (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This has rather subdued aromas evoking coconut, carob, baked plum and a whiff of resin. Lean and linear, the palate shows dried cherry and licorice notes set against dusty tannins that leave a rather firm, drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Carpineto 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This is a light, zippy Aglianico that shows an amazing sense of drive. Crushed pink peppercorn, rose and tart berries are framed by tangy acidity and a vibrant mineral undercurrent. The tannins are mellowed and smooth, lingering in the background but still lending enough support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: D'Angelo 2013 Caselle (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of ripe pear and green apple carry over to the palate, along with hints of saline and bitter almond. Tangy acidity gives it a juicy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Peter Zemmer 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: This offers delicate scents of white wild flower and honeydew melon while the tangy palate shows pear, lemon drop and a hint of cantaloupe. Fresh acidity gives it a crisp, clean finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Tramin 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Opaque ruby in color, with dense purple highlights, this red is rich in dark cherry and plum, mixed with tobacco and a hint of rubber. Time in stainless steel and concrete has left the fruit pure and clean, yielding a dark-fruit-coulis flavor on the palate that's brightened up by a brisk line of crushed stone. Well-mannered tannins and integrated acidity lend just enough support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cataldi Madonna 2017 Malandrino (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of wild berry, moist soil, eucalyptus and blue flower shape the nose. It's bright and linear, offering strawberry, sour cherry and the barest hint crushed herb alongside lithe, polished tannins. Vibrant acidity keeps it light on its feet. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gianni Brunelli 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This offers heady scents of spring blossom, white stone fruit and a whiff of crushed mint. Reflecting the nose, the crisp palate offers Anjou pear, honeydew melon and a hint of Alpine herb. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kupelwieser 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Tilled soil, cedar and coffee-bean aromas lead the nose. The full-bodied solid palate offers Morello cherry, espresso and star anise alongside firm tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: PianCornello 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Sunbaked earth, grilled herb and pressed blue-flower aromas form the nose. On the structured medium-bodied palate, fine-grained tannins accompany fleshy Morello cherry and star anise. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ridolfi 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This has subtle aromas suggesting mature black-skinned berry, roasted coffee bean and a whiff of menthol. The linear, rather austere palate offers dried Marasca cherry, espresso and licorice alongside close-grained, astringent tannins that leave a lean, drying finish. Give the tannins several years to unclench then drink sooner rather than later to capture the remaining fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenute Silvio Nardi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of hot gravel, iron and tangy red berries show on the energetic, savory nose. There's power to the palate in a bright red-berry flavor that's lifted by juicy acidity. Firm tannins lend support but don't detract from the forward, fruity palate. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2016 Monatic Dark (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Racy and linear, this has delicate aromas evoking crushed stone, citrus and Alpine herb. The elegant, understated palate reveals elderberry, grapefruit and saline alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbazia di Novacella 2019 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: The initially shy nose eventually reveals whiffs of violet, wild berry and leather. The taut medium-bodied palate suggests dried cherry, clove and botanical herb alongside dusty, rather drying tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colombaio di Cencio 2015 Gran Selezione (Chianti Classico)

Description: Green-apple and citrus aromas follow through to the bright palate along with notes of Alpine herb and green melon. It's fresh, with tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colterenzio 2018 Puiten Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: A blend of 70% Vermentino, Fiano, Verdicchio, Manzoni Bianco and Petit Manseng all grown in a single vineyard, this has subdued aromas suggesting yellow stone fruit, Mediterranean herb and yellow wild flower. The full-bodied palate offers apricot, honey and a hint of saline alongside fresh acidity. It closes on a bitter almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guado al Melo 2018 Criseo White (Bolgheri)

Description: Aromas of ripe apricot and Alpine herb follow through to the racy, light-bodied palate along with juicy Meyer lemon and a hint of pineapple. Crisp acidity and a saline note give it a tangy close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: St. Pauls 2019 Riesling (Alto Adige)

Description: The shy nose eventually reveals exotic spice, crushed mint and a whiff of blue flower. The austere palate suggests steeped prune and powdered sage alongside grainy tannins that grip the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenute Silvio Nardi 2015 Vigneto Poggio Doria (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Linear and firmly structured, this has aromas and flavors of dried black cherry, prune, ground clove and tobacco alongside earthy notes of game and truffle. Close-grained tannins clench the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vigne Chigi 2018 Casavecchia di Pontelatone Cretaccio Red (Terre del Volturno)
Country: Terre del Volturno, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Spring blossom and white stone-fruit aromas mingle together on this fresh, savory white. The light-bodied, rounded palate delivers white peach, juicy pear and a hint of Alpine fennel alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franz Haas 2018 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of ripe apple and yellow pear follow through to the savory palate along with hints of white almond and dried sage. Tangy acidity keeps it fresh. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Tramin 2019 Moriz Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Leafy underbrush, French oak and wet earth aromas lead the way along with whiffs of new leather and fruitcake. The palate is lean on fruit richness, offering vanilla, licorice and prune alongside close-grained tannins that leave a drying close. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castelgiocondo 2014 Ripe al Convento Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Round and structured, this medium-bodied white has flavors of ripe apricot, lemon drop and passion fruit. Tangy acidity and a hint of saline lift the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Decugnano dei Barbi 2017 Mare Antico (Orvieto Classico)

Description: Tropical-fruit, citrus and tomato-vine aromas lead the nose. The aromas carry over to the crisp, savory palate along with suggestions of honeydew melon and a tangy saline note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franz Haas 2018 Sauvignon (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of toasted oak, roasted coffee bean and scorched underbrush lead the nose along with a balsamic whiff of menthol. The oak aromas carry over to the palate along with prune, licorice and orange rind. Drying tannins provide support. Drink sooner rather than later to capture the remaining fruit and freshness. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Giodo 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Vinified partly in terracotta amphora, partly in steel and partly on the skins in steel vats, this opens with aromas of ripe yellow stone fruit, acacia and walnut. Mirroring the nose, the rather understated palate offers apricot, chestnut honey and a hint of mineral before closing on a bitter-almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mazzei 2018 Codice Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Aromas of melon, apple and dried flower stalks carry the nose. The palate is a bit oily in feel, yet properly lifted by citric acidity that builds. There's a white-tea-like grip to the close, along with lingering tones of peach and apple. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2018 Monatic Gold White (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of hazelnut and campfire ride over a wild-berry core in this wine. There's a pleasant plumpness to the palate, hemmed by a line of tart acidity and crunchy mineral tones. A structured frame of firm medium-grained tannins lends support to this otherwise accessible Aglianico. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Paternoster 2016 Synthesi (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Made with Viognier fermented and aged in barrique, this has subtle aromas evoking mature yellow stone fruit, vineyard dust a whiff of honeysuckle. The palate offers dried apricot and star anise while a saline note marks the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Pinciana 2017 Viognier (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Citrus, tomato-vine and field-flower aromas mingle with a delicate whiff of tropical fruit. Racy and linear, the palate offers grapefruit and yellow apple alongside hints of bitter almond and saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Baron di Pauli 2018 Kinesis Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Blue-flower, baked plum, exotic-spice and toasted aromas emerge from the glass. The dense, brawny palate offers steeped prune, licorice and orange peel alongside fine-grained tannins. The heat of evident alcohol dominates the close and throws it off balance. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Pavone 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of scorched underbrush, coconut and French oak lead the nose along with a whiff of menthol. The big monolithic palate has a muscular structure, but it's lean on fruit richness, evoking tobacco, prune and orange zest alongside assertive, mouthdrying tannins before closing on the heat of evident alcohol. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Pavone 2015 Fiore del Vento (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Rose, forest-floor, camphor and red-berry aromas form the nose on this fragrant red. Ethereally elegant, the linear palate suggests juicy red cherry, crushed mint and star anise alongside taut glossy tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it light on its feet. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Crocedimezzo 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This opens with aromas of forest floor, red-skinned berry and baking spice. The solid juicy palate offers raspberry jam, star anise and clove alongside velvety tannins. Drink 2021–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria La Lecciaia 2015 Vigna Manapetra (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Made entirely with organically farmed Vermentino, this opens with aromas of Spanish broom and orchard fruit. The savory palate offers Bartlett pear, white peach and ginger alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Prelius 2018 Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Underbrush, tobacco-leaf, leather and balsamic aromas lead the nose, along with whiffs of steeped prune. The prune aromas carry over to the lean, if muscular, palate along with licorice and the heat of evident alcohol. Taut tannins give it a firm finish but it's shy on fruit and freshness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Lorenzo 2015 Bramante (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This has a shy nose that eventually suggests coconut, French oak and baked plum. The brawny palate opens with blueberry extract, licorice and roasted coffee bean before the heat of evident alcohol takes over. Dense close-grained tannins give it a drying close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Luce 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Coconut, ripe dark-skinned fruit and toasted oak aromas take center stage. The mature palate offers prune, mocha and vanilla alongside taut tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Beatesca 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Dense aromas of tobacco leaf, goji berries, dried cranberry, pressed rose and pink peppercorn start this off. It is rounded and plush in feel on entry, but broadened out by baked red-fruit flavors that are lifted by tangy acidity. Earthy floral tones rise up on the midpalate, with a hint of tomato chiming in. The copious tannins build a tightly knit frame, but the fruit and acidity do well to push through. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bisceglia 2014 Gudarrà Aglianico

Description: This has delicate aromas suggesting spring blossom and white stone fruit. On the light-bodied palate, fresh acidity accompanies yellow pear and ripe apple. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Elena Walch 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Delicately scented, this has aromas of yellow apple and hazelnut. The aromas follow over to the racy, rather lean palate along with delicate notes suggesting acacia honey and saline. Crisp acidity gives it a clean, dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2018 Vial Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of white stone fruit and green melon lead the nose. The aromas carry over to the medium-bodied palate along with ripe pear and apple. Fresh acidity lifts the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kupelwieser 2019 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Underbrush, camphor and new leather aromas mingle with a whiff of purple flower and tobacco. Reflecting the heat of the scorching vintage, the big broad palate is dominated by licorice and alcohol, with hints of stewed prune and vanilla in the background. While some may love the power, it's shy on fruit richness and freshness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Fiorita 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Espresso, toasted oak and cooking spice form the nose. The ripe palate offers prune, roasted coffee bean and clove alongside assertive, drying tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Martoccia 2013 Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This has subdued aromas suggesting mature black-skinned fruit, vanilla and espresso. The dense palate offers blackberry jam, licorice and dried sage alongside close-grained tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Martoccia 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of almond and red apple carry the nose of this Pinot Grigio that spent up to 12 hours on its skins after crush. Citrus and apple peel flavors are honed by slight melon-rind and almond tones on the palate, with lifted acidity lending support to the creamy frame. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2018 Monatic Amber Pinot Grigio (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of underbrush, violet and cedar emerge from the glass. The rather austere palate offers dried cherry, powdered sage and a hint of cinnamon alongside firm tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere La Vigna 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Mocha, charred earth and leather lead the nose. The ripe palate offers prune, clove and roasted coffee bean alongside closed-grained tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terre Nere Campigli Vallone 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Subdued aromas of dill and incense waft out of the glass. The palate is full in feel, with oak tones at the fore and juicy brandied cherry at the core. The tannins show some grit and grip, yet there's plenty of vibrant acidity to balance it out. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torre Zambra 2015 Colle Maggio Riserva (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of pretty yellow blossoms, apple and melon show on the well-formed nose of this organic Trebbiano. Rounded in feel, the palate shows ripe fruit balanced by a lifted vein of lemon balm. It's a delicious, well-balanced white that will please many. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Umani Ronchi 2018 Montipagano Organic (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Lifted tones of violet and pink peppercorn meld with a dried goji berry core on the nose. The palate is tense in feel, driven by a rush of acidity but properly restrained by a framing of well-mannered tannins. Juicy, tart red fruit dominates, with lingering peppery spice and mineral notes on the finish. Drink now. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: D'Angelo 2017 Sacravite Aglianico (Basilicata)

Description: Aromas of French oak and blue flower lead the nose. The tight lean palate offers prune, orange zest and toasted notes alongside astringent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Aisna 2014 Alessandro Rossi Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Scents of oak, cedar and hazelnut shape the delicate nose along with a whiff of peach on this light-bodied white. The linear, ethereal palate offers yellow pear, saline and a hint of butterscotch alongside crisp acidity before closing on a hint of almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alois Lageder 2018 Haberle Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of pretty yellow blossoms, apple and melon show on the well-formed nose of this organic Trebbiano. Rounded in feel, the palate shows ripe fruit balanced by a lifted vein of lemon balm. It's a delicious, well-balanced white that will please many. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Umani Ronchi 2018 Montipagano Organic (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Lifted tones of violet and pink peppercorn meld with a dried goji berry core on the nose. The palate is tense in feel, driven by a rush of acidity but properly restrained by a framing of well-mannered tannins. Juicy, tart red fruit dominates, with lingering peppery spice and mineral notes on the finish. Drink now. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: D'Angelo 2017 Sacravite Aglianico (Basilicata)

Description: Aromas of French oak and blue flower lead the nose. The tight lean palate offers prune, orange zest and toasted notes alongside astringent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Aisna 2014 Alessandro Rossi Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Scents of oak, cedar and hazelnut shape the delicate nose along with a whiff of peach on this light-bodied white. The linear, ethereal palate offers yellow pear, saline and a hint of butterscotch alongside crisp acidity before closing on a hint of almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alois Lageder 2018 Haberle Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: White stone-fruit and spring-blossom aromas waft out of the glass. On the bright palate, tangy acidity lifts ripe yellow pear and mature apple. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bollini 2019 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: After a few swirls of the glass, the nose suggests wild berry, cured tobacco leaf and a whiff of violet. The straightforward palate shows juicy sour cherry, cranberry and clove set against fine-grained tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Camigliano 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This has a shy nose that eventually reveals whiffs of white stone fruit and toasted hazelnut. The palate is also shy, suggesting grapefruit, yellow apple and a hint of flinty mineral alongside racy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Kurtatsch 2018 Kofl Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: A zesty nose of lemon peel and chamomile starts this off, with a bit of stoniness riding underneath. Medium in weight, the palate is driven by red apple and lemon balm, showing plenty of acidity to keep it crisp and refreshing. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Ripa Teatina 2018 Arenile (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of truffle, woodland berry and iris shape the delicate nose. The straightforward palate is rather evolved and light on its feet, evoking unripe sour cherry, licorice and a hint of toasted hazelnut alongside dusty tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casanuova delle Cerbaie 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Weedy underbrush, stewed prune and leather aromas slowly come together along with a whiff of blue flower. The dense, rather lethargic palate reflects the heat of the vintage, offering raisin, tobacco and the heat of evident alcohol but it lacks vitality and fruit richness. Close-grained tannins provide support and generate a rather astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Pavone 2015 Campo Marzio (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: French oak, sunbaked earth and camphor aromas lift out of the glass along with the barest hint of steeped prune. The densely concentrated palate is already evolved in terms of fruit richness, showing exotic spice and tobacco but only the barest hint of dried cherry alongside scorching alcohol. Close-grained tannins provide the assertive framework and a mouthdrying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Pavone 2015 Fiore del Melitoto (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Delicate scents of pear and a whiff of chamomile waft out of the glass. On the savory palate, fresh acidity lifts ripe apple and lemon before finishing on a hazelnut note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2019 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: This opens with aromas of cedar, underbrush and mocha. The ripe palate offers prune, star anise and roasted coffee bean alongside close-grained tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Togata 2015 Seconda Stella d Destra (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Wild-berry and camphor aromas mix with a hint of tobacco. Reflecting the nose, the taut medium-bodied palate offers ripe Marasca cherry, licorice and a hint of smoke. Polished tannins lend support. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Martoccia 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: A blend of 81% Sauvignon Blanc, 10% Vermentino, 6% Viogner and 3% Verdicchio, this has subdued aromas of toasted oak, acacia and ripe yellow apple. The oak aromas carry over to the shy, medium-bodied palate, along with hints of grapefruit and roasted coffee bean before a rather lean, drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ornellaia 2017 Poggio alle Gazze White (Toscana)

Description: Made predominantly with Vermentino and a small amount of Chardonnay, this features aromas and flavors of apricot, yellow apple and white almond. Tangy acidity and a relaxed perlage provide the easygoing backdrop. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Rabano NV Brut Sparkling (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Mature apricot, wild-herb and citrus aromas are front and center. The aromas carry over to the medium-bodied palate along with crisp acidity before a bitter-almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Santa Lucia 2018 Brigante Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Espresso, cedar and scorched earth aromas emerge from the glass. The dense palate offers black plum jam, cedar and mocha alongside the warmth of evident alcohol and close-grained tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tassi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Lifted aromas of cranberry, hibiscus and orange rind are front and center, with a hint of banana in the background. Medium in weight, the palate is driven by cherry and lemon tones, with a gentle grip of tannins on the finish. It's a fruit forward yet well balanced rosato. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torre Zambra 2019 Colle Zambra (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: Lifted notes of mentholated herbs and small red berries carry the bright, crisp nose. It's silken in feel on entry, lifted by juicy acidity and polished tannins. A core of tart red berries abounds on the palate, with a dusting of crushed minerals and a slight grip of tannins on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Valle Tritana 2016 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
