Description: A cherry-coulis tone melds with tobacco and earth on the nose. The medium-bodied palate is bright in acidity, with loads of tangy red-berry flavors alongside tar and iodine. It ends rich in feel, with just enough lift for balance. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cataldi Madonna 2015 Tonì (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Earthy aromas of leather and game mingle with mature black-skinned fruit and tilled soil. Showing a rustic charm, the aromas follow over to dense palate along with baked prune and licorice. Dusty, drying tannins provide the framework. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Innocenti 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of roasted coffee bean, tobacco and tilled soil emerge from the glass. The tightly wound palate offers espresso, prune and dried sage alongside assertive tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tassi 2015 Franci (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Forest berry, camphor and a whiff of tilled soil lead the way on this easygoing red. On the lithe smooth palate, fresh acidity and dusty tannins accompany cranberry and hints of star anise. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Poggio Salvi 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of crushed, mentholated herbs, blackberry and black pepper are lifted and pure on the nose. This light-bodied Montepulciano offers a succulent core of cherry and blackberry flavors on the palate, all framed by fine yet supportive tannins. It's a great everyday red that would be a welcome addition to the dinner table. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Umani Ronchi 2018 Podere (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: One of the best value whites coming out of Italy, this enjoyable wine has aromas of spring blossom and white stone fruit. Crisp and savory, the fresh palate offers yellow pear and juicy citrus before a hint of white almond signals the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mezzacorona 2019 Estate Bottled Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: Woodland-berry, truffle and violet aromas are front and center on this fragrant Rosso. The light-bodied palate suggests fresh strawberry, pomegranate and a hint of dark culinary spice set against easygoing tannins and bright acidity. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Caparzo 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Elderflower, grapefruit, crushed tomato-vine and gooseberry aromas fill the glass on this aromatic white. The aromas follow on to the crisp, savory palate together with hints of ginger and yellow peach. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Erste Neue 2018 Puntay Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: This opens with aromas evoking black plum, cooking spice and leather. The aromas carry over to the forward palate along with tobacco while smooth tannins offer relaxed support. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria La Lecciaia 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This has subtle aromas of toasted hazelnut, citrus and grilled herb. The linear palate suggests oak, yellow-apple skin and lemon zest, alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Girlan 2018 Flora Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of scorched earth, leather and tobacco lead the way. The chewy palate offers star anise and black plum jam alongside polished, ripe tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Collina dei Lecci 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: A quiet nose of melon, chamomile and lemon starts off this white, with plush, juicy flavors carrying to the palate. There's a real zip of energy to the acidity, which provides ample lift throughout. The finish is quick on a brisk lemon-tonic note. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2018 Agronika Pecorino (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Light rose-gold in color, this rosé offers a mild nose of cherry and white blossoms. The palate is silken in feel yet properly lifted by acidity. Creamy strawberry and melon flavors are held in check by sharp grapefruit and gentle stoniness. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2018 Monatic Rosé (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: The wine has a shy nose that eventually suggests crushed stone and Bartlett pear. On the linear palate, tangy acidity accompanies ripe yellow apple, lemon thyme and a hint of dried chamomile. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: St. Pauls 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of earth, red flowers and warm baking spice cover the red-cherry fruit on the nose. The palate is full in feel, with a blanket of anise and allspice surrounding the rich red-fruit core. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torre Zambra 2016 Colle Maggio (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aged in large cask and tonneaux, this has aromas of beeswax, cedar and toasted nut. On the round, full-bodied palate, bright acidity lifts butterscotch, pear and honeyed notes before a coffee-bean close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tramin 2018 Unterebner Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Fermented 50% in oak, 34% in amphora and the rest in steel, this has aromas of dried tropical fruit, apricot and Mediterranean scrub. The medium-bodied palate is lean in terms of fruit richness, opening with crushed mint while the finish shows dried pineapple and candied notes before a firm, bitter close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Val delle Rose 2017 Cobalto Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Aromas of crushed gravel, red cherry, currant and Alpine herbs yield a fresh, zesty start to this red. It's silky smooth on the palate, built up by plenty of crunchy berry flavors and polished tannins. A resounding tart cherry note lingers on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2017 Agronika (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of green apple and pear march over to the tangy palate along, with a hint of Meyer lemon. Crisp acidity lifts the fruity flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bottega Vinaia 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: Crisp and medium-bodied, this refreshing white has pretty aromas of white spring flower and pear. The tangy palate offers ripe apple, white peach and a citrusy note alongside vibrant acidity before an almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: A 50-50 blend of organically-grown Chardonnay and Viognier, this has aromas of tropical fruit, apricot and toasted nut. The palate is structured but more restrained than the nose, offering grapefruit and fennel seed alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Palazzetta 2018 Prima Viola White (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Aromas of espresso, dark-skinned fruit and toasted oak slowly emerge from the glass. The solid, one-dimensional palate offers blackberry jam, licorice and roasted coffee bean alongside assertive tannins that leave rather astringent finish. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Poderina 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Tilled soil, leather and mocha aromas emerge from the glass. The firm palate offers sour cherry, clove and dried sage alongside raspy tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mocali 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of struck match and popcorn-kernel arise on the nose, with a bit of seared lemon riding in the background. Half of this wine sees time in neutral tonneaux for about 12 months, yielding a rounded, almost silken feel. Ample acidity does well to lift up the palate, with defined flavors of melon and sour lemon riding through the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Umani Ronchi 2017 Centovie Pecorino (Colli Aprutini)

Description: This entry-level wine from Valle Reale is produced from organic grapes and sees no time in oak. The result is a pure, fresh wine that dazzles in flavors of tangy red plum and succulent red cherry. Lifted acidity and delicate, sandy tannins frame it all, giving it enough structure and verve to be enjoyed at the dinner table. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Valle Reale 2018 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Made with Vermentino and Viognier, this has subdued aromas suggesting yellow stone fruit and a whiff of spring field flower. On the bright, light-bodied palate, crisp acidity accompanies yellow peach and lemon zest before a tangy saline close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa Pinciana 2018 Airali White (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Here's a fun, friendly white with aromas of tropical fruit and apricot. The aromas follow over to the tangy palate, along with grapefruit and a candied note set against crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2018 La Pettegola Vermentino (Toscana)

Description: This red is showing a rather developed nose of hoisin, dried cherries, goji berries and dried violet. It is soft and supple in feel, yet lifted by a proper vein of acidity. The tannins are fine but provide a firm grip on the midpalate and ultimately clench up the finish. Tangy mineral tones ride underneath, with more floral tones chiming in. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bisceglia 2015 Gudarrà (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of ripe dark-skinned fruit, culinary spice and tilled soil lead the way. The straightforward, accessible palate offers mature black plum, vanilla and clove alongside round tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonacchi 2015 Il Selciato (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of toasted nut, oak and coconut lead the nose along with a whiff of white stone fruit. The racy palate is on the lean side, evoking yellow apple, bitter almond and hints of butterscotch alongside brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Maso Cantaghel 2018 Maso Papa Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Intense cherry-red in color, this traditional Cerasuolo offers a rich dark-red-berry flavor on the palate, lifted by bright acidity and a gentle framing of tannins. Medium in weight, it shows plenty of heft to stand up to enjoyment in the cooler months of the year. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2018 Agronika (Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo)

Description: This has fruity aromas of honeydew melon and green apple. The aromas follow through to the light, easygoing palate along with a hint of peach and crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Alta Luna 2019 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Subtle aromas suggesting wild red berry and tilled earth form the nose, along with whiffs of toast and coconut. The rather lean taut palate evokes coffee bean, orange rind and dried cherry alongside firm acidity and dusty tannins that leave a drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argiano 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Peach and Mediterranean brush aromas follow through to the light-bodied palate, along with a hint of pineapple. Tangy acidity keeps it fresh. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bruni 2018 Plinio White (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Aromas of fresh spring blossoms, candied lemon peel and melon rind carry the nose. The palate shows a pleasing roundness, with a mix of tart citrus and apple flavors. It's a fine, zesty drop that would be delightful alone or alongside fresh salads and grilled poultry. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Valle Tritana 2018 Passerina (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: This opens with delicate scents of spring blossom and red berry, and (thanks to brief maceration of the grape skins in the must) a pretty copper color. On the palate, tangy acidity accompanies peach and pomegranate before a saline close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casata Monfort 2019 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Delicately scented, this has light aromas suggesting yellow pear and apple. The scents make their way over to the fresh, rounded palate along with a hint of bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castel Sallegg 2018 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: Mild aromas of red berries and grilled herbs carries the nose. This light-bodied red offers a straightforward fresh red-cherry flavor, lifted up by juicy acidity. The tannins provide just enough framing and grip. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2018 Estate Grown (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Deeply yellow in color, this has aromas recalling toasted almond, Mediterranean scrub and yeasty whiffs of bread crust. On the linear palate, tangy acidity and a hint of saline accompany dried apricot and gooseberry. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Casa di Terra 2018 Vermentino (Bolgheri)

Description: This has a subdued nose that eventually reveals whiffs of pressed chamomile flower toasted hazelnut. The palate is shy in terms of fruit richness, suggesting bitter almond and lemon zest alongside brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kellerei Kaltern Caldaro 2018 Soll Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Cooking spice, underbrush and leather aromas lead the way. The straightforward palate offers ripe black plum, star anise and clove alongside evolved tannins. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Togata 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of scorched earth, leather and tobacco eventually take shape in the glass. The medium-bodied palate offers clove, black plum and white pepper alongside round mature tannins. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Togata 2015 Jacopus (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: A blend of Vermentino, Ansonica and Viognier, this has delicate aromas of white spring flower and white stone fruit. The tangy light-bodied palate is also on the delicate side, suggesting white peach, pineapple and citrus alongside crisp acidity. It closes on a saline note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Mortelle 2018 Vivia White (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Light aromas of cranberry and hibiscus carry a slight herbal undertone on the nose. Medium in weight, the palate brings a richer red-fruit flavor, with bright blood orange to lift it up. It has good grip and feel, but the concentration of fruit is on the lighter side. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Pasetti 2018 Tenutarossa Rosato

Description: French oak, butterscotch and coconut aromas dominate the nose. The flavors follow through to the firm, full-bodied along with cedar, vanilla and coffee bean but it lacks fruit richness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Peter Zemmer 2017 Giati Riserva Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Blue-flower, underbrush and red-berry aromas lift out of the glass, along with a whiff of eucalyptus. It's tangy and straightforward, offering dried cherry, orange zest and clove alongside vigorous acidity and taut, drying tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggiarellino 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Anjou pear aromas follow over to the straightforward tangy palate, along with notes of green apple and citrus. Bright acidity keeps it fresh. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Girlan 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of cooking spice, Mediterranean herb and leather emerge from the glass. The straightforward, rather light-bodied palate offers black-cherry jam and star anise alongside pliant tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonacchi 2015 Molino del Piano (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of scorched earth, used leather and baking spice lead the way. The already approachable palate offers prune compote, clove and a hint of tobacco alongside pliant tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonacchi 2015 Molino della Suga (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This opens with aromas of cooking spice, truffle and tobacco. The no-frills palate offers black plum, sage and star anise alongside pliant tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonacchi 2015 Notte di Note (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This light- to medium-bodied Montepulciano boasts a cohesive nose of ripe dark cherry, plum juice, anise and tobacco leaf on the nose and palate. It's bright and tangy in feel, honed in by a gentle hug of raspy tannins. This is a great weekday red to be enjoyed alongside pasta marinara. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Valle Tritana 2017 Tritàno (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Apricot and exotic fruit aromas follow on to the straightforward palate together with hints of grapefruit. It closes on a notes of bitter almond and saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castelfeder 2019 Lahn Kerner (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: This has a shy nose evoking toasted nut and oak. The aromas carry over to the palate along with bitter yellow-apple skin, saline and coffee bean. It has fresh acidity but is shy on fruit richness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colterenzio 2019 Berg Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)

Description: This tangy white has subtle scents of yellow stone fruit and a whiff of botanical herb. On the light-bodied palate, crisp acidity accompanies apricot and lemon zest before a bitter-almond close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria di Magliano 2018 Pagliatura Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: The rather shy nose evokes spring wildflower and white stone fruit. On the crisp palate, vibrant acidity accompanies suggestions of green apple and pear before a citrusy close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Kris 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Aromas of toasted oak, baked plum and espresso slowly emerge from the glass. The solid palate offers roasted coffee bean, prune and vanilla alongside grainy tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Togata 2015 La Togata dei Togati (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Fun and informal, this light-bodied rosato offers aromas and flavors of red berry, wild herb and a hint of orange zest, alongside racy acidity. Hints of bitter almond and tangy saline mark the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere San Cristoforo 2018 Pink Rosato (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Crisp and clean, this opens with delicate aromas of spring blossom and white stone fruit. On the vibrant palate, fresh acidity accompanies green apple and a hint of white peach. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tolloy 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Tangy and bright, this has aromas of orange blossom and honeydew melon. The fruit aromas carry over to the zesty palate, along with citrus and a hint of white stone fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Val delle Rose 2018 Litorale Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Fruity aromas of apple and pear follow over to the light-bodied palate, along with a hint of green melon. Tangy acidity gives it a bright finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Zenato 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Fruity aromas of apple and pear follow over to the light-bodied palate, along with a hint of green melon. Tangy acidity gives it a bright finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Zenato 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: This has aromas evoking baking spice, violet and tilled soil. The no-frills palate offers black plum, clove and a hint of tobacco leaf alongside smooth tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonacchi 2015 Casalino (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Grapefruit and crushed botanical herb scents form the nose. The aromas carry over to the brisk, linear palate along with suggestions of yellow peach and saline. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castelfeder 2019 Raif Sauvignon (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Vinous aromas of crushed red berry carry over to the easygoing palate, along with star anise. Relaxed tannins and fresh acidity provide light support. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castelli Martinozzi 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This has a subtle nose suggesting dark-skinned fruit, violet and a whiff of moist earth. The linear palate is on the lean side, evoking pomegranate, star anise and sage alongside bright acidity and dusty, drying tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Poderina 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This fleshy white offers loads of honeydew, lemon oil and chamomile tones. It's rounded and ripe in feel, lifted by a strong citric element that resolves well on the creamy melon finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2018 Rocky Marciano Pecorino (Abruzzo)

Description: A lifted, fruity nose of lemon, muskmelon and banana carries to the medium-bodied palate. Bright acidity pushes through, lending good balance to the straightforward nature of this wine. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torre Zambra 2018 Colle Maggio Pecorino (Abruzzo)

Description: High-toned aromas of cherry and plum meld with a sweet tone of cigar box on the nose. The palate is smooth and sultry, with juicy shots of acidity brightening it up, but all the while there's a lingering sheen of sweet oak. The tannins are rather in charge on the end, giving it a bold and brash feel. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Umani Ronchi 2015 Centovie (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: This approachable Aglianico is rounded in dark cherry and blackberry tones, with warm, sweet spices filling it out. There's good lift and vitality to the palate, with tangy acidity propelling it along while soft tannins offer a gentle frame. White pepper and violet linger on the close. Drink now. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Bisceglia 2017 Terra di Vulcano (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: This opens with subdued aromas of dark-skinned fruit, baking spice and underbrush. The easygoing palate shows black-plum jam and vanilla alongside smooth tannins. Drink over the next few years. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonacchi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: White stone-fruit and yellow wild-flower aromas form the delicate nose. On the refreshing palate, tangy acidity accompanies honeydew melon and ripe Bartlett pear. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castel Firmian 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: This has delicate scents suggesting white rose and citrus. On the fresh, tangy palate, racy acidity accompanies apricot and pink grapefruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cembra 2019 Kerner (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of lemon balm, chamomile and melon rind show on the fresh, lifted nose. Juicy in feel, the palate delivers a pleasing mix of apple and melon, lifted by bright shots of lemon. This is a great buy for those searching for a balanced medium-bodied white. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2018 Estate Grown (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of apricot, white pepper and Mediterranean scrub form the nose. Made with Syrah and Vermentino, the racy, light-bodied palate offers yellow peach and pomegranate alongside vibrant acidity. It closes on a note of bitter almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frescobaldi 2018 Alie Rosato (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of lemon peel, green melon rind and medicinal herbs carry the pretty nose.There'silkiness to the palate, with bright, racy acidity pushing through. This is a zesty vibrant pour that ends with a lemon-drop tone. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2018 Agronika Passerina (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Subtle aromas suggesting yellow stone fruit and beeswax form the nose. On the vibrant, light-bodied palate, bright acidity accompanies apricot and an acacia-honey note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere San Cristoforo 2018 Luminosa Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This has a shy nose that eventually reveals aromas of black-skinned fruit, moist forest floor, dark spice and a whiff of game. Reflecting the nose, the earthy palate offers dried black cherry, blackberry and clove alongside grainy almost gritty tannins that leave a firm, drying finish. It's not for everyone but it has a rustic charm. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vigne Chigi 2018 Pallagrello Nero (Terre del Volturno)
Country: Terre del Volturno, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Tangy and bright, this has subtle aromas of yellow apple and a whiff of apricot. Mirroring the nose, the easygoing palate offers yellow peach and a hint of white almond alongside fresh acidity. It's simple but well made. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Mantellassi 2018 Lucumone Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This wine is closed on the nose, offering a quiet tin-can tone. Light in feel, the fruit is not very intense on the palate, showing a straightforward juicy red-cherry note. Gentle tannins ride alongside bright acidity to lend support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: La Valentina 2017 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Blue-flower, exotic-spice and dark-skinned berry aromas waft out of the glass. The light-bodied palate is on the lean side, offering sour cherry, orange and a hint of roasted coffee bean alongside firm acidity and tight dusty tannins that leave a firm, drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Patrizia Cencioni 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Crushed tomato vine and wet stone aromas lead the nose. On the light-bodied palate, racy acidity accompanies suggestions of apricot and grapefruit before a powdered sage finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castel Sallegg 2018 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)

Description: Inky ruby in color, with purple highlights, this wine smells rich on the nose in tones of toasted vanilla, tobacco and brandy-soaked cherries. The palate follows suit, bolstered by a ripping line of acidity. Oaky tones of dill and vanilla linger on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Moro Wines 2013 Morus (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Toasted nut, yellow stone fruit and a whiff of dried herb aromas form the subtle nose. The light-bodied rather diluted palate offers suggestions of peach, yellow apple and lemon alongside tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rocca di Frassinello 2018 Vermentino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Made with Sangiovese and Merlot, this easygoing rosato offers delicate aromas of violet and wild berry. On the refreshing palate, tangy acidity accompanies juicy sour cherry along with the barest hints of white pepper and bitter almond. It's simple but well made. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2018 Centine Rosé (Toscana)

Description: Made with Sangiovese and Vermentino, this racy rosato has delicate aromas of red berry and a hint of citrus. It's bright and light bodied, offering sour cherry and pink grapefruit alongside lively acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2018 Cost'e Rosato (Toscana)

Description: This informal white has aromas and flavors of Anjou pear and a hint of green apple. It's simple but well made, with fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bollini 2019 Sauvignon (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
Country: Vigneti delle Dolomiti, Northeastern Italy, Italy

Description: This has aromas of grilled herb, baked plum and a whiff of resin. The palate is rather lean, suggesting prune and clove alongside dusty, drying tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Carpineto 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Dark-spice, black-skinned berry and camphor aromas slowly take shape in the glass. The lean palate is rather shy, suggesting prune and ground clove alongside dusty, rather fleeting tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Col di Lamo 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of green apple follow over to the fresh palate along with green melon and a hint of white almond. Tangy acidity keeps it lively. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Vis 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: The shy nose eventually releases delicate aromas of acacia flower and a whiff of white stone fruit. The bright easygoing palate offers yellow pear and a hint of green melon alongside bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casata Monfort 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: The nose is rather shy but eventually reveals whiffs of beeswax and toasted nut. The palate isn't very expressive, suggesting hints of yellow-apple skin and bitter almond. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castel Sallegg 2018 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: Aromas of autumn leaves, small red berries and savory spice carry the nose. The medium-bodied palate is smooth and supple, with a dried currant and cherry core that's bolstered by mildly bitter tannins. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Regio Cantina 2017 Genesi (Aglianico del Vulture)
Country: Aglianico del Vulture, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Bright, crisp aromas of candied apple and lemon carry the nose, with a wilted floral tone riding in the background. The light-bodied palate shows a mix of sweet and tart fruit that end short on the clipped finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torre Zambra 2019 Madia (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)

Description: This wine has delicate aromas of spring blossom and white stone fruit. On the fresh, simple palate, crisp acidity accompanies Anjou pear and yellow apple. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cavit 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: This easygoing white has delicate aromas evoking pear and apple. The aromas follow over to the light-bodied palate along with a hint of green melon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantine di Ora 2019 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)

Description: This ripe Pecorino offers mild aromas of melon, lemon and chamomile on the nose, which carry to the slightly oily palate. Bright acidity does well to lift the feel on the midpalate, generating a sharp contrast between honeydew and citrus flavors. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: La Valentina 2018 Pecorino (Colline Pescaresi)

Description: Aromas of roasted coffee bean, baking spice and underbrush slowly emerge from the glass. The taut palate offers clove, prune and espresso alongside close-grained tannins that leave a rather astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mocali 2015 Vigna delle Raunate (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Gentle notes of lemon and pine meld with a stalky yellow-flower core on the nose. There's roundness to the palate, yet bright acidity shines through—almost sharp at first, but then turns more tame. Tight flavors of lemon and underripe white plum finish with a load of tang. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Pasetti 2018 Pecorino (Abruzzo)

Description: Lightly scented and light-bodied, this has subdued aromas suggesting honeydew melon and banana. The aromas carry over to the extremely simple palate, along with crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cembra 2019 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)

Description: Fresh and light-bodied, this tangy easygoing white has delicate flavors evoking apple and pear before a citrusy close. It's extremely simple but well made, with crisp acidity and would make a refreshing pour for large, informal gatherings. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lagaria 2019 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: A cherry-jelly aroma melds with geranium on the nose. Light in feel, the palate is straightforward and driven by lots of tart red cherry. The tannins are soft and supple, with the structure mostly coming from the driving acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Torre Zambra 2017 Madia (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Aromas of sawdust and anise carry the nose, not giving away much fruit. The palate is more boisterous in cherry and plum tones, with a sheen of warm spice and wood notes on top. Soft tannins and bright acidity lend support to the whole. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Nevio 2016 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: Mild aromas of cherry and blackberry are lifted by an herbal menthol note. There's a nice roundness to the palate, with vibrant acidity and a gentle grip of tannins lending support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2018 Estate Grown Merlot (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: This unoaked Sangiovese offers simplistic yet persistent red-cherry and raspberry tones. The acidity is fresh and vibrant and the tannins are delicate, letting the buoyant red fruit shine. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2018 Estate Grown Sangiovese (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Subtle aromas evoking crushed tomato vine and passion fruit lead the nose. The light, simple palate evokes pink grapefruit and white peach alongside crisp acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Vis 2019 Rosé Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)

Description: Brisk aromas of lemon peel and chamomile carry the nose. The palate is shot through with sour tones of citrus, white cherry and white plum. This is a zippy, ultrafresh white that needs food to tame all that acidity. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2018 Monatic White Pecorino (Abruzzo)

Description: Bright red cherry and toasted vanilla carry the nose. The palate shows sweet red fruit, with a sheen of more vanilla and sweet baking spices. It displays a fine structure, but the oak comes off too forward. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Umani Ronchi 2018 Montipagano (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Made with Chardonnay and Vermentino, this zesty, informal white has subdued aromas evoking beeswax and a whiff of apricot. The simple, light-bodied palate suggests hints of yellow apple and citrus alongside brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2018 Centine White (Toscana)

Description: This informal red has vinous aromas of grape must, red cherry and a whiff of crushed herb. The lean, light-bodied palate offers sour cherry and orange rind alongside brisk acidity and dusty tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina di Montalcino 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Red apple, candied white flowers and fresh dill carry the nose. The palate is creamy in feel, but properly lifted by bright acidity. A savory nut tone marks the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2018 Estate Grown Pinot Grigio (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: This white is rather quiet on the nose, not revealing many charms. The palate is full in feel, with ample acidic lift, but the flavors are mild and lean toward sour lemon and melon rind. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cataldi Madonna 2018 Giulia Pecorino

Description: Made entirely with Sangiovese, this lightly hued, onion-skin-colored rosato has a shy nose evoking red berry and the barest hint of botanical herb. The light-bodied, diluted palate offers mere suggestions of unripe sour cherry and bitter almond set against brisk acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria di Magliano 2018 Ilario Sangiovese Rosato (Maremma Toscana)

Description: A dense nose of iodine, plum and warm spices carries to the rich, thick palate. The dark-fruit flavors are ensconced in big tannins and plenty of warm spice tones. Toasted vanilla reverberates on the close. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Ripa Teatina 2014 Rocky Marciano (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Tones of cherry, grilled herbs and a hint of green bell pepper carry the nose and palate. It feels lean and spritely, with sour-leaning acidity lending all the support. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2018 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: A fruity nose of ripe red apple, melon and candied banana starts off this straightforward Pinot Grigio. There's a ripe, almost mushy melon flavor to the palate, yet it still has ample lift from candied citrus and apple flavors. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Zaccagnini 2019 Dal Tralcetto Pinot Grigio (Colline Pescaresi)

Description: Straightforward but clean aromas of apple, lemon and melon carry the nose. The palate is well rounded, but lifted by zesty acidity. It's short and simplistic, but enjoyable nonetheless. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Citra 2018 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Terre di Chieti)
Country: Terre di Chieti, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Aromas of brandy-soaked plums and cherries meld with a heavy dose of vanilla, dill and sandalwood on the nose. The palate is thick in feel, built up by a host of oaky flavors. There is freshness from tangy acidity behind all that density, but ultimately the oak wins out on the finish. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Cantina Zaccagnini 2017 Dal Tralcetto (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: Candied aromas of cherry and strawberry mix with mentholated herbs, giving the nose a cough drop-like sensibility. The palate is rich and full in feel but shot through with rapier-like acidity that seems rather sharp, while grating tannins add to the disjointed nature of the wine. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Novaripa 2014 Spyro Riserva Limited Edition (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)

Description: This breezy red offers a simplistic palate of geranium, tilled earth and cranberry. Built more by tangy acidity, the tannins are gossamer thin, making this light and easy. ALEXANDER PEARTREE
Title: Stella 2017 Montepulciano d'Abruzzo

Description: This is the final Riserva to benefit from the late Franco Biondi Santi's masterful hand. It boasts enticing scents of rose, underbrush, red berry, new leather and crushed mint. The chiseled palate features succulent Morello cherry, pomegranate, orange zest, star anise and a hint of tobacco, all framed in taut, polished tannins. Firm acidity lends youthful tension and keeps it impeccably balanced. Drink 2024–2062. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Biondi-Santi 2012 Riserva (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Violet, iris, warm spice, new leather, earth and wild berry are just some of the aromas you'll find on this tantalizingly fragrant, gorgeous red. Linear and elegant, the radiant palate shows youthful tension, boasting red cherry, pomegranate, star anise, baking spice and orange zest framed in tightly wound, polished tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2025–2040. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Marroneto 2015 Madonna delle Grazie (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This fragrant, savory red carries aromas of underbrush, plum, blue flower, cocoa and camphor on the nose. The polished palate boasts juicy Marasca cherry, ripe blackberry, licorice, tobacco and an appealing hint of game. Silky tannins and bright acidity keep it balanced and elegant. Drink 2021–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi Antinori 2016 Tignanello Red (Toscana)

Description: Intense aromas of berry, iris, underbrush, botanical herb and camphor shape the enticing nose. Firmly structured, the taut, full-bodied palate offers juicy black cherry, raspberry, licorice and tobacco set against tightly knit, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ciacci Piccolomini d'Aragona 2015 Pianrosso (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Fragrant and all about finesse, this gorgeous wine opens with enticing aromas of blue flower, forest floor, wild berry and a whiff of eucalyptus. It's linear and elegant, delivering succulent red cherry, pomegranate, star anise and tobacco alongside polished tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it impeccably balanced. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Conti Costanti 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of woodland berry, new leather, blue flower and a baby powder shape the enticing nose on this fragrant red. Juicy and bright, the polished, delicious palate doles out crushed raspberry, cherry compote and baking spice alongside taut, refined tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced while a licorice note graces the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Chiuse 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Rose, violet, camphor, wild berry and aromatic herb aromas are front and center in this gorgeous red. It's juicy, enveloping and delicious, doling out succulent black cherry, raspberry compote, licorice and baking spice alongside velvety tannins. Thanks to the estate's vineyards north of Montalcino, it has freshness and mid-term staying power. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fuligni 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Sunbaked earth, mature black-plum, fragrant blue-flower and leather aromas mingle with balsamic whiffs of camphor on this full-bodied, delicious red. Made with 65% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot and 5% Sangiovese, the creamy palate is earthy and full of flavor, boasting juicy blackberry, raspberry, dried mint, cocoa and licorice. Taut velvety tannins provide plenty of support and finesse. Drink through 2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello dei Rampolla 2015 Sammarco Red (Toscana)

Description: Fragrant and loaded with finesse, this perfumed red features enticing scents of woodland berry, pine forest, violet, underbrush and a whiff of sandalwood. Elegantly structured, it's tantalizingly ethereal, delivering juicy red cherry, strawberry, black tea, licorice and a pronounced mineral note evoking rusty iron alongside tightly knit, refined tannins. It's surprisingly vibrant for the hot vintage and still youthfully austere, but that's a good thing as it shows great aging potential. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Marroneto 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of cassis, warm spice and camphor form the nose. Made with 73% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Sangiovese and 7% Cabernet Franc, the vibrant, linear palate shows great finesse, offering cranberry, blueberry and crushed mint alongside white pepper. It's smooth and balanced, with bright acidity and polished tannins. The best is yet to come, so hold for more complexity. Drink 2023–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi Antinori 2016 Solaia Red (Toscana)

Description: Made entirely with Cabernet Franc, this radiant red opens with intense aromas of black currant, Mediterranean scrub, blue flower and camphor aromas. On the supremely elegant palate, supple tannins and bright acidity accompany cassis, black raspberry, crushed herb and licorice before a cedar finish. It's smooth, radiant and delicious, with great energy. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Macchiole 2016 Paleo Rosso Cabernet Franc (Toscana)

Description: Fragrant and elegantly structured, this opens with aromas of woodland berry, iris, new leather and wild aromatic herb. The taut, linear palate delivers juicy Morello cherry, ripe pomegranate, crushed mint and star anise framed in firm, polished tannins. Boasting some of the highest vineyards in the denomination, it retains great freshness and balance. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Potazzine 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Enticing aromas of ripe wild berry, iris, camphor and sunbaked soil take shape in the glass. Full bodied and enveloping, the smooth, delicious palate doles out juicy Marasca cherry, raspberry jam, licorice and tobacco while firm velvety tannins provide support. It boasts concentration and structure but also balance, thanks to the fruit richness and freshness. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ciacci Piccolomini d'Aragona 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Made with organically farmed grapes and fermented with indigenous yeasts, this opens with varietal aromas of ripe dark-skinned fruit, forest floor, fragrant purple flower, spice and new leather. Full bodied and enveloping, the concentrated, chewy palate offers juicy Marasca cherry, ripe plum, licorice and baking spice framed in firm, velvety tannins. It's delicious and already tempting but let it fully develop. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Ragnaie 2015 VV (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: A blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, this red has alluring aromas of botanical herb, woodland berry, blue flower and a whiff of warm spice. Full bodied and loaded with finesse, the smooth, delicious palate doles out juicy raspberry, black cherry jam, tobacco and licorice before a coffee-bean finish. Fresh acidity and a backbone of firm, fine-grained tannins provide balance and structure. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2016 Excelsus Red (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of ripe dark-skinned berry, violet, underbrush and warm spice emerge in the glass, along with a whiff of camphor. Full bodied and enveloping, the structured palate delivers raspberry jam, dried black cherry, licorice and tobacco alongside firm fine-grained tannins. It closes on an espresso note. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castelgiocondo 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: From one of Montalcino's under-the-radar gems, this is a fantastic effort for the hot vintage, opening with classic varietal aromas of underbrush, leather, wild berry and a balsamic whiff of camphor. Smooth, full bodied and enveloping, the delicious palate combines finesse, great fruit and balance, doling out crushed raspberry, cherry compote, licorice and baking spice. It's already almost accessible but offers years of drinking pleasure. Drink 2021–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Armilla 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc, this polished, savory red opens with aromas of ripe black-skinned fruit, cedar and warm spice. Reflecting the nose, the linear, vibrant palate delivers juicy blackberry, blueberry and licorice. A hint of camphor unfolds before transitioning into a peppermint close. Smooth, fine-grained tannins provide the elegant backbone. Drink through 2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guado al Tasso 2016 Bolgheri Superiore

Description: Cedar, cassis, camphor and French oak aromas lead the nose on this 100% Syrah. The full-bodied palate features ripe blackberry, raspberry jam, dark exotic spice, dried mint and espresso alongside tightly-knit fine-grained tannins. It's well balanced, with fresh acidity that lifts the licorice close. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Macchiole 2016 Scrio Syrah (Toscana)

Description: Underbrush, mature berry and exotic spice aromas mingle with a whiff of leather. Firmly structured and linear, the palate features ripe Marasca cherry, cranberry, licorice and tobacco while tightly wound, fine-grained tannins provide the backbone. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. Give it time to fully develop. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Altesino 2015 Montosoli (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Earthy aromas of underbrush, scorched earth, leather and fragrant blue flower mingle with whiffs of exotic spice on this full-bodied red. It's chewy and delicious, doling out raspberry jam, baked plum, cocoa and licorice alongside enveloping velvety tannins. It closes on a hint of dried mint. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Ragnaie 2015 Casanovina Montosoli (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Rose petal, crushed mint, woodland berry and eucalyptus aromas slowly take shape on this delicious full bodied red. It's linear and elegantly structured, featuring juicy Marasca cherry, cranberry, licorice and cocoa alongside firm velvety tannins. It closes on an orange-zest note. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Talenti 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of cedar, cassis, camphor and oak-driven spice are front and center on this fragrant, full-bodied red. On the precise, savory palate, firm, elegant tannins offer polished support for juicy red berry, licorice and tobacco while fresh acidity keeps it balanced. It's young but already shows an impressive depth of flavors. Drink 2021–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Biserno 2016 Biserno Red (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of wild berry, underbrush, dried herbs and leather shape the nose. It's medium in body, with tension and structure that support flavors of pomegranate, red cherry, licorice and tobacco. It's still young thanks to taut, refined tannins and fresh acidity, but will blossom into a beauty. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Padelletti 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Sunbaked earth, underbrush, leather and baked plum aromas emerge on this full-bodied red. Round and enveloping, the delicious, concentrated palate doles out juicy Morello cherry, fleshy black raspberry, licorice and baking spice alongside velvety tannins. It's already almost accessible but will also provide years of drinking pleasure. Enjoy through 2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Collosorbo 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Subtle aromas of underbrush, cedar, camphor and cassis waft out of the glass along with a whiff of blue flower. The firmly structured, full-bodied palate offers dried cherry, black currant jam, grilled sage and espresso alongside tightly-knit close-grained tannins. You'll also notice the warmth of evident alcohol on the close but the rich fruit stands up to it. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Masseto 2016 Merlot (Toscana)

Description: Cedar, French oak and cassis aromas follow over to the vibrant palate along with coconut and dried black cherry. Racy acidity lends energy and youthful tension while firm fine-grained tannins offer elegant support. It's still young and primary so it give it time to fully develop. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ornellaia 2016 Bolgheri Superiore

Description: Made in high-altitude vineyards, this fragrant red is fresher than most of the region's wines from the hot 2015 vintage. It opens with enticing aromas of red berry, pressed rose, pipe tobacco, wild herb and underbrush while the radiant, linear palate delivers sour cherry, red currant, star anise and white pepper. Bright acidity and taut, fine-grained provide balance and support. It's still youthfully austere but will age beautifully. Drink 2022–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monteraponi 2015 Baron'Ugo Red (Toscana)

Description: Fragrant blue-flower, perfumed berry, new leather and pipe-tobacco aromas waft out of the glass along with whiffs of a freshly tilled vineyard. The smooth, elegantly structured palate delivers juicy Marasca cherry, crushed black raspberry and baking spice framed in polished tannins. It also has surprising freshness for the hot vintage that lends balance. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa al Cortile 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Underbrush, wild berry, rose and camphor aromas waft out of the glass along with whiffs of rosemary and graphite on this medium-bodied red. It's linear, savory and balanced, delivering red-cherry, pomegranate, star anise and white-pepper flavors set against vibrant acidity and polished tannins. It shows breeding and finesse. It's ready now or you could hold for even more complexity. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Biondi-Santi 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Delicate, alluring scents of rose, thyme, camphor and wild red berry lead the way along with a whiff of spice. It's ethereally elegant, offering juicy red cherry, strawberry compote, star anise, crushed mint and a smoky note alongside taut, ultrarefined tannins. It's radiant, with bright acidity. Some may find this almost too graceful but lovers of finesse will be enchanted. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbadia Ardenga 2015 Vigna Piaggia (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Subdued aromas evoking underbrush, baked plum and scorched earth form the nose along with a balsamic whiff of camphor. Full bodied and chewy, the brawny, enveloping palate features dried cherry, licorice, coffee bean and the warmth of alcohol alongside firm, noble tannins. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Baricci 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Truffle, carob and scorched soil aromas meld with scents of baked plum and mint. Concentrated and full bodied, the chewy palate doles out ripe black cherry, blackberry and baking spice alongside taut, velvety tannins that lead to a firm finish. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franco Pacenti–Canalicchio 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Plum, leather, eucalyptus, violet and botanical herb aromas lead the nose on this fragrant red. The linear palate has body and finesse, offering licorice, raspberry jam and espresso alongside taut close-grained tannins. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terralsole 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Underbrush, scorched earth, grilled herb and mature black-skinned-berry aromas form the nose along with coconut sensations. Full bodied and savory, the elegant, concentrated palate delivers dried black cherry, licorice, tobacco and espresso alongside assertive, velvety tannins that leave a firm finish. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Le Ripi 2015 Amore e Magia (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of dark skinned berry, cedar and cassis mingle with whiffs of violet and French oak. On the elegant, structured palate, tight, fine-grained tannins support flavors of black cherry, red currant, espresso and tobacco. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2016 Summus Red (Toscana)

Description: Truffle, leather, crushed violet, mature blueberry and molten chocolate aromas meld together on this full-bodied red. A savory, earthy blend of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% Petit Verdot, the smooth palate offers mature blueberry, blackberry and clove aromas punctuated with hints of game. Velvety tannins provide polished support. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello dei Rampolla 2015 D'Alceo Red (Toscana)

Description: Forest floor, truffle, violet, leather and grilled herb aromas emerge from the glass. On the full-bodied palate, assertive fine-grained tannins accompany dried Morello cherry, cranberry, licorice and carob while a menthol note provides back up. Give it time to unwind and fully develop. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Ragnaie 2015 Fornace (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot opens with aromas of Mediterranean brush, black-skinned berry and tobacco. The concentrated palate offers blackberry jam, licorice and mocha alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Campo alle Comete 2016 Bolgheri Superiore

Description: Aromas of grilled herb, graphite and wild berry take center stage along with whiffs of rose and exotic spice. On the full-bodied polished palate, fine-grained tannins lithely frame red cherry, pomegranate, coffee bean and orange zest while fresh acidity keeps it bright. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Terralsole 2015 Vigna Fonte Lattaia (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Earthy aromas of forest floor, dark-skinned berry and leather lead the nose. The savory, balanced palate offers dried black cherry, raspberry jam, star anise and black pepper alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Paradiso di Cacuci 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Mediterranean scrub, leather and ripe black-skinned-berry aromas lead the nose. The savory, balanced palate offers dried black cherry, clove and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Capanne Ricci 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Made entirely with Sangiovese and vinified and aged in clay amphora, this intriguing red has continuously evolving aromas that include scorched earth, truffle, leather and baked plum. Full bodied and enveloping, the warm, structured palate delivers prune, dried black cherry, ground pepper and a mineral note alongside tightly knit, velvety tannins. You'll also detect the warmth of alcohol on the midpalate and the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fontodi 2016 Dino Sangiovese (Colli della Toscana Centrale)
Country: Colli della Toscana Centrale, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Aromas of underbrush, leather, camphor and wild berry form the nose. On the elegant, medium bodied palate, licorice and clove accent a core of juicy black cherry while polished tannins lend refined support. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Altesino 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Subtle aromas of forest floor, woodland berry, wild herb and camphor aromas shape the nose. On the firmly structured palate, tightly knit noble tannins support dried cherry, pomegranate, licorice and tobacco. It's still young so give it a few more years to fully develop. Drink 2023–2033. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lisini 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of red berry, blue flower, leather and an earthy whiff of truffle waft out of the glass. Reflecting the nose, the taut, linear palate shows juicy Marasca cherry, baking spice, camphor and wild herb alongside lithe tannins and fresh acidity. It's savory, with youthful tension and while ready now it will offer several years of enjoyment. It's a fantastic Rosso. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Le Ripi 2016 Sogni e Follia (Rosso di Montalcino)

Description: Cedar, camphor, French oak and cassis aromas are front and center. Mirroring the nose, the firm full-bodied palate offers coconut, roasted coffee bean, dried blackberry and vanilla along with notes of grilled green bell pepper. Assertive, close grained tannins provide the framework and generate a clenching, mouthdrying finish. Give the tannins several years to unwind. Drink 2023–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Macchiole 2016 Messorio Merlot (Toscana)

Description: Enticing aromas of cassis, black-skinned berry, graphite and eucalyptus take center stage on this Carménère, Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon blend. The concentrated, balanced palate doles out black plum jam, star anise, cocoa and vanilla alongside fine-grained tannins. Enjoy 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Mortelle 2016 Ampio delle Mortelle Red (Toscana)

Description: This savory, full-bodied blend of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Cabernet Franc features enticing aromas of woodland berry, underbrush and star anise. The concentrated, polished palate delivers black currant, licorice, tobacco and a touch of nutmeg alongside fine-grained tannins. Enjoy 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Bolgheri 2017 Bolgheri Superiore

Description: Aromas of black-skinned berry, charred earth and new leather lift out of the glass. The concentrated medium-bodied palate offers dried black cherry, tobacco, star anise and orange zest alongside austere fine-grained tannins and firm acidity. Drink 2023–2032. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Val di Suga 2015 Vigna del Lago (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This blend of Petit Verdot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc features aromas of black-skinned berry, toasted hazelnut and underbrush. The structured palate delivers blackberry jam, toasted oak, licorice and tobacco alongside polished tannins. Enjoy through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Brancaia 2016 Ilatraia Red (Toscana)

Description: Vibrant and delicious, this textbook Rosso has enticing aromas of woodland berry, rose, tobacco and a whiff of eucalyptus. On the smooth, savory palate, polished tannins and bright acidity accompany succulent wild cherry, raspberry compote and licorice. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ciacci Piccolomini d'Aragona 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Delicately scented, this offers alluring aromas of red woodland berry, camphor and a whiff of rosemary in bloom. It's elegant to the point of being ethereal, with an almost gossamer-like texture featuring taut silky tannins that lithely support sour cherry, pomegranate and star anise. Bright acidity keeps it fresh and light on its feet before it finishes on a drying note evoking raw coffee bean. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio di Sotto 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Scorched earth, black-skinned berry and tobacco aromas come together on this. The juicy medium-bodied palate offers fleshy black cherry, clove, cinnamon and white pepper alongside fine-grained, enveloping tannins. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Scopetone 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This blend of Merlot, Cabernet Franc, Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon opens with aromas of black-skinned berry, cedar, plum and clove. The juicy palate offers black-currant jam, licorice and sage alongside velvety tannins. Enjoy through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Macchiole 2017 Bolgheri

Description: This opulent 100% Cabernet Franc opens with inviting aromas of black-skinned berry, bell pepper, graphite and Mediterranean brush. The concentrated, savory palate offers black currant jam, licorice, black pepper and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins. Enjoy through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio al Tesoro 2016 Dedicato a Walter (Bolgheri)

Description: Aromas of black-skinned berry, mocha, blue flower and cedar form the nose on this Merlot and Sangiovese blend. The savory full-bodied palate delivers black currant, clove, espresso and licorice alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frescobaldi 2016 Giramonte Red (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of forest floor, new leather, baked plum and camphor mingle with a whiff of scorched earth in this full-bodied red. It's densely knit and chewy, delivering dried Marasca cherry, raspberry jam, licorice and tobacco framed in velvety tannins. Drink 2022–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Caprili 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Earthy aromas of truffle, scorched soil, tobacco, violet and new leather lead the way. It's full bodied and chewy, doling out mature black cherry, raspberry jam, ground clove and a hint of carob alongside enveloping, close-grained tannins. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Ragnaie 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This big chewy red shows ripe dark-skinned fruit, vanilla and French oak set against accents of underbrush, tobacco leaf, dried herb, licorice and coffee. Firm velvety tannins lend noble support. Thanks to the juicy fruit, the warmth of alcohol is present but doesn't dominate. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mastrojanni 2015 Vigna Schiena d'Asino (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Merlot, this offers aromas of black-skinned berry, green peppercorn and ginger. The concentrated, balanced palate delivers ripe black currant, licorice and black pepper alongside firm, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2021–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guado al Melo 2016 Atis (Bolgheri Superiore)

Description: Aromas reminiscent of fragrant purple flower, woodland berry, eucalyptus and new leather waft out of the glass. Juicy, savory and incredibly easy to drink, the smooth palate features succulent Marasca cherry, raspberry and licorice. Bright acidity and polished tannins keep it fresh and balanced. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Sesta 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Ripe black-skinned berry, leather and scorched earth aromas lead the nose on this structured wine. The concentrated, chewy palate offers mature black cherry, strawberry jam, star anise and black pepper alongside tightly wound tannins that need time to unwind. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lazzeretti 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Forest floor, scorched earth, grilled herb and exotic spice aromas form the nose. On the full-bodied palate, firm fine-grained tannins accompany dried black cherry, orange zest, licorice and a hint of coconut before a warm, rather lean black-tea finish. Drink after 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mastrojanni 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of violet, underbrush and red woodland berry shape the nose. Medium bodied and linear, the vibrant palate offers pomegranate, sour cherry and star anise set against racy acidity and taut, polished tannins that provide support and finesse. Drink through 2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Potazzine 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Leather, ground clove and red-berry aromas lift out of the glass. The bright palate features red cherry, pomegranate and black pepper alongside fresh acidity and fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pinino 2015 Vigna Pinino (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Made with organically grown grapes, this Cabernet Sauvignon opens with inviting aromas of cassis, underbrush and mint. The savory, polished palate features black currant, licorice and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Prelius 2018 Maremma Toscana

Description: Violet, Mediterranean brush and scorched earth aromas lead the nose. The concentrated palate offers black-plum jam, star anise and orange rind set against firm tannins. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cava d'Onice 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This offers aromas of ripe black-skinned berry, scorched earth and leather. The dense palate presents ripe black cherry, tobacco and star anise alongside firm chewy tannins. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Celestino Pecci 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Red berry, crushed mint, camphor and toasted notes aromas form the nose. The austere, linear palate features sour cherry, coffee bean and a hint of clove set against fresh acidity while close-grained, drying tannins leave a grippy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ridolfi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Fragrant purple-flower, ripe plum and baking-spice aromas lead the nose. On the chewy full-bodied palate, tight, velvety tannins accompany succulent black cherry, blackberry and star anise. It's not your typical easygoing Rosso and will offer good mid-term aging. Drink through 2021–2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tassi 2016 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of scorched earth, underbrush and licorice lead the nose along with a whiff of eucalyptus. It's full bodied, offering dried cherry, prune, star anise and a hint of crushed herb alongside solid fine-grained tannins before a warm finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Sesti 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of rose, crushed aromatic herb and wild berry mingle with whiffs of scorched earth. Made with organically farmed grapes, the savory, medium-bodied palate has surprising concentration, doling out juicy black plum, ripe Morello cherry and baking spice alongside rounded, well-integrated tannins. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Pavone 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This Merlot opens with aromas of ripe dark fruit, cedar and mocha. The structured palate reflects the nose, offering ripe blackberry, espresso, coconut and plum jam alongside fine-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rocca di Frassinello 2016 Baffonero (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah and Petit Verdot features alluring aromas evoking cassis, black-skinned berry and underbrush. The concentrated palate offers black plum, tobacco and mocha alongside polished tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Campo alle Comete 2017 Stupore (Bolgheri)

Description: Made with Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot and Sangiovese, this opens with attractive aromas of black-skinned berry, underbrush and graphite. The savory palate offers blackberry jam, tobacco and espresso alongside fine-grained tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Frescobaldi 2016 Mormoreto Red (Toscana)

Description: Made with Cabernet Franc, Cabernet Sauvignon and Carménère, this opens with dark berry, Mediterranean scrub and leather aromas. It's savory and balanced, delivering blackberry-jam, tobacco and cooking-spice flavors alongside fine-grained tannins. Enjoy 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Mortelle 2016 Poggio alle Nane (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This Cabernet Franc opens with dark-skinned berry, bell pepper and tobacco aromas. The savory, balanced palate features juicy black currant, mocha and licorice alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Sette Cieli 2016 Scipio Cabernet Franc (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of mature plum, vanilla, French oak and camphor lift out of the glass. Full bodied and firmly structured, the palate features dried black cherry, prune, licorice and a hint of tobacco leaf set against a backbone of close-grained tannins. Give it several years for the tannins to unwind then drink to enjoy the already mature fruit flavors. Drink after 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Poggione 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of dark-skinned berry, coconut and oak-driven spice shape the nose on this 100% Merlot. Reflecting the nose, the full-bodied palate offers licorice, dried black cherry, espresso and the warmth of evident alcohol. Firm, fine-grained tannins provide the framework. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guado al Tasso 2017 Cont'Ugo (Bolgheri)

Description: Underbrush, red-skinned-berry and tobacco aromas emerge from the glass. The juicy palate offers raspberry jam, orange zest and cinnamon alongside firm tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Fortuna 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc offers aromas of cassis, mocha and graphite. The structured palate presents blackberry jam, star anise and espresso alongside polished tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Caccia al Piano 1868 2016 Levia Gravia (Bolgheri Superiore)

Description: Made with Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, this opens with aromas of black-skinned berry, underbrush and thyme. The juicy, balanced palate presents licorice, blackberry jam and mocha alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink 2021–2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guado al Melo 2017 Rute (Bolgheri)

Description: Fragrant and refined, this lovely red features violet, wild berry, incense and crushed aromatic herb aromas. The bright linear palate offers juicy cherry, cranberry, star anise and a hint of coffee bean alongside silky tannins and nervous acidity. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Fiorita 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Red berry, star anise and menthol aromas mingle together on this savory red. It's full bodied but accessible, doling out ripe black cherry, plum and licorice alongside rounded tannins. Drink now through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Talenti 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of red berries, violet and leather lead the nose on this medium-bodied red. Made entirely with organically grown Ciliegiolo grapes, the juicy palate offers raspberry preserves, clove and cinnamon alongside pliant tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Selva 2015 Maremma Toscana

Description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Syrah opens with aromas of cassis, underbrush and tobacco. The savory, balanced palate offers blackberry, clove and white pepper alongside polished tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guado al Tasso 2018 Il Bruciato (Bolgheri)

Description: This offers aromas of dark-skinned berry, tilled soil and a whiff of new leather. The savory, balanced palate delivers dried black cherry, star anise and tobacco alongside firm, youthfully austere tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Col di Lamo 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Violet, red-berry and new leather aromas shape the nose. It's bright and juicy, offering flavors of red cherry, raspberry jam and white pepper alongside fresh acidity and polished tannins. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Pinino 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Ripe black-skinned berry, violet, underbrush and new leather aromas fill the glass. Full bodied and rounded, the palate offers licorice, spirit-soaked black cherry and tobacco accompanied by close-grained, solid tannins that leave a drying finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Capanna 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: French oak, coconut and fragrant purple-flower aromas lead the nose along with whiffs evoking sunbaked earth. The aromas follow over to the austere palate along with dried cherry and exotic spice framed by close-grained tannins that leave a clenching finish. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salicutti 2015 Teatro (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This opens with aromas of mature dark-skinned fruit, espresso and toasted oak. The dense palate offers sour cherry, ground clove and roasted coffee bean alongside close-grained tannins. Drink 2023–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Val di Suga 2015 Vigna Spuntali (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: A blend of 60% Sangiovese, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon and 20% Merlot, this offers enticing scents of fragrant blue flower, mature black-skinned berry and whiffs of camphor. All about understated elegance, the bright, linear palate features Marasca cherry, red currant and star anise alongside lithe tannins and fresh acidity. It closes on an almond note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Piccini 2016 Sasso al Poggio Red (Toscana)

Description: Made entirely with Alicante, this shows aromas of rose petal, red berry and Mediterranean scrub. The bright palate offers red cherry, star anise and clove alongside velvety tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Mantellassi 2016 Querciolaia (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This organically farmed Sangiovese has aromas of red berry, cedar and cooking spice. The savory palate offers sour cherry, tobacco and toasted oak alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere San Cristoforo 2018 Carandelle (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Aromas of black-skinned berry, violet, Mediterranean brush and leather lead the nose on this Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot blend. The smooth, savory palate offers black currant jam, tobacco and licorice alongside fine-grained tannins. Enjoy through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Bolgheri 2018 Varvàra (Bolgheri Superiore)

Description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, this opens with aromas of mocha, ripe dark-skinned fruit and coconut. The concentrated palate shows toasted oak, roasted coffee bean and blackberry jam alongside firm, fine-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mazzei 2016 Tenuta Belguardo (Maremma Toscana)

Description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc, this leads with aromas of black-skinned berry, bell pepper and Mediterranean brush. The dense palate delivers prune, cassis, licorice and tobacco alongside big, chewy tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio al Tesoro 2016 Sondraia (Bolgheri Superiore)

Description: A blend of Malbec, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, this presents aromas of dark-skinned berry, underbrush and cedar. The dense palate offers toasted oak, black currant jam and licorice set against assertive, rather astringent tannins. You'll also notice the warmth of evident alcohol. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta Sette Cieli 2016 Indaco Red (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of cocoa, sunbaked earth and toasted almond lead the way. It's ripe and chewy, with taut polished tannins that accompany juicy black cherry, raspberry and ground clove. Drink now through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: San Polo 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of ripe fruit, blue flower and leather emerge from the glass. It's savory and surprisingly tangy for the hot vintage, doling out black-cherry jam, orange zest and baking spice alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palazzo 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Scorched earth, new leather, dried botanical herb and mature black-skinned berry aromas slowly emerge in the glass. The full-bodied palate doles out fleshy Marasca cherry, ripe black plum, licorice and dried sage alongside solid but velvety tannins. Showing the heat of the vintage, it's already almost accessible but still offers several years of sipping pleasure. Drink 2022 through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castelli Martinozzi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Made with organically grown Sangiovese, this opens with aromas of dark-skinned berry, tobacco and cooking spice. The savory palate offers black-cherry jam, clove and black pepper alongside polished tannins. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cordella 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Subdued aromas suggesting scorched underbrush, camphor and espresso form the nose. On the muscular, monolithic palate, firm grainy tannins accompany dried cherry, prune, roasted coffee bean, tobacco and the heat of evident alcohol. Give the tannins a few years to unwind then drink sooner rather than later to capture the fruit and remaining freshness. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mastrojanni 2015 Vigna Loreto (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Wild berry, rose, toasted notes and the barest whiff of new leather form the nose on this savory young red. The lithe, linear palate shows juicy Marasca cherry, red plum and baking spice alongside polished tannins. Bright acidity keeps it fresh. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ridolfi 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Made with Cabernet Franc, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot, this full-bodied red features aromas of black-skinned berry, tobacco and new leather. The structured palate offers ripe black plum, licorice and espresso alongside fine-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Biserno 2017 Il Pino Red (Toscana)

Description: Aromas of mature dark berry, cooking spice and toasted oak lead the way on this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Title: Campo alla Sughera 2016 Arnione (Bolgheri Superiore)

Description: Made with organically farmed Sangiovese and Alicante grapes, this opens with inviting scents of red berry, baking spice and white pepper. The juicy, approachable palate offers red cherry, crushed raspberry and clove alongside velvety tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Selva 2018 Maremma Toscana

Description: A blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, this opens with aromas of violet, tobacco and green peppercorn. The savory, youthfully tense palate offers black plum, licorice, toasted oak and mocha alongside fine-grained tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ornellaia 2017 Le Serre Nuove (Bolgheri)

Description: Aromas of cedar, leather and dark-skinned fruit emerge from the glass. The polished palate offers dried black cherry, mocha and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello Romitorio 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Warm and structured, this has aromas evoking scorched earth, underbrush and mature black-skinned berry. On the firm palate, assertive, close-grained tannins accompany dried black cherry, licorice, sage and tobacco while the warmth of alcohol caps off the finish. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Col d'Orcia 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Made with 90% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon and 5% Petit Verdot, this offers aromas of cedar, cassis and violet. Title: Geografico 2016 Contessa di Radda Red (Toscana)
