Title: Casteani 2017 Marujo (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Made with organically farmed Sangiovese, this offers aromas of red berry, leather and Mediterranean brush. The lively, juicy palate features red cherry, crushed raspberry and clove alongside velvety tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria di Magliano 2015 Sinarra (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Aromas of dark-skinned berry, tobacco and a balsamic note of eucalyptus lead the nose. The firm palate offers black plum, licorice and black pepper alongside polished tannins. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Canneta 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: This opens with aromas evoking cassis, ripe black plum and underbrush. The concentrated palate features tobacco, licorice and black-cherry jam alongside chewy tannins and the warmth of alcohol. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Celestino Pecci 2015 Poggio al Carro (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of black-skinned berry, sandalwood and mocha shape the nose on this medium-bodied red. A blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Syrah, the savory palate offers dried black cherry, tobacco and espresso alongside polished tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2016 Magna Cum Laude Red (Toscana)

Description: Iris, underbrush, wild berry and new leather aromas emerge in the glass. The dense, straightforward palate doles out juicy black cherry, mint and licorice while solid but polished tannins and fresh acidity lend support. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: PianCornello 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Enticing scents of fragrant purple flower, perfumed berry and exotic spice shape the nose. Smooth and savory, the elegant, accessible palate features mature black cherry, licorice and orange zest framed in silky tannins. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Scopetone 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Made with 65% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Alicante, 10% Cabernet Franc and 5% Petit Verdot, this opens with aromas evoking dark-skinned berry, underbrush and vanilla. The savory palate offers cassis, mocha and black pepper alongside chewy tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mazzei 2016 Belguardo Tirrenico (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This Merlot opens with aromas of black-skinned fruit, leather and cedar. The savory palate offers ripe black plum, mocha and licorice alongside polished tannins. Drink through 2024. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fertuna 2015 Messiio (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Made entirely with organically grown Sangiovese, this opens with aromas evoking mature red berry, cedar and Mediterranean brush. The juicy palate offers raspberry jam, red cherry and white pepper alongside fresh acidity and pliant tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere San Cristoforo 2018 Amaranto (Maremma Toscana)

Title: Tenuta Moraia 2016 Maremma Toscana

Description: This opens with aromas evoking scorched earth, coconut, toasted notes and balsamic whiffs of camphor. Firm and full bodied, the palate shows dried cherry and exotic spice alongside assertive close-grained tannins that leave a drying grippy finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franco Pacenti–Canalicchio 2015 Rosildo (Brunello di Montalcino)

Title: Terralsole 2015 Vigna Pian Bossolino (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot carries aromas of black-skinned berry, Mediterranean brush and leather. The structured palate features blackberry jam, licorice and mocha alongside polished tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio al Tesoro 2017 Il Seggio (Bolgheri)

Title: Prelius 2015 Prile (Maremma Toscana)

Title: Banfi 2017 Aska (Bolgheri)

Description: Made with organically farmed Sangiovese, this has red-berry, Mediterranean scrub and cooking spice aromas. The juicy, accessible palate offers sour cherry, star anise and white pepper alongside velvety tannins. Enjoy it soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rascioni e Cecconello 2018 Maremmino (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This opens with delicate scents evoking iris, violet, wild berry and whiffs of dried aromatic herb. It's light bodied and agile, with dusty tannins that accompany cranberry, pomegranate and star anise. It's fresh, with tangy acidity. Drink 2021–2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Abbadia Ardenga 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Underbrush, grilled herb, wild berry and blue-flower aromas shape the nose. On the vibrant palate, vigorous acidity and taut fine-grained tannins accompany sour cherry, strawberry and a hint of espresso. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Canalicchio di Sopra 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Syrah, this opens with aromas of ripe dark-skinned fruit, baking spice and toasted oak. The aromas carry over to the straightforward palate along with mocha notes while assertive tannins provide the firm framework. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casa di Terra 2018 Moreccio (Bolgheri)

Description: This opens with subtle aromas suggesting underbrush, wild herb and a whiff of toasted nut. Smooth and juicy, the palate shows ripe Morello cherry, pomegranate and ground clove. It's already accessible thanks to polished tannins and fresh acidity. Enjoy through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Collosorbo 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc has aromas evoking ripe black plum and baking spice. The aromas follow through to the straightforward palate along with licorice and mocha set against solid tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Mortelle 2017 Botrosecco (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This Sangiovese has aromas of ripe black plum and vanilla. The rather evolved palate offers raisin, star anise and coconut alongside pliant tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Montale 2015 Cinque Vigne (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This has aromas suggesting black-skinned fruit, leather and tilled soil. The forward palate delivers black-plum, tobacco and clove alongside chewy tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio dell'Aquila 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Tilled soil, mocha and baked plum aromas lead the nose. The dense palate offers prune, toasted oak and roasted coffee bean alongside grainy tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Magia 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Subdued aromas evoking menthol, scorched earth and cherries marinated in spirits slowly take shape in the glass. The big, one-dimensional palate is dominated by blistering alcohol while notes of dried cherry, game and leather stay muffled in the background. Grainy tannins clench the hot assertive finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lambardi 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Made with Sangiovese and Alicante, this has red-berry, exotic spice and underbrush aromas. The medium-bodied, straightforward palate offers raspberry, clove and sage alongside flexible tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta L'impostino 2016 Ottava Rima (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This blend of Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot has aromas of toasted oak, bell pepper and vanilla. The densely concentrated, monolithic palate offers roasted coffee bean, prune and coconut alongside assertive tannins and the heat of evident alcohol. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Campo al Mare 2016 Baia al Vento (Bolgheri)

Description: Made with Merlot, this opens with aromas of coconut, graphite and mature black plum. Showing the heat of the vintage, the evolved palate presents prune, dark chocolate and roasted coffee bean alongside close-grained tannins. Drink sooner rather than later to capture the remaining fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casa di Terra 2017 Mosaico (Bolgheri)

Description: Underbrush, moist earth, toasted nut and a whiff of violet form the nose. Light bodied and linear, the palate offers cranberry, Marasca cherry and star anise alongside bright acidity and dusty, not very persistent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Innocenti 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas of toasted oak, coconut and baked plum lead the nose. The mature palate offers black-cherry-marinated in spirits, star anise and roasted coffee bean alongside grainy tannins. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: La Rasina 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Subdued aromas of scorched earth, baking spice and dark-skinned fruit slowly emerge from the glass. The straightforward palate offers prune, orange zest and ground clove alongside chewy tannins. It has a rather fleeting finish. Drink after 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Uggiano 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Intense aromas of rose dominate the nose while whiffs of moist soil and wild herb linger in the background. The bright, easygoing palate offers sour cherry, pomegranate and a hint of clove set against vibrant acidity and light tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Paganico 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: A blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, this opens with aromas evoking ripe dark berry, scorched earth and mocha. The aromas carry over to the straightforward palate along with star anise and pliant tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere 7 2018 L'Invidio (Bolgheri)

Description: Blue-flower, wild berry and pine-resin aromas come together in the glass. On the tense, racy palate, nervous acidity accompanies sour cherry and white pepper alongside dusty, drying tannins. Drink through 2022. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Poggione 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc has subdued aromas suggesting mature dark-skinned fruit and cooking spice. The dense palate evokes prune, mocha and toasted oak alongside tightly wound, rather astringent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere Prospero 2016 Bolgheri

Description: Aromas of underbrush, Mediterranean brush and prune form the subdued nose. The ripe, one-dimensional palate suggests raisin, vanilla and orange zest alongside brawny tannins, the heat of alcohol evident. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio Lucina 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Roasted coffee bean, toasted oak and dark-spice aromas lead the nose. The tightly knit palate suggests prune, mocha and dried sage flavors alongside raspy tannins that leave an astringent finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poggio Nardone 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: Made with Sangiovese and Petit Verdot, this easygoing red opens with red fruit, graphite and underbrush aromas. The straightforward palate offers red plum and baking spice alongside smooth tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Santa Lucia 2018 Losco (Maremma Toscana)

Description: Subdued aromas of toasted oak, roasted coffee bean and baked plum slowly emerge from the glass. The warm, one-dimensional palate offers blackberry jam, espresso and a green note evoking powdered sage alongside raspy tannins that leave a rather astringent finish. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Verbena 2015 Le Pope (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Aromas of ripe dark fruit and baking spice lead the way on this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Sangiovese and Merlot. The juicy, straightforward palate offers dried black cherry and hints of star anise alongside pliant tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2017 Centine Red (Toscana)

Description: Wild berry, violet and menthol aromas are front and center on this bright young red. It's easygoing and approachable, offering juicy Marasca cherry and a hint of baking spice alongside soft tannins and vibrant acidity. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Banfi 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Aromas suggesting toasted oak, espresso and tobacco slowly emerge from the glass. The tightly wound palate offers prune, roasted coffee bean and sage alongside close-grained tannins. Drink after 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Madonna Nera 2015 Brunello di Montalcino

Description: The shy nose eventually reveals aromas suggesting cedar, vanilla and tilled soil. The straightforward palate suggests sour cherry, roasted coffee bean and clove alongside dusty, rather fleeting tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rodolfo Cosimi 2015 Terra Rossa (Brunello di Montalcino)

Description: Made with Sangiovese, this easygoing red has subdued aromas of baking spice and red berry. The tangy, simple palate offers sour cherry and clove alongside round tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Mantellassi 2018 Il Canneto (Maremma Toscana)

Description: This has subtle aromas of plum, underbrush, wild herb and a whiff of leather. The light-bodied, easygoing palate offers juicy black cherry and a hint of baking spice alongside loose-knit tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonacchi 2017 Molino del Piano (Rosso di Montalcino)

Description: This straightforward red has subtle aromas evoking moist underbrush, crushed aromatic herb and a whiff of toasted nut. The palate is rather lean and diluted, suggesting sour cherry and a hint of clove alongside firm acidity and dusty, fleeting tannins that leave a mouthdrying close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Voliero 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This opens with aromas of toasted nut and underbrush. On the lean, fleeting palate, vigorous acidity and dusty, drying tannins accompany sour cherry and a hint of dried sage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Camigliano 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This has somewhat muddled aromas of stewed prune, resin and game that carry over to the lean, somewhat diluted palate along with a hint of almond. It has bright acidity while dusty, fleeting tannins offer loose support. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria La Lecciaia 2018 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: This has aromas suggesting cellar floor, tilled soil and a whiff of camphor. On the light-bodied, rather diluted palate, dusty, fleeting tannins accompany dried cherry and a hint of clove. Drink now. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bonacchi 2017 Rosso di Montalcino

Description: Drop-dead gorgeous, this radiant sparkler opens with lovely aromas of white spring flower, pastry dough and white stone fruit. Smooth and silky, the radiant palate delivers Bartlett pear, golden apple, lemon zest and mineral that lead into a bone-dry finish. Small, continuous bubbles provide the silky background while vibrant acidity lends energy and remarkable freshness. It's already fantastic but will continue to age beautifully for years. Drink through 2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' del Bosco 2010 Annamaria Clementi Dosage Zero Riserva (Franciacorta)

Description: Mature black-skinned berry, rose, tilled soil and a balsamic whiff of eucalyptus shape the nose. The bright, elegant palate has energy, tension and depth, delivering ripe wild cherry, red plum, licorice and crushed botanical herb. Taut, fine-grained tannins lend polished support while fresh acidity keeps it balanced. A gorgeous wine. Drink through 2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Ama 2016 Vigneto La Casuccia Gran Selezione (Chianti Classico)

Description: A blend of 80% Sangiovese, 13% Merlot and 7% Malvasia Nera, this opens with aromas of black- and red-skinned berry, pipe tobacco, tilled earth and a whiff of new leather. Elegant and taut, the palate shows tension, verve and finesse, delivering juicy Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and hints of French oak. It's balanced, with polished, fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2021–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Ama 2016 San Lorenzo Gran Selezione (Chianti Classico)

Description: Delicate aromas of citrus zest, red berry, wild herb and bread crust waft out of the glass on this beautiful sparkler. Made entirely with Pinot Nero, the dry, radiant palate boasts structure and finesse, delivering sour cherry, pomegranate, grapefruit and almond alongside crisp acidity. Tiny, continuous bubbles create an elegant perlage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' del Bosco 2010 Annamaria Clementi Rosé Riserva Extra Brut (Franciacorta)
Designation: Annamaria Clementi Rosé Riserva Extra Brut

Description: Aromas of black-skinned fruit, dark spice and sunbaked soil mingle with whiffs of camphor and forest floor on this enticing blend of 80% Sangiovese and 20% Malvasia Nera. The elegant, structured palate delivers black plum, ripe black cherry, star anise and crushed mint while firm, polished tannins provide support and finesse. It's well balanced, with bright acidity, while an earthy hint of game gives the finish depth. Drink 2023–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Ama 2016 Vigneto Bellavista Gran Selezione (Chianti Classico)

Description: A bend of 90% Sangiovese with 10% Canaiolo and Colorino, this opens with enticing aromas of fragrant blue flower, wild berry, exotic spice and a whiff of new leather. Full-bodied and elegant, the smooth, densely woven palate doles out juicy black cherry, licorice, orange zest and a hint of nutmeg set against velvety tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it well balanced. Drink through 2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Poliziano 2016 Asinone (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: New leather, forest-berry and rose aromas shape the enticing nose on this radiant red along with a balsamic whiff of camphor. The firm, elegantly structured palate features ripe Marasca cherry, black raspberry, licorice and crushed mint framed in tightly wound, fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. It's linear and still youthfully austere, with great aging potential. Drink 2023–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salcheto 2016 Vecchie Viti del Salco (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Vibrant, linear and fragrant, this radiant 100% Sangiovese has enticing scents of wild berry, rose, new leather, tobacco and a balsamic whiff of camphor. It's full bodied but boasts a silky-smooth finesse, delivering red cherry, pomegranate and exotic spice alongside polished, elegant tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. Drink 2021–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Boscarelli 2016 Il Nocio (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Fragrant blue flower, crushed aromatic herb and wild berry aromas form the nose on this smooth, full-bodied red. A blend of 90% Sangiovese and 10% Canaiolo Nero, it's savory and loaded with finesse, delivering juicy black cherry, ripe blackberry, truffle and cocoa before a star anise finish. Supple tannins and bright acidity provide seamless support and balance. Drink 2021–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Dei 2016 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Rose, mature red berry and wild herb aromas mingle with a balsamic whiff of eucalyptus. The delicious, polished palate boasts a restrained elegance, delivering juicy Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, star anise and white pepper alongside refined tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced and lends just enough tension. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Ama 2017 Chianti Classico

Description: Varietal aromas of violet, plum and black-skinned berry shape the nose on this fragrant, polished red. On the fresh, delicious palate, velvety tannins accompany juicy wild cherry, crushed raspberry and baking spice. It's nicely balanced, with bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Volpaia 2016 Riserva (Chianti Classico)

Description: Wild berry, blue flower, crushed herb, camphor and a whiff of tobacco mingle together on this vibrant red. Made with 85% Sangiovese as well as Canaiolo, Colorino and Mammolo, the radiant palate is loaded with finesse, delivering raspberry compote, Marasca cherry, licorice and Asian spice. Elegant, fine-grained tannins provide the framework while bright acidity keeps it balanced. Drink 2021–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Boscarelli 2016 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Enveloping and delicious, this full-bodied, velvety red combines power and finesse, starting with inviting aromas of mature black-skinned fruit, new leather, camphor, violet and dark spice. The smooth, concentrated palate almost seems weightless thanks to smooth, tightly knit tannins and fresh acidity that balance ripe plum, mature black cherry, licorice and tobacco. Drink 2022–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Dei 2015 Madonna delle Querce (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Delicate but alluring scents reminiscent of woodland berry, crushed herb, new leather and blue flower float above the glass on this medium-bodied red. Made entirely with Sangiovese, the savory—almost ethereal—palate is all about finesse and freshness, delivering Morello cherry, cranberry, star anise and a smoky note set against vibrant acidity. Polished tannins bestow elegant support. It's incredibly delicious and easy to drink. Enjoy through 2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Molinaccio di Montepulciano 2016 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Made with organically farmed Sangiovese, this presents aromas of violet, red berry, leather and a whiff of mint. The bright, elegant palate delivers juicy red cherry, star anise and tobacco alongside fresh acidity and firm, refined tannins. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Istine 2017 Vigna Casanova dell'Aia (Chianti Classico)

Description: This silky, structured sparkler opens with aromas of bread crust, pastry cream, orange zest and red berry. Round creamy and elegant, the vibrant palate delivers pomegranate, yellow apple, lemon drop and white almond alongside a creamy perlage. Fresh acidity lifts the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' del Bosco 2010 Vintage Collection Dosage Zero Noir Riserva (Franciacorta)
Designation: Vintage Collection Dosage Zero Noir Riserva

Description: This 100% Sangiovese boasts enticing scents of fragrant purple flower, new leather, black-skinned berry, star anise and a balsamic whiff of camphor. Smooth and elegant, the vibrant palate offers succulent black cherry, raspberry compote, licorice and cinnamon alongside taut, fine-grained tannins. Thanks to high vineyard altitudes, it has great freshness and balance for the scorching vintage. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Castello di Albola 2016 Solatio Gran Selezione (Chianti Classico)

Description: Fragrant purple flower, ripe plum, new leather and camphor are just some of the aromas you'll find on this earthy, elegant red. Made with organically farmed Sangiovese, the velvety, medium-bodied palate delivers ripe black cherry, blackberry, licorice and tobacco. It's still a bit austere, with tightly knit, fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity so give it another year or two to fully unwind. Drink 2021 through 2033. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Romeo 2013 Lipitiresco (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Aromas of beeswax, yellow wild flower, stone fruit and honey form the delicate nose, along with the barest whiff of petrol. Smooth, enveloping and savory, the palate offers mature apricot, yellow peach, lemon zest and honeyed nut before a saline finish. Fresh acidity lifts the finish. It's already delicious but hold for even more complexity. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Roagna 2017 Derthona Montemarzino Timorasso (Vino Bianco d'Italia)
Country: Vino Bianco d'Italia, Italy Other, Italy

Description: Mature black-skinned berry aromas mingle with balsamic whiffs of eucalyptus, new leather and a hint of violet. Taut and linear, the elegant palate delivers ripe Marasca cherry, brown spice, exotic incense and a minty finish. It's balanced, with fresh acidity. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Felsina 2016 Rancia Riserva (Chianti Classico)

Description: Elegant and fresh, this lovely sparkler features enticing scents of white stone fruit, spring wild flower and bread crust. On the bright, bone-dry palate, tangy acidity and a creamy perlage accompany ripe pear, mature yellow apple and a lemon note before a mineral finish. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' del Bosco 2015 Vintage Collection Dosage Zero (Franciacorta)

Description: Made from 100% Corvina, this structured, velvety red opens with enticing aromas of black-skinned berry, cedar and tobacco. The full-bodied, balanced palate offers blackberry jam, Morello cherry, licorice and black pepper alongside fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2021–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Allegrini 2013 La Poja Corvina (Veronese)

Description: A blend of 85% Chardonnay and 15% Pinot Bianco, this polished sparkler offers heady aromas evoking field flower, white stone fruit and a whiff of baked bread. Mirroring the nose, the creamy palate doles out yellow apple, white peach, baking spice and pastry dough alongside a silky perlage before a candied lemon-drop close. Fresh acidity brightens the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' del Bosco 2015 Vintage Collection Satén (Franciacorta)

Description: Enticing aromas of iris, red berry and pine forest are front and center on this stunning red. Made with organically grown Sangiovese, the structured palate is surprisingly fresh for the hot vintage, offering succulent red cherry, raspberry jam, clove and cinnamon alongside fine-grained tannins and tangy acidity. Drink 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Istine 2017 Vigna Istine (Chianti Classico)

Description: Aromas of wild berry, pipe tobacco, mint and eucalyptus shape the nose along with whiffs of French oak. On the linear, elegantly structured palate, tightly knit, fine-grained tannins wrap around ripe black cherry, red currant, star anise and toast. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi Antinori 2015 Villa Antinori Riserva (Chianti Classico)

Description: This fragrant red offers enticing scents of forest berry, iris, violet and a balsamic whiff of eucalyptus. Linear and elegant, the taut palate features raspberry, pomegranate, star anise and a white-pepper note alongside fine-grained tannins. It's vibrant and balanced, with an orange zest finish. Drink 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Gracciano della Seta 2016 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Floral aromas of violet and rose mingle with underbrush and ripe black-skinned fruit on the 100% Sangiovese. Polished and linear, the savory palate delivers juicy black cherry, raspberry, licorice and tobacco while smooth tannins offer elegant support. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced and bright. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Bèrne 2016 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Aromas of truffle, underbrush, baked plum and a whiff of cocoa form the nose. Reflecting the nose, the taut, medium-bodied palate shows ripe black cherry, prune, dark chocolate and a hint of wild herb before a tight licorice close. Fine-grained tannins lend polished support. Best 2021–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Il Molinaccio di Montepulciano 2015 La Poiana Riserva (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: This smooth 100% Sangiovese, made with organically farmed grapes, features intense aromas of mature dark-skinned berry, sunbaked earth and new leather. The fragrant, savory palate doles out ripe red cherry, crushed raspberry, star anise and tangerine zest alongside velvety tannins. Drink 2021–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Istine 2017 Vigna Cavarchione (Chianti Classico)

Description: Alluring aromas of cranberry, pomegranate and oak-driven spice shape the nose. The aromas follow through to the elegant, savory palate along with vanilla, star anise and a hint of coconut while bright acidity and supple tannins provide support and finesse. Drink 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Marchesi Antinori 2016 Marchese Antinori Tenuta Tignanello Riserva (Chianti Classico)

Description: Made with 85% Sangiovese, 10% Merlot and 5% Colorino, this opens with alluring aromas that evoke iris, dark-skinned berry, sunbaked earth and leather. The structured palate delivers dried black cherry, cranberry jam, licorice and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Enjoy 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ruffino 2015 Riserva Ducale Oro Gran Selezione (Chianti Classico)

Description: Aromas of exotic spice and black plum mingle with notes of wild herb and a whiff of oak. On the tight elegant palate, firm close-grained tannins support red cherry, pomegranate, chopped mint and star anise while bright acidity lends balance. It's still youthfully austere so give it time to fully develop. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Felsina 2016 Berardenga Riserva (Chianti Classico)

Description: Made with organically grown grapes and without added sulfites, this opens with aromas of wild berry, violet, tobacco and botanical herb. The elegant, austere palate offers black cherry, pomegranate and star anise alongside taut, refined tannins. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monteraponi 2017 Chianti Classico

Description: Aromas of rose, new leather, red berry and wild herb shape the nose. The linear, racy palate shows finesse and energy, delivering red cherry, pomegranate, licorice, French oak and roasted coffee bean set against vibrant acidity and tightly wound, fine-grained tannins. It's still youthfully austere and needs time to unwind and fully develop. Drink 2024–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Boscarelli 2016 Costa Grande (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Inviting aromas of blueberry, graphite and leather emerge from the glass. The concentrated, elegant palate delivers dried black cherry, tobacco and black pepper alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink now through 2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cotarella 2014 RC2 Red (Umbria)

Description: Yellow spring flower, pear and crushed stone aromas lift out of the glass. On the rounded, medium-bodied palate, bright acidity and a marked mineral note of saline accompany yellow apple, white peach and lemon drop. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Decugnano dei Barbi 2018 Villa Barbi (Orvieto Classico)

Description: The shy nose slowly reveals Mediterranean scrub, citrus and a whiff of Spanish broom. The aromas give way to the linear palate offering sour cherry, citrus and a fennel note alongside fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cavicchioli 2018 Vigna del Cristo (Lambrusco di Sorbara)
Country: Lambrusco di Sorbara, Central Italy, Italy

Description: Red-berry, rose and crushed herb aromas mingle with scents of dark spice and a whiff of leather on this elegant, understated red. Vibrant and linear, the medium-bodied palate shows energy and finesse, delivering raspberry, strawberry compote and star anise set against bright acidity. It closes on mineral note evoking rusty iron while taut, fine-grained tannins provide a polished framework. Drink 2022–2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Salcheto 2016 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: A blend of Sangiovese, Colorino and Mammolo, this racy red opens with earthy aromas of purple flower, mature plum, moist soil and botanical herb. Ethereally elegant, the sleek, savory palate offers juicy Marasca cherry, orange zest, star anise and hint of game alongside supple tannins. Bright acidity keeps it fresh and balanced. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Romeo 2018 Due Fratellired (Rosso di Montepulciano)

Description: Delicate aromas of mature wild berry mingle with fragrant blue flower, dark spice and balsamic notes on this polished red. On the savory, elegant palate, supple tannins accompany ripe black cherry, juicy blackberry and licorice. It's surprisingly fresh for the hot vintage. Enjoy through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Valiano 2015 Poggio Teo (Chianti Classico)

Description: A blend of 90% Corvina Veronese and 10% Oseleta, this offers aromas of black-skinned berry, tobacco and roasted coffee bean. The full-bodied, balanced palate delivers ripe black plum, licorice and black pepper alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Allegrini 2016 La Grola Red (Veronese)

Description: Aromas suggesting prune, leather, scorched soil and oak-driven spice lead the way. The enveloping, savory palate is fresher than the nose, delivering juicy Morello cherry, ripe blackberry, tobacco and licorice framed in smooth, velvety tannins. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE

Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

KERIN O’KEEFE

Title: Cantina Valpantena 2016 Torre del Falasco (Valpolicella Ripasso)

Description: Packaged in an extremely heavy bottle, this has aromas evoking sawdust, oak, licorice, dried herb and citrus zest. The medium-bodied palate is lean on fruit richness, offering prune, star anise and orange rind alongside dusty, not very persistent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria del Cerro 2015 Antica Chiusina (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: This has aromas evoking ripe black plum, tobacco and graphite. The forward palate offers raisin, coconut and cocoa alongside smooth tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Santi 2016 Solane (Valpolicella Ripasso Classico)

Description: Underbrush, game, violet and wild berry aromas are front and center. Reflecting the nose, the lean, light-bodied palate shows wild cherry, crushed herb and gamy notes alongside dusty, not very persistent tannins before a rather green, astringent finish evoking powdered sage. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vecchia Cantina di Montepulciano 2016 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: This offers aromas of dark-skinned fruit and cedar while the dense palate shows raisin, tobacco and cooking spice. Assertive tannins leave a firm, drying close. Drink soon to catch the remaining fruit flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ca' Rugate 2017 Campo Lavei (Valpolicella Superiore)

Description: Aromas of ripe black-skinned fruit and cooking spice emerge from the glass. The smooth palate offers prune, tobacco and a hint of white pepper alongside round tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Valpantena 2016 Torre del Falasco Red

Description: This opens with aromas of red berry, exotic spice a whiff of underbrush. The medium-bodied, straight-forward palate delivers mature red cherry, cinnamon and a hint of star anise alongside rounded tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cesari 2017 Rajo (Valpolicella Ripasso)

Description: Subdued aromas suggesting cooking spice and black plum slowly emerge from the glass. The straightforward palate evokes prune, mocha and almond alongside smooth tannins. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Delibori 2017 Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso
Country: Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso, Veneto, Italy

Description: Aromas of toasted oak, dark fruit and cooking spice lift out of the glass. The taut palate offers ripe black plum, mocha and vanilla alongside tightly wound tannins. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: I Saltari 2013 Valpolicella Superiore

Description: This has earthy aromas suggesting ripe black plum and tilled soil. On the straightforward palate, firm tannins accompany black-currant jam and clove. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ilatium Morini 2015 Campo Prognai (Valpolicella)

Description: This shows aromas of new leather, toasted oak and a balsamic note. The firm palate offers prune, fig and clove alongside close-grained tannins. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monte Santoccio 2017 Valpolicella Classico Superiore

Description: Delicate aromas of red berry and clove lift out of the glass. On the tangy, straightforward palate, fresh acidity and smooth tannins offset raspberry and ground pepper notes. Enjoy soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: SalvaTerra 2018 Campocroce (Valpolicella)

Description: Fruity aromas of wild berry follow over to the slender, light-bodied palate along with sour cherry, orange zest and a hint of white pepper. It's bright and easy drinking, with fresh acidity and pliant tannins. Drink now. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Trerose 2018 Salterio (Rosso di Montepulciano)

Description: Smooth and easygoing, this has aromas and flavors of ripe black-skinned berry and ground clove. It's light bodied and fresh, with bright acidity and agile tannins. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Valdipiatta 2018 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: Aromas of rose, leather and cassis are front and center. On the light-bodied, straightforward palate, dusty, fleeting tannins accompany black currant, sour cherry and a hint of bell pepper. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vecchia Cantina di Montepulciano 2016 Poggio Stella (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: This has earthy aromas of underbrush, toasted hazelnut, leather and a whiff of blue flower. The palate is also on the earthy side, offering overripe plum Morello cherry and ground clove set against dusty, rather fleeting tannins. It closes on a gamy note. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Casale Daviddi 2016 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: Subdued aromas of ripe dark fruit and cooking spice eventually take shape. The straightforward palate shows blackberry jam, vanilla and a clove note alongside smooth tannins. Drink through 2021. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Costa Arènte 2017 Valpolicella Ripasso Valpantena

Description: Subtle aromas of dark fruit and baking spice form the restrained nose. It's straightforward, offering blackberry jam, tobacco and a hint of clove alongside smooth tannins. Enjoy soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Costa Arènte 2018 Costa Arente (Valpolicella)

Description: Delicate aromas of ripe dark fruit and tobacco lead the nose. The straightforward palate offers prune, mocha and vanilla alongside loose-knit tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Domìni Veneti 2016 Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso
Country: Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso, Veneto, Italy

Description: The shy nose eventually reveals aromas suggesting dried dark fruit and baking spice. The straightforward palate offers prune, clove and cedar alongside round tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tommasi 2016 Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso
Country: Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso, Veneto, Italy

Description: Rather subdued but varietal aromas suggesting crushed tomato vine and grapefruit mingle with a whiff of graphite. The aromas follow over to the lean, light-bodied palate along with a hint of pineapple. It's simple but fresh, with tangy acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Masseria Frattasi 2018 SVG920 Sauvignon (Vino Bianco d'Italia)
Country: Vino Bianco d'Italia, Italy Other, Italy

Description: This opens with ripe dark-skinned berry and fig aromas. The scents carry over to the simple palate along with evolved tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Montresor 2016 Capitel della Crosara (Valpolicella Ripasso)

Description: This opens with subtle aromas of white stone fruit, chamomile and a whiff of resin. On the palate, brisk acidity and vigorous bubbles frame medicinal herb, citrus rind and yellow-apple skin. It closes on a bitter-walnut note. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tenuta di Angoris NV Metodo Classico 1684 Chardonnay (Vino Spumante)

Description: This light-bodied, racy red has fruity aromas of red berry that carry over to the simple palate along with a suggestion of star anise. Bright acidity and dusty tannins offer light support. Drink now. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vecchia Cantina di Montepulciano 2018 Redi (Rosso di Montepulciano)

Description: Soft and simple, this informal red offers flavors suggesting fleshy black cherry and a hint of clove. Pliant tannins offer light support. Drink now. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antico Colle 2017 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: This has aromas of French oak, bell pepper and cooking spice. On the taut palate, close-grained tannins accompany raisin, vanilla and a touch of mocha. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Adami 2016 Valpolicella Superiore

Description: Aromas evoking cassis and a whiff of star anise form the nose. The aromas follow over to the light-bodied palate along with hints of bell pepper and dusty tannins that leave a drying close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Del Cerro 2018 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: Aromas of mature black-skinned berry, dried herb and tobacco lead the nose. The full-bodied palate offers cherries marinated in spirts and licorice set against fine-grained tannins. You'll also notice the heat of alcohol on the close. Drink sooner rather than later. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Montemercurio 2017 Petaso (Rosso di Montepulciano)

Description: This simple red offers red berry and whiffs of dark spice that carry over to the light-bodied palate. It's simple and bright, with fresh acidity and dusty tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vecchia Cantina di Montepulciano 2018 Poggio Stella (Rosso di Montepulciano)

Description: Aromas of ripe dark fruit, baking spice and vanilla slowly emerge from the glass. The simple palate evokes black-cherry jam, espresso and vanilla alongside round tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villabella 2017 Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso
Country: Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso, Veneto, Italy

Description: Red berry, blue flower and a whiff of aromatic herb aromas escape the glass. On the easygoing palate, bright acidity and relaxed, rather dusty tannins accompany dried cherry and a hint of clove. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Le Bèrne 2018 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: The nose is rather shy but eventually releases earthy aromas of grilled herb and dark fruit that follow over to the rather lean palate along with clove. It's easy drinking, with somewhat fleeting tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Acinum 2018 Valpolicella

Description: Initially closed, the shy nose eventually suggests sour berry, wild herb and new leather. It's lean and astringent, offering unripe sour cherry, prune and a green note of powdered sage alongside dusty, fleeting tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Svetoni 2016 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: The shy nose eventually reveals baking spice and ripe dark-skinned fruit. The informal palate offers prune and mocha alongside round tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Giusti 2017 Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso
Country: Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso, Veneto, Italy

Description: Aromas of French oak and a whiff of cellar floor waft out of the glass along with coconut notes. Reflecting the nose, the full-bodied palate is dominated by French oak, toasted and licorice notes that stifle suggestions of prune and raisin while astringent tannins clench the finish. Despite the assertive, mouthdrying tannins, drink sooner rather than later to capture the remaining fruit. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Icario 2015 Vitaroccia Riserva (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Aromas suggesting weedy underbrush, leather, violet and black-skinned fruit form the subtle nose. The light-bodied palate offers dried cherry, celery and a hint of espresso alongside buffed, not very persistent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Metinella 2015 142-4 (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Aromas of plum, blue flower, weedy underbrush and camphor lift out of the glass. On the lean, rather diluted palate, you'll find suggestions of blueberry, prune and a hint of vanilla before the abrupt, drying finish. Dusty, fleeting tannins provide loose support. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Vecchia Cantina di Montepulciano 2015 Poggio Stella Riserva (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: Aromas of French oak, mint and blue flower lead the nose. The lean palate offers coconut, espresso and sour cherry alongside rather astringent tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Villa S. Anna 2016 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: This opens with aromas of ripe dark-skinned fruit, toasted oak and a whiff of tobacco. The rather simple palate offers blackberry jam, vanilla and coconut alongside smooth tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Bellora 2017 Gianni Bellora (Valpolicella Ripasso)

Description: Subdued aromas suggesting prune, vanilla and bell pepper carry over to the evolved palate along with toasted oak. Assertive tannins clench the lean finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Corte Adami 2016 Red

Description: This simple red offers aromas of red fruit and baking spice while the tangy, light-bodied palate evokes black raspberry and clove. It's easy drinking, with pliant tannins. Drink soon.11/29/19 KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Ilatium Morini 2017 Valpolicella

Description: Made with 90% Sangiovese and 10% Canaiolo, this opens with aromas of tilled soil, mature dark-skinned berry and a whiff of violet. It's easy drinking, with juicy Marasca cherry and white pepper notes alongside agile tannins. Drink through 2020. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Metinella 2017 Rossodisera (Rosso di Montepulciano)

Description: Red berry and underbrush aromas carry over to the light-bodied palate along with dried red cherry and clove. It's simple, with pliant tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Monte Santoccio 2018 Valpolicella Classico

Description: Made predominantly with Sangiovese, this has subdued aromas suggesting violet and a whiff of dark-skinned berry. The robust but simple palate delivers dried cherry and star anise. Drink now. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Peppucci 2017 Petroro 4 Red (Umbria)

Description: The shy nose eventually suggests prune and baking spice. The aromas carry over to the simple palate along with hints of bitter almond and espresso. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rock 2017 Italians (Valpolicella Ripasso)

Description: Crushed herb, red berry and a whiff of violet shape the subtle nose on this light-bodied red. On the simple, rather diluted palate, firm acidity and dusty tannins accompany suggestions of sour cherry and star anise. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fattoria Svetoni 2018 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: This has earthy aromas recalling forest floor, leather, violet and tobacco. It's light bodied and simple, offering suggestions of woodland berry and clove alongside dusty, fleeting tannins before an abrupt close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Duca di Saragnano 2016 Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: This has subdued aromas evoking prune and an earthy note of weedy underbrush. The simple, light-bodied palate offers sour cherry and a hint of toasted hazelnut alongside loose-knit, rather fleeting tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tommasi 2016 Rafaèl (Valpolicella Classico Superiore)

Description: This opens with aroma of dried cherry and white pepper. The aromas carry over to the simple, light-weight palate along with soft tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Delibori 2018 Valpolicella Classico

Description: Aromas of moist underbrush, plum cake and game take shape in the glass. The palate is on the lean side and rather diluted, evoking raw cranberry, powdered sage and a hint of unroasted coffee bean alongside grainy, fleeting tannins that leave an abrupt, astringent close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mettinella 2016 Burberosso (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
Country: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy

Description: A blend of 80% Sangiovese and 20% Merlot, this informal red has aromas suggesting iris and ripe berry. The simple palate evokes black cherry and a hint of coffee alongside dusty, fleeting tannins that dry out the abrupt close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Lombardo 2017 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: This light-bodied red has flavors of dried cherry, ground black pepper and a hint of clove. It's simple and informal, with easygoing tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cantina Valpantena 2018 Torre del Falasco (Valpolicella)

Description: This has aromas of sour cherry and clove that carry over to the diluted palate. It's extremely simple, with fleeting tannins. Drink soon. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Antica Corte 2018 Valpolicella

Description: This has earthy aromas of game, used leather and damp underbrush. It's extremely rustic, showing flavors evoking dried cherry, bitter sage and a hint of barnyard set against grainy, fleeting tannins. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Duca di Saragnano 2018 Rosso di Montepulciano

Description: Boasting structure, elegance and complexity, this compelling wine opens with aromas of wild berry, Mediterranean scrub, new leather and a whiff of tilled earth. Smooth and enveloping, the radiant palate shows a great depth of flavors including juicy red cherry, crushed strawberry and licorice offset by an energizing mineral tension. It's impeccably balanced, with taut, refined tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2021–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palari 2014 Faro

Description: Red-berry, wild herb, Mediterranean brush and eucalyptus aromas are front and center on this fragrant, gorgeous red. The radiant palate delivers red currant, red cherry, exotic spice and crushed mint alongside elegant fine-grained tannins. It's beautifully balanced, with bright acidity. Classy and delicious. Drink through 2031. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palari 2016 Rosso del Soprano Red (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Intensely fragrant, this has aromas of underbrush, Mediterranean scrub, woodland berry, carob and exotic incense. The palate is all about elegance and energy, delivering red currant, pomegranate, orange zest, star anise and French oak alongside polished fine-grained tannins before a saline close. It's already tempting but hold to let it fully integrate and develop even more complexity. Drink through 2033. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palari 2013 Faro

Description: This compelling wine opens with enticing aromas of smoke, flint, dark berry, rose and Mediterranean scrub. It's loaded with elegance and intriguing mineral tension, delivering morello cherry, cranberry, star anise, thyme and graphite set against taut fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Rocca Coeli 2015 Rosso (Etna)

Description: Rose-petal, botanical herb, camphor, dark-spice and wild red-berry aromas all mingle together on this enticingly fragrant wine. Reflecting the nose, the linear, vibrant palate delivers crushed strawberry, juicy sour cherry, star anise and white pepper alongside a mineral note evoking graphite. It's balanced and loaded with finesse and tension, with bright acidity and taut, polished tannins. Give it time and you'll be rewarded with even more complexity. Drink 2022–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colombera & Garella 2015 Pizzaguerra (Lessona)

Description: Made from 100% dried Zibibbo grapes, this classic dessert wine offers intense aromas of mature apricot, chestnut honey and orange marmalade. The fresh, balanced palate doles out ripe fig, date, lemon jam, tangerine zest and a touch of bergamot that persist into the long lingering finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Donnafugata 2016 Ben Ryè (Passito di Pantelleria)
Country: Passito di Pantelleria, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Enticing scents of wild berry, blue flower, exotic spice and Mediterranean scrub shape the nose. Elegantly structured, the polished palate delivers blackberry, black cherry, licorice and crushed mint alongside a backbone of smooth, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Planeta 2015 Noto Santa Cecilia Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)

Description: Wild berry, new leather, smoke and balsamic notes of eucalyptus shape the nose on this fragrant red. The smoky note carries over to the racy, youthfully austere palate along with Marasca cherry, pomegranate, flint and ground clove. It's ethereally elegant, with mineral tension and a backbone of firm acidity. Tight fine-grained tannins keep it balanced. Drink 2024–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guastaferro 2014 Primum (Taurasi)

Description: Balsamic aromas of camphor mingle with mature black-skinned fruit, underbrush, leather, wet stone and oak-driven spice. On the elegantly structured, vibrant palate, firm acidity and tightly wound but polished tannins frame sour cherry, cranberry, licorice and tobacco. Drink 2021–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2014 Studi Rosamilla (Taurasi)

Description: Exotic spice, rose, eucalyptus and red-berry aromas are front and center on this perfumed red. It's loaded with finesse and tension, delivering Marasca cherry, cranberry, licorice and clove while a mineral note evoking rusty iron (and that's a good thing) adds depth to the finish. Firm acidity and tightly knit fine-grained tannins provide structure and balance. Drink 2021–2033. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Travaglini 2013 Tre Vigne Nebbiolo (Coste della Sesia)

Description: Taut and linear, this opens with aromas of red berry, pipe tobacco and eucalyptus. The firm, elegantly structured palate delivers sour cherry, cassis, star anise and a hint of smoke before finishing on an accent of coffee. Taut, fine-grained tannins provide the framework. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2015 Serpico (Taurasi)

Description: Aromas of wild berry, violet and dark spice mingle with earthy notes of truffle and a hint of game. On the savory palate, bright acidity accompanies juicy morello cherry, black raspberry and star anise along with a hint of eucalyptus. Polished tannins provide lithe support. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Michele Chiarlo 2016 Cipressi (Nizza)

Description: Aromas of black-skinned fruit, menthol and exotic spice shape the nose. On the taut, elegant palate, fresh acidity and velvety tannins accompany black cherry, blackberry, licorice and tobacco. It closes on a mocha note. Drink through 2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Michele Chiarlo 2016 La Court (Nizza)

Description: Wild berry, blue-flower, French oak and exotic spice aromas lead the way along with a whiff of eucalyptus. The linear, structured palate is still youthfully austere, offering cranberry, pomegranate, orange zest and star anise along with hints of coconut and coffee bean. Taut, close-grained tannins and vibrant acidity provide the framework. Drink 2022–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2014 Studi Candriano (Taurasi)

Description: Carob, blackberry and camphor aromas shape the nose on this young, vibrant red. It's smooth and silky, delivering raspberry compote, eucalyptus and hazelnut set against polished tannins and bright acidity. A saline note caps off the close. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Curto 2014 Fontanelle Nero d'Avola (Eloro)

Description: Enticing aromas of ripe dark-skinned fruit, fragrant purple flower, Mediterranean scrub and dark spice escape the glass. On the firmly structured palate, taut fine-grained tannins accompany Marasca cherry, cassis, tobacco and star anise. The assertive finish closes on a note of roasted coffee bean. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argiolas 2015 Turriga Red (Isola dei Nuraghi)
Country: Isola dei Nuraghi, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Mature dark-skinned berry, new leather, eucalyptus and star anise aromas lift out of the glass along with a whiff of rose. Firmly structured, the tense, medium-bodied palate delivers morello cherry, cranberry, orange zest and licorice set against a backbone of firm, refined tannins. Bright acidity keeps it balanced. It's still youthfully austere and needs time fully develop. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Colombera & Garella 2015 Bramaterra

Description: Scorched soil, leather, mature black-skinned fruit and Mediterranean scrub are just some of the aromas you'll find on this blend of Nero d'Avola and Perricone. The enveloping, full-bodied palate delivers ripe blackberry, black cherry, black spice and dried herb alongside firm, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2020–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tasca d'Almerita 2015 Rosso del Conte Red (Contea di Sclafani)
Country: Contea di Sclafani, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: Aromas of Spanish broom, yellow stone fruit and chamomile lift out of the glass along with a whiff of toasted nut. The linear palate offers yellow peach, ripe pear honeyed almond and a mineral finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2016 Studi Campo Aperto (Fiano di Avellino)
Country: Fiano di Avellino, Southern Italy, Italy

Description: Honeysuckle, yellow-peach and botanical herb aromas lift out of the glass. On the foaming, savory palate, crisp acidity lifts nectarine, apricot, orange zest and thyme. It's incredibly delicious. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Saracco 2018 Moscato d'Asti

Description: Raspberry-compote and fruitcake aromas mingle with balsamic notes of eucalyptus. The aromas follow through to the enveloping, full-bodied palate together with licorice, baking spice, toasted almond and pipe tobacco before an iron finish. Velvety tannins give it a creamy elegance. Drink through 2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Travaglini 2014 Il Sogno Nebbiolo (Piemonte)

Description: Mature dark-skinned berry, tobacco and a whiff of new leather lead the nose on this smooth, medium-bodied red. On the chewy palate, polished tannins accompany dried Marasca cherry, cassis and ground black pepper. Drink through 2023. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2017 Dal Re Aglianico (Irpinia)

Description: Underbrush, black-skinned fruit, new leather and balsamic aromas are front and center on this full-bodied red. It's smooth and enveloping, offering prune, ripe black cherry, tobacco and licorice alongside polished tannins. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Fiorentino 2014 Taurasi

Description: This opens with enticing aromas of red berry, leather and underbrush. The structured, elegant palate offers red cherry, tobacco and star anise alongside youthfully austere but fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2023–2033. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Scarpa 2015 Tettineive (Barbaresco)

Description: Spring blossom, ripe yellow stone fruit and Mediterranean herb aromas mingle together in the glass. Full-bodied and fresh, the elegantly structured palate doles out mature apricot, tangerine zest and lemon drop before a graphite finish. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Argiolas 2018 Is Argiolas (Vermentino di Sardegna)
Country: Vermentino di Sardegna, Sicily & Sardinia, Italy

Description: A blend of Petit Verdot and Cesanese d'Affile, this opens with aromas of Mediterranean brush, toasted oak, mature black plum and exotic spice. The densely concentrated, jammy palate offers dried blackberry, coconut, orange zest and tobacco alongside enveloping, fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2028. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Franchetti 2017 Red (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Aromas evoking Mediterranean scrub, scorched earth, mature berry and wild herb shape the nose. Firm but elegantly structured, the palate delivers dried Marasca cherry, red currant, thyme and star anise set against taut fine-grained tannins. Drink 2021–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Palari 2012 Santa Nè Red (Terre Siciliane)

Description: Made with 85% Nebbiolo and 15% Vespolina, this fragrant red opens with enticing scents of wild herb, red berry, menthol, forest floor and sandalwood. Traditionally crafted, the austere palate boasts an earthy elegance, delivering juicy sour cherry, pomegranate, white pepper and a hint of game alongside bright acidity and polished tannins. Drink through 2026. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Mirù 2011 Cavenago (Ghemme)

Description: Crushed herb, mature dark-skinned berry, star anise and balsamic notes of camphor lead the way. Made with 70% Nebbiolo, 20% Vespolina and 10% Uva Rara, the austere palate offers dried cherry, orange zest, licorice and dried sage. It's linear and austere, with tightly knit tannins and firm acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Podere ai Valloni 2011 Vigna Cristiana (Boca)

Description: Aromas of citrus blossom, thyme and yellow stone fruit almost jump out of the glass on this fragrant, foaming wine. The rich, creamy palate doles out white peach, apricot, candied orange slice and crushed aromatic herb alongside a tangy mineral note. Crisp acidity lifts the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Saracco 2018 D'Autunno (Moscato d'Asti)

Description: This opens with aromas of prune, pressed violet, leather and molten chocolate. The rounded, accessible palate doles out dried black cherry, truffle, cassis, star anise and tobacco set against polished, fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Di Meo 2012 Vino Blu Riserva (Taurasi)

Description: Mature black-skinned berry, sunbaked earth, leather and pressed blue-flower aromas form the delicate but enticing nose along with balsamic whiffs of eucalyptus. On the linear palate, lithe, fine-grained tannins support dried cherry, cranberry, star anise and sanguine notes. It closes on a note of dried herb. Drink through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Guastaferro 2015 Memini Aglianico (Irpinia)

Description: Smooth and savory, this polished red has an enticing nose showing black-skinned berry, wild mint, blue flower and culinary spice. The juicy palate delivers ripe Marasca cherry, red currant, star anise and white pepper set against taut, refined tannins. Enjoy through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tasca d'Almerita 2017 Guarnaccio Perricone (Sicilia)

Description: Inviting aromas of dried fruit pineapple and apricot mingle with delicate whiffs of white rose. The round palate offers vanilla, marmalade and candied lemon slice while fresh acidity lends balance and lifts the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Tasca d'Almerita 2018 Capofaro Malvasia (Salina)

Description: Aromas of rose, woodland berry, leather and forest floor mingle with whiffs of camphor on this fragrant, medium-bodied red. The elegantly structured, balanced palate has nice tension fueled by bright acidity and iron notes that accompany ripe cherry, raspberry, licorice and a hint of baking spice. Taut fine-grained tannins provide firm, polished support. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Travaglini 2015 Nebbiolo (Coste della Sesia)

Description: Made from dried Moscato grapes, this opens with heady aromas of marmalade, ripe apricot and jasmine. The aromas follow through to the balanced palate alongside pistachio, vanilla and fresh acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
Title: Cusumano 2012 Moscato dello Zucco Moscato (Sicilia)

Description: Made with organically farmed Nero d'Avola, this offers compelling aromas of mature dark-skinned berry, new leather and underbrush. The savory, structured palate delivers ripe black cherry, star anise and crushed mint set alongside lithe, polished tannins and fresh acidity. Enjoy through 2025. KERIN O’KEEFE
